title: 湖南省命名首批铸牢中华民族共同体意识研究基地
text:
日前，湖南省民宗委在自愿申报、综合考察和严格评审的基础上，命名中共湖南省委党校（湖南行政学院）、湖南省社会主义学院、湖南师范大学、湖南科技大学、吉首大学、湖南工商大学、湖南女子学院为湖南省首批铸牢中华民族共同体意识研究基地。
命名首批铸牢中华民族共同体意识研究基地是湖南贯彻落实中央和省委民族工作会议精神的一项重要工作举措。研究基地实行“竞争入选、合作共建、定期评估、优胜劣汰”的动态管理机制，为期三年。
下一步，湖南将依托研究基地，坚持问题导向，紧密联系省情，持续深入开展铸牢中华民族共同体意识重大基础理论和实践问题研究，为推动新时代民族工作高质量发展，凝心聚力加快建设社会主义现代化新湖南提供智力支撑。
en_title: Hunan Province named the first batch of research bases for the consciousness of the Chinese nation's community
en_text: A few days ago, on the basis of voluntary declaration, comprehensive inspection and strict evaluation, the Hunan Provincial Committee of Ethnic Religion and Religion named the Party School of the Hunan Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China (Hunan Administration College), Hunan Socialist College, Hunan Normal University, Hunan University of Science and Technology, Jishou University, Hunan Technology and Business University and Hunan Women's College are the first batch of research bases for the consciousness of the Chinese nation's community in Hunan Province. The naming of the first batch of research bases for building the consciousness of the Chinese nation's community is an important work measure for Hunan to implement the spirit of the national work conference of the central and provincial party committees. The research base implements a dynamic management mechanism of "competitive selection, cooperative joint construction, regular evaluation, and survival of the fittest" for a period of three years. In the next step, Hunan will rely on the research base, adhere to the problem orientation, closely connect with the situation of the province, and continue to carry out in-depth research on the major basic theoretical and practical issues that consolidate the consciousness of the Chinese nation. Provide intellectual support for building a new socialist modern Hunan.

title: 本市生活必需品市场供应稳定
text:
本报讯（记者 牛伟坤 李祺瑶）市商务局一级巡视员王洪存昨天表示，本市生活必需品市场供应形势稳定，特别是肉蛋菜供应，品类丰富，货源十分充足。本市将采取一系列举措，继续稳定市场供应。
本市生活必需品市场供应已进入冬季模式，本市将多措并举稳定市场供应，支持保供企业多渠道组织货源进京，扩大商业库存，确保市场供应不断档不缺货。主要批发市场多种措施鼓励商户节日期间尽可能减少外出流动，抓住交易高峰和销售旺季，坚守产地组织应季货品进京，切实保障市场供应。发挥连锁企业强大直采直供优势，提前做好蔬菜、肉类、大米、食用油等日常必需品的充足供应准备。在蔬菜等价格波动明显时，本市将启动零售端保供稳价支持政策，减少节日期间生活必需品的价格波动。落实批发市场减免进场费鼓励政策，多渠道调动保供企业进京运送的积极性。
本市还将强化政府储备管理，制定今冬明春生活必需品储备调控预案，保障应急供应；做好米面粮油肉蛋菜等生活必需品储备管理和应急投放准备。相关部门还将强化农贸市场、社区菜店、商超等重点环节价格执法，严防借疫情之机散布涨价信息、哄抬价格等违法行为；持续加强“菜篮子”产品市场价格监测，进一步完善监测预警和信息发布体系，稳定市场运行。
en_title: The city's daily necessities market supply is stable
en_text: News from this newspaper (Reporter Niu Weikun Li Qiyao) Wang Hongcun, a first-level inspector of the Municipal Bureau of Commerce, said yesterday that the market supply of daily necessities in this city is stable, especially the supply of meat, eggs and vegetables, which are rich in variety and sufficient in supply. The city will take a series of measures to continue to stabilize market supply. The market supply of daily necessities in this city has entered the winter mode. The city will take multiple measures to stabilize the market supply, support the supply guarantee enterprises to organize the supply of goods to Beijing through multiple channels, expand the commercial inventory, and ensure that the market supply will not be out of stock. Major wholesale markets have adopted various measures to encourage merchants to reduce their outings as much as possible during festivals, seize the peak trading season and peak sales season, and stick to the origin to organize seasonal goods into Beijing to effectively ensure market supply. Give full play to the strong direct procurement and direct supply advantages of chain enterprises, and prepare for the adequate supply of daily necessities such as vegetables, meat, rice, and edible oil in advance. When the price of vegetables and other items fluctuates significantly, the city will launch a support policy of maintaining supply and stabilizing prices at the retail end to reduce the price fluctuation of daily necessities during the festival. Implement the incentive policy of reducing or exempting entry fees for wholesale markets, and mobilize the enthusiasm of enterprises to ensure supply to Beijing for transportation through multiple channels. The city will also strengthen the management of government reserves, formulate a control plan for the reserves of daily necessities this winter and next spring, and ensure emergency supply; do a good job in the management and emergency release of daily necessities such as rice, flour, grain, oil, meat, eggs and vegetables. Relevant departments will also strengthen price law enforcement in key links such as farmers' markets, community vegetable stores, and supermarkets, and strictly prevent illegal acts such as disseminating price increase information and driving up prices by taking advantage of the epidemic; continue to strengthen market price monitoring of "vegetable basket" products, and further improve monitoring and early warning and information release system to stabilize market operation.

title: 持续推动空域精细化管理改革
text:
本报讯（记者 刘亚辉）12月24日，全国政协重点提案跟踪办理协商座谈会以视频方式在北京和郑州两地举行，持续推动“空域精细化管理改革”提案办理工作取得新成效。
    全国政协提案委员会副主任戚建国，全国政协委员、中国民航局原副局长李健在北京会场参加；全国政协提案委员会副主任郭庚茂，省委常委、副省长费东斌，省政协副主席周春艳、秘书长汪中山在河南会场参加。费东斌介绍了我省空域管理和民航发展总体情况。民航河南空管分局、河南机场集团负责同志介绍了我省有关情况。国家空管委办公室、中国民航局空管行业管理办公室、北京地区空管协调委办公室负责同志作了发言，大家深入交流并提出意见建议。
    戚建国在讲话中总结了提案办理经验。他指出，在以习近平同志为核心的党中央坚强领导下，各方密切配合，推动空域精细化管理改革取得明显成效，空域精细化管理改革试点在全国得到推广，区域军民协调机制逐步完善，区域性空域结构不断优化，低空空域改革试点取得阶段性成果。针对当前河南地区仍需解决的问题，要进一步确立空管就是服务的理念，完善军地协调机制，推动低空空域管理改革，提高中原地区空域使用效率，助推民用无人驾驶航空器发展，加快南阳机场迁建工作，为河南和全国经济社会发展提供高质量空管服务。
    郭庚茂在主持会议时指出，通过连续跟踪督办，空域精细化管理改革取得了实质性进展。其间，河南省委、省政府高度重视、大力推动，河南省政协主动担当、积极协调，形成了工作合力。希望大家持续关心支持政协提案办理工作和空域精细化管理改革，以实际行动贯彻落实党的十九届六中全会精神，为人民政协事业取得新发展作出更大贡献。
    周春艳代表省政协，对全国政协和各提案办理单位关心支持河南发展表示感谢，表示要认真学习全国政协重点提案跟踪督办的好经验，不断提升提案办理质量；要继续做好服务协调工作，推动此次会议精神贯彻落实，助力河南民航业高质量发展。
en_title: Continue to promote the reform of airspace refined management
en_text: News from this newspaper (Reporter Liu Yahui) On December 24, the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference held a conference on the tracking and handling of key proposals in Beijing and Zhengzhou by video, and continued to promote the proposal handling of "refined airspace management reform" to achieve new results. Qi Jianguo, Deputy Director of the Proposal Committee of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, Li Jian, member of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference and former Deputy Director of the Civil Aviation Administration of China attended the venue in Beijing; Guo Gengmao, Deputy Director of the Proposal Committee of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, Fei Dongbin, Member of the Standing Committee of the Provincial Party Committee and Vice Governor, Zhou Chunyan, Vice Chairman of the Provincial Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, Secretary-General Wang Zhongshan attended the meeting in Henan. Fei Dongbin introduced the overall situation of airspace management and civil aviation development in our province. The responsible comrades of the Henan Air Traffic Control Branch of Civil Aviation and Henan Airport Group introduced the relevant situation of our province. The responsible comrades of the Office of the National Air Traffic Control Commission, the Air Traffic Management Industry Management Office of the Civil Aviation Administration of China, and the Office of the Beijing Regional Air Traffic Control Coordination Committee made speeches, and everyone had an in-depth exchange and put forward opinions and suggestions. In his speech, Qi Jianguo summarized the experience in handling proposals. He pointed out that under the strong leadership of the CPC Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping as the core, all parties have cooperated closely to promote the reform of refined airspace management and achieved remarkable results. The structure of low-altitude airspace has been continuously optimized, and the pilot program of low-altitude airspace reform has achieved phased results. In view of the problems that still need to be solved in Henan, it is necessary to further establish the concept of air traffic control as a service, improve the military-civilian coordination mechanism, promote the reform of low-altitude airspace management, improve the efficiency of airspace use in the Central Plains, boost the development of civil unmanned aerial vehicles, and speed up Nanyang The airport relocation work provides high-quality air traffic control services for the economic and social development of Henan and the whole country. Guo Gengmao pointed out when presiding over the meeting that substantial progress has been made in the reform of refined airspace management through continuous tracking and supervision. During this period, the Henan Provincial Party Committee and the Provincial Government attached great importance to it and vigorously promoted it. I hope that everyone will continue to care and support the handling of the CPPCC's proposals and the reform of refined airspace management, implement the spirit of the Sixth Plenary Session of the 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China with practical actions, and make greater contributions to the new development of the CPPCC. On behalf of the Provincial Political Consultative Conference, Zhou Chunyan expressed her gratitude to the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference and all the proposal handling units for their concern and support for the development of Henan, and expressed that she would earnestly study the good experience of tracking and supervising the handling of key proposals of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, and continuously improve the quality of proposal handling; continue to do a good job in service coordination and promote this The spirit of the meeting was implemented to help the high-quality development of the civil aviation industry in Henan.

title: 数百件精品细说岭南美术“前世今生”
text:
南方日报讯 （记者/孙羽嘉 仇敏业）12月24日，广东美术馆年末大展——“GDMoA年度艺术家学术提名展（2021）”以及“美在广东——中国美术馆与广东美术馆藏粤籍艺术家作品展”开幕。两个展览分别从传统与当代的角度，以数百件精品力作回顾岭南美术的百年风云，同时展现了当代中国多元化发展的艺术语境。
    “美在广东——中国美术馆与广东美术馆藏粤籍艺术家作品展”由广东省文化和旅游厅指导，中国美术馆、广东美术馆联合主办。展览汇集了两馆所藏的居廉、李铁夫、高剑父、黄新波、胡一川、关山月、黎雄才、杨之光、汤小铭等广东艺术家及曾在广东生活工作过的各时期艺术家共140余件作品。作品题材多样、内涵丰富、风格迥异，较好地反映了广东美术创作的整体水平。
    同样由广东美术馆主办的“GDMoA年度艺术家学术提名展（2021）”则为观众带来了顾小平、曹斐、郭工等20多位当代艺术家的新锐作品。
en_title: Hundreds of fine works detail the "past life and present life" of Lingnan art
en_text: Nanfang Daily News (Reporter/Sun Yujia Qiu Minye) On December 24, the year-end exhibition of Guangdong Museum of Art - "GDMoA Annual Artist Academic Nomination Exhibition (2021)" and "Beauty in Guangdong - Collection of National Art Museum of China and Guangdong Museum of Art" The Cantonese Artist Works Exhibition" opened. The two exhibitions review the century-old situation of Lingnan art from the perspective of traditional and contemporary perspectives with hundreds of masterpieces, and at the same time show the artistic context of the diversified development of contemporary China. "Beauty in Guangdong - Exhibition of Cantonese Artists Collected by the National Art Museum of China and the Guangdong Museum of Art" is directed by the Guangdong Provincial Department of Culture and Tourism, and jointly sponsored by the National Art Museum of China and the Guangdong Museum of Art. The exhibition brings together more than 140 works by Guangdong artists such as Ju Lian, Li Tiefu, Gao Jianfu, Huang Xinbo, Hu Yichuan, Guan Shanyue, Li Xiongcai, Yang Zhiguang, Tang Xiaoming and other artists from different periods who have lived and worked in Guangdong. The works have diverse themes, rich connotations and different styles, which better reflect the overall level of Guangdong art creation. The "GDMoA Annual Artists Academic Nomination Exhibition (2021)", also hosted by Guangdong Museum of Art, brought to the audience the cutting-edge works of more than 20 contemporary artists including Gu Xiaoping, Cao Fei and Guo Gong.

title: 双碳命题 龙岗答卷
text:
“刚刚发布的两个文件让人听了很振奋。希望龙岗在深圳东部未开发的重要土地上好好谋划，产业要围绕低碳、零碳、负碳，有秩序、有节奏地稳步推进。”中国循环经济协会会长朱黎阳在“碳路先锋，龙岗先行”主题研讨会上说。
12月16日—17日，2021碳达峰碳中和论坛暨第九届深圳国际低碳城论坛上，龙岗区正式向外界公布《龙岗区节能减碳总体方案》（下称《方案》）和《深圳国际低碳城综合发展规划》（下称《规划》）。这是深圳首个区级“双碳”顶层设计。
“二氧化碳排放力争于2030年前达到峰值，努力争取2060年前实现碳中和。”这是中国向世界作出的庄严承诺。龙岗的“双碳”探索，比时代潮流来得更早，“碳路先锋”可谓是其绿色发展之路的精准概括。早在2011年，龙岗区便主动接过了“试卷”，在深圳东部谋划打造绿色低碳发展的示范载体——深圳国际低碳城。
十年以来，龙岗区坚守低碳、绿色、可持续发展的初心不变，将低碳绿色融入城区规划建设、产业导入、交通布局、民生福祉等各个方面，规上工业万元GDP能耗低至0.073吨标准煤/万元，领跑全国，获评“第四批国家生态文明建设示范区”“全省首批碳中和试点示范区”等称号。今年以来，龙岗更是在低碳发展上动作频频，在“一芯两核多支点”战略中布局东核“低碳智造核”，明确“IT+BT+低碳”的产业发展思路，通过氢能公交、零碳公园、近零碳与可持续发展示范社区等实践在城市生活向公众传递低碳文化理念。
以此次“双碳”新政发布为起点，龙岗正在全面铺开“双碳”大棋局，以“低碳”重塑城市发展逻辑。面向未来，龙岗力争成为国家碳达峰、碳中和试点建设示范区，打造工业大区绿色可持续发展的龙岗样板，提供可复制、可推广的产业大区绿色低碳发展新样本。
●南方日报见习记者 刘越亚
顶层设计
发展与减排并重
“站在新的历史起点上，我们在这里正式发布‘双碳’新政，向全社会宣告，龙岗走好绿色低碳高质量发展道路的信心和决心。这两个文件的全新亮相，标志着龙岗绿色低碳发展战略，迈出了新的坚实步伐。”龙岗区委常委、副区长谷更军在龙岗区低碳新政发布仪式上说。
当前，龙岗已连续三年位列全国工业百强区榜首。全国工业强区如何进行低碳转型，其经验对国内工业城市和产业城区都具有参考价值和借鉴意义。
实现“双碳”目标，是一场广泛而深刻的经济社会变革。打好实现碳达峰、碳中和这场硬仗，顶层设计不可或缺。
此次全新出炉的两大政策文件，是龙岗区多次问计专家，汲取顶级外脑智慧的成果。为探寻城区低碳绿色发展的有益思路，今年3月，龙岗区委、区政府组团奔赴北京，邀请数10位国内低碳能源、资源环境、绿色金融等领域的顶尖专家作为龙岗区应对气候变化特别顾问，成立推动龙岗区低碳发展的首批低碳智库团队。11月，龙岗区召开专家咨询会，听取顶级专家对于深圳国际低碳城建设发展的真知灼见。
“十四五”是碳达峰的关键期、窗口期，龙岗也同样来到了绿色发展再上新台阶的阶段。根据《广东省碳达峰碳排放核算指南（暂行）》《广东省地级市碳达峰实施方案编制大纲》测算，龙岗区二氧化碳排放量已进入达峰平台期，呈现先上升后下降趋势。龙岗在当下出台指引全区绿色低碳发展的纲领性可谓恰逢其时。
根据《方案》，到2025年，龙岗计划基本完成经济社会绿色低碳发展转型，成为经济增长与碳排放脱钩的排头兵、国内碳达峰先行区；到2030年，成为工业大区绿色低碳发展的典范，向全国提供可复制可操作的龙岗经验；在国内率先全面建成碳中和示范区。
对照时间表，谋定路线图。龙岗提出10项推进低碳举措，内容涵盖低碳产业、绿色建筑、绿色交通、宜居环境等方面，将绿色低碳理念全面贯彻于经济、政治、文化、社会、生态文明建设各项工作中。
从《方案》内容来看，龙岗重视处理好发展与减碳的关系，科学发展、科学减碳的思路贯穿其中。例如，“推动生物医药、绿色低碳产业形成集聚”“打造低碳智造聚集地”等内容，明确了产业大区的转型方向。“推动传统产业智能化改造”“全面普及推广绿色低碳方式”“打造智慧能源+交通综合体系”等内容，则彰显了工业大区在“减碳”承诺下的责任与担当。
系统转型
以“低碳”重塑发展逻辑
新图景在前，路线图出炉，经济增长、社会转型、节能减碳三项并举。此次《方案》的出炉，是龙岗谋划从“双碳”积极参与者到关键引领者的重要转折点。
“中国提出的‘双碳’目标不是直线的减法，而是系统的加减乘除。”“实现‘双碳’目标要防止一刀切，也要防止转型不力。”“低碳”一词炙手可热，业内专家多次提出，实现“双碳”目标的过程中，不只是简单的节能减排问题，而是发展方式的问题。
多年来，龙岗系统推进经济社会发展的低碳转型，践行一套实现“双碳”目标的“加减乘除”法。
政策“加”码助力绿色发展。今年以来，低碳产业被列为与电子信息通信和生物药并列的全区支柱性产业来培育打造。“东核”低碳智造核将深圳国际低碳城、宝龙科技城组成联合体，将绿色低碳与智能智造紧密结合推动制造业高质量发展。龙岗区第七次党代会提出实施绿色低碳产业壮大计划，未来将培育引进一批绿色低碳产业的领军企业，构建低碳产业集群。
固废“减”排推动低碳转型。数据显示，龙岗区规上工业万元GDP能耗低至0.073吨标准煤/万元，领跑全国；万元GDP水耗、能耗连续五年下降，经济发展的绿色含量显著提升；2020年PM2.5降至20.4微克/立方米，达到世界卫生组织第二阶段标准，获评“第四批国家生态文明建设示范区”“全省首批碳中和试点示范区”等称号。
产业集聚释放“乘”数效应。今年龙岗加速导入绿色低碳产业资源，与国家电投集团广东电力有限公司签署战略合作协议，与9家绿色低碳产业优秀企业集中签约，一举揽下投资总额超500亿元；与香港中文大学（深圳）城市地下空间及能源研究院合作打造国际低碳城地热综合利用示范园区，为推动壮大低碳产业矩阵积蓄动力。
能源利用“除”旧换新。龙岗开通运营全市首条氢能公交示范线；成为全市唯一获批“全国整县（区）屋顶分布式光伏开发试点”；建成全球单厂规模最大、烟气排放标准最高、日处理生活垃圾5000吨的深圳东部环保电厂，彻底结束了生活垃圾填埋处置的历史。
这一系列成绩，让龙岗的绿色低碳发展之路熠熠生辉。未来，龙岗秉承高质量发展理念，把绿色低碳理念融入全区规划布局、城市建设、产业发展、生活引导等各个方面，一个能耗更低、环境更美、生态更优的品质城区正在照进现实。
打造标杆
一场绿色发展的全方位试验
“要继续擦亮深圳国际低碳城这个品牌，坚持高站位推动国际低碳城建设，以世界眼光、国际标准做好低碳城发展规划。”16日开幕式主论坛上，中国气候变化事务特使解振华为深圳国际低碳城送上寄语。
“从第一届起就参加了深圳国际低碳城论坛，这个论坛多年来带动和促进了深圳在促进清洁能源绿色低碳发展方面所做的工作。”国务院原参事石定寰在线上致辞中说。
时隔3年，第九届国际低碳城论坛主论坛重新回归龙岗主场，大众目光再次聚焦论坛举办地——深圳国际低碳城。不少于第一届论坛便与它结识“老朋友”线上线下千里相约。
深圳国际低碳城，是龙岗区“一芯两核多支点”中“低碳智造核”的主阵地。片区山水资源丰富，生态本底优越，海绵城区建设理念贯穿城区规划、建设和运营的全过程，建设了一批极具低碳内涵的示范项目。经过10年的发展探索，深圳国际低碳城获得了国际国内良好的知名度，在绿色低碳领域积累了丰富的实践基础。
自2013年开始，龙岗已连续举办“深圳国际低碳城论坛”5届主论坛、3届分论坛，来自超过60个国家和国际组织的5500名嘉宾汇聚在这里畅所欲言、碰撞智慧，完成了一批重要项目签约。
今年以来，龙岗区通过高水平打造一平方公里大集成、运用100余项先进低碳技术改造提升场馆、谋划举办绿色低碳沙龙和引进第六届气候影视大会、加强低碳顶层规划设计等措施，举全区之力筹备第九届国际低碳城论坛，力争荟萃低碳精深智慧、打造国家碳外交平台。
回归再出发，深圳国际低碳城有了“升级”的新使命。龙岗全新编制《深圳国际低碳城综合发展规划》，以更高的站位、更宽的视野、更实的举措，为该片区在科技创新、产业体系、区域合作、发展模式、绿色能源等方面实现升级制定了方案。
《规划》赋予深圳国际低碳城打造中国碳达峰、碳中和先行示范区的总体定位，目标将该片区建设成为“国家绿色低碳技术集聚创新区、国际低碳交流合作开放区、全民绿色低碳行动引领区”。到2025年，建设成为粤港澳大湾区绿色高质量发展的示范样板；到2030年，成为国家展现碳达峰碳中和丰硕成果的旗帜标杆。
构建低碳科技与产业中心，营造疏密有致的低碳城市形态，建设全景式绿色韧性基础设施，建设湾区低碳创新交流平台……从《规划》内容中可以预见，未来龙岗将在这块规划总面积约53平方公里的土地上，集中进行一场绿色发展的全方位试验。
《规划》提出，下一步，国际低碳城将全力推进8大重点行动，打造低碳排放与高质量发展相协调的国家级样板，为深圳乃至全国探索一条适合超大城市的减排降碳路径。
到那时，科技范十足的低碳科技成果在这里落地转化，居民乐享绿色健康生活方式，“碳普惠”引领绿色生活新风尚，近零碳建筑和山河廊道生态景观掩映其中，具有国际影响力的低碳交流平台吸引八方来客。

en_title: Longgang Answer Sheet for Two-Carbon Proposition
en_text: "The two documents just released are very exciting. I hope that Longgang will make good plans on the important undeveloped land in the east of Shenzhen, and the industry should focus on low-carbon, zero-carbon, and negative carbon, and advance steadily in an orderly and rhythmic manner." Zhu Liyang, President of China Circular Economy Association, said at the seminar on "Carbon Road Pioneer, Longgang First". From December 16th to 17th, at the 2021 Carbon Peak Carbon Neutral Forum and the 9th Shenzhen International Low-Carbon City Forum, Longgang District officially announced to the outside world the "Overall Plan for Energy Conservation and Carbon Reduction in Longgang District" (hereinafter referred to as the "Plan") and the "Shenzhen International Low-Carbon City Comprehensive Development Plan" (hereinafter referred to as the "Plan"). This is the first district-level "double carbon" top-level design in Shenzhen. "We strive to reach a peak in carbon dioxide emissions by 2030, and strive to achieve carbon neutrality by 2060." This is China's solemn commitment to the world. Longgang's "dual carbon" exploration came earlier than the trend of the times, and "Carbon Road Pioneer" can be described as an accurate summary of its green development path. As early as 2011, Longgang District took the initiative to take the "examination paper" and planned to build a demonstration carrier of green and low-carbon development in eastern Shenzhen - Shenzhen International Low-Carbon City. Over the past ten years, Longgang District has adhered to the original intention of low-carbon, green and sustainable development, and integrated low-carbon green into urban planning and construction, industry introduction, transportation layout, people's livelihood and other aspects, and the industrial energy consumption per 10,000 yuan of GDP is low. To 0.073 tons of standard coal/10,000 yuan, leading the country, and won the title of "the fourth batch of national ecological civilization construction demonstration areas" and "the first batch of carbon neutral pilot demonstration areas in the province". Since the beginning of this year, Longgang has made frequent moves in low-carbon development. In the strategy of "one core, two cores and multiple fulcrums", Longgang has laid out the "low-carbon intelligent core" of East Nuclear, and clarified the industrial development idea of "IT+BT+low-carbon". Practices such as hydrogen energy buses, zero-carbon parks, and near-zero-carbon and sustainable development demonstration communities convey the concept of low-carbon culture to the public in urban life. Starting from the release of the "Double Carbon" New Deal, Longgang is fully rolling out the "Double Carbon" chess game, reshaping the logic of urban development with "low carbon". Facing the future, Longgang strives to become a national demonstration area of carbon peaking and carbon neutrality pilot construction, creating a Longgang model of green and sustainable development in industrial areas, and providing a new model of green and low-carbon development in industrial areas that can be replicated and promoted. ●Nangfang Daily trainee reporter Liu Yueya pays equal attention to top-level design development and emission reduction "Standing at a new historical starting point, we officially release the 'double carbon' new policy here, announcing to the whole society that Longgang will take a green, low-carbon and high-quality development path The new appearance of these two documents marks a new solid step in Longgang’s green and low-carbon development strategy.” Gu Gengjun, Member of the Standing Committee of Longgang District Committee and Deputy District Chang, at the launch ceremony of the Low-Carbon New Deal in Longgang District said. At present, Longgang has ranked first among the top 100 industrial areas in China for three consecutive years. The experience of how to carry out low-carbon transformation in strong industrial areas across the country has reference value and reference significance for domestic industrial cities and industrial urban areas. Achieving the "dual carbon" goal is a broad and profound economic and social transformation. Top-level design is indispensable for the tough battle to achieve carbon peaking and carbon neutrality. The two new policy documents released this time are the result of many experts in Longgang District who have learned from top-level external brain wisdom. In order to explore useful ideas for low-carbon and green development in urban areas, in March this year, the Longgang District Party Committee and the District Government organized a delegation to Beijing to invite 10 top domestic experts in the fields of low-carbon energy, resources and environment, and green finance as Longgang District to deal with climate change. Special consultant, established the first low-carbon think tank team to promote the low-carbon development of Longgang District. In November, Longgang District held an expert consultation meeting to listen to the insights of top experts on the construction and development of Shenzhen International Low-Carbon City. The "14th Five-Year Plan" is a critical period and a window period for carbon peaking, and Longgang has also reached a stage of green development to a new level. According to the "Guidelines for Carbon Emissions Accounting for Carbon Peaking in Guangdong Province (Interim)" and "Guangdong Province's Prefectural-level City Carbon Peaking Implementation Plan Compilation Outline", the carbon dioxide emissions in Longgang District have entered the peak plateau period, showing a trend of rising first and then falling. It is just the right time for Longgang to introduce a programmatic guideline for the green and low-carbon development of the whole region. According to the "Plan", by 2025, Longgang plans to basically complete the transformation of economic and social green and low-carbon development, becoming a leader in the decoupling of economic growth and carbon emissions, and a pioneer area for carbon peaking in China; by 2030, it will become an industrial area with green and low-carbon development. A model of Longgang, providing replicable and operational Longgang experience to the whole country; taking the lead in building a carbon-neutral demonstration zone in an all-round way in China. Compare the timetable and develop a roadmap. Longgang proposed 10 low-carbon measures, covering low-carbon industries, green buildings, green transportation, livable environment, etc., and fully implement the green and low-carbon concept in the construction of economic, political, cultural, social and ecological civilization. . From the content of the "Plan", Longgang attaches great importance to handling the relationship between development and carbon reduction, and the ideas of scientific development and scientific carbon reduction run through it. For example, "promoting the formation of agglomeration of biomedicine, green and low-carbon industries" and "building a low-carbon intelligent manufacturing agglomeration" have clarified the transformation direction of the industrial zone. Contents such as "promoting the intelligent transformation of traditional industries", "comprehensively popularizing and promoting green and low-carbon methods", and "building a comprehensive system of smart energy and transportation" demonstrate the responsibility and responsibility of the industrial zone under the commitment of "carbon reduction". The system transformation will reshape the development logic with "low carbon" and a new vision is ahead, and the roadmap has been released. The release of the "Plan" is an important turning point for Longgang's plan to change from an active participant in the "Double Carbon" to a key leader. "The 'two-carbon' goal proposed by China is not a straight-line subtraction, but a systematic addition, subtraction, multiplication and division." "To achieve the 'two-carbon' goal, we must prevent one-size-fits-all, and also prevent poor transformation." The word "low carbon" is hot, and the industry Experts have repeatedly pointed out that in the process of realizing the "dual carbon" goal, it is not just a simple issue of energy conservation and emission reduction, but a problem of development mode. Over the years, Longgang has systematically promoted the low-carbon transformation of economic and social development, and practiced a set of "addition, subtraction, multiplication and division" methods to achieve the "double carbon" goal. Policy "plus" code to help green development. Since the beginning of this year, the low-carbon industry has been listed as a pillar industry in the region alongside electronic information communication and biological medicine to be cultivated and built. The "East Core" low-carbon intelligent manufacturing core will form a consortium of Shenzhen International Low-Carbon City and Powerlong Science and Technology City, and will closely combine green low-carbon and intelligent manufacturing to promote the high-quality development of the manufacturing industry. The Seventh Party Congress of Longgang District proposed the implementation of the green and low-carbon industry expansion plan. In the future, it will cultivate and introduce a number of leading enterprises in the green and low-carbon industry to build a low-carbon industry cluster. Solid waste "reduction" to promote low-carbon transformation. The data shows that the energy consumption per 10,000 yuan of GDP of the above-scale industries in Longgang District is as low as 0.073 tons of standard coal per 10,000 yuan, leading the country; .5 dropped to 20.4 micrograms/cubic meter, meeting the World Health Organization's second-stage standard, and was awarded the titles of "The Fourth Batch of National Ecological Civilization Construction Demonstration Zones" and "the Province's First Batch of Carbon Neutral Pilot Demonstration Zones". Industrial agglomeration releases the "multiplier" effect. This year, Longgang accelerated the introduction of green and low-carbon industrial resources, signed a strategic cooperation agreement with State Power Investment Group Guangdong Electric Power Co., Ltd., and signed contracts with 9 outstanding enterprises in green and low-carbon industries, with a total investment of over 50 billion yuan in one fell swoop; (Shenzhen) Urban Underground Space and Energy Research Institute cooperated to build a demonstration park for comprehensive utilization of geothermal energy in an international low-carbon city, accumulating momentum for promoting the expansion of the low-carbon industry matrix. Energy utilization "removes" the old for the new. Longgang opened and operated the city's first hydrogen energy bus demonstration line; became the city's only approved "national county (district) rooftop distributed photovoltaic development pilot"; built the world's largest single plant, the highest flue gas emission standard, and daily processing of 5,000 domestic wastes Tons of Shenzhen Eastern Environmental Protection Power Plant completely ended the history of domestic waste landfill disposal. These series of achievements have made Longgang's green and low-carbon development path shining brightly. In the future, Longgang will adhere to the concept of high-quality development and integrate the concept of green and low-carbon into the planning and layout, urban construction, industrial development, life guidance and other aspects of the region. A high-quality urban area with lower energy consumption, more beautiful environment and better ecology is emerging. into reality. Building a benchmark for an all-round test of green development "We must continue to polish the brand of Shenzhen International Low-Carbon City, adhere to a high-level position to promote the construction of an international low-carbon city, and make a low-carbon city development plan with a global vision and international standards."16 At the main forum of the opening ceremony in Japan, China's special envoy for climate change, Xie Zhenhua, sent a message to Shenzhen International Low-Carbon City. "Since the first session, I have participated in the Shenzhen International Low-Carbon City Forum. This forum has driven and promoted Shenzhen's work in promoting the green and low-carbon development of clean energy over the years." Shi Dinghuan, former counselor of the State Council, said in an online speech. After a lapse of three years, the main forum of the 9th International Low-Carbon City Forum has returned to the main venue of Longgang, and the public's attention has once again focused on the venue of the forum - Shenzhen International Low-Carbon City. No less than the first forum, it has met "old friends" online and offline thousands of miles. Shenzhen International Low-Carbon City is the main position of "low-carbon intelligent core" in the "one core, two cores and multiple fulcrums" in Longgang District. The area is rich in mountains and water resources and has a superior ecological background. The concept of sponge city construction runs through the entire process of urban planning, construction and operation, and a number of demonstration projects with very low-carbon connotations have been built. After 10 years of development and exploration, Shenzhen International Low-Carbon City has gained a good reputation at home and abroad, and has accumulated a rich practical foundation in the green and low-carbon field. Since 2013, Longgang has held 5 main forums and 3 sub-forums of the "Shenzhen International Low-Carbon City Forum". 5,500 guests from more than 60 countries and international organizations gathered here to speak freely and collide with wisdom. Signing contracts for important projects. Since the beginning of this year, Longgang District has adopted measures such as building a large integration of one square kilometer at a high level, using more than 100 advanced low-carbon technologies to transform and upgrade venues, planning to hold green and low-carbon salons, introducing the 6th Climate Film and Television Conference, and strengthening low-carbon top-level planning and design. , mobilize the power of the whole region to prepare for the 9th International Low-Carbon City Forum, and strive to gather low-carbon profound wisdom and build a national carbon diplomacy platform. After returning and starting again, Shenzhen International Low-Carbon City has a new mission of "upgrading". Longgang has newly compiled the "Shenzhen International Low-Carbon City Comprehensive Development Plan", with a higher position, wider vision and more practical measures, to provide the area with scientific and technological innovation, industrial system, regional cooperation, development mode, green energy, etc. A plan has been formulated for the realization of the upgrade. The "Planning" gives Shenzhen International Low-Carbon City the overall positioning of building China's carbon peak and carbon neutral pilot demonstration area. Green and Low-Carbon Action Leading Zone”. By 2025, it will become a demonstration model for the green and high-quality development of the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area; by 2030, it will become a national benchmark for the country to demonstrate the fruitful achievements of carbon peaking and carbon neutrality. Build a low-carbon technology and industry center, create a dense and dense low-carbon urban form, build a panoramic green and resilient infrastructure, and build a low-carbon innovation exchange platform in the Bay Area... From the content of the "Planning", it can be foreseen that Longgang will be here in the future. On the land with a total planned area of about 53 square kilometers, an all-round test of green development will be carried out. The "Planning" proposes that in the next step, the International Low-Carbon City will make every effort to promote 8 key actions, create a national model for coordinating low-carbon emissions and high-quality development, and explore a path for emission reduction and carbon reduction suitable for megacities in Shenzhen and even the whole country. . By that time, low-carbon scientific and technological achievements full of science and technology will be transformed here, residents will enjoy a green and healthy lifestyle, and "carbon inclusiveness" will lead the new trend of green life. title: 构建统一大市场  推动制度型开放
text:
随着各国政府的批准，《区域全面经济伙伴关系协定》（RCEP）将于2022年1月1日正式生效。
  伴随着RCEP的最终落地，RCEP成员国间的区域贸易规则将得到有效整合，区域内部营商环境将得到大幅优化，统一的内部大市场将得以实现。RCEP不仅有助于降低东亚区域内贸易和投资的制度性交易成本，为区域乃至世界经济注入发展新动力，而且将成为我国构建新发展格局的重要平台，进一步推动我国实现在规则、规制、管理、标准等领域的制度型开放。
构建更高水平开放型经济的重要平台
  推动形成以国内大循环为主体、国内国际双循环相互促进的新发展格局，这是中国当前的总体发展政策。而RCEP实施后，将成为我国构建新发展格局的新的重要平台。
  据统计，2020年，我国向RCEP成员国出口额达到7007亿美元，占当年我国出口总额的27%；从RCEP成员国进口额达到7779亿美元，占当年我国进口总额的37.8%；我国吸收的外国直接投资也有10%来自RCEP成员国。
  一方面，RCEP通过推动成员国削减90%的货物贸易关税并最终实现零关税，以及大幅削减非关税壁垒，将扩大市场准入，降低交易成本，为广大企业和消费者带来更大规模、更低成本的技术、商品和服务，更好地满足企业生产经营和人民美好生活需要，畅通国内大循环。另一方面，RCEP实施后，伴随着原产地规则、海关程序、检验检疫、技术标准等贸易投资便利化等措施的落地实施，将大幅优化区域内部营商环境，增强和协调中国与其他成员国的经贸关系，深化区域内价值链分工合作，有助于我国更好地融入区域和全球产业链、价值链和供应链网络，促进国内国际双循环，实现经济高质量发展。美国彼得森国际经济研究所预测，到2030年，RCEP有望带动中国出口增加2480亿美元，拉动经济增长1000亿美元，分别较基线多增长5.0%、0.4%。
  RCEP是构建更高水平开放型经济的重要平台。党的十八大提出，要加快实施自由贸易区战略，党的十九届五中全会提出实施自由贸易区提升战略，构建面向全球的高标准自由贸易区网络。RCEP实施后，中国不仅将首次与日本建立自由贸易关系，使我国自贸伙伴国数量增加到26个，更将中国的自贸覆盖率提高至35%，这意味着未来我国将有超过1/3的进出口贸易得到制度性保障。
  目前，伴随着价值链贸易和第四次工业革命，全球贸易体系进入新一轮重构，国际经贸规则正在从边境措施向边境内措施延伸。RCEP以达成现代、全面、高质量和互惠的自由贸易协定为目标，不仅涉及传统货物贸易、原产地规则等，还纳入了知识产权、电子商务、竞争政策、政府采购等新议题。
  其中，我国服务贸易开放承诺达到了现有自由贸易协定最高水平，首次在自由贸易协定中以负面清单方式对投资领域进行承诺，并承诺赋予其他成员国准入前国民待遇；首次在自由贸易协定中全面纳入知识产权条款；首次在自由贸易协定中纳入数据流动、信息存储等数字贸易规则等。RCEP生效后，将切实促进我国对标国际高水平经贸规则，加快商品要素流动型开放向规则、规制、管理、标准等制度型开放转变，形成更大范围、更宽领域、更深层次对外开放新格局，推动建设更高水平开放型经济新体制。
降低制度性交易成本，助力区域经济发展
  目前，RCEP成员国间已达成27个自贸协定和44个双边投资协定，规定了不同的关税减让安排、原产地规则等不同条款，这些相互交织、重叠的贸易规则使得区域内部贸易体系变得纷繁杂乱，导致了“意大利面条碗效应”，增加了企业交易成本。
  RCEP实施后，不仅可以为90%以上的货物贸易提供统一的关税减让安排，还借鉴中国—东盟自由贸易协定升级谈判的成功经验，大幅将选择性原产地规则的适用比例提高至65.8%，使得原产地规则的便利性和灵活性得以提高。此外，RCEP还引入了原产地区域累积原则、原产地证书自主声明等规则，有望降低企业利用RCEP优惠关税的交易成本。
  更重要的是，RCEP推动和鼓励成员国在海关程序和贸易便利化，标准、技术法规和合格评定程序，服务贸易，投资，电子商务等方面加强合作，以进一步提高便利化水平，降低制度性交易成本。联合国贸发会议指出，RCEP将降低交易成本，为本地区吸引外国直接投资提供重要机遇，特别是与其他地区相比，RCEP成员国之间的内部相互投资仅占全部对外直接投资的30%，仍有较大增长空间。
  伴随全球化进一步调整，以RCEP成员国为主体的东亚地区已成为与北美、欧洲并驾齐驱的全球价值链贸易中心。但本区域发展面临疫情负面影响的短期冲击和内部最终消费不足的长期制约。2022年，RCEP成员国将启动货物贸易削减关税进程，其中大部分商品将立即实现零关税或在10年内实现零关税。在服务贸易领域，各成员国开放水平均高于各自“10+1”协定水平，涵盖金融、电信、交通、旅游、教育等多个重要领域，并将在生效6年内全部转为负面清单，进一步提升开放水平。在投资领域，各成员国对非服务业投资采用负面清单方式作出高水平开放承诺，将大幅提升政策透明度。
  RCEP全面生效实施后，将带动全球近1/3的经济体量形成统一的内部大市场，增强东亚地区经贸政策的稳定性，增强正向投资预期，提振生产和消费信心，有助于为本地区甚至全球提供一个区别于传统欧美市场的最终消费市场，将为区域乃至世界经济增长注入新动力。亚洲开发银行的一项新近研究表明，到2030年，RCEP可望为成员国带动出口5140亿美元，拉动经济增长2630亿美元，分别较基线多增加5.2%和0.6%，将为东亚生产网络的深化与世界经济发展创造更多最终需求和更大发展动力。
坚持开放地区主义，完善全球经济治理
  中国多次强调，推进区域经济一体化，要坚持开放的地区主义。RCEP不以建立封闭的排他性贸易集团为目的，而是在保证成员国数量可控的同时，坚持高标准的适度性、非歧视性与包容度，倡导开放地区主义。
  具体而言，RCEP的开放性体现在多个方面。例如，RCEP践行真正的多边主义，坚持包容而不排他，融合而不脱钩，不排斥任何国家加入，不预设加入门槛和条件；RCEP高度强调贸易投资便利化和经济技术合作，政策实施的外溢效应非常显著，政策红利不仅仅局限于成员国之间，更在优化区域营商环境；RCEP表现出的较大灵活性和舒适度，能更好满足各成员供应链和创新需求，有望在货物贸易、服务贸易、投资和规则领域方面，在区域不同发展水平的经济体之间实现利益平衡；RCEP采用循序渐进、逐步推进的方式，不断升级市场准入和经贸规则，保证协定开放性和高质量。可见，RCEP充分体现了成员国发展诉求的最大公约数，将引导经济全球化朝着更加开放、包容、普惠、平衡、共赢的方向发展。
  面对层出不穷的全球性问题和挑战，我们应该坚持开放包容、协商合作，坚持和维护多边主义，积极推动构建人类命运共同体。历史经验表明，只有充分考虑和平衡包容性、多样性和灵活性，区域经济一体化进程才能得到有效推进。RCEP是中国和其他东亚成员国参与区域贸易投资合作机制的一次新尝试，有助于均衡普惠推动新兴领域经济治理规则制定，为完善参与全球经济治理体系改革贡献了新理念和新方案，必将成为引领全球经济治理体系改革完善的新里程碑。
  
（作者：沈铭辉，系中国社会科学院习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想研究中心特约研究员，中国社会科学院亚太与全球战略研究院副院长、研究员）
en_title: Constructing a Large Unified Market and Promoting Institutional Opening
en_text: With ratification by governments, the Regional Comprehensive Economic Partnership (RCEP) will come into force on January 1, 2022. With the final implementation of RCEP, the regional trade rules among RCEP member countries will be effectively integrated, the business environment within the region will be greatly optimized, and a unified large internal market will be realized. RCEP will not only help reduce the institutional transaction costs of intra-regional trade and investment in East Asia, and inject new impetus into the regional and even world economy, but will also become an important platform for my country to build a new development pattern, further promoting my country's implementation of rules, regulation and management. , standards and other fields of institutional opening. An important platform for building a higher-level open economy It is China's current overall development policy to promote the formation of a new development pattern with the domestic cycle as the mainstay and the domestic and international dual cycles promoting each other. After the implementation of RCEP, it will become a new important platform for my country to build a new development pattern. According to statistics, in 2020, my country's exports to RCEP member countries reached US$700.7 billion, accounting for 27% of my country's total exports that year; imports from RCEP member countries reached US$777.9 billion, accounting for 37.8% of my country's total imports that year; my country absorbed 10% of foreign direct investment also comes from RCEP member countries. On the one hand, RCEP will expand market access, reduce transaction costs, and bring larger-scale, larger-scale, higher-quality products to businesses and consumers by pushing member countries to cut tariffs on trade in goods by 90% and ultimately achieve zero tariffs, as well as slashing non-tariff barriers. Lower-cost technologies, commodities and services can better meet the needs of enterprises' production and operation and the people's better life, and smooth the domestic circulation. On the other hand, after the implementation of RCEP, along with the implementation of trade and investment facilitation measures such as rules of origin, customs procedures, inspection and quarantine, and technical standards, the business environment within the region will be greatly optimized, and China and other member states will be enhanced and coordinated. It will help my country better integrate into regional and global industrial chains, value chains and supply chain networks, promote domestic and international dual circulation, and achieve high-quality economic development. The Peterson Institute for International Economics predicts that by 2030, RCEP is expected to increase China's exports by US$248 billion and economic growth by US$100 billion, 5.0% and 0.4% higher than the baseline, respectively. RCEP is an important platform for building a higher-level open economy. The Eighteenth National Congress of the Communist Party of China proposed to speed up the implementation of the free trade zone strategy. The Fifth Plenary Session of the Nineteenth Central Committee of the Communist Party of China proposed to implement the free trade zone upgrading strategy and build a high-standard free trade zone network facing the world. After the implementation of RCEP, China will not only establish free trade relations with Japan for the first time, increasing the number of my country's free trade partners to 26, but also increase China's free trade coverage to 35%, which means that in the future, my country will have more than 1/1/2 of the country's free trade partners. 3 The import and export trade has been systematically guaranteed. At present, with the value chain trade and the fourth industrial revolution, the global trade system has entered a new round of reconstruction, and international economic and trade rules are being extended from border measures to measures within the border. RCEP aims to achieve a modern, comprehensive, high-quality and reciprocal free trade agreement, which not only involves traditional trade in goods, rules of origin, etc., but also incorporates new topics such as intellectual property rights, e-commerce, competition policy, and government procurement. Among them, my country's commitment to opening up trade in services has reached the highest level of existing free trade agreements. For the first time, China has made commitments in the field of investment in the form of a negative list in a free trade agreement, and promised to grant other member states pre-establishment national treatment; for the first time in a free trade agreement Include intellectual property clauses fully in China; for the first time, digital trade rules such as data flow and information storage have been included in free trade agreements. After the RCEP takes effect, it will effectively promote my country's benchmarking of international high-level economic and trade rules, accelerate the transformation of the opening of commodity factors to the institutional opening of rules, regulations, management, and standards, and form a new opening to the outside world in a wider range, wider field, and deeper level. pattern, and promote the construction of a new system of a higher-level open economy. Reduce institutional transaction costs and help regional economic development At present, RCEP member countries have reached 27 free trade agreements and 44 bilateral investment agreements, which stipulate different tariff concession arrangements, rules of origin and other different terms. Overlapping trade rules have cluttered the intraregional trade system, leading to the “spaghetti bowl effect” that increases transaction costs for firms. After the implementation of RCEP, it can not only provide a unified tariff reduction arrangement for more than 90% of trade in goods, but also draw on the successful experience of China-ASEAN Free Trade Agreement upgrade negotiation, and greatly increase the application ratio of selective rules of origin to 65.8%. This increases the convenience and flexibility of the rules of origin. In addition, RCEP has also introduced rules such as the principle of accumulation in the area of origin and the self-declaration of the certificate of origin, which is expected to reduce the transaction cost of enterprises using RCEP preferential tariffs. More importantly, RCEP promotes and encourages member states to strengthen cooperation in customs procedures and trade facilitation, standards, technical regulations and conformity assessment procedures, trade in services, investment, e-commerce, etc., to further improve the level of facilitation and reduce institutionalization. transaction cost. UNCTAD pointed out that RCEP will reduce transaction costs and provide important opportunities for the region to attract foreign direct investment, especially compared with other regions, internal mutual investment among RCEP member countries only accounts for 30% of all foreign direct investment, still There is more room for growth. With the further adjustment of globalization, East Asia, with RCEP member states as the main body, has become a global value chain trade center that keeps pace with North America and Europe. However, the development of the region faces short-term impacts from the negative impact of the epidemic and long-term constraints from insufficient internal final consumption. In 2022, RCEP member countries will start the tariff reduction process for trade in goods, most of which will be tariff-free immediately or within 10 years. In the field of trade in services, the level of openness of each member state is higher than the level of the respective "10+1" agreement, covering many important fields such as finance, telecommunications, transportation, tourism, education, etc., and will all be turned into a negative list within 6 years of entry into force. Further improve the level of openness. In the field of investment, member states have made a high-level commitment to openness to non-service investment by adopting a negative list approach, which will greatly enhance policy transparency. After the RCEP is fully implemented, it will drive nearly one-third of the world's economic volume to form a unified large internal market, enhance the stability of economic and trade policies in East Asia, enhance positive investment expectations, boost production and consumption confidence, and help promote economic growth. The region and even the world provide a final consumer market that is different from traditional European and American markets, which will inject new impetus into regional and even world economic growth. A recent study by the Asian Development Bank shows that by 2030, RCEP is expected to drive exports of member countries by US$514 billion and economic growth by US$263 billion, which are 5.2% and 0.6% higher than the baseline, respectively. Deepening and world economic development create more final demand and greater development momentum. Adhere to open regionalism and improve global economic governance China has repeatedly emphasized that to promote regional economic integration, we must adhere to open regionalism. RCEP does not aim to establish a closed exclusive trade bloc, but adheres to high standards of moderation, non-discrimination and inclusiveness, and advocates open regionalism while ensuring that the number of member states is controllable. Specifically, the openness of RCEP is reflected in many aspects. For example, RCEP practices true multilateralism, adheres to inclusiveness without exclusion, integration without decoupling, exclusion of any country from joining, and does not pre-set entry thresholds and conditions; RCEP highly emphasizes trade and investment facilitation and economic and technological cooperation, and policy implementation The spillover effect is very significant. The policy dividend is not only limited to member countries, but also optimizes the regional business environment. The greater flexibility and comfort shown by RCEP can better meet the supply chain and innovation needs of each member, and is expected to be more effective in goods. In the fields of trade, service trade, investment and rules, achieve a balance of interests among economies at different levels of development in the region; RCEP adopts a step-by-step, step-by-step approach to continuously upgrade market access and economic and trade rules to ensure the openness and high quality of the agreement . It can be seen that RCEP fully embodies the greatest common divisor of the development demands of member states, and will guide economic globalization towards a more open, inclusive, inclusive, balanced and win-win direction. In the face of emerging global problems and challenges, we should adhere to openness, inclusiveness, consultation and cooperation, uphold and maintain multilateralism, and actively promote the building of a community with a shared future for mankind. Historical experience shows that only by fully considering and balancing inclusiveness, diversity and flexibility can the process of regional economic integration be effectively promoted. RCEP is a new attempt by China and other East Asian member states to participate in the regional trade and investment cooperation mechanism. It helps to promote the formulation of economic governance rules in emerging fields in a balanced and inclusive manner, and contributes new ideas and new solutions to improve participation in the reform of the global economic governance system. It will become a new milestone leading the reform and improvement of the global economic governance system. (Author: Shen Minghui, special researcher at the Research Center for Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, Chinese Academy of Social Sciences, Vice President and Researcher of the Institute of Asia-Pacific and Global Strategy, Chinese Academy of Social Sciences)

title: 奋力走好新时代的“赶考”路
text:
【光明论坛】
党的十九届六中全会通过的《中共中央关于党的百年奋斗重大成就和历史经验的决议》指出：“现在，党团结带领中国人民又踏上了实现第二个百年奋斗目标新的赶考之路。时代是出卷人，我们是答卷人，人民是阅卷人。我们一定要继续考出好成绩，在新时代新征程上展现新气象新作为。”这是在“两个一百年”奋斗目标的历史交汇点，我们党总结历史、把握当下、展望未来，宣告的奋斗姿态和做出的庄严承诺，体现了我们党“赶考”永远在路上的清醒和自觉。实现中华民族伟大复兴的中国梦，目标美好而崇高、任务艰巨而繁重，需要我们乘势而上、再接再厉，奋力走好新时代的“赶考”路。
“赶考”，对于中国共产党的百年历史而言具有特殊而重要的意义，它生动展现出中国共产党矢志践行初心使命、筚路蓝缕奠基立业、创造辉煌开辟未来的奋斗姿态。在一定程度上说，永远在路上“赶考”的精神状态，是我们取得一个又一个伟大胜利、交出一份又一份优异答卷的成功密码。在庆祝中国共产党成立100周年大会上，习近平总书记强调：“过去一百年，中国共产党向人民、向历史交出了一份优异的答卷。现在，中国共产党团结带领中国人民又踏上了实现第二个百年奋斗目标新的赶考之路。”时代不同，内涵有别。新时代新征程，我们必须把握“赶考”的时代意义和内涵要求，奋力开拓、勇毅前行，继续书写“赶考”新篇章。
党的十八大以来，党和国家事业取得历史性成就、发生历史性变革，根本在于以习近平同志为核心的党中央的坚强领导，在于习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想的科学指导。党确立习近平同志党中央的核心、全党的核心地位，确立习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想的指导地位，反映了全党全军全国各族人民共同心愿，对新时代党和国家事业发展、对推进中华民族伟大复兴历史进程具有决定性意义。新的“赶考”之路上，我们必须增强“四个意识”，坚定“四个自信”，做到“两个维护”，把“两个确立”真正转化为做到“两个维护”的思想自觉、政治自觉、行动自觉，团结一致向前进。
过去的成功经验,是今后继续成功的法宝。一百年来，党领导人民进行伟大奋斗，在进取中突破，于挫折中奋起，从总结中提高，积累了宝贵的历史经验。《中共中央关于党的百年奋斗重大成就和历史经验的决议》深刻总结了我们党百年奋斗的历史经验：坚持党的领导，坚持人民至上，坚持理论创新，坚持独立自主，坚持中国道路，坚持胸怀天下，坚持开拓创新，坚持敢于斗争，坚持统一战线，坚持自我革命。这“十个坚持”是经过长期实践积累的宝贵经验，是党和人民共同创造的精神财富，新的“赶考”路上，必须倍加珍惜、长期坚持，并在新时代实践中不断丰富和发展。
本领强、素质高，是考出好成绩的关键和保障。新的“赶考”之路上，来自各方面的困难、风险、挑战肯定还会不断出现，关键看我们有没有克服它们、战胜它们、驾驭它们的本领。全党同志特别是各级领导干部要有本领不够的危机感，以时不我待的精神，一刻不停增强本领。只有全党本领不断增强了，第二个百年奋斗目标才能实现，中华民族伟大复兴的中国梦才能梦想成真。当前，第一个百年目标已经顺利实现，实现第二个百年奋斗目标同样需要全党深刻认识和有效克服能力不足危险，不断提高学习本领、政治领导本领、改革创新本领、科学发展本领、依法执政本领、群众工作本领、狠抓落实本领、驾驭风险本领，发扬斗争精神，增强斗争本领，以过硬本领赢得主动、赢得优势、赢得未来。
（作者：李林宝，系媒体评论员）

title:
兜牢民生底线
不断强化社会救助保障
text:
河北民政系统坚决履行兜底保障政治责任，不断改革和完善社会救助制度，持续推进巩固拓展脱贫攻坚成果同乡村振兴有效衔接，更好地保障困难群众的基本生活。


打造多层次救助体系。低保、特困等基本生活救助政策有效落实，截至目前，全省共保障城乡低保对象167.9万人，城乡特困供养人员25.6万人。落实乡镇（街道）临时救助备用金制度，及时对遭遇突发性、临时性困难的群众提供急难救助，实施临时救助18.8万人次，救助流浪乞讨人员2.6万人次。通过政府购买服务、签订照料护理协议等方式，为社会救助家庭中的老年人、未成年人、残疾人提供访视和照料服务，形成“物质+服务”救助方式。省市县三级192家社会救助基金会共筹集资金9.7亿元，截至目前，共救助1916人、支出870余万元。


完善社会救助制度体系。印发《河北省低保边缘家庭认定办法》《河北省特困人员认定办法》和《关于完善城乡居民最低生活保障标准制定和动态调整机制的实施方案》等政策文件。全省城乡低保平均保障标准分别达到每人每月711元、每人每年5573元。


巩固拓展脱贫攻坚成果。印发《关于巩固拓展民政领域脱贫攻坚成果同乡村振兴有效衔接实施方案》等文件，加强对未纳入兜底保障范围内的脱贫人口、易返贫致贫人口等重点人口的监测，坚决避免因“脱保”“漏保”等造成规模性返贫。截至目前，全省223.4万名脱贫人口中，社会救助兜底保障78.5万人，占35%。


加强低收入人口动态监测。初步建成低收入人口数据库，除包含低保对象、特困人员外，还纳入低保边缘人口47.9万人、脱贫不稳定户4.5万人、边缘易致贫户5.6万人、因病因灾因意外事故等突发严重困难人口0.4万人，为开展低收入人口动态监测和常态化救助帮扶奠定了坚实基础。
en_title: Embrace the bottom line of people's livelihood and continuously strengthen social assistance and security
en_text: The Hebei civil affairs system resolutely fulfilled its political responsibility to ensure the bottom line, continuously reformed and improved the social assistance system, continued to promote the effective connection between the consolidation and expansion of poverty alleviation achievements and rural revitalization, and better guarantee the basic life of the people in need. Create a multi-level assistance system. Basic living assistance policies such as subsistence allowances and extreme poverty have been effectively implemented. Up to now, the province has guaranteed a total of 1.679 million urban and rural subsistence allowances and 256,000 urban and rural poor supporters. Implement the temporary assistance reserve fund system for townships (sub-districts), and provide emergency assistance to people who encounter sudden and temporary difficulties in a timely manner. Through government purchase of services, signing of care and nursing agreements, etc., visits and care services are provided for the elderly, minors, and disabled people in social assistance families, forming a "material + service" assistance method. A total of 970 million yuan has been raised by 192 social assistance foundations at the provincial, municipal and county levels. So far, a total of 1,916 people have been rescued and more than 8.7 million yuan has been spent. Improve the social assistance system. Policy documents such as the Measures for the Identification of Families with Minimum Living Allowances in Hebei Province, the Measures for the Identification of Extremely Poor Persons in Hebei Province, and the Implementation Plan for Improving the Mechanism for Establishing and Dynamic Adjustment of Minimum Living Security Standards for Urban and Rural Residents were issued. The province's urban and rural subsistence allowances averaged 711 yuan per month and 5,573 yuan per person per year, respectively. Consolidate and expand the achievements of poverty alleviation. Documents such as the "Implementation Plan on Consolidating and Expanding the Achievements of Poverty Alleviation in the Field of Civil Affairs and Effectively Connecting with Rural Revitalization" and other documents were issued to strengthen the monitoring of key populations such as those who were not included in the scope of basic guarantees and those who were prone to return to poverty. "The "missing guarantee" and so on have resulted in a large-scale return to poverty. Up to now, among the 2.234 million people lifted out of poverty in the province, 785,000 people have been covered by social assistance, accounting for 35%. Strengthen dynamic monitoring of low-income population. A low-income population database has been preliminarily established. In addition to subsistence allowances and people in extreme poverty, it also includes 479,000 people at the edge of subsistence allowances, 45,000 people who are unstable in poverty alleviation, 56,000 people who are prone to poverty at the edge, and accidents caused by disasters and accidents. The population of 40,000 people with sudden and severe difficulties has laid a solid foundation for the development of dynamic monitoring of low-income population and normalized assistance.

title: 牢牢把握共抓大保护、不搞大开发战略导向 扎实推动长江经济带高质量发展
text:
中共中央政治局常委、国务院副总理、推动长江经济带发展领导小组组长韩正23日主持召开推动长江经济带发展领导小组全体会议，深入学习贯彻习近平总书记重要讲话和指示批示精神，贯彻落实党的十九届六中全会精神和中央经济工作会议部署，审议有关文件，研究部署推动长江经济带高质量发展重点工作。
韩正表示，近年来各有关部门和沿江省市认真贯彻落实党中央、国务院决策部署，推动长江生态环境保护取得了阶段性成效，成绩值得充分肯定。下一步，要完整、准确、全面贯彻新发展理念，牢牢把握共抓大保护、不搞大开发的战略导向，坚持问题导向的工作方法，以重点突破带动整体工作有力有序有效推进，扎实推动长江经济带高质量发展。
韩正强调，要高质量编制好长江国土空间规划，形成管用、可操作的“底图”。要抓好水污染防治和水生态修复，做好长江“十年禁渔”工作，加强河湖岸线保护，探索建立生态产品价值实现机制。要加快长江黄金水道建设，推进航道、船舶、港口和通关管理“四个标准化”，大力发展多式联运。要加强城乡区域协调联动发展，谋划好产业协同发展。要推动高水平对外开放，强化长三角引领带动作用，提高中上游地区开放水平，深度融入“一带一路”建设。要加强调查研究，切实提高解决问题的针对性和有效性。
刘鹤、李强、陈敏尔、何立峰出席会议，推动长江经济带发展领导小组成员、领导小组办公室以及有关部门单位负责同志参加会议。会议以电视电话会议形式召开，长江经济带11省市设分会场。
据新华社电
en_title: Firmly grasp the strategic orientation of cooperating with large-scale protection and not large-scale development, and solidly promote the high-quality development of the Yangtze River Economic Belt
en_text: Han Zheng, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee, Vice Premier of the State Council, and head of the leading group for promoting the development of the Yangtze River Economic Belt, presided over a plenary meeting of the leading group for promoting the development of the Yangtze River Economic Belt on the 23rd. The spirit of the Sixth Plenary Session of the 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and the deployment of the Central Economic Work Conference, reviewed relevant documents, and studied and deployed key tasks to promote the high-quality development of the Yangtze River Economic Belt. Han Zheng said that in recent years, relevant departments and provinces and cities along the Yangtze River have conscientiously implemented the decisions and deployments of the Party Central Committee and the State Council, and have achieved phased results in promoting the ecological and environmental protection of the Yangtze River, and the achievements are worthy of full recognition. In the next step, we must fully, accurately and comprehensively implement the new development concept, firmly grasp the strategic orientation of focusing on large-scale protection and not engaging in large-scale development, adhere to the problem-oriented work method, and use key breakthroughs to drive the overall work to advance in a strong, orderly and effective manner. Promote the high-quality development of the Yangtze River Economic Belt. Han Zheng emphasized that it is necessary to formulate the land and space planning of the Yangtze River with high quality and form a useful and operable "base map". It is necessary to do a good job in the prevention and control of water pollution and the restoration of water ecology, do a good job in the "ten-year fishing ban" in the Yangtze River, strengthen the protection of river and lake shorelines, and explore the establishment of a mechanism for realizing the value of ecological products. It is necessary to speed up the construction of the golden waterway of the Yangtze River, promote the "four standardizations" of management of waterways, ships, ports and customs clearance, and vigorously develop multimodal transport. It is necessary to strengthen the coordinated development of urban and rural areas, and plan the coordinated development of industries. It is necessary to promote high-level opening to the outside world, strengthen the leading role of the Yangtze River Delta, improve the level of opening up in the middle and upper reaches, and deeply integrate into the "Belt and Road" construction. It is necessary to strengthen investigation and research, and effectively improve the pertinence and effectiveness of solving problems. Liu He, Li Qiang, Chen Min'er, and He Lifeng attended the meeting, and members of the Leading Group to Promote the Development of the Yangtze River Economic Belt, the Office of the Leading Group and the responsible comrades of relevant departments attended the meeting. The meeting was held in the form of a video and teleconference, with branch venues set up in 11 provinces and cities in the Yangtze River Economic Belt. According to Xinhua News Agency

title: 全国一体化政务服务平台“助企纾困服务专区”上线
text:
据新华社北京12月23日电 为贯彻落实中央经济工作会议和国务院常务会议关于帮助市场主体特别是中小微企业、个体工商户减负纾困、恢复发展的部署要求，日前，全国一体化政务服务平台上线“助企纾困服务专区”，推动惠企政策对广大市场主体直达直享和在线办理，减轻企业负担，激发市场主体活力。
    专区设置了“惠企政策一键直达”“助企服务一网通办”和“意见建议一站征求”三个服务栏目，利用大数据手段为企业“精准画像”，推动助企纾困政策对企业的精准化匹配、个性化推送、一站式办理，形成助企纾困政策查询、办理、反馈、完善的管理闭环，推动各类办事服务好办易办，让企业更快速、更便捷、更精准地享受政策、直达办事服务。
    专区汇聚了各地区、各部门出台的最新助企纾困政策，为企业提供政策智能推荐、项目匹配、申报月历、政策评价等服务，一站式汇聚部门和地方推出的“政策匹配自测”“免申即享”等创新服务，并关联相关政策的可申报项目和服务，实现政策对企业的精准匹配、精准直达，方便企业快速了解和兑现扶持政策。专区整合了各地区各部门为落实助企纾困政策所提供的网上办事服务，支持企业查看和办理企业开办、用工招聘、生产经营等涉企“一件事”服务，初步实现助企纾困政策相关办事服务一站查询、一站办理。同时，企业可通过专区直达各地区建设的惠企服务专栏和国务院部门相关助企纾困办事服务，方便企业精准直达快享相关服务。目前，专区已汇聚地方、部门出台的助企纾困政策842条、关联办事服务1200项，其中“免申即享”政策101条，相关政策在持续丰富完善中。
en_title: The national integrated government service platform "helping enterprises in distress service area" was launched
en_text: According to Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, December 23, in order to implement the deployment requirements of the Central Economic Work Conference and the State Council Executive Meeting on helping market entities, especially small and medium-sized enterprises, individual industrial and commercial households to relieve their burdens, relieve their burdens, and resume development, a few days ago, the national integrated government service The platform has launched a "service area for helping enterprises and bailouts" to promote the direct enjoyment and online processing of favorable enterprise policies for the majority of market entities, so as to reduce the burden on enterprises and stimulate the vitality of market entities. The special area has set up three service columns: "One-click direct access to corporate policies", "One-stop service for corporate assistance" and "One-stop solicitation of opinions and suggestions", using big data means to "accurate portraits" of enterprises, and to promote the assistance and rescue policies for enterprises. Accurate matching, personalized push, and one-stop processing have formed a closed-loop management of inquiries, processing, feedback, and sound management of assistance policies for enterprises, promoting various types of services to be easier to handle, and making enterprises faster, more convenient, and more efficient. Accurately enjoy policies and direct office services. The special area brings together the latest rescue policies issued by various regions and departments to provide enterprises with intelligent policy recommendation, project matching, application calendar, policy evaluation and other services. Innovative services such as "free application and enjoyment", and related policies and declarable projects and services, to achieve precise matching and direct access between policies and enterprises, and to facilitate enterprises to quickly understand and implement support policies. The special area integrates the online service services provided by various regions and departments to implement the relief policy for enterprises, supports enterprises to view and handle "one thing" services related to business establishment, employment recruitment, production and operation, etc., and initially realize the relief of enterprises. One-stop inquiry and one-stop processing of policy-related services. At the same time, enterprises can use the special zone to directly access the service columns for benefiting enterprises built in various regions and the relevant assistance and relief services of the State Council departments, so as to facilitate enterprises to directly and quickly enjoy relevant services. At present, the special area has gathered 842 government assistance policies and 1,200 related services issued by local governments and departments, including 101 "free application and enjoy" policies, and relevant policies are being continuously enriched and improved.

title: 着力稳外贸，国务院这些判断和部署有深意
text:
把退税平均时间压缩至6个工作日以内、培育一批离岸贸易中心城市（地区）、鼓励银行有针对性开展远期结售汇业务……日前召开的国务院常务会议，就做好跨周期调节、推动外贸稳定发展列出一系列重要部署和具体举措。
　　今年我国外贸干得怎么样？会议指出，今年我国进出口快速增长，为稳定经济增长作出重要贡献。在形势研判方面，会议表示当前外贸面临不确定不稳定不平衡因素增多。
　　海关统计显示，今年前11个月，我国进出口总值35.39万亿元，同比增长22%，比2019年同期增长24%，超过去年全年总量。
　　会议要求，加强对进出口的政策支持。具体而言，会议提出落实减税降费措施；加快出口退税进度，把退税平均时间压缩至6个工作日以内；引导银行结合外贸企业需求创新保单融资等产品；保持人民币汇率基本稳定，鼓励银行有针对性开展远期结售汇业务，提升外贸企业应对汇率风险能力等要求。
　　国家金融与发展实验室副主任曾刚表示，日前，中国人民银行上调金融机构外汇存款准备金率2个百分点，有助于平抑汇率波动对外贸企业的影响。“与此同时，还需要金融机构积极为外贸企业，特别是中小微企业提供汇率风险管理工具和服务，更好实现保市场主体、稳定就业。”
　　近年来，跨境电商等外贸新业态蓬勃发展。会议提出，增设跨境电子商务综合试验区，培育一批离岸贸易中心城市（地区），按照市场化方式加大对建设使用海外仓的支持，优化跨境电商零售商品进口清单、扩大进口类别。
　　针对外贸企业普遍面临的运费压力，会议作出“鼓励外贸企业和航运企业签订长期协议”“依法依规打击违规收费、哄抬运价等行为”“支持金融机构向符合条件的小微外贸企业提供物流方面的普惠性金融支持”等部署。
　　2022年1月1日，区域全面经济伙伴关系协定（RCEP）将正式生效实施。这次会议对生效后实施工作也作出相应部署。
　　会议指出，鼓励企业用好成员国降税、区域原产地累积规则等，扩大优势产品出口和有竞争力的产品进口。
　　会议还提出，建立自贸协定实施公共服务平台和专家队伍，通过政府购买服务方式进一步加强对中小微企业的培训，提升理解和应用协定规则能力。发展通关、单证等专业化服务，为中小微企业提供便利。
　　商务部研究院对外贸易研究所所长梁明等业内人士指出，RCEP生效将为我国企业开拓区域市场提供良机，与此同时，企业跨境投资成本也将随之降低，对于优化区域内资源配置、夯实区域产业链供应链稳定性意义重大。
　　（据新华社北京12月23日电 记者刘红霞 张千千）
en_title: Focusing on stabilizing foreign trade, these judgments and deployments of the State Council are meaningful
en_text: Compressing the average tax refund time to less than 6 working days, cultivating a group of offshore trade center cities (regions), and encouraging banks to carry out targeted forward foreign exchange settlement and sales business... The State Council executive meeting held a few days ago will do a good job of inter-cycle A series of important arrangements and specific measures are listed for regulating and promoting the stable development of foreign trade. How is my country's foreign trade doing this year? The meeting pointed out that the rapid growth of my country's imports and exports this year has made important contributions to stabilizing economic growth. In terms of situation research and judgment, the meeting stated that the current foreign trade is facing an increase in uncertain, unstable and unbalanced factors. Customs statistics show that in the first 11 months of this year, my country's total import and export value was 35.39 trillion yuan, a year-on-year increase of 22%, an increase of 24% over the same period in 2019, and exceeded the total last year. The meeting called for strengthening policy support for import and export. Specifically, the meeting proposed to implement measures to reduce taxes and fees; speed up the progress of export tax rebates, and reduce the average tax rebate time to less than 6 working days; guide banks to innovate products such as insurance policy financing according to the needs of foreign trade enterprises; keep the RMB exchange rate basically stable, encourage banks to Carry out forward foreign exchange settlement and sales business in a targeted manner, and improve the requirements for foreign trade enterprises to cope with exchange rate risks. Zeng Gang, deputy director of the National Finance and Development Laboratory, said that recently, the People's Bank of China raised the foreign exchange deposit reserve ratio of financial institutions by 2 percentage points, which will help smooth the impact of exchange rate fluctuations on foreign trade enterprises. "At the same time, financial institutions are also required to actively provide foreign trade enterprises, especially small and medium-sized enterprises with exchange rate risk management tools and services, so as to better protect market entities and stabilize employment." In recent years, new forms of foreign trade such as cross-border e-commerce have flourished. develop. The meeting proposed to add a comprehensive cross-border e-commerce pilot zone, cultivate a number of offshore trade center cities (regions), increase support for the construction and use of overseas warehouses in a market-oriented manner, optimize the import list of cross-border e-commerce retail commodities, and expand imports. category. In response to the freight pressure generally faced by foreign trade enterprises, the meeting made "encourage foreign trade enterprises and shipping enterprises to sign long-term agreements", "strike illegal charges and drive up freight prices in accordance with laws and regulations", and "support financial institutions to provide logistics to eligible small and micro foreign trade enterprises". Inclusive financial support” and other deployments. On January 1, 2022, the Regional Comprehensive Economic Partnership (RCEP) will come into effect. The meeting also made corresponding arrangements for the implementation work after it came into effect. The meeting pointed out that enterprises are encouraged to make good use of the tax reduction of member states and the accumulation of regional origin rules, etc., to expand the export of competitive products and the import of competitive products. The meeting also proposed to establish a public service platform and a team of experts for the implementation of the free trade agreement, further strengthen the training of small, medium and micro enterprises through government purchase of services, and improve the ability to understand and apply the rules of the agreement. Develop professional services such as customs clearance and documents to provide convenience for small, medium and micro enterprises. Liang Ming, director of the Foreign Trade Research Institute of the Ministry of Commerce Research Institute, and other industry insiders pointed out that the entry into force of RCEP will provide Chinese enterprises with a good opportunity to develop regional markets. . It is of great significance to consolidate the stability of the regional industrial chain and supply chain. (According to Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, December 23, reporter Liu Hongxia and Zhang Qianqian)

title: 宜川：“一村一警”零距离守护群众安宁
text:
□本报记者 谢 岗 通讯员 李花花
    “这是我局‘一村一警’作战图，每一个标记就是一个行政村对应的一名警力，做到了警力和辖区的全覆盖……”12月7日，在陕西省宜川县公安局“一村一警”办公室，民警指着墙上的地图向记者介绍着。
    民辅警人人都有“责任田”
    为了践行以“人民为中心”的发展理念，让“枫桥经验”在宜川开花结果，破解农村防范薄弱、治安复杂、警力不足现状，探索基层治理的有效路径，2020年，宜川县公安局决定实施“一村一警”机制，让机关124名民警辅警下沉到全县112个行政村、4个社区，配合当地派出所民警共同开展、防范、宣传、服务等基层基础工作。
    据宜川县公安局党委委员、政工室主任李江龙介绍，为了确保“一村一警”工作扎实开展，该局专门成立了工作机构，制定了“一村一警”工作实施方案，以“访民情、解民忧、化矛盾、防风险、查问题、治乱点”为主要内容，把创建“零发案、零犯罪、零事故、矛盾零上交”平安示范村（社区）为工作目标，建立分色走访、重点工作目标、信息登记、领导包抓、线索转递、联动宣传、考核奖惩七项工作机制，切实把爱心服务送到群众身边，把矛盾风险化解在群众身边，把平安幸福守护在群众身边，努力实现基础牢、出事少、治安好的工作目标。
    为民解忧获群众点赞
    “只要机关工作抽开空，我都会自己驾车来到村里，了解村民所需，和村民们聊聊近况……”记者采访当日，正巧碰见宜川县公安局指挥中心辅警颜荣正要前往她所包抓的甘义沟村。一同前往的路上，颜荣向记者介绍着包村以来的点点滴滴。
    “这是工作纪实本、这是移动警务通、手电筒、警民联系卡、防范电信网络诈骗宣传册……”在颜荣所带的警务工作包里，记者看到了她每次到村上时所带的众多工作资料。打开颜荣的“一村一警”工作纪实本，详细记录着村子的治安、矛盾纠纷化解、进村入户等情况。
    “经常有警察来，‘一村一警’让大伙儿有了安全感，我们双手称赞！”提到宜川县公安局正在开展的“一村一警”工作，村民柴海军连连称赞。“自从颜荣开始驻村后，我们的联系方便多了，随时有问题随时打电话，在反诈宣传、业务办理、纠纷调解等方面都做了很多工作。”柴海军告诉记者，对于村民来说，颜荣不仅仅是一位负责任的好辅警，更像是大家的“亲戚”，因为她的心里常惦记着乡亲们。
    自掏腰包给独居老人过生日、为生活困难老人申请补助和社会救助、帮群众代办业务……“一个人的力量毕竟是有限的，我想发动身边更多的力量来帮助较为困难的群众，切切实实为群众办实事、办好事。”颜荣说。
    驻村守护辖区平安
    “接警数下降34%、刑事立案数下降17%、行政受案数下降27%、纠纷数下降41%。”对于“一村一警”长效工作机制，感触最为深刻的是基层派出所民警。
    英旺派出所所长付国平在当地工作已经有10余年，全所5名民警要负责辖区6000余名群众的安宁。英旺乡辖区流动人口较多，人员构成较为复杂，社会治安管理压力较大。
    “自从该项工作实施后，最为明显的是发案率得到了有效控制，辖区的治安案件现在每年发案数在10至12起，大大减少了基层派出所的压力，也有效缓解了基层警力不足的困难。”付国平说：就拿茹坪村为例，作为1000余人的大村子，发生一些治安案件在所难免，以前打架、赌博等案件时有发生，但是有了驻村民警后，通过有效预防化解，现在是零发案村组，且乡风文明、邻里关系和谐有序。
    如今在宜川，每个行政村都设立了警务工作站或警务工作室，在为群众安全保驾护航的同时，也是掌握社情民意的“信息点”，处理治安问题的“执勤点”、为民便民的“服务点”，切实做到了“矛盾不上交、平安不出事、服务不缺位”。
    据了解，宜川县公安局“一村一警”长效工作实施以来，扎实开展“我为群众办实事”实践活动，已累计为群众办实事157件，积极协调8家单位为19名特殊群体儿童爱心助学，倡议社会爱心企业和爱心人士为4名大学生和15名中小学生每年捐款2000元，联合筹划为50名家庭特殊小学生开展捐赠。
en_title: Yichuan: "One Village, One Police" to protect the peace of the masses
en_text: □ Li Huahua, correspondent of this newspaper reporter Xie Gang, "This is our bureau's 'one village, one police officer' battle map. Each mark is a police force corresponding to an administrative village, and the full coverage of the police force and the area under its jurisdiction has been achieved..." December 7 , In the "One Village One Police" office of the Public Security Bureau of Yichuan County, Shaanxi Province, the police pointed to the map on the wall and introduced the reporter to the reporter. Everyone has a "responsibility field". In order to practice the "people-centered" development concept, let the "Fengqiao Experience" blossom and bear fruit in Yichuan, solve the current situation of weak prevention, complicated public security, and insufficient police force in rural areas, and explore the grassroots An effective path for governance. In 2020, the Yichuan County Public Security Bureau decided to implement the "one village, one police officer" mechanism, allowing 124 police auxiliary police officers from the agency to go to 112 administrative villages and 4 communities in the county to cooperate with the local police station police. , prevention, publicity, service and other basic work at the grassroots level. According to Li Jianglong, member of the Party Committee and Director of the Political Work Office of the Yichuan County Public Security Bureau, in order to ensure the solid development of the work of "one police officer in one village", the bureau has set up a special working organization and formulated an implementation plan for "one police officer in one village". The main content is to interview people's feelings, solve people's worries, resolve conflicts, prevent risks, investigate problems, and deal with chaotic points, and create a safe demonstration village (community) with "zero incidents, zero crimes, zero accidents, and zero turnover of contradictions" as the work. The goal is to establish seven working mechanisms of color separation visits, key work goals, information registration, leadership package capture, clue forwarding, joint publicity, assessment, reward and punishment, so as to effectively deliver loving services to the masses, resolve conflicts and risks around the masses, and reduce risks to the masses. Peace and happiness will be guarded by the masses, and efforts will be made to achieve the goal of solid foundations, fewer accidents, and good public security. "As long as there is time in the work of the agency, I will drive to the village by myself to understand the needs of the villagers and chat with the villagers about the current situation..." On the day of the interview, the reporter happened to meet the command center of the Yichuan County Public Security Bureau Auxiliary police officer Yan Rong was about to go to Ganyigou Village, which she had captured. On the way to go together, Yan Rong introduced to the reporter every bit of the story since Baocun. "This is a work record book, this is a mobile police service, a flashlight, a police-community contact card, a brochure on preventing telecommunication and network fraud..." In the police work bag that Yan Rong brought, the reporter saw her every time she went to Murakami. A lot of work information with you. Open Yan Rong's "One Village, One Police" work record book, which records in detail the village's public security, resolution of conflicts and disputes, and entry into the village and households. "The police often come, and 'one policeman in one village' gives everyone a sense of security. We applaud with both hands!" The villager Chai Haijun repeatedly praised the work of "one policeman in one village" being carried out by the Yichuan County Public Security Bureau. "Since Yan Rong has been stationed in the village, our contact has become much more convenient. We can call anytime if there is any problem. We have done a lot of work in anti-fraud publicity, business handling, and dispute mediation." Chai Haijun told reporters that for the villagers to come Said that Yan Rong is not only a good and responsible auxiliary police officer, but more like everyone's "relatives", because she always thinks about the villagers in her heart. Paying for the birthday of the elderly living alone, applying for subsidies and social assistance for the elderly in difficulties, helping the masses to do business... "After all, one's power is limited, and I want to mobilize more power around me to help the more difficult people. Do practical things and good deeds for the masses." Yan Rong said. The number of police received dropped by 34%, the number of criminal cases dropped by 17%, the number of administrative cases dropped by 27%, and the number of disputes dropped by 41%.” The most profound feeling about the long-term working mechanism of “one village, one police officer” It's the grassroots police station. Fu Guoping, the director of Yingwang Police Station, has been working in the local area for more than 10 years. The five policemen of the station are responsible for the tranquility of the more than 6,000 people in the area. In Yingwang Township, there are many floating population, the composition of personnel is more complex, and the management of social security is under great pressure. "Since the implementation of this work, the most obvious thing is that the incidence rate has been effectively controlled. The number of public security cases in the jurisdiction is now 10 to 12 cases per year, which has greatly reduced the pressure on the grassroots police stations and effectively alleviated the lack of grassroots police forces. Fu Guoping said: Take Ruping Village as an example, as a large village of more than 1,000 people, it is inevitable that some security cases will occur. In the past, cases such as fighting and gambling occurred from time to time, but after the police stationed in the village, the Effective prevention and resolution, it is now a zero-incident village group, and the township is civilized and the neighborhood relationship is harmonious and orderly. Now in Yichuan, every administrative village has set up a police work station or a police work studio. While escorting the safety of the masses, it is also an "information point" for grasping social conditions and public opinion, a "duty point" for dealing with public security issues, and a The "service point" for the convenience of the people has effectively achieved "no conflict, no accident, no lack of service". It is understood that since the implementation of the long-term work of "one village, one police officer" by the Yichuan County Public Security Bureau, it has carried out the practical activities of "I do practical things for the masses". The group of children loves to help students, advocates social caring enterprises and caring people to donate 2,000 yuan each year to 4 college students and 15 primary and secondary school students, and jointly plans to make donations for 50 special families.

title: 东莞1498万大奖得主获奖一周后兑奖
text:
在东莞福彩中出12月第三个千万大奖的隔天，当月第一个千万大奖得主才姗姗来迟兑奖。
12月5日，“双色球”第2021139期开奖，当期全国开出一等奖14注，单注奖金7490724元。东莞寮步彩民凭借一张4元1注2倍投单式机选票揽获总奖金1498万多元的双色球大奖。
12月13日下午，大奖得主赖先生（化名）才在儿女陪同下来到东莞市福彩中心兑奖。
现场，工作人员问起赖先生为何一周后才来领奖。“差点就错过大奖。”赖先生回答。原来，由于最近身体不舒服，赖先生买了彩票后的第二天就回到老家休养，因而没有及时核对开奖号码。由于旅途奔波，他把彩票遗忘在外套的口袋里，直到开奖后的第五天下午，赖先生偶然翻出口袋里的彩票，才想起核对中奖号码。
要不是这个偶然动作，他很有可能就与大奖擦肩而过。
赖先生反复核对号码后，立刻打电话告知在外地工作的几个儿女。为了见证兑奖时刻，儿女们都特意来到东莞陪父亲一起兑奖。
据赖先生介绍，他今年50多岁，是一位资深彩民，从上世纪90年代就开始购买彩票了。“刚开始是看到别人去买，自己也跟着买。”赖先生说，既能做公益，又有中大奖的可能，于是一买便是20多年。
在2000年左右，赖先生做起了小买卖，买彩票的投入也多了，每期“双色球”开奖都要买上一百多元。不过，新冠肺炎疫情发生后，赖先生每期“双色球”的投入也随之降到了十元以下。
这次能够中得大奖，对赖先生来说是雪中送炭。对于这1498万元福彩奖金，他已经有了初步的打算。赖先生计划先将欠下的债务还清，剩下的将用于二次创业。
“福彩给了我这份幸运，我要好好利用。”他说。
en_title: Dongguan 14.98 million award winners redeem their awards one week later
en_text: The day after the Dongguan Welfare Lottery's third tens of millions in December, the winner of the first tens of millions of the month was long in coming to claim the prize. On December 5th, the 2021139th issue of "Double Color Ball" was drawn. In the current period, 14 first prizes were drawn nationwide, with a single bet bonus of 7,490,724 yuan. Liaobu lottery players in Dongguan won the two-color ball award with a total prize of more than 14.98 million yuan by virtue of a single-machine vote of 4 yuan, 1 note and 2 times. On the afternoon of December 13, the grand prize winner, Mr. Lai (pseudonym), accompanied by his children, went to the Dongguan Welfare Lottery Center to redeem the prize. At the scene, the staff asked why Mr. Lai did not come to accept the award until a week later. "I almost missed the grand prize," Mr. Lai replied. It turned out that due to recent physical discomfort, Mr. Lai returned to his hometown to recuperate the day after he bought the lottery ticket, so he did not check the lottery numbers in time. Due to the long journey, he forgot the lottery ticket in his coat pocket. It was not until the afternoon of the fifth day after the draw that Mr. Lai accidentally dug out the lottery ticket in his pocket and remembered to check the winning numbers. If it weren't for this accidental move, he would probably have missed the big prize. After double-checking the numbers, Mr. Lai immediately called to inform his sons and daughters who were working in other places. In order to witness the moment of redemption, the sons and daughters came to Dongguan to accompany their father to redeem the prize. According to Mr. Lai, he is in his 50s and is a senior lottery player who has been buying lottery tickets since the 1990s. "In the beginning, I saw other people buy it, and I bought it myself." Mr. Lai said that he can not only do public welfare, but also have the possibility of winning the big prize, so he bought it for more than 20 years. Around 2000, Mr. Lai started a small business and invested a lot in buying lottery tickets. He had to buy more than 100 yuan for each "two-color ball" lottery draw. However, after the outbreak of the new crown pneumonia, Mr. Lai's investment in each "two-color ball" has also dropped to less than ten yuan. To be able to win the grand prize this time is a relief for Mr. Lai. For the 14.98 million yuan welfare lottery bonus, he already has a preliminary plan. Mr. Lai plans to pay off the debt he owes first, and the rest will be used for the second venture. "The lucky lottery gave me this luck, and I want to make good use of it," he said.

title: 福州市人民代表大会常务委员会关于修改《福州市历史文化名城保护条例》的决定(2021)
text:
福州市人民代表大会常务委员会关于修改《福州市历史文化名城保护条例》的决定(2021)
            

福州市人民代表大会常务委员会公告

（〔十五届〕第四十一号）




　　《福州市人民代表大会常务委员会关于修改〈福州市历史文化名城保护条例〉的决定》已于2021年10月28日经福州市第十五届人民代表大会常务委员会第四十次会议通过，于2021年12月15日经福建省第十三届人民代表大会常务委员会第三十次会议批准，现予公布，自公布之日起施行。

     福州市人民代表大会常务委员会


　　2021年12月22日





福州市人民代表大会常务委员会关于修改《
福州市历史文化名城保护条例
》的决定

（2021年10月28日福州市第十五届人民代表大会常务委员会第四十次会议通过

2021年12月15日福建省第十三届人民代表大会常务委员会第三十次会议批准）




　　福州市第十五届人民代表大会常务委员会第四十次会议决定对《
福州市历史文化名城保护条例
》作如下修改：


　　



　　一、

将第一条修改为：“为了加强福州历史文化名城的保护和管理，继承和弘扬优秀历史文化，促进经济和社会协调发展，根据《
中华人民共和国城乡规划法
》《
历史文化名城名镇名村保护条例
》《
福建省历史文化名城名镇名村和传统村落保护条例
