title: 宁夏部署今冬明春疫情防控工作多部门联动，守住生态环境安全底线
text:
记者近日从宁夏回族自治区生态环境领域新冠肺炎疫情防控领导小组会议获悉，宁夏回族自治区已成立由生态环境、卫生健康、城乡建设、公安等部门工作人员组成的医疗废物处置工作专班，在严格落实常态化疫情防控措施的基础上，多部门联动，加强医疗废物全过程监管、完善疫情防控指挥体系、健全防控机制，科学精准防控今冬明春新冠肺炎疫情，守住生态环境安全底线。
　　根据《全区生态环境系统做好今冬明春新冠肺炎疫情防控工作实施方案》（以下简称《实施方案》）要求，宁夏回族自治区各市、县（区）要建立以政府分管领导为组长的疫情医疗废物应急处置工作专班，完善医疗废物应急处置机制，提升医疗废物收集、转运、处置能力，加强应急调度，解决突发问题，确保一旦出现突发疫情，在1小时内由常态化转向应急化。同时，严格对定点医院、医疗废物处置单位、医疗废物协同应急处置单位医疗废物贮存、转运和处置工作进行监管检查，督促做好医疗废物规范管理，涉疫情医疗废物管理与处置，做到应收尽收、应处尽处、日产日清，确保涉疫情医疗废物优先处置，收集、转运、处置闭环管理。加强对医疗机构污水处理设施运行状况和污水消毒情况的监测监督检查，加强医疗污水和城镇污水监管，确保污水处理设施正常运行，污水经处理达标排放，消毒杀菌措施落实到位，实现医疗机构污水收集、处理、排放全链条监管。
　　按照《实施方案》，宁夏回族自治区将生态环境、卫生健康等部门以及医疗废物处置单位、医疗废物协同应急处置单位纳入应急体系，并明确定点医院集中隔离场所，封闭管理小区（村庄）涉疫情医疗废物及参照疫情医疗废物管理的生活垃圾收集、贮存规范要求，建立医疗废物应急运输、处置梯队，确保医疗废物应急处置有力有序开展；精准测算各类应急物资、防护物资、消毒物资需求，做好防疫物资准备，确保关键时刻拿得出、用得上。
　　记者崔万杰
en_title: Ningxia deploys multi-departmental linkage of epidemic prevention and control work this winter and next spring to keep the bottom line of ecological environment safety
en_text: The reporter recently learned from the meeting of the leading group for the prevention and control of the new crown pneumonia epidemic in the field of ecological environment of Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region that Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region has established a special class for medical waste disposal work composed of staff from the departments of ecological environment, health, urban and rural construction, and public security. On the basis of the implementation of normalized epidemic prevention and control measures, multi-departmental linkages should strengthen the supervision of the whole process of medical waste, improve the epidemic prevention and control command system, and improve the prevention and control mechanism, scientifically and accurately prevent and control the new crown pneumonia epidemic this winter and next spring, and maintain the bottom line of ecological environment safety. . According to the requirements of the "Implementation Plan for the Prevention and Control of the New Coronary Pneumonia Epidemic in This Winter and Next Spring" (hereinafter referred to as the "Implementation Plan") in the ecological environment system of the whole region, all cities and counties (districts) in the Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region shall establish a team led by the government leaders in charge. A special class for emergency disposal of medical waste in epidemic situation, improve the emergency disposal mechanism of medical waste, enhance the collection, transfer and disposal capacity of medical waste, strengthen emergency dispatch, solve emergencies, and ensure that once an emergency occurs, it will be transformed from normalization within 1 hour. emergency. At the same time, strictly supervise and inspect the storage, transfer and disposal of medical waste in designated hospitals, medical waste disposal units, and collaborative emergency disposal units of medical waste, and urge the standardized management of medical waste, the management and disposal of medical waste related to the epidemic, and the collection of receivables. Collect, dispose of, and clear daily production to ensure priority disposal of medical waste related to the epidemic, and closed-loop management of collection, transfer, and disposal. Strengthen the monitoring, supervision and inspection of the operation status of sewage treatment facilities and sewage disinfection in medical institutions, strengthen the supervision of medical sewage and urban sewage, ensure the normal operation of sewage treatment facilities, discharge sewage up to the standard after treatment, put disinfection and sterilization measures in place, and realize sewage collection in medical institutions. , treatment, emission of the whole chain supervision. According to the "Implementation Plan", the Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region has incorporated the departments of ecological environment, health and health, as well as medical waste disposal units and medical waste collaborative emergency disposal units into the emergency response system, and has clearly identified centralized isolation sites in hospitals, and closed the management community (village) for medical treatment related to the epidemic. Waste and domestic waste collection and storage requirements of epidemic medical waste management, establish medical waste emergency transportation and disposal echelon, ensure effective and orderly development of medical waste emergency disposal; Prepare anti-epidemic materials to ensure that they are available and used at critical moments. Reporter Cui Wanjie

title: 国安主帅比利奇要打翻身仗
text:
本报讯（记者 王洋）今晚，北京国安队将在2021赛季中超联赛第二阶段争冠组第四轮比赛中对阵积分榜上领先国安队1分的深圳队。国安队主帅比利奇在昨天的赛前发布会上表示，球队会拿出好的表现，扭转上一场大比分失利的不利局面，无论最终能否夺得冠军，都会尽可能派出最强阵容完成本阶段联赛。
日前，瑞士草蜢足球俱乐部官宣了国安队球员李磊加盟的消息。这也意味着本赛季结束后，李磊将离开国安前往欧洲踢球。对于后面几场比赛是否还会继续使用李磊首发的问题，比利奇答道：“李磊跟俱乐部的合同马上要到期了，他想去欧洲历练一下，也是很好的想法，我祝愿他今后一切顺利。目前他的身体状态和竞技状态都不错，我还是会随时使用他。”
其实，目前国安队的积分已经很难争夺联赛前三名，尤其在上轮惨败之后，已落后“领头羊”山东队15分，很多球迷发出希望球队更多使用年轻球员的呼声。对此，比利奇有不同看法，他说：“是的，这些年轻球员一直在跟我们一起集训，但我们身处争冠组，我们还是要为俱乐部的荣誉奋斗，并对联赛表示尊重，要尽量保证更好的成绩，因为每个名次都是不同的。后面还有5场比赛，我们还是尽可能派出最强阵容去面对。”
en_title: Guoan coach Bilic wants to turn around
en_text: News from this newspaper (Reporter Wang Yang) Tonight, Beijing Guoan will face Shenzhen, who are 1 point ahead of Guoan in the standings, in the fourth round of the second stage of the 2021 Chinese Super League championship group. Guo'an coach Bilic said at yesterday's pre-match press conference that the team will show a good performance and reverse the unfavorable situation of the previous big loss. The lineup completes this stage of the league. A few days ago, the official of the Swiss Grasshopper Football Club announced the news of the joining of Guoan player Li Lei. This also means that after this season, Li Lei will leave Guoan to play in Europe. In fact, it is difficult for the Guoan team to compete for the top three points in the league, especially after the disastrous defeat in the last round, which has fallen behind the "leaders" "Shandong team scored 15 points, and many fans expressed their hope that the team should use more young players. Bilic has a different view on this, he said: "Yes, these young players have been training with us, but we are in the championship group, we still have to fight for the honor of the club and show respect for the league, We must try our best to ensure better results, because each ranking is different. There are still 5 games left, and we still try to send the strongest team to face it.”

title: 最高法发文全方位加强对执行权的监督制约
text:
据新华社北京12月21日电 最高人民法院21日对外发布关于进一步完善执行权制约机制加强执行监督的意见，全方位加强对执行权的监督制约，把执行权关进“制度铁笼”和“数据铁笼”，确保高效公正规范善意文明执行。
    最高人民法院执行局副局长何东宁介绍，意见分为6个部分，共43条。其中明确提出要深化审判权与执行权分离。有效发挥审判、破产、国家赔偿程序对执行权的制约作用，避免以执代审、违法个别清偿，以及不及时启动国家赔偿程序侵害当事人权益；深化执行裁决权与执行实施权的分离，加强执行裁决权对执行实施权的监督制约；健全事务集约、繁简分流的执行权运行机制，实现由办案人员一人包案到底到分段、集约办理的转变，加强对消极执行、选择性执行的监管，有效解决权力寻租顽疾。
    何东宁说，意见对执行案款管理提出明确要求，全面推行“一案一账号”管理模式，在相关法律文书中一旦明确接受执行案款账户的，执行人员不得要求被执行人将案款打入指定账户以外的其他账户。
    为了统一执行股权的法律适用，解决实践中的相关争议，依法保障当事人、利害关系人合法权益，最高法21日还对外发布了关于人民法院强制执行股权若干问题的规定。其中明确了股权冻结的规则，规定了解决股权评估难、防范股权价值被恶意贬损的应对措施，同时明确了交付股权类案件执行的相关规则。
en_title: The Supreme Court issued a document to comprehensively strengthen the supervision and restriction of the executive power
en_text: According to Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, December 21st, the Supreme People's Court issued an opinion on further improving the enforcement power restriction mechanism and strengthening enforcement supervision on the 21st. The "data iron cage" ensures efficient, fair, standardized, well-intentioned and civilized execution. According to He Dongning, deputy director of the Executive Bureau of the Supreme People's Court, the opinions are divided into 6 parts, with a total of 43 articles. It clearly proposes to deepen the separation of judicial power and executive power. Effectively bring into play the restrictive role of trial, bankruptcy, and state compensation procedures on enforcement powers, and avoid infringing on the rights and interests of parties by acting as a trial judge, illegal individual settlement, and failure to initiate state compensation procedures in a timely manner; The power of adjudication supervises and restricts the power of execution; improve the operation mechanism of the power of execution with intensive affairs and separation of complex and simple, realize the transformation from one person handling the case to the staged and intensive handling, and strengthen the supervision of passive execution and selective execution. , and effectively solve the stubborn problem of power rent-seeking. He Dongning said that the opinions put forward clear requirements on the management of execution funds, and fully implement the "one case, one account" management model. Once the execution case funds account is clearly accepted in the relevant legal documents, the execution personnel shall not require the person to be executed to enter the case funds into the account. Accounts other than the specified account. In order to unify the legal application of equity enforcement, resolve relevant disputes in practice, and protect the legitimate rights and interests of parties and interested parties in accordance with the law, the Supreme People's Court also issued regulations on several issues concerning the enforcement of equity by the people's courts on the 21st. It clarifies the rules for equity freezing, specifies the countermeasures to solve the difficulty of equity evaluation and prevent malicious devaluation of equity value, and clarifies the relevant rules for delivery of equity-related cases for execution.

title: 人民日报：央企走出去——注重低碳环保 发展绿色产业
text:
英国门迪电池储能项目。中国华能供图
在位于巴西圣保罗州的伊利亚电站附近，三峡巴西员工带领电站周边社区孩子一起放流鱼苗，并讲解相关知识。三峡巴西供图
建设中的新加坡三巴旺综合社区中心项目。中建南洋供图

开展公益活动，呵护动植物，保护环境，推广可再生能源和技术……在走出去的过程中，中国企业积极履行环境责任，秉持绿色发展理念，深耕绿色市场，自觉保护、改善周边生态环境，助力当地实现可持续发展目标。
增殖放流保护濒危物种
诺贝托·维安纳是一名生物专家，在中国三峡（巴西）有限公司（以下简称“三峡巴西”）大萨尔托水电站的鱼类养殖中心工作。该中心的工作之一是增殖放流，将养殖的鱼苗投放到自然水域。自1987年起，维安纳就在这里工作，见证了增殖放流对当地环境的改善。
在巴拉那河支流巴拉那帕内马河上，大萨尔托水电站鱼类养殖中心建有54个鱼塘，水域面积达2万平方米，目前养殖着7种本地鱼类。“增殖放流地点主要在电站水库以及河流支流，这些地方有利于鱼群快速生长，且不易被捕食。本地鱼种放流后能适应当地流域环境，形成可持续的种群。”维安纳说。2016年，三峡巴西收购大萨尔托水电站，进一步加强养殖中心的运营。
在巴西环境和可再生资源研究所的授权和指导下，中心每年向巴拉那帕内马河投放150万尾鱼苗，向巴拉那河投放210万尾鱼苗。“我们的行动对于维护该地区生物多样性和扩大鱼类资源有重要意义，对河流沿岸的社区也有经济和文化价值。在巴拉那帕内马河上的塔夸茹苏电站水库，我们的增殖放流行动让一种曾濒临灭绝的淡水鱼类再次成为可以捕捞的鱼种。”维安纳介绍说，近年来，中心与高校等科研机构展开合作，研究促进鱼类扩大种群的方法，还在当地学校举办讲座、组织活动，让学生参与到放流活动中。2018年，“大萨尔托水电站生态与鱼类管理项目”在第十六届巴西可持续发展最佳实践评比中获得最佳实践奖。
“保护环境是我们的优先事项之一，水环境对于清洁能源生产以及整个社会都非常关键，我们已推动一些保护生物多样性和可持续发展的行动。”三峡巴西环境经理罗杰里奥·马尔凯托表示。例如，外来入侵物种金贻贝繁殖能力极强，不仅对环境造成威胁，还会对流域水质和水利水电工程造成极大破坏。2017年起，中国企业与当地一家生物技术公司展开合作，绘制金贻贝的基因图谱，尝试使基因改造过的金贻贝与野生金贻贝繁育出的下一代不再具有繁殖能力，从而控制其数量，保护水域生态。该项目的成果有望在数年内推出。
监测和再利用水生大型植物也是一项重要工作。水生大型植物对生态系统非常重要，它们可以保护河岸，为水生生物提供食物和庇护所，但其快速和过度繁殖则会影响生物多样性，且不利于航行、捕捞和水力发电等人类活动。中国企业和当地科研机构合作，研发水生植物监控系统，建立水生植物信息库，为水生环境治理提供决策依据。与此同时，水生大型植物还有望被转化为生物燃料。“我们正在评估不同水生大型植物的应用潜力，以提升燃料质量、扩大生产规模。”三峡巴西环境分析师里卡多·德巴罗斯介绍说，“未来我们的研究成果可以在巴西和国外推广，帮助解决水生大型植物过度生长带来的环境问题，将其转化为能源。”
为可持续的未来“充电”
威尔特郡门迪镇位于英国伦敦以西140公里处，一个重量级的电力项目正让这座小镇引人注目。6月30日，中国华能集团英国门迪电池储能项目正式投入商业运行，至今已平稳运行5个多月。这是目前欧洲最大的电网侧单体电池储能电站，也是中国电力企业在发达国家建设的首个大型电池储能项目。
门迪电池储能项目装机容量为100兆瓦，配置1小时电池容量，性能指标已达到国际领先水平。“我认为这是非常振奋人心的项目，它助力本地减少碳排放，促进可再生能源发展，我们很欢迎。”威尔特郡议会内阁成员托比·斯图吉斯说。该项目主要设备均由中国企业制造和集成，国产化率超过70%，主要参与英国电网调峰、快速频率响应等服务，为英国电网消纳更多可再生能源创造条件，助力该国实现2050年零碳排放目标。
“门迪项目缘起于一次‘大停电’。”华能集团驻英国首席代表郭敬禹介绍，2019年8月9日，英国发生严重的停电事故，暴露出电网灵活性设施的不足。近年来，英国可再生能源迅速发展，2019年其发电量占比首次超过化石能源。然而，风能、太阳能等可再生能源具有间歇性和波动性，电网必须拥有更高的灵活性。因此，建设可迅速参与调峰调频的电池储能项目，是提高电网灵活性和安全性的最佳选择之一。
中国企业第一时间响应这一需求。门迪项目从开工到投运仅用一年半的时间，其间还克服了疫情的不利影响。“在项目建设运营中，我们始终将当地生态环境保护置于工作首位。”郭敬禹介绍，项目开工前，中方请专家对周边环境进行了细致全面的生态评估，发现项目地以北约400米的地方栖息着两种珍稀蝴蝶——沼泽豹纹蝶和红背小灰蝶。经评定，项目不会对两种蝴蝶造成不良影响。但专家又发现，距项目南侧边界仅56米的一处池塘中栖息着大冠蝾螈，为了保护好这些“原住民”，项目团队根据专家建议，开工前在场区周围安装了长1200米的两栖动物保护围栏。未来，还将在场区以南建设由原生木材和石头组成的大冠蝾螈越冬巢。
中国企业还探索出新的商业模式，与壳牌欧洲能源公司签署了英国市场第一份具有保底性质的电池储能项目购售电协议。10月10日，门迪项目平稳运行100天，全站40套电池储能子系统性能指标均达到设计预期，成为英国国家电网动态控制调频市场最大的服务提供商。提供动态控制调频服务对机组功率响应时间要求极高，目前英国总计有800兆瓦的电池储能电站能满足该要求。
近年来，电池储能已成为推动可再生能源从替代能源走向主体能源的关键技术。在全球碳减排趋势下，电池储能项目在未来5年可能迎来爆发式增长。近日门迪二期工程开工建设，项目投产后将进一步提升英国国家电网容纳可再生能源的能力。英国驻华贸易使节吴侨文表示：“门迪电池储能项目将成为整个欧洲最大的锂电池储能系统，并且成为英国可再生能源行业的重要组成部分。我们欢迎更多的中国投资，这不仅有利于两国企业发展，带动就业和经济增长，还有助于建立更好、更绿色的经济体。”
保留更多自然野趣
早上去空气清新的树林中漫步，中午到环境优美的美食中心用餐，闲暇之余去游泳健身……不久的将来，新加坡三巴旺综合社区中心附近的居民就可以迎来这样的休闲生活场景。
三巴旺综合社区中心项目位于新加坡北部，临山而建，总建筑面积15.2万平方米。其开发初衷是在原有自然环境的基础上建设便民设施，让居民能够在休闲娱乐的同时享受大自然。2018年，中国建筑（南洋）发展有限公司（以下简称“中建南洋”）中标该项目。由于项目坐落于一片原始森林附近，如何保留原址中大量的野生树木并融入规划的社区中心，成为一个难题。
该项目经理万海涛介绍说，在施工准备阶段，中建南洋对规划范围内的树木进行了盘点、检查、分类、标识，并请树艺专家进行评估，施工期间更是多次调整方案，尽可能地保护树木。比如，一片公园区域原本设计有一条穿过树林的步道，但在开工前期，施工者发现这里有许多图纸上并未标注的树木。为此，中国企业与新加坡国家公园局合作，修改了设计方案，调整了步道位置。这样一来，不仅区域内的植被得到保存，人们漫步在这条林荫步道上，还能享受到更多自然野趣。再如，项目原本设计有一条排水沟，但施工范围内有6棵10米以上高的大树，为了不对大树根部造成损伤，中国企业改变了排水沟的位置。“本着尊重自然、保护自然的精神，整个工程保留下来500多棵树木。”万海涛说。
近年来，新加坡注重应对气候变化，不断提高建筑的环境可持续标准，对绿色建筑标志认证设置了最高等级——绿色标志白金奖。三巴旺综合社区中心项目以取得绿色标志白金奖为目标，将绿色环保理念贯穿于项目设计和施工的各个环节。中心的建筑屋顶实现了无土植物全覆盖，在新加坡常年炎热的气候下，这种设计不仅外观上绿意盎然，还可以起到降温、吸音、降噪等作用；园林区域的降雨排水系统运用石块、碎石、植物等天然材料，将雨水汇集起来并层层过滤沉降泥沙，营造出天然河道景象，既美观又能净化水源；项目还采用了大量预制构件，虽然对施工精度提出了很高的要求，但可以最大程度减少施工中产生的建筑垃圾。
翻看项目设计图，体育场、健身房、美食中心等造型各异的建筑掩映在绿茵中。建成后的三巴旺综合社区中心还包括诊所、老人照护中心、儿童保健中心等，覆盖社区各年龄阶段居民的需求，将给当地人的生活带来极大便利。对此，附近的居民都充满期待。新加坡前基础建设统筹部部长许文远表示：“这是一个雄心勃勃的项目，希望它成为一个吸引三巴旺居民前来的聚会点。”
从风车磨坊到风电场
“风电机是怎么建起来的？”“为什么风电机发的电叫做绿色能源？”……不久前，法国BFM电视台黄金时段播放了一期节目，是中国广核集团欧洲能源公司（以下简称“中广核欧能”）在法国南部城市阿萨克举办的云开放活动，前来参观的孩子们对风电机的工作原理展现出极大的兴趣。在法国知名主持人夏洛特·布特鲁普的带领下，当地250名小学生、农户和市长米莉亚·维格鲁一起，体验了风能给这座小城带来的改变。
在当地居民看来，阿萨克风电场带来了绿色能源，可为约6500个家庭供电，还推动了社区的可持续发展。在阿萨克，有一条名为“从风电场到风车磨坊”的徒步道路，总长6公里，是穿行小城的第一条徒步路线。“这条路穿越时空，连接了河畔古老的风车磨坊和现代的风电场，为小镇带来了新的生机。”维格鲁介绍说，中国企业参与了徒步路线的开辟工作，赞助了讲解风机的指示牌。目前，阿萨克风电场已被当地旅游局纳入本地工业旅游推广项目。“阿萨克市政府和中国公司还开展以探索风电场为主题的公益性参观活动。作为工业旅游项目，阿萨克风电场定将吸引更多民众前来参观了解。”维格鲁说。
不仅在阿萨克，从巴黎以东200公里的沙尔蒙风力发电场，到在建的布列塔尼大区格鲁瓦岛漂浮海上风电先导示范项目，自2014年在巴黎成立以来，中广核欧能以开发风能为核心业务，逐步发展成为法国主要清洁能源运营商之一，为当地社会创造就业，促进中法清洁能源合作。
中国能源企业逐步打开市场、在当地建立良好的口碑，离不开在建设、运维全过程中践行绿色环保理念。据了解，这些新能源项目都遵循环保标准的土地规划以及动植物保护措施，在风电场矩阵设计中宁可降低装机容量，也不破坏物种保护区域。中广核欧能环境专家克里斯·弗朗索瓦介绍说，公司会对各个发电场站进行持续性监测，通过定期停机和安装鸟类提醒装置，做好动物保护工作。“我们安装了监控和声音警报设备，根据实时监测到的鸟类种类、距离、飞行轨迹，判断相撞危险以启动警报设备规避碰撞。”弗朗索瓦说。此外，这些风电项目还注重降低噪声和视觉污染、保护生物多样性等。
在位于巴黎拉德芳斯商务区的中广核欧能全球远程监控及数据分析中心，两块巨幅液晶显示屏上，7个欧洲国家16个项目所在地的温度、湿度、风力、发电量等实时数据不停跳跃着。截至目前，中广核欧能总装机容量2.4吉瓦，2020年新能源上网电量超过50亿千瓦时，可为200万个欧洲家庭供电，减少的碳排放量相当于植树超过1.3万公顷。自2019年中欧能源合作平台项目正式启动以来，中欧双方在清洁能源技术产业化、市场准入、电网并网、可再生能源使用等方面合作取得更多实质性成果，中国的能源企业与多个欧洲老牌能源企业开展了越来越多的合作。

Photo courtesy of China Huaneng Near the Ilia Power Station in the state of Sao Paulo, Brazil, employees of Three Gorges Brazil led the children from the surrounding communities to release fish fry and explained relevant knowledge. Photo courtesy of Three Gorges Brazil The Sembawang Integrated Community Center project in Singapore is under construction. Photo courtesy of China Construction Nanyang Wind Farm in Assac, France. Photo courtesy of CGN to carry out public welfare activities, take care of animals and plants, protect the environment, and promote renewable energy and technologies... In the process of going global, Chinese enterprises actively fulfill their environmental responsibilities, adhere to the concept of green development, deeply cultivate green markets, and consciously protect and improve surrounding areas. Ecological environment and help local achieve sustainable development goals. Proliferation and release to protect endangered species Norberto Viana is a biological expert working at the Fish Farming Center of China Three Gorges (Brazil) Co., Ltd. One of the center's jobs is stocking and releasing, where farmed fry are released into natural waters. Vianna has been working here since 1987 and has seen the improvement of the local environment by the proliferative release. On the Parana Panema River, a tributary of the Paraná River, there are 54 fish ponds built in the fish breeding center of the Salto Hydropower Station, with a water area of 20,000 square meters, and 7 kinds of local fish are currently cultivated. "The proliferation and release sites are mainly in power station reservoirs and river tributaries. These places are conducive to the rapid growth of fish schools and are not easy to be preyed on. After the release of local fish species, they can adapt to the local watershed environment and form sustainable populations," said Vianna. In 2016, Three Gorges Brazil acquired the Grand Salto Hydropower Station to further strengthen the operation of the breeding center. Under the authorization and guidance of the Brazilian Institute of Environment and Renewable Resources, the center releases 1.5 million fry into the Parana Panema River and 2.1 million fry into the Paraná River every year. “Our actions have important implications for maintaining biodiversity and expanding fish stocks in the region, as well as economic and cultural value to communities along the river. At the Taquajusu Power Station Reservoir on the Paranapanema River, our augmentation The release operation has made a once endangered freshwater fish a fishable species again." Vianna said that in recent years, the center has cooperated with scientific research institutions such as universities to study methods to promote the expansion of fish populations. Local schools hold lectures and organize activities to allow students to participate in exile activities. In 2018, "The Ecology and Fish Management Project of Gran Salto Hydropower Station" won the Best Practice Award in the 16th Brazil Sustainable Development Best Practice Competition. "Protecting the environment is one of our priorities, the water environment is critical for clean energy production and society as a whole, and we have driven some actions to protect biodiversity and sustainable development." Rogerio Marr, Environmental Manager, Three Gorges Brazil Kato said. For example, the invasive alien species golden mussel has a strong reproductive capacity, which not only threatens the environment, but also causes great damage to the water quality of the watershed and water conservancy and hydropower projects. Since 2017, Chinese companies have cooperated with a local biotechnology company to draw the genetic map of golden mussels, and try to make the next generation of genetically modified golden mussels and wild golden mussels no longer have the ability to reproduce, so as to control their numbers and protect water ecology. . The results of the project are expected to be available within a few years. Monitoring and reusing aquatic macrophytes is also important. Aquatic macrophytes are important to ecosystems, protecting river banks and providing food and shelter for aquatic life, but their rapid and excessive reproduction affects biodiversity and hinders human activities such as navigation, fishing and hydropower. Chinese enterprises cooperate with local scientific research institutions to develop aquatic plant monitoring systems and establish an aquatic plant information database to provide decision-making basis for aquatic environment governance. At the same time, aquatic macrophytes are also expected to be converted into biofuels. "We are evaluating the application potential of different aquatic macrophytes to improve fuel quality and expand production scale," said Ricardo de Barros, environmental analyst at Three Gorges Brazil. "In the future, our research results can be promoted in Brazil and abroad. Help solve the environmental problems caused by the overgrowth of aquatic macrophytes and turn them into energy." "Charging" for a sustainable future The Wiltshire town of Mendy, 140km west of London, UK, is undergoing a major power project. Make this town stand out. On June 30, China Huaneng Group's UK Mendi battery energy storage project was officially put into commercial operation, and it has been running smoothly for more than five months. This is currently the largest grid-side single battery energy storage power station in Europe, and the first large-scale battery energy storage project built by a Chinese power company in a developed country. The Mendi battery energy storage project has an installed capacity of 100 megawatts and is equipped with a battery capacity of 1 hour. Its performance indicators have reached the international leading level. "I think this is a very exciting project to help reduce carbon emissions locally and promote renewable energy development and we welcome it," Wiltshire Council cabinet member Toby Sturgess said. The main equipment of this project is manufactured and integrated by Chinese enterprises, and the localization rate exceeds 70%. It mainly participates in services such as peak regulation and fast frequency response of the British power grid, creating conditions for the British power grid to absorb more renewable energy and helping the country achieve 2050 Annual zero carbon emission target. "The Mendi project originated from a 'big blackout'." Guo Jingyu, chief representative of Huaneng Group in the UK, introduced that on August 9, 2019, a serious power outage occurred in the UK, exposing the lack of power grid flexibility facilities. In recent years, renewable energy has developed rapidly in the UK, and its share of power generation in 2019 exceeded that of fossil energy for the first time. However, renewable energy sources such as wind and solar are intermittent and fluctuating, and the grid must have greater flexibility. Therefore, building a battery energy storage project that can quickly participate in peak and frequency regulation is one of the best options to improve the flexibility and security of the power grid. Chinese enterprises responded to this demand at the first time. The Mendi project took only one and a half years from the start of construction to the operation, during which time the adverse impact of the epidemic was overcome. "During the construction and operation of the project, we always put the local ecological protection at the top of our work." Guo Jingyu said that before the project started, the Chinese side invited experts to conduct a detailed and comprehensive ecological assessment of the surrounding environment, and found a place about 400 meters north of the project site. There are two species of rare butterflies that inhabit the Swamp Leopard and the Red-backed Fluttershy. It has been assessed that the project will not adversely affect the two species of butterflies. However, experts also found that a large-crowned salamander lives in a pond only 56 meters away from the southern boundary of the project. In order to protect these "indigenous people", the project team installed a 1,200-meter-long 1,200-meter-long installation around the site before the start of construction. amphibian protection fence. In the future, a large-crowned salamander wintering nest made of native wood and stone will be built in the south of the site. Chinese companies have also explored new business models and signed the first power purchase and sale agreement for battery energy storage projects in the UK market with guaranteed bottom line with Shell European Energy. On October 10th, the Mendi project ran smoothly for 100 days, and the performance indicators of 40 sets of battery energy storage subsystems in the whole station reached the design expectations, becoming the largest service provider in the UK National Grid dynamic control and frequency regulation market. Providing dynamic control and frequency modulation services has extremely high requirements on the power response time of the units. At present, there are a total of 800 MW of battery energy storage power stations in the UK that can meet this requirement. In recent years, battery energy storage has become a key technology to promote renewable energy from alternative energy to main energy. Under the global carbon emission reduction trend, battery energy storage projects may usher in explosive growth in the next five years. The second phase of the Mendi project has recently started construction. After the project is put into operation, it will further enhance the capacity of the UK National Grid to accommodate renewable energy. Wu Qiaowen, the British trade envoy to China, said: "The Mendi battery energy storage project will become the largest lithium battery energy storage system in the whole of Europe and an important part of the UK's renewable energy industry. We welcome more Chinese investment. Not only will it benefit the development of enterprises in the two countries, drive employment and economic growth, but also help to build a better and greener economy.” Retain more natural wildness Go for a walk in the woods with fresh air in the morning, and go to a food center with a beautiful environment at noon Dining, swimming and fitness in spare time... In the near future, residents near the Singapore Sembawang Integrated Community Center will be able to welcome such a leisure life scene. The Sembawang Integrated Community Center project is located in the northern part of Singapore, built near the mountains, with a total construction area of 152,000 square meters. The original intention of its development is to build convenient facilities on the basis of the original natural environment, so that residents can enjoy nature while having leisure and entertainment. In 2018, China State Construction (Nanyang) Development Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "CSCEC Nanyang") won the bid for the project. Since the project is located near a virgin forest, how to retain the large number of wild trees on the original site and integrate it into the planned community center has become a difficult problem. Wan Haitao, the project manager, said that during the construction preparation stage, CSCEC Nanyang carried out inventory, inspection, classification, and identification of the trees within the planning scope, and asked arborist experts to evaluate them. During the construction period, the plan was adjusted many times. Protect trees as much as possible. For example, a park area was originally designed with a walkway through the woods, but in the early stage of construction, the builders found that there were many trees that were not marked on the drawings. To this end, the Chinese company cooperated with the National Parks Board of Singapore to revise the design plan and adjust the location of the trail. In this way, not only the vegetation in the area is preserved, but people walking on this tree-lined trail can also enjoy more natural wildness. Another example is that the project was originally designed to have a drainage ditch, but there are 6 trees over 10 meters high in the construction area. In order not to cause damage to the roots of the trees, the Chinese company changed the location of the drainage ditch. "In the spirit of respecting and protecting nature, more than 500 trees have been preserved throughout the project," Wan Haitao said. In recent years, Singapore has focused on tackling climate change, continuously improving the environmental sustainability standards of buildings, and has set the highest level of green building mark certification - the Green Mark Platinum Award. The Sembawang Integrated Community Center Project aims to obtain the Green Mark Platinum Award, and integrates the concept of green environmental protection into all aspects of project design and construction. The roof of the center is fully covered by soilless plants. In Singapore's hot climate all year round, this design not only looks green, but can also play a role in cooling, sound absorption and noise reduction; the rainwater drainage system in the garden area is used. Stones, gravel, plants and other natural materials collect rainwater and filter sediment sediment layer by layer, creating a natural river scene, which is both beautiful and can purify the water source; the project also uses a large number of prefabricated components, although the construction accuracy is raised. High requirements, but can minimize the construction waste generated during construction. Looking at the project design drawings, buildings with different shapes such as stadiums, gymnasiums, and food centers are hidden in the greenery. After completion, the Sembawang Comprehensive Community Center will also include clinics, elderly care centers, child health care centers, etc., covering the needs of residents of all ages in the community, and will bring great convenience to the lives of local people. In this regard, the nearby residents are looking forward to it. "This is an ambitious project, and I hope it will become a meeting point that attracts the residents of Sembawang," said Xu Wenyuan, Singapore's former coordinating minister for infrastructure. From windmills to wind farms "How are wind turbines built? "Why is the electricity generated by wind turbines called green energy?"... Not long ago, the French BFM TV broadcasted a prime-time program, which is the European Energy Company of China General Nuclear Power Group (hereinafter referred to as "CGN European Energy") in the southern city of France. At the cloud open event held by Asaq, the children who came to visit showed great interest in the working principle of wind turbines. Led by well-known French host Charlotte Butrup, 250 local primary school students, farmers and Mayor Miria Vigreux experienced the changes that wind can bring to this small town. In the eyes of local residents, the Asaq wind farm has brought green energy, can supply electricity to about 6,500 homes, and has also promoted the sustainable development of the community. In Asaq, there is a hiking path called "From Wind Farm to Windmill Mill", which is 6 kilometers long and is the first hiking route through the small town. "This road travels through time and space, connecting the ancient windmills and modern wind farms on the river bank, bringing new vitality to the town." Vigreu said that Chinese enterprises participated in the development of the hiking route and sponsored the explanation. Fan sign. At present, the Asaq Wind Farm has been included in the local industrial tourism promotion project by the local tourism bureau. "Assac City Government and Chinese companies also carry out public welfare visits with the theme of exploring wind farms. As an industrial tourism project, Assac Wind Farm will definitely attract more people to visit and understand." Vigreu said. Not only in Assac, from the Charmont wind farm, 200 kilometers east of Paris, to the pilot demonstration project of floating offshore wind power on the island of Groy in the Brittany region, since its establishment in Paris in 2014, CGNPC has With the development of wind energy as its core business, Oneng has gradually developed into one of the major clean energy operators in France, creating jobs for the local society and promoting Sino-French clean energy cooperation. Chinese energy companies gradually open up the market and establish a good reputation in the local area. It is understood that these new energy projects all follow environmental protection standards for land planning and animal and plant protection measures. In the matrix design of wind farms, it is preferable to reduce the installed capacity rather than destroy the species protection area. Chris Francois, an environmental expert at CGN European Energy, said that the company will conduct continuous monitoring of each power station, and do a good job in animal protection by regularly shutting down and installing bird reminders. "We installed monitoring and sound warning equipment, and based on the real-time monitoring of bird species, distances, and flight trajectories, we judged the danger of collision and activated the warning equipment to avoid collisions," Francois said. In addition, these wind power projects also focus on reducing noise and visual pollution, and protecting biodiversity. In the global remote monitoring and data analysis center of CGNPC European Energy located in the La Defense business district of Paris, on two huge LCD screens, real-time data such as temperature, humidity, wind power, and power generation of 16 projects in 7 European countries are displayed. Jumping nonstop. Up to now, CGN European Energy has a total installed capacity of 2.4 GW. title: 中电建生态环境集团治水方案的珠海实践
text:
前山河是珠海经济特区成长的见证，前山河两岸景象随着城市发展变迁，由芦苇荡和农田发展成繁华商圈，而随着城市发展，污染加重，河水的颜色也发生了变化。近年来，珠海市委、市政府高度重视前山河治理工作，前山河治理驶入快车道。
    珠海作为珠江三角洲中心城市之一、粤港澳大湾区重要节点城市，“母亲河”的环境治理，关乎珠海的“面子”和“里子”。为彻底整治前山河流域水环境，2019年底，珠海市、香洲区引进中电建生态环境集团推进珠海前山河流域综合整治。
    今年1—9月，前山河石角咀国考断面平均水质达到地表水Ⅲ类标准，流域内5条城市黑臭水体2020年底全部通过住建部“长制久清”评估审核。在为珠海发展奠定坚实生态基础的同时，也为粤港澳大湾区同等规模城市水环境治理提供了可复制的珠海模式。
    撰文：王韶江
    扛重任
    EPC模式“登陆”珠海
    前山河流域属于珠江三角洲河网水系，发源于中山市五桂山东南麓，流经中山、珠海两地，经石角咀水闸注入湾仔水道出海，与澳门相望。
    作为珠海市主城区内唯一的淡水河，历史上的前山河，一度是重要的饮用水源，哺育着珠海人民。然而随着经济社会的快速发展，城市人口持续增长，城市雨污基础设施建设未同步跟进，城市市政管网覆盖不足、现状管网缺陷较多、居住小区管网雨污混流严重，大量生活污水混入前山河，农业、工业污染也尚未得到彻底治理，前山河流域（珠海段）水质持续恶化，原本清澈的河流变为V类水，部分支流成为黑臭水体。
    2015年国务院颁布实施的《水污染防治行动计划》（“水十条”）明确：2020年年底前，地级以上城市建成区黑臭水体均控制在10%以内；到2030年，全国城市建成区黑臭水体总体得到消除。前山河流域水环境综合整治迫在眉睫。
    2019年，珠海市委、市政府制订《前山河流域水环境综合治理专项攻坚总体实施方案》，将前山河水环境综合治理工作分为三年实施。力争三年内基本实现“正本清源，雨污分流”，远期实现“河畅、水清、岸绿、景美”的目标。
    在具体实施方面，中电建生态环境集团采用EPC模式治理前山河。此前，中电建生态环境集团已采用此种模式成功治理多个河流环境治理项目，其中最为典型的是深圳市茅洲河流域水环境治理项目。
    全长41.6公里的茅洲河是深莞两市界河，在最高峰的时候，茅洲河流域一共有4万多家工业企业。治理前的茅洲河，被称作珠三角污染最严重的河流，河水持续发黑发臭，如同墨汁一般。 经过中电建生态环境集团持续攻坚，茅洲河水质不断改善，最终实现从“黑水横流”到“鸥鹭齐飞”的生态蝶变。
    “作为国内首个超100亿元的大型水环境治理项目，茅洲河流域水环境治理的成功案例为国家生态环境治理进行了积极有益的探索，为行业、企业实现可持续发展，转型升级、提质增效奠定了坚实基础。”中电建生态环境集团湾区区域总部总经理、前山河项目总承包部总经理张晶介绍，正是凭借这些“功勋章”，中电建生态环境集团脱颖而出，肩负起了前山河综合整治的重任。
    挖根源
    对3700余处排水口进行溯源
    前山河流域环境问题由来已久，恢复前山河“长制久清”，任重而道远。其关键在于找准病根，对症下药。
    珠海市香洲区前山河流域综合整治项目于2019年12月19日签约，项目总承包部同步组建，2020年1月2日举行开工仪式，项目正式开工。开工后，总承包部对流域范围的河渠、管网及排口进行全面排查、溯源，修复、完善污水主干管管网系统；对流域范围内的居民小区、城中村、企事业单位等的雨污水系统进行排查，实现相应排水单元的雨污分流；提高片区污水收集率，大幅减少入河污染物总量。
    然而，前山河流域综合整治的总面积约114.35平方公里，流域内河网众多，纵横交错相互连通，共有44条河渠、544个小区、527个商业企业、166个机关事业单位，要对每条河渠、每个小区逐家逐户进行梳理，并非易事。
    张晶介绍，“与茅洲河的工业污染为主因导致水质变差相比，前山河水污染治理的核心在于市政生活污水管网雨污分流的全面整改。前山河流域多为老旧城区、城中旧村、城郊地区，片区管网存在老化、错接漏接的情况，必须要先摸清地下管网的底数，找到这些管网的缺失段、破损点、混接处。”
    2020年初，为尽快摸清前山河流域范围114.35平方公里内主管、支管、沿河渠排口及各个排水单元的管网情况，中电建生态环境集团先后组织500余人的专业排查队伍，采用管网排查机器人、3D激光成像仪、CCTV、QV等各型先进设备用来摸清管网情况，完成对翠屏、北山、造贝、南屏东、银林排洪渠等5条黑臭水体及前山河主河道两岸共计3700余处排水口进行溯源，进而将河渠、主干管、支管及排水单元管网绘制成一张网络图，为最终完善雨污管网提供可靠条件。
    在疫情影响、外部制约因素多及资源紧张情况下，总承包部先后掀起“1·20”“4·15”“10·30”“翠屏渠应急攻坚”等关键目标建设高潮。2020年10月30日，前山河项目提前完成主体工程施工，国考断面水质稳定达到Ⅳ类水标准。在项目实施期间，中电建生态环境集团月均投入人员3500余人，高峰期投入人员达5000余人，投入设备1700余台/套，香洲区内300多个工作面同时开工，创造了单周23公里，单日3.75公里的珠海管网施工新纪录，累计完成约400多个小区及100个机关事业单位正本清源施工，正本清源小区管网铺设累计超过550公里，市政管网建设累计60公里。
    祛病灶
    擘画前山河绿色生态画卷
    前山河流域综合整治EPC项目工程整体推进了全流域水体整治、雨污分流及管网建养、正本清源改造等“全覆盖”系列工程，为前山河带来了新生，以前散发的阵阵臭味，现在已几乎察觉不到，河水也更加清澈。
    看着前山河水一天天变好，家住附近的康先生竖起大拇指，“现在前山河越来越热闹，每天晚饭后都要和家人一起来河边走走。”
    数据显示，前山河石角咀国考断面2020年水质月平均值达到了地表Ⅳ类水标准，氨氮等主要水质指标平均值达到地表Ⅲ类水标准，珠海也因此进入当年1—6月全国国考断面水环境质量改善排名前30位的城市。国考断面治理成果受到广东生态环境厅书面表扬。
    中电建生态环境集团前山河总承包部在优质履约的基础上，积极践行央企责任，投入突击抢险力量全力支持翠屏排洪渠应急工程建设；台风“海高斯”登陆珠海市后，立即启动项目应急抢险预案，出动人员设备，协助地方政府开展灾后抢险工作；在2021年疫情反复期间，第一时间驰援香洲区拱北街道疫情防控工作，赢得了地方政府和群众的高度赞誉，牢固树立了中国电建敢打硬战、能打胜仗的良好央企形象。
    通过对前山河流域水环境治理流域统筹、系统治理，中电建生态环境集团让“母亲河”碧波粼粼、鱼虾成群的风光重现在市民眼前。在此基础上，前山河流域水环境综合整治二期工程业已进入设计阶段，计划年内开工。
    前山河二期项目将以提升水质为核心，以控制面源污染、降低主干管水位、提高污水厂进场浓度等为重点，以实现整个前山河流域“长制久清”为愿景，实施包括收污控源工程、活水保质工程、智慧水务工程等三大类工程，将前山河打造为集生态廊道、行洪通道、休闲碧道、文化驿道、滨水经济带于一体的“美丽河湖、幸福河湖”。
en_title: Zhuhai Practice of China Power Construction Eco-Environmental Group's Water Control Plan
en_text: The Qianshan River is a testimony to the growth of the Zhuhai Special Economic Zone. With the development of the city, the scenery on both sides of the Qianshan River has developed from reeds and farmland into a prosperous business district. With the development of the city, the pollution has increased, and the color of the river has also changed. In recent years, the Zhuhai Municipal Party Committee and Municipal Government have attached great importance to the management of Qianshan River, and the management of Qianshan River has entered the fast lane. Zhuhai is one of the central cities in the Pearl River Delta and an important node city in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area. The environmental governance of the "Mother River" is related to Zhuhai's "face" and "lizi". In order to completely rectify the water environment of the Qianshan River Basin, at the end of 2019, Zhuhai City and Xiangzhou District introduced China Power Construction Ecological Environment Group to promote the comprehensive improvement of the Qianshan River Basin in Zhuhai. From January to September this year, the average water quality of the Shijiaozui National Examination Section of the Qianshan River reached the Class III standard for surface water, and the black and odorous water bodies in 5 cities in the basin have all passed the “long-term and long-term clearing” assessment and audit by the Ministry of Housing and Urban-Rural Development by the end of 2020. While laying a solid ecological foundation for the development of Zhuhai, it also provides a replicable Zhuhai model for water environment governance in cities of the same scale in the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area. Written by: Wang Shaojiang shoulders the heavy responsibility of "landing" the Qianshan River Basin in Zhuhai with the EPC model, which belongs to the Pearl River Delta river network. Macau faces each other. As the only freshwater river in the main urban area of Zhuhai, Qianshan River in history was once an important source of drinking water, nurturing the people of Zhuhai. However, with the rapid economic and social development, the urban population continues to grow, the construction of urban rain and sewage infrastructure has not been followed up, the urban municipal pipeline network is insufficiently covered, the existing pipeline network has many defects, the mixed flow of rain and sewage in the pipeline network of residential areas is serious, and a large number of living Sewage has been mixed into Qianshan River, and agricultural and industrial pollution has not been completely treated. The water quality of Qianshan River Basin (Zhuhai Section) has continued to deteriorate. The originally clear river has turned into V-type water, and some tributaries have become black and odorous water bodies. In 2015, the State Council promulgated and implemented the "Water Pollution Prevention and Control Action Plan" ("Ten Water Regulations"), which clearly stated that by the end of 2020, black and odorous water bodies in built-up areas of cities above the prefecture level will be controlled within 10%; The black and odorous water bodies were generally eliminated. The comprehensive improvement of the water environment in the Qianshan River Basin is imminent. In 2019, the Zhuhai Municipal Party Committee and Municipal Government formulated the "Overall Implementation Plan for the Comprehensive Treatment of Water Environment in Qianshan River Basin", which divided the comprehensive treatment of Qianshan River water environment into three years for implementation. Strive to basically achieve "the original source, clear the source, divert rain and sewage" within three years, and achieve the goal of "smooth river, clear water, green shore and beautiful scenery" in the long run. In terms of specific implementation, China Power Construction Ecological Environment Group adopts the EPC model to manage Qianshan River. Previously, China Power Construction Eco-Environmental Group has adopted this model to successfully manage a number of river environmental governance projects, the most typical of which is the Shenzhen Maozhou River Basin Water Environment Governance Project. The Maozhou River with a total length of 41.6 kilometers is the boundary river between Shenzhen and Dongguan. At its peak, there were more than 40,000 industrial enterprises in the Maozhou River Basin. Before the treatment, the Maozhou River was called the most polluted river in the Pearl River Delta. The river water continued to blacken and stink, like ink. After the continuous efforts of China Power Construction Ecological Environment Group, the water quality of Maozhou River has been continuously improved, and finally the ecological butterfly change has been realized from "cross-flow of black water" to "flying of gulls and herons". "As the first large-scale water environment treatment project in China with a value of over 10 billion yuan, the successful case of water environment treatment in the Maozhou River Basin has carried out a positive and beneficial exploration for the national ecological environment management, and has achieved sustainable development for the industry and enterprises, transformation and upgrading, and quality improvement. The efficiency increase has laid a solid foundation." Zhang Jing, general manager of the Bay Area Regional Headquarters of China Power Construction Eco-Environment Group and general contracting department of the Qianshanhe Project, introduced that it is with these "merit medals" that China Power Construction Eco-Environment Group stands out. It has shouldered the important task of comprehensive renovation of the former mountains and rivers. Digging the roots and tracing the source of more than 3,700 drainage outlets The Qianshan River Basin has a long history of environmental problems, and it is a long way to go to restore the Qianshan River to be "long-term and clean". The key is to identify the root cause of the disease and prescribe the right medicine. The Qianshan River Basin Comprehensive Renovation Project in Xiangzhou District, Zhuhai City was signed on December 19, 2019, and the general contracting department of the project was established simultaneously. The groundbreaking ceremony was held on January 2, 2020, and the project officially started. After the start of construction, the general contracting department will conduct a comprehensive investigation, traceability, repair and improvement of the main sewage pipe network system in the river canals, pipe networks and discharge outlets within the basin; The sewage system is checked to realize the diversion of rain and sewage in the corresponding drainage unit; the sewage collection rate in the area is improved, and the total amount of pollutants entering the river is greatly reduced. However, the total area of the Qianshan River Basin for comprehensive renovation is about 114.35 square kilometers. There are many river networks in the basin, which are criss-crossed and interconnected. There are 44 canals, 544 communities, 527 commercial enterprises, and 166 government agencies and institutions. , It is not easy to sort out each community from house to house. Zhang Jing said, “Compared with the deterioration of water quality caused by industrial pollution in the Maozhou River, the core of water pollution control in Qianshan River lies in the comprehensive rectification of rain and sewage diversion in the municipal sewage pipe network. Qianshan River Basin is mostly an old urban area and an old urban area. In villages and suburban areas, the pipeline network in the area is aging, wrongly connected and missed, so we must first find out the base of the underground pipeline network, and find the missing sections, damaged points, and mixed connections of these pipeline networks." At the beginning of 2020, in order to quickly To find out the pipe network of the main pipe, branch pipes, outfalls along the river and each drainage unit within 114.35 square kilometers of the Qianshan River Basin, China Power Construction Eco-Environment Group has organized a professional inspection team of more than 500 people, using pipe network inspection robots, 3D Laser imagers, CCTV, QV and other advanced equipment are used to find out the situation of the pipeline network, and complete the monitoring of 5 black and odorous water bodies such as Cuiping, Beishan, Beizao, Nanpingdong, Yinlin flood discharge channel and the main channel of Qianshan River. A total of more than 3,700 drainage outlets on both sides of the strait were traced to the source, and then the river channel, main pipe, branch pipe and drainage unit pipe network were drawn into a network map, which provided reliable conditions for the final improvement of the rainwater and sewage pipe network. Under the influence of the epidemic, many external constraints and resource constraints, the General Contracting Department has successively set off key goals such as "January 20", "April 15", "10.30" and "Emergency Attack on Cuiping Canal". On October 30, 2020, the main construction of the Qianshan River project was completed ahead of schedule, and the water quality of the national examination section stably reached the Class IV water standard. During the implementation of the project, China Power Construction Eco-Environmental Group invested more than 3,500 people on average per month, more than 5,000 people during peak periods, and more than 1,700 sets of equipment. The construction of the Zhuhai pipeline network reached a new record of 3.75 kilometers in a single day. About 400 communities and 100 government agencies and institutions have completed the original Qingyuan construction. The original Qingyuan District pipeline network has accumulated more than 550 kilometers and the municipal pipeline network construction has accumulated to 60 kilometers. The EPC project of comprehensive improvement of the Qianshan River Basin has promoted the whole basin water body improvement, rain and sewage diversion, pipeline network construction and maintenance, and original source clearing transformation. Newborn, the stench that used to be emitted is now almost imperceptible, and the river water is clearer. Seeing that the water in Qianshan River is getting better day by day, Mr. Kang, who lives nearby, gives a thumbs up, "Now Qianshan River is getting more and more lively, and every day after dinner, I have to go for a walk by the river with my family." The data shows that Qianshan River Stone In 2020, the monthly average water quality of the Jiaozui National Examination Section reached the surface class IV water standard, and the average value of major water quality indicators such as ammonia nitrogen reached the surface class III water standard. As a result, Zhuhai also entered the national national examination section from January to June that year. The water environment quality has improved. Top 30 cities. The national examination section management results were praised in writing by the Guangdong Department of Ecology and Environment. On the basis of high-quality performance of the contract, Qianshanhe General Contracting Department of China Power Construction Eco-Environment Group actively fulfilled the responsibility of a central enterprise, and invested in emergency rescue forces to fully support the construction of the emergency project of Cuiping flood discharge canal; Launched the emergency rescue plan for the project, dispatched personnel and equipment to assist the local government in carrying out post-disaster rescue work; during the repeated epidemic in 2021, the company immediately assisted the epidemic prevention and control work in Gongbei Street, Xiangzhou District, and won high praise from the local government and the public. It has created a good image of POWERCHINA's central enterprise that dares to fight hard and can win battles. Through the overall planning and systematic management of the water environment in the Qianshan River Basin, China Power Construction Ecological Environment Group has made the "mother river" sparkling with blue waves and groups of fish and shrimps in front of the public. On this basis, the second phase of the comprehensive improvement of the water environment in the Qianshan River Basin has entered the design stage and is scheduled to start within this year. The second phase of the Qianshan River project will focus on improving water quality, focusing on controlling non-point source pollution, reducing the water level in main pipes, and increasing the concentration of sewage treatment plants. Three major types of projects, including pollution collection and source control projects, living water quality preservation projects, and smart water projects, will build Qianshan River into a "beautiful river" integrating ecological corridors, flood channels, leisure green roads, cultural post roads, and waterfront economic belts. Lake, Happy River Lake".

title: 国资委明确国有控股上市公司提质
text:
杜雨萌
　　国资委在京召开中央企业负责人会议，披露了前11个月中央企业的经济运行情况，并进一步明确了2022年央企生产经营和改革发展等重点工作内容，如持续提升国有控股上市公司质量、深化跨行业跨领域跨企业专业化整合等。
　　
持续提升国有控股上市公司质量
    
国资委数据显示，今年中央企业效益增长创历史最好水平，高质量发展迈出新步伐。前11个月，央企利润总额达2.3万亿元、净利润1.75万亿元。营业收入利润率达7.1%，同比提升1.1个百分点；研发投入强度2.3%，同比提高0.1个百分点，预计全年达到2.6%。
　　还有两项数据同样引人关注。数据显示，1月份至11月份，中央企业向上市公司注入优质资产1221.5亿元，运用上市公司平台实施股权融资1986.9亿元，同比分别增长17.4%和64.7%。
　　此次会议在切实抓好央企明年生产经营和改革发展八方面重点工作中提到，中央企业要优化经营策略，大力降本节支，持续推进“两金”管控，确保经营活动现金流合理充裕，持续提升国有控股上市公司质量。
　　国信证券高级研究员张立超表示，经济高质量发展需要高质量的上市公司，推动资本市场持续、稳定、健康发展也要求从源头入手提升上市公司质量。持续提升国有控股上市公司质量具体体现在：着力提高以经营业绩、偿债能力、资产配置为代表的经营质量；以信息披露、市值管理、投资者关系管理等为代表的治理质量；以研发资金与人力资本投入为代表的创新质量。事实上，国资国企改革与提高上市公司质量互为因果、相互促进。
　　据同花顺iFinD数据统计，截至12月19日，A股已有86家上市公司率先披露2021年年度业绩预告。业绩预告类型为略增、续盈、预增的上市公司共65家，其中7家为国有控股上市公司（包括央企国资控股、省属国资控股和地市国资控股）。
　　值得一提的是，为进一步引导中央企业更好发挥国民经济稳定器、压舱石的作用，此次会议强调，明年针对央企考核的“两利四率”要努力实现“两增一控三提高”。“两增”即利润总额和净利润增速高于国民经济增速，“一控”即控制好资产负债率，“三提高”即营业收入利润率、全员劳动生产率、研发经费投入进一步提高。
　　
深化跨行业跨领域跨企业专业化整合
　　“切实增强产业链供应链韧性和竞争力，加快推动现代产业体系建设”同样成为国资委部署2022年工作任务的重点。
　　会议强调，要积极打造现代产业链“链长”，促进上中下游、大中小企业融通创新、协同发展，培育一批国家级先进制造业集群，系统推进数字化转型，打造一批科技领军企业、专精特新企业和单项冠军企业。
　　2022年国资委将深入实施现代产业链“链长”行动计划。即在加快第一批“链长”企业计划落地的同时，启动第二批重点产业链“链长”企业遴选。同时，聚焦高端装备、新一代信息技术、新材料等领域培育一批国家级先进制造业集群。
　　中国企业联合会研究部研究员刘兴国表示，只有进一步推动央企加大技术研发投入力度，加快关键技术突破步伐，以技术优势构建起在全球产业链中的竞争优势，增强对全球产业链的影响力与控制力，才能更好促进和保障我国产业安全。显然，“链长制”是一个合适的抓手，一方面有助于激励“链长”企业不断提升技术水平和发展质量，持续做优做强做大，以维持并强化“链长”地位；另一方面，也有助于促进“链长”企业自觉带动全产业链融通发展，在整体上增强产业链活力，进而为经济安全提供有力保障。
　　作为国企改革三年行动的重要内容，“优化国有资本布局”仍是明年国资央企工作的重点。而国资布局的优化和调整，显然离不开央企间的重组整合。
　　对此，国资委明确，2022年要深化跨行业跨领域跨企业专业化整合，加强海工装备、新能源汽车、工业互联网、物流大数据、航空货运等协同发展平台建设。
    （本文摘编自《证券日报》）
en_title: State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission clarifies that the quality of state-controlled listed companies will be improved
en_text: Du Yumeng State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission held a meeting of the heads of central enterprises in Beijing, disclosing the economic operation of central enterprises in the first 11 months, and further clarified the key tasks such as the production, operation, reform and development of central enterprises in 2022, such as the continuous improvement of state-owned listed companies. quality, deepening the integration of cross-industry, cross-field and cross-enterprise specialization, etc. Continuing to improve the quality of state-controlled listed companies Data from the State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission shows that this year, the growth of central SOEs has reached the best level in history, and new steps have been taken in high-quality development. In the first 11 months, the total profit of central enterprises reached 2.3 trillion yuan, and the net profit was 1.75 trillion yuan. The operating income profit margin reached 7.1%, an increase of 1.1 percentage points year-on-year; the R&D investment intensity was 2.3%, an increase of 0.1 percentage points year-on-year, and it is expected to reach 2.6% for the whole year. Two other figures are equally interesting. Data show that from January to November, central enterprises injected 122.15 billion yuan of high-quality assets into listed companies, and used the platform of listed companies to implement equity financing of 198.69 billion yuan, a year-on-year increase of 17.4% and 64.7% respectively. In this meeting, it was mentioned in the eight key tasks of the production, operation and reform and development of central enterprises next year that central enterprises should optimize their business strategies, vigorously reduce costs and expenses, continue to promote the management and control of "two funds", and ensure a reasonable and sufficient cash flow for operating activities. , continue to improve the quality of state-controlled listed companies. Zhang Lichao, a senior researcher at Guosen Securities, said that high-quality economic development requires high-quality listed companies, and promoting the sustainable, stable and healthy development of the capital market also requires improving the quality of listed companies from the source. The continuous improvement of the quality of state-controlled listed companies is embodied in: focusing on improving the quality of operations represented by business performance, solvency, and asset allocation; the quality of governance represented by information disclosure, market value management, investor relations management, etc.; and research and development funds. Innovation quality represented by human capital investment. In fact, the reform of state-owned assets and state-owned enterprises and the improvement of the quality of listed companies are mutually causal and mutually reinforcing. According to statistics from Flush iFinD, as of December 19, 86 A-share listed companies have taken the lead in disclosing their 2021 annual performance forecasts. There are a total of 65 listed companies whose performance forecasts are slightly increased, continued profit, and pre-increased, of which 7 are state-controlled listed companies (including central state-owned enterprises, provincial state-owned assets, and prefecture-level state-owned assets). It is worth mentioning that, in order to further guide the central enterprises to better play the role of the stabilizer and ballast of the national economy, the meeting emphasized that the "two interests and four rates" for the assessment of central enterprises next year should strive to achieve "two increases, one control and three". improve". "Two increases" means that the growth rate of total profit and net profit is higher than that of the national economy, "one control" means to control the asset-liability ratio, and "three increases" means that the profit margin of operating income, the labor productivity of all employees, and the investment in research and development funds are further increased . Deepening cross-industry, cross-field and cross-enterprise specialization integration "effectively enhancing the resilience and competitiveness of the industrial chain and supply chain, and accelerating the construction of a modern industrial system" has also become the focus of the SASAC's deployment of 2022 tasks. The meeting emphasized that it is necessary to actively create a "chain length" of the modern industrial chain, promote the integration, innovation and coordinated development of upstream, midstream and downstream, large and medium-sized enterprises, cultivate a group of state-level advanced manufacturing clusters, systematically promote digital transformation, and create a group of leading technology companies, Specializing in special new enterprises and single champion enterprises. In 2022, the State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission will implement the "chain length" action plan for the modern industrial chain. That is, while accelerating the implementation of the first batch of "chain-length" enterprise plans, the selection of the second batch of key industrial chain "chain-length" enterprises will be launched. At the same time, focus on high-end equipment, new-generation information technology, new materials and other fields to cultivate a number of national-level advanced manufacturing clusters. Liu Xingguo, a researcher at the Research Department of the China Enterprise Confederation, said that only by further promoting central enterprises to increase investment in technology research and development, speed up the pace of breakthroughs in key technologies, build a competitive advantage in the global industrial chain with technological advantages, and enhance their influence on the global industrial chain and control, can better promote and protect my country's industrial security. Obviously, the "chain length system" is a suitable starting point. On the one hand, it helps to encourage "chain length" enterprises to continuously improve their technical level and development quality, and continue to be better, stronger and bigger, so as to maintain and strengthen the status of "chain length". On the other hand, it will also help to promote "chain-length" enterprises to consciously drive the integrated development of the entire industrial chain, enhance the vitality of the industrial chain as a whole, and thus provide a strong guarantee for economic security. As an important part of the three-year reform of state-owned enterprises, "optimizing the layout of state-owned capital" will still be the focus of the work of state-owned and central enterprises next year. The optimization and adjustment of the layout of state-owned assets is obviously inseparable from the reorganization and integration of central enterprises. In this regard, the State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission has made it clear that in 2022, it will deepen the professional integration of cross-industry, cross-field and cross-enterprise, and strengthen the construction of collaborative development platforms such as marine equipment, new energy vehicles, industrial Internet, logistics big data, and air cargo. (This article is excerpted from "Securities Daily")

title: 党的百年奋斗开辟了实现中华民族伟大复兴的正确道路
text: 实现中华民族伟大复兴，凝聚了几代中国人的夙愿，体现了中华民族和中国人民的整体利益，是每一个中华儿女的共同期盼。中国共产党自成立以来，始终把为中国人民谋幸福、为中华民族谋复兴作为自己的初心使命，矢志不渝，历久弥新。党的十九届六中全会通过的《中共中央关于党的百年奋斗重大成就和历史经验的决议》指出：‘一百年来，党领导人民不懈奋斗、不断进取，成功开辟了实现中华民族伟大复兴的正确道路。’这条道路穿越百年风雨，越走越光明，越走越宽广，直抵中华民族伟大复兴的光辉彼岸。    实现中华民族伟大复兴    是党百年奋斗的主题    习近平总书记指出：“一百年来，中国共产党团结带领中国人民进行的一切奋斗、一切牺牲、一切创造，归结起来就是一个主题：实现中华民族伟大复兴。”    中华民族是世界上伟大的民族，有着5000多年源远流长的文明历史，为人类文明进步作出了不可磨灭的贡献。1840年鸦片战争以后，中国逐步成为半殖民地半封建社会，国家蒙辱、人民蒙难、文明蒙尘，中华民族遭受了前所未有的劫难。为了拯救民族危亡，中国人民奋起反抗，仁人志士奔走呐喊，各种救国方案轮番出台，但都以失败而告终。在各种政治力量中，唯有中国共产党肩负起了实现救亡图存和中华民族伟大复兴的历史使命。作为马克思主义政党，中国共产党摆脱了以往一切政治力量追求自身特殊利益的局限，以民族复兴为己任，领导中国人民展现出同敌人血战到底的气概、在自力更生的基础上光复旧物的决心、自立于世界民族之林的能力，点亮了实现中华民族伟大复兴的灯塔。    一百年来，中国共产党团结带领中国人民，创造了新民主主义革命的伟大成就，为实现中华民族伟大复兴创造了根本社会条件；创造了社会主义革命和建设的伟大成就，为实现中华民族伟大复兴奠定了根本政治前提和制度基础；创造了改革开放和社会主义现代化建设的伟大成就，为实现中华民族伟大复兴提供了充满新的活力的体制保证和快速发展的物质条件；创造了新时代中国特色社会主义的伟大成就，为实现中华民族伟大复兴提供了更为完善的制度保证、更为坚实的物质基础、更为主动的精神力量。    百年奋斗，沧桑巨变。中国从四分五裂、一盘散沙到高度统一、民族团结，从积贫积弱、一穷二白到全面小康、繁荣富强，从被动挨打、饱受欺凌到独立自主、坚定自信，仅用几十年时间就走完发达国家几百年走过的工业化历程，创造了经济快速发展和社会长期稳定两大奇迹。今天，中华民族向世界展现的是一派欣欣向荣的气象，巍然屹立于世界东方。    实现中华民族伟大复兴    进入了不可逆转的历史进程    2012年11月29日，习近平总书记在参观《复兴之路》展览时，提出“实现中华民族伟大复兴，就是中华民族近代以来最伟大的梦想”重要论断，使“中国梦”成为激励中华儿女奋勇向前的强大精神力量。    党的十八大以来，习近平总书记以宏阔的历史视野、深邃的战略思考、坚定的人民情怀，统筹中华民族伟大复兴战略全局和世界百年未有之大变局，深刻阐述中华民族伟大复兴的内涵、意义、路径、方略，创造性地将实现中华民族伟大复兴纳入科学社会主义实践和共产主义征程，指引方向，揭示规律，擘画蓝图，明确任务，团结带领全党全国各族人民解决了许多长期想解决而没有解决的难题，办成了许多过去想办而没有办成的大事，推动党和国家事业取得历史性成就、发生历史性变革。今天，我们比历史上任何时期都更接近、更有信心和能力实现中华民族伟大复兴的目标。    提供更为完善的制度保证。习近平总书记指出：“改革开放以来，我们总结历史经验，不断艰辛探索，终于找到了实现中华民族伟大复兴的正确道路，取得了举世瞩目的成果。这条道路就是中国特色社会主义。”中国特色社会主义是科学社会主义理论逻辑和中国社会发展历史逻辑的辩证统一，根植于中国大地、反映中国人民意愿、适应中国和时代发展进步要求，是加快推进社会主义现代化、实现中华民族伟大复兴的必由之路。党的十八大以来，习近平总书记把制度建设摆到更加突出的位置，强调“构建系统完备、科学规范、运行有效的制度体系，使各方面制度更加成熟更加定型”。党的十八届三中全会把“完善和发展中国特色社会主义制度，推进国家治理体系和治理能力现代化”确定为全面深化改革的总目标。党的十八届四中全会对全面依法治国作出明确部署。党的十九届四中全会全面总结中国特色社会主义制度建设的历史性成就，系统描绘了中国特色社会主义的制度图谱。9年来，在以习近平同志为核心的党中央坚强领导下，神州大地开启了一场气势如虹、势如破竹的伟大变革。以制度建设为主线，各方面先后出台2000多个改革方案，全面发力、多点突破、纵深推进，许多领域实现历史性变革、系统性重塑、整体性重构。坚持全面从严治党，以踏石留印、抓铁有痕的劲头抓作风建设，以零容忍的态度惩治腐败，对党进行了革命性锻造、对军队进行了革命性重塑。支撑中国特色社会主义制度的根本制度不断筑牢、基本制度更加完善、重要制度不断创新，各领域基础性制度框架基本确立，系统完备、科学规范、运行有效的制度体系日渐成型。    奠定更为坚实的物质基础。习近平总书记指出：“实现中华民族伟大复兴的中国梦，就是要实现国家富强、民族振兴、人民幸福”。以习近平同志为核心的党中央高瞻远瞩、谋篇布局，着眼我国社会主要矛盾转化，坚持以人民为中心，把人民对美好生活的向往作为奋斗目标，准确把握新发展阶段，完整、准确、全面贯彻新发展理念，加快构建新发展格局，深入推进供给侧结构性改革，坚定实施科教兴国、创新驱动发展、区域协调发展等重大战略，打好防范化解重大风险、精准脱贫、污染防治攻坚战，团结带领全党全国各族人民砥砺前行、开拓创新，推动中国经济进入高质量发展轨道，我国经济实力、科技实力、国防实力和综合国力显著增强，国际地位、国际形象极大提升。经过全党全国各族人民持续奋斗，我们实现了第一个百年奋斗目标，在中华大地上全面建成了小康社会，历史性地解决了绝对贫困问题，书写了人类发展史上的伟大奇迹。经济总量实现新飞跃，国内生产总值突破100万亿元；发展方式发生转变，“中国制造”转向“中国创造”；人民生活显著改善，织就全球最大社会保障网；生态环境明显好转，天蓝地绿水清的美丽中国容颜初显；人民军队淬火成钢，向着世界一流军队砥砺前行。这些变革性实践、突破性进展、标志性成就，在党的百年奋斗历程中具有里程碑意义，为实现中华民族伟大复兴奠定了更为雄厚的物质基础。我们乘势而上开启全面建设社会主义现代化国家新征程，为中国发展厚植根基、突破关键，开创民族复兴的美好未来。    激发更为主动的精神力量。习近平总书记指出：“一个民族的复兴需要强大的物质力量，也需要强大的精神力量。”党的十八大以来，以习近平同志为主要代表的中国共产党人，坚持用马克思主义的立场、观点、方法观察时代、把握时代、引领时代，创立了习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想这一当代中国马克思主义、二十一世纪马克思主义，为我们提供了认识世界、改造世界的强大思想武器，让中华民族伟大复兴获得了前所未有的历史主动、精神主动。大力弘扬以爱国主义为核心的民族精神和以改革创新为核心的时代精神，鲜明提出以伟大建党精神为源头的中国共产党人精神谱系，为坚持和发展中国特色社会主义提供强大精神动力。在全社会积极培育和践行社会主义核心价值观，弘扬中华民族传统美德，把爱家和爱国统一起来，锲而不舍、一以贯之抓好社会主义精神文明建设，为全国各族人民不断前进提供坚强的思想保证、强大的精神力量、丰润的道德滋养。延续历史文脉，坚定文化自信，按照时代的新进步，推动中华文明创造性转化和创新性发展，激活其生命力，让中华文明同世界各国人民创造的丰富多彩的文明一道，为人类发展进步提供正确的精神指引和强大的精神动力。铸牢中华民族共同体意识，引导各族人民牢固树立休戚与共、荣辱与共、生死与共、命运与共的共同体理念。以全人类共同价值构建人类命运共同体，追求和平、追求幸福、奉献世界，引领人类文明发展新纪元。    （下转03版）
en_title: The Party's Hundred Years of Struggle Has Opened Up the Right Way to Realize the Great Rejuvenation of the Chinese Nation
en_text: Achieving the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation embodies the long-cherished wish of several generations of Chinese people, reflects the overall interests of the Chinese nation and the Chinese people, and is the common aspiration of every son and daughter of the Chinese nation. Since its establishment, the Communist Party of China has always regarded seeking happiness for the Chinese people and seeking rejuvenation for the Chinese nation as its original mission. The "Resolution of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China on the major achievements and historical experience of the party's century-old struggle" adopted by the Sixth Plenary Session of the 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of The right way to revival. 'This road has gone through a century of wind and rain, and it has become brighter and wider, and it has reached the glorious shore of the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation. Achieving the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation is the theme of the party's century-long struggle. General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out: "In the past 100 years, all the struggles, sacrifices, and creations that the Communist Party of China has united and led the Chinese people to make can be summed up in one theme: realizing the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation. "The Chinese nation is a great nation in the world, with a long history of civilization spanning more than 5,000 years, and has made indelible contributions to the progress of human civilization. After the Opium War in 1840, China gradually became a semi-colonial and semi-feudal society. The country was humiliated, the people suffered, and the civilization was dusted. The Chinese nation suffered an unprecedented catastrophe. In order to save the nation from peril, the Chinese people rose up to resist, people with lofty ideals ran and shouted, and various national salvation plans were introduced one after another, but they all ended in failure. Among various political forces, only the Communist Party of China shoulders the historical mission of realizing the national salvation and the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation. As a Marxist political party, the Communist Party of China has got rid of the limitation of all political forces in the past to pursue its own special interests, and takes national rejuvenation as its own responsibility. The ability of the forest of nations in the world lights up the beacon of the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation. title: 创新实干勇毅前行  推动民政事业高质量发展
text:
青岛市即墨区通济街道办事处社区服务中心工作人员陪残疾居民过元宵节。


5月9日，青岛市民政局在市北区举办居家社区养老服务大集开集仪式，图为市民在活动现场进行咨询。

2021年，山东省青岛市民政局聚焦人民群众对美好生活的向往，强化“创一流”“当排头”意识，担当作为、创新实干，着力保民生、兜底线，固根基、提效能，扩供给、促均等，奋力推动全市民政事业高质量发展。


聚焦“一老一小一困” 


民生保障更加有力


养老服务扩面提质。青岛市民政局全力推进居家社区养老服务改革，继去年建成98处城区街道级居家社区养老服务中心之后，建成40处农村镇级居家社区服务中心，实现专业养老机构提供居家社区养老服务城乡全覆盖。制定《支持养老服务行业健康发展的若干措施》《青岛市街道（镇）级居家社区养老服务中心签约家庭养老床位运营管理办法（试行）》，举办居家社区养老服务大集，全市家庭养老床位数达到1.9万张。开展社区养老服务设施清查整治行动，全市新建小区养老服务设施配建率达99.3%、老旧小区养老服务设施配建率达98.1%。举办2021中国山东·青岛国际康养产业博览会，成立青岛市养老服务指导中心，提高全市养老机构服务质量，目前全市共有养老机构286家、机构养老床位4.2万张。开发养老服务地图，老年人通过手机就能查询预约养老服务；推广养老服务时间银行，完成服务订单1.15万单；为2500名失智老人发放防走失定位手环，建立多部门协同配合的失智老年人防走失关爱机制，切实增强广大老年人及其家庭的安全感。


儿童福利温暖人心。成立青岛市未成年人保护工作领导小组，实现区（市）未成年人保护中心、镇（街）未成年人保护工作站全覆盖，配齐配强135名儿童督导员、6634名儿童主任，进一步完善未成年人保护服务体系。以镇（街）未成年人保护工作站为枢纽，联动儿童社工和志愿者1100多人。投入420余万元购买儿童类社工服务，10个区（市）实现政府购买服务全覆盖。采取“困境未成年人＋Ｎ（儿童主任、专业社工、志愿者、爱心企业、爱心人士等）”关爱帮扶模式，评估农村留守儿童和困境儿童家庭750户，个案帮扶农村留守儿童和困境儿童400人次。开展“绽放小葵花”困境未成年人心理关爱项目，对全市1000名困境未成年人进行心理需求调研，制订个性化关爱方案。开展事实无人抚养儿童助学全省试点工程，为39名符合条件的学生发放助学金18.8万元。


民生保障托稳兜实。落实动态调整机制，将低保、特困救助保障标准提高10%，有效保障9.6万名城乡低保、特困人员基本生活；同步提高残疾人、困境儿童救助保障标准，惠及3.8万名困难残疾人、9.1万名重度残疾人和1800余名孤儿、困境儿童。在各区（市）建立社会救助综合服务中心、各镇（街）设立社会救助“一门受理、协同办理”平台，建立全省一流的“区（市）、镇（街）、村（居）”三级衔接互通的社会救助工作网络。健全主动发现机制，加强低收入人口动态监测，发挥临时救助“救急难”作用，确保对困难群众早发现、早报告、早救助，今年以来全市通过主动发现救助困难群众8107人。创新“物质+服务”多维救助，打造全省社会救助综合改革试点。不间断进行街面巡查、救助帮扶，保障流浪乞讨人员温暖过冬、清凉过夏。开展“照亮回家路”寻亲专项行动，帮助19名走失人员成功寻亲。入选康复辅助器具产业国家综合创新试点城市。


聚焦“共建共治共享” 


基层治理更加有序


慈善福彩汇聚爱心。建立慈善组织综合监管机制，强化慈善事业发展制度保障。落实慈善优惠政策，为22家慈善组织确认公益性捐赠税前扣除资格。动员各级慈善组织支持巩固脱贫攻坚成果，开展“慈善及时雨”“慈善阳光助学”“点亮小桔灯”等服务项目81个。截至11月底，全市福利彩票共计销售13.74亿元、筹集福彩公益金4.3亿元，组织开展服务老年人、儿童、残疾人的各类公益活动25次。


社会组织繁荣发展。全市社会组织达到1.03万余家。加强社会组织党建引领，选聘25名党建工作指导员，审核社会组织负责人566人，实现党组织和党的工作全覆盖。开展“我为企业减负担”阳光收费行动，515家商协会减免会费及服务性收费1385万元。打击整治非法社会组织124家，分类处置“僵尸型”社会组织996家。鼓励引导社区社会组织参与基层社会治理，广泛开展“邻里守望”关爱行动。1323家社会组织开展902个乡村振兴项目，投入资金4788万元。128家社会组织参与东西部协作，实施帮扶项目和活动142个，捐赠款物3620万元。


社区治理精准精细。完成全市2072个村（居）委会换届选举工作，选齐配强村（社区）班子队伍，不断强化社区制度保障。开展村（社区）“牌子多”问题集中整治，规范社区出具证明事项。全面推广“一窗受理、全科服务”模式，城市社区覆盖率达到100%。开展“五社联动”社区治理服务项目，举办2021年青岛市社区供需服务大集，搭建社区服务线上供需对接平台。成立青岛社会工作学院，建成75处镇（街）社工站，实施困境人群服务、社区治理赋能等项目100余个、服务3万余人。强化志愿服务管理，探索建立志愿服务激励保障机制，全市注册志愿者155万人、志愿服务团队2640支，开展志愿服务项目7752个。


聚焦“便民利民惠民” 


社会服务更加高效


政务服务方便快捷。扎实推进“政务服务一件事”工作，将12个部门25项救助事项接入系统，实现社会救助“一门受理、协同办理”。“公民身故一件事”包含的11件事项，全部实现数据跑腿。残疾人两项补贴实现跨省申办。开展婚姻登记“跨省通办”试点，在青岛市长期居住的国内居民可以预约办理婚姻登记，目前已办理跨区域通办婚姻登记3911件。完成全省首例事实无人抚养儿童认定申请受理“全省通办”服务。持续优化道路命名流程，编制《青岛市中心城区地名规划》，命名城区道路196条。


民政领域安全稳定。慎终如始、持之以恒抓好民政机构疫情防控，严格落实常态化防控措施，扎实做好核酸检测“应检尽检”、疫苗接种“应接尽接”等工作，保障民政领域公共卫生安全。完善养老机构智慧消防平台，运用物联网构筑养老机构安全屏障。全面落实安全生产责任制，深入细致开展安全生产大排查、大整治工作，及时整改消除安全隐患，切实保障民政服务机构安全运行。


踏上新征程，青岛市民政局将以全面贯彻党的十九届六中全会精神和习近平总书记对民政工作的重要指示精神为引领，以人民群众需求为导向，履职尽责、开拓创新，努力推动新时代青岛民政事业更高质量发展，为青岛建设现代化国际大都市贡献民政力量。(文图/青岛市民政局)
en_title: Innovation, hard work and courage to move forward to promote the high-quality development of civil affairs
en_text: The staff of the Community Service Center of Tongji Sub-district Office, Jimo District, Qingdao City accompanied disabled residents to celebrate the Lantern Festival. On May 9, the Qingdao Civil Affairs Bureau held an opening ceremony of a home-based community elderly care service in Shibei District. The picture shows citizens consulting at the event site. In 2021, Qingdao Civil Affairs Bureau of Shandong Province will focus on the people's yearning for a better life, strengthen the awareness of "creating first-class" and "being at the forefront", take responsibility, innovate and work hard, strive to protect people's livelihood, realize the bottom line, consolidate the foundation, improve efficiency, and expand supply , promote equality, and strive to promote the high-quality development of civil affairs across the country. Focusing on "one old, one small and one poor" people's livelihood security is more powerful, and elderly care services are expanded and improved in quality. The Qingdao Civil Affairs Bureau has made every effort to promote the reform of home-based and community-based elderly care services. Following the completion of 98 urban street-level home-based and community-based elderly care service centers last year, 40 rural town-level home-based community service centers have been built, realizing the full coverage of urban and rural areas provided by professional elderly care institutions. . Formulated "Several Measures to Support the Healthy Development of the Elderly Care Service Industry" and "Administrative Measures for the Operation and Management of Home-based Elderly Care Beds Signed by the Sub-district (town) Home Community Elderly Care Service Centers in Qingdao (Trial)", held a large collection of home-based and community elderly care services, and the number of family elderly care beds in the city. reached 19,000. The inspection and rectification of community elderly care service facilities was carried out. The construction rate of elderly care service facilities in newly built communities reached 99.3%, and the provision rate of elderly care service facilities in old communities reached 98.1%. The 2021 China Shandong-Qingdao International Health Care Industry Expo will be held, and the Qingdao Elderly Care Service Guidance Center will be established to improve the service quality of the city's elderly care institutions. At present, there are 286 elderly care institutions and 42,000 institutional elderly care beds in the city. Develop a senior care service map, so that the elderly can inquire and reserve senior care services through their mobile phones; promote the time bank for senior care services, and complete 11,500 service orders; distribute anti-lost positioning bracelets to 2,500 elderly people with dementia, and establish a multi-department collaboration for dementia The anti-lost care mechanism for the elderly has effectively enhanced the sense of security of the elderly and their families. Child welfare is heartwarming. A leading group for the protection of minors in Qingdao was established to achieve full coverage of district (city) minors protection centers and town (street) minors protection workstations, with 135 child supervisors and 6,634 child directors. Improve the service system for the protection of minors. With the town (street) minor protection workstation as the hub, more than 1,100 children's social workers and volunteers have been linked. Invested more than 4.2 million yuan to purchase children's social work services, and 10 districts (cities) achieved full coverage of government-purchased services. Adopting the "minors in need + N (children directors, professional social workers, volunteers, caring enterprises, caring people, etc.)" care and assistance model, evaluating 750 rural left-behind children and families with children in distress, and helping rural left-behind children and children in distress in individual cases 400 people. Carry out the "Blooming Little Sunflower" psychological care project for minors in distress, conduct psychological needs research on 1,000 minors in distress in the city, and formulate personalized care plans. Launched the province's pilot project to assist unsupported children to study, and issued 188,000 yuan of stipends to 39 eligible students. People's livelihood security is guaranteed. Implementing the dynamic adjustment mechanism, raising the minimum living allowance and special hardship assistance standards by 10%, effectively guaranteeing the basic living of 96,000 urban and rural people with minimum living allowances and extreme hardships; simultaneously raising the assistance and guarantee standards for the disabled and children in need, benefiting 38,000 people with disabilities, 91,000 severely disabled people and more than 1,800 orphans and children in distress. Establish a comprehensive social assistance service center in each district (city), set up a social assistance "one-door acceptance and collaborative handling" platform in each town (street), and establish a first-class "district (city), town (street), village (residential)" platform in the province "Three-level linking and interconnecting social assistance network. Improve the active discovery mechanism, strengthen the dynamic monitoring of low-income population, play the role of temporary rescue "emergency rescue", and ensure early detection, early reporting, and early assistance to the needy people. Since this year, the city has rescued 8,107 people in need through active discovery. Innovate "material + service" multi-dimensional assistance, and create a pilot program for comprehensive reform of social assistance in the province. Uninterrupted street inspections, assistance and assistance are carried out to ensure that homeless and beggars stay warm in winter and cool in summer. Launched the special action of "illuminating the way home" to find relatives, helping 19 lost people to find their relatives successfully. Selected as a national comprehensive innovation pilot city for the rehabilitation assistive device industry. Focus on "co-construction, co-governance and sharing", grassroots governance is more orderly, charity welfare lottery gathers love. Establish a comprehensive supervision mechanism for charitable organizations and strengthen institutional guarantees for the development of charities. Implemented preferential charitable policies and confirmed pre-tax deduction qualifications for charitable donations for 22 charitable organizations. Charity organizations at all levels were mobilized to support and consolidate the achievements of poverty alleviation, and carried out 81 service projects such as "Charity Timely Rain", "Charity Sunshine Aid for Students" and "Lighting the Orange Lamp". As of the end of November, the city's welfare lottery sales totaled 1.374 billion yuan, raised 430 million yuan in welfare lottery funds, and organized 25 public welfare activities to serve the elderly, children and the disabled. Social organizations thrive. There are more than 10,300 social organizations in the city. Strengthen the leadership of the party building of social organizations, select 25 party building work instructors, review 566 leaders of social organizations, and achieve full coverage of party organizations and party work. Launched the "I reduce the burden for enterprises" sunshine charging action, 515 business associations reduced or exempted 13.85 million yuan of membership fees and service charges. 124 illegal social organizations were cracked down and rectified, and 996 "zombie-type" social organizations were classified and disposed of. Encourage and guide community social organizations to participate in grass-roots social governance, and extensively carry out the "neighborhood watch" caring action. 1,323 social organizations carried out 902 rural revitalization projects with an investment of 47.88 million yuan. 128 social organizations participated in the East-West collaboration, implemented 142 assistance projects and activities, and donated 36.2 million yuan in money and goods. Precise and precise community governance. Completed the city's 2072 village (neighborhood) committee elections, selected and matched strong village (community) teams, and continuously strengthened the community system guarantee. Carry out centralized rectification of the problem of "too many brands" in villages (communities), and standardize the certification matters issued by the community. The model of "one-window acceptance and full-service service" has been comprehensively promoted, and the coverage rate of urban communities has reached 100%. Carry out the "Five Communities Linkage" community governance service project, hold the 2021 Qingdao community supply and demand service gathering, and build an online supply and demand docking platform for community services. Established Qingdao Social Work College, built 75 town (street) social work stations, and implemented more than 100 projects such as services for people in distress and community governance empowerment, serving more than 30,000 people. Strengthen volunteer service management, explore the establishment of a volunteer service incentive and guarantee mechanism, 1.55 million registered volunteers, 2,640 volunteer service teams, and 7,752 volunteer service projects. Focus on "convenience for the people, benefit the people and benefit the people" Social services are more efficient and government services are convenient and fast. Solidly promote the work of "government service one thing", connect 25 assistance items from 12 departments to the system, and realize the "one-door acceptance and coordinated handling" of social assistance. The 11 items included in the "Citizen Death One Matter" are all data errands. The two subsidies for disabled people can be applied across provinces. The pilot program of "cross-province general handling" of marriage registration has been carried out. Domestic residents who have lived in Qingdao for a long time can make an appointment for marriage registration. At present, 3,911 cross-regional marriage registrations have been handled. Completed the province's first case of de facto unsupported children's application and acceptance of the "province-wide" service. Continue to optimize the road naming process, compile the "Qingdao Central City Geographical Name Planning", and name 196 urban roads. Security and stability in the field of civil affairs. Be prudent and persevere in the prevention and control of the epidemic in civil affairs institutions, strictly implement normalized prevention and control measures, and do a solid job in nucleic acid testing "everything should be checked" and vaccination "everything should be received", so as to ensure public health in the field of civil affairs. Safety. Improve the smart fire protection platform for elderly care institutions, and use the Internet of Things to build security barriers for elderly care institutions. Fully implement the safety production responsibility system, carry out in-depth and meticulous work safety inspections and rectification, timely rectify and eliminate potential safety hazards, and effectively ensure the safe operation of civil affairs service agencies. On the new journey, Qingdao Civil Affairs Bureau will fully implement the spirit of the Sixth Plenary Session of the 19th CPC Central Committee and the spirit of General Secretary Xi Jinping's important instructions on civil affairs work as the guide, be guided by the needs of the people, perform its duties with due diligence, pioneer and innovate, Efforts will be made to promote the higher-quality development of Qingdao's civil affairs in the new era, and contribute to the construction of Qingdao into a modern international metropolis.
