title: “女儿呀，终于把你找到了”-
text:
□陈怀禹
    49年前，襁褓中的徐秀丽失踪，从此她的父母家人踏上了长达49年的寻亲路。得知自己是被抱养的，徐秀丽也开始寻亲。今年“团圆行动”开展后，徐秀丽和她的生身父母几乎在同一时间求助公安机关。近日，在山东和江苏两地警方的帮助下，徐秀丽与阔别49年的亲人相见。
    11月25日，在潍坊市公安局经济开发区分局民警的陪伴下，徐秀丽坐上动车，赶到江苏常熟与家人相认。
    “女儿呀，找了你49年，终于把你找到了！”在江苏省常熟市公安局大义派出所，徐秀丽和生身父母紧紧拥抱在一起。
    49年前，在江苏连云港的露天广场附近，徐秀丽父母因有事情需要处理，将女儿临时让别人看管，可返回时女儿却不见了踪影。为此，徐秀丽的父母走遍了江苏的每个地方，整整寻找了49年。
    徐秀丽被养父母从淄博某处抱养后，对其视若己出。养父过世，徐秀丽无意中获知自己并非亲生，从此便萌生了寻亲的念头。今年8月15日，徐秀丽得知潍坊公安通过免费采集血样帮助当地多个家庭团圆的事情，便抱着试一试的态度向经济开发区分局提供了自己的血样样本。
    仿佛心有灵犀，今年9月末，徐秀丽的生身父母也抱着试一试的态度提供了自己的血样。今年11月初，徐秀丽和父母比对成功。
    得知二姐曾吃过潍坊的肉火烧并对此念念不忘，徐秀丽在家制作了十几斤的肉火烧，并带着其他潍坊特色美食去认亲。“看着她飞奔过去与亲人拥抱在一起，还有他们分肉火烧时发出的开心的笑声，我们也很高兴。”潍坊市公安局经济开发区分局民警说。
en_title: "Daughter, I finally found you"-
en_text: □Chen Huaiyu 49 years ago, Xu Xiuli, who was an infant, disappeared. Since then, her parents and family have embarked on a 49-year search for relatives. Knowing that she was adopted, Xu Xiuli also began to look for relatives. After the "Reunion Action" was launched this year, Xu Xiuli and her biological parents sought help from the public security organs at almost the same time. Recently, with the help of the police in Shandong and Jiangsu, Xu Xiuli met her relatives who had been separated for 49 years. On November 25, accompanied by the police from the Economic Development Division of the Weifang Public Security Bureau, Xu Xiuli got on the train and rushed to Changshu, Jiangsu to meet her family. "Daughter, I've been looking for you for 49 years, and I finally found you!" At the Dayi Police Station of the Public Security Bureau of Changshu City, Jiangsu Province, Xu Xiuli hugged her biological parents tightly. 49 years ago, near the open-air plaza in Lianyungang, Jiangsu, Xu Xiuli's parents temporarily put their daughter under the care of others because they had to deal with it, but when they returned, the daughter disappeared. To this end, Xu Xiuli's parents traveled all over Jiangsu and searched for 49 years. After Xu Xiuli was adopted by her adoptive parents from somewhere in Zibo, she regarded her as her own. When her adoptive father passed away, Xu Xiuli inadvertently learned that she was not her own biological daughter, and she had the idea of looking for her relatives from then on. On August 15 this year, Xu Xiuli learned that Weifang Public Security had helped local families reunite by collecting blood samples for free, so she provided her own blood samples to the Economic Development Zone Bureau with the attitude of giving it a try. As if they had a heart-to-heart, at the end of September this year, Xu Xiuli's biological parents also provided their own blood samples with the attitude of giving it a try. In early November this year, Xu Xiuli successfully compared with her parents. Knowing that the second sister had eaten Weifang's meat fire and was obsessed with it, Xu Xiuli made more than ten kilograms of meat fire at home, and brought other Weifang specialties to recognize her relatives. "We are also very happy to see her flying over to hug her relatives, and the happy laughter they made when they shared the meat," said a policeman from the Economic Development Zone of the Weifang Public Security Bureau.

title: 国家市场监管总局关于推进营商环境创新试点城市企业内部使用的最高计量标准器具管理模式改革工作的通知
text:
国家市场监管总局关于推进营商环境创新试点城市企业内部使用的最高计量标准器具管理模式改革工作的通知
        
        

国家市场监管总局关于推进营商环境创新试点城市企业内部使用的最高计量标准器具管理模式改革工作的通知

（国市监计量发〔2021〕81号）




北京市、上海市、浙江省、广东省、重庆市市场监管局：

　　为深入贯彻落实《
全国人民代表大会常务委员会关于授权国务院在营商环境创新试点城市暂时调整适用〈中华人民共和国计量法〉有关规定的决定
》、《
国务院关于开展营商环境创新试点工作的意见
》（国发〔2021〕24号）部署要求，加快推进营商环境创新试点城市企业内部使用的最高计量标准器具管理模式改革，进一步优化营商环境，激发市场主体活力，现将有关事项通知如下。


　　一、
改革事项和主要内容。在北京、上海、重庆、杭州、广州、深圳等6个营商环境创新试点城市，取消企业内部使用的最高计量标准器具考核发证及强制检定。企业内部使用的最高计量标准器具调整为企业自主管理，不需计量行政部门考核发证，也不再实行强制检定，但应满足计量溯源性要求。
企业依法自主管理。营商环境创新试点城市取消企业内部使用的最高计量标准器具考核发证及强制检定后，企业可参照计量标准考核规范和相关专业计量技术规范等技术要求，建立和自主管理其内部使用的最高计量标准器具，确保各项计量标准量值准确。企业自主管理的最高计量标准器具，应当溯源至社会公用计量标准器具或计量基准器具，社会公用计量标准器具或计量基准器具无法满足溯源技术要求的，应当通过计量比对的方式保证量值的一致性，或者通过溯源至国际互认的校准测量能力满足溯源要求。对社会开展检定的，应符合《
中华人民共和国计量法
》及《
计量授权管理办法
》等法律法规有关要求。
加强指导和帮扶。有关地方市场监管部门要帮助企业了解最高计量标准器具的技术和管理要求、计量溯源性要求和溯源方式等，指导有需求的企业建立完善相关管理制度，科学合理有效建立、保存、维护和使用计量标准器具。可结合当地实际情况，通过建立信息平台、开展技术咨询等方式，帮助企业不断提高计量能力和水平。
加强事中事后监管。有关地方市场监管部门要加强对企业自主管理最高计量标准器具的事中事后监管，确保满足计量溯源性要求和计量标准准确。通过监督检查或抽查等发现计量标准器及配套设备不齐全、未依法进行检定或校准、环境条件或工作场地不适宜、计量管理制度不健全等情况的，要及时告知企业予以纠正。
加快改革落地实施。有关地方市场监管部门要按照重大改革于法有据的要求，依照法定程序开展营商环境创新试点工作。建立健全改革试点推进工作机制，落实责任机构和人员，明确工作措施和工作时限，周密安排部署，强化预研预判和跟踪监测，制定改革实施方案，确保既放得开又管得住。在此基础上，鼓励地方结合工作实际，在风险总体可控前提下，创新性开展好改革试点工作。浙江省、广东省市场监管局要分别加强对杭州市和广州市、深圳市企业内部使用的最高计量标准器具管理模式改革工作的业务指导和政策支持。
做好工作衔接。有关地方市场监管部门要按照国务院要求，及时优化调整计量标准器具核准行政许可业务流程，修订完善工作规则和服务指南，建立与试点要求相适应的管理制度。已按照《
计量标准考核办法
》有关规定取得计量标准考核证书的，在其有效期内证书依然有效；已经受理企业内部使用的最高计量标准器具核准行政许可申请的，有关市场监管部门要依法终止审批程序，并做好后续监管工作，防止出现管理漏洞。
强化评估总结。有关省级市场监管部门要及时跟踪、监测、评估、总结试点工作的实际情况，对出现问题和风险的要及时按程序向当地人民政府和市场监管总局报告，必要时请示报告国务院予以调整或停止实施。对实践证明行之有效、市场主体欢迎的经验做法、改革措施要及时予以总结推广。有关省级市场监管部门应当于每年6月30日、12月31日前向市场监管总局报送半年评估报告，内容包括改革基本情况、经验做法、事中事后监管情况、社会反响情况、存在的突出问题及意见建议等。

     国家市场监管总局

　　2021年12月20日
en_title: Notice of the State Administration for Market Regulation on Promoting the Reform of the Management Model of the Highest Measurement Standard Instruments Used by Enterprises in the Pilot City of Business Environment Innovation
en_text: Notice of the State Administration for Market Regulation on Promoting the Reform of the Management Model of the Highest Standard of Measurement Instruments Used by Enterprises in the Pilot Cities for Business Environment Innovation Circular (Guoshijianweifa [2021] No. 81) Market Supervision Bureaus of Beijing, Shanghai, Zhejiang, Guangdong, and Chongqing: In order to thoroughly implement the "Standing Committee of the National People's Congress on Authorizing the State Council in the Business Environment Innovation pilot cities temporarily adjust the application of the relevant provisions of the "Measurement Law of the People's Republic of China" and the "Opinions of the State Council on Carrying out the Pilot Work of Business Environment Innovation" (Guo Fa [2021] No. 24) deployment requirements to accelerate the promotion of business environment innovation The reform of the management model of the highest measurement standard instruments used by enterprises in the pilot cities will further optimize the business environment and stimulate the vitality of market entities. The relevant matters are hereby notified as follows. 1. Reform issues and main contents. In 6 pilot cities for business environment innovation, including Beijing, Shanghai, Chongqing, Hangzhou, Guangzhou, and Shenzhen, the assessment and certification and compulsory verification of the highest measurement standard instruments used within enterprises have been cancelled. The highest measurement standard instruments used within the enterprise are adjusted to the enterprise's own management, and there is no need for the measurement administrative department to assess and issue certificates, and no mandatory verification is required, but it should meet the requirements of measurement traceability. Enterprises manage independently in accordance with the law. After the pilot cities for business environment innovation cancel the assessment and certification and compulsory verification of the highest measurement standard instruments used in enterprises, enterprises can establish and independently manage the highest measurement standards for their internal use by referring to technical requirements such as measurement standard assessment specifications and relevant professional measurement technical specifications. Standard instruments to ensure that the measurement standards are accurate. The highest measurement standard instruments independently managed by the enterprise shall be traceable to the public measurement standard instruments or measurement reference instruments. If the social public measurement standard instruments or measurement reference instruments cannot meet the technical requirements for traceability, the consistency of the measurement value shall be ensured by means of measurement comparison. , or meet traceability requirements through traceability to internationally recognized calibration measurement capabilities. The verification of the society shall comply with the relevant requirements of laws and regulations such as the Metrology Law of the People's Republic of China and the Measures for the Administration of Metrology Authorization. Strengthen guidance and assistance. Relevant local market supervision departments should help enterprises to understand the technical and management requirements of the highest measurement standard instruments, measurement traceability requirements and traceability methods, etc., and guide enterprises in need to establish and improve relevant management systems, and scientifically, rationally and effectively establish, save, maintain and use measurement. standard appliance. Combined with the actual local situation, it can help enterprises to continuously improve their measurement capabilities and levels by establishing information platforms and conducting technical consultations. Strengthen supervision during and after the event. Relevant local market supervision departments should strengthen the interim and ex post supervision of the highest measurement standard instruments independently managed by enterprises to ensure that measurement traceability requirements are met and measurement standards are accurate. If it is found through supervision, inspection or random inspection that the measurement standard and supporting equipment are not complete, the verification or calibration has not been carried out in accordance with the law, the environmental conditions or workplace are unsuitable, and the measurement management system is not perfect, the enterprise shall be promptly informed to make corrections. Accelerate the implementation of reforms. Relevant local market supervision departments shall carry out the pilot work of business environment innovation in accordance with the requirements of major reforms that are based on the law and in accordance with legal procedures. Establish and improve the reform pilot promotion working mechanism, implement responsible agencies and personnel, clarify work measures and work time limits, carefully arrange deployment, strengthen pre-research prediction and follow-up monitoring, and formulate reform implementation plans to ensure both liberalization and control. On this basis, encourage local governments to innovatively carry out reform pilot work based on actual work conditions and under the premise of overall controllable risks. The Market Supervision Bureau of Zhejiang Province and Guangdong Province shall strengthen the business guidance and policy support for the reform of the management model of the highest measurement standard instruments used by enterprises in Hangzhou, Guangzhou and Shenzhen respectively. Do a good job connecting. Relevant local market supervision departments shall, in accordance with the requirements of the State Council, optimize and adjust the administrative licensing business process for the approval of standard measuring instruments in a timely manner, revise and improve work rules and service guidelines, and establish management systems that meet the requirements of the pilot program. If a measurement standard assessment certificate has been obtained in accordance with the relevant provisions of the "Measures for Measurement Standard Assessment", the certificate is still valid within its validity period; if the application for the approval of the administrative license for the highest measurement standard instrument used within the enterprise has been accepted, the relevant market supervision department shall terminate the approval process according to law. , and do a good job in follow-up supervision to prevent management loopholes. Enhanced assessment summary. The relevant provincial market supervision departments should track, monitor, evaluate and summarize the actual situation of the pilot work in a timely manner, and report to the local people's government and the State Administration for Market Regulation in accordance with procedures in a timely manner, and report to the State Council for adjustment or suspension if necessary. implement. Experiences, practices and reform measures that have been proven effective in practice and welcomed by market players should be summarized and promoted in a timely manner. Relevant provincial market supervision departments shall submit semi-annual assessment reports to the State Administration for Market Regulation before June 30 and December 31 each year, including the basic situation of reform, experience and practices, supervision during and after the event, social repercussions, and outstanding existing questions and suggestions. State Administration for Market Regulation December 20, 2021

title: 建设宜居宜业宜游美丽新陆丰
text:
奋力裂变发展，实现蓝色崛起，是陆丰人给自己定下的目标，也彰显出了陆丰后起直追的野心与决心。近年来，陆丰通过进一步健全城乡融合发展机制，统筹推进乡村振兴、镇街振兴、城市振兴，全面提高发展的平衡性和协调性，正不断发生着全领域的蝶变。
    如今，一幅城市美、镇圩美、乡村美“三美共进”的新画卷正在徐徐展开，宜居宜业宜游美丽的新陆丰展现出来，陆丰用踏实的步伐，一步一个脚印奋力走出城乡面貌大裂变的新路子。
    ●撰文：彭骏 陈欣欣
    紧扣民生线 擦亮宜居底色
    今年国庆期间，当大家都沉浸在喜庆的节日氛围时，汕尾的黄阿姨却和儿子闹起了“别扭”。老人非说“回去住着更舒心”，执意要搬回陆丰的老房子，这让特意接她到新房养老的儿子有些不解。
    黄阿姨居住的小区是建于上世纪80年代的东海镇玉印小区。从和老姐妹的聊天中，老人得知陆丰大力创建文明城市，对老旧小区进行升级改造：过去坑坑洼洼的路面变得平坦宽敞，蜘蛛网般的电线全部入地，休闲小广场翻建如新，还增加了部分适老化设施……经过改造的玉印小区面貌焕然一新，这也是吸引老人回来的主要原因。
    今年以来，陆丰市结合党史学习教育，开展“我为群众办实事”实践活动，紧盯群众在出行、居住、治安、生活等方面面临的“急难愁盼”问题，集中攻坚。全市以创建文明城市行动为抓手，持续全面开展市、镇、村三级文明联创，对各地城乡环境卫生进行重点整治，掀起一场“卫生革命”。在城镇，推动老旧小区改造工程、处理生活垃圾、整治街道容貌；在村镇，以乡村振兴为总体目标，改善乡村人居环境、建设美丽乡村、开展“三清三拆三整治”工作。
    让居民点赞的，除了焕然一新的环境变化和深入人心的文明新风，还有从外到里、方方面面的提升完善。陆丰聚焦平安社会、城市建设、民生服务、路网设施、教育医疗，推动全领域宜居建设。
    陆丰不遗余力地推进“幼有善育、学有优教、劳有厚得、病有良医、老有颐养、住有宜居、弱有众扶”民生目标，并取得显著成效。目前，省委政法委正式解除了对陆丰社会治安重点地区整治，全市社会治安实现根本性好转，公共安全形势稳中向好；完成国、省道路面改造及“四好农村路”近四百公里，交通网络更加立体快捷；优化了污水处理、天然气管道等，市政基础设施实现优化升级；新建的龙山校区已投入使用，陆丰市一职、甲秀职校和新安职校建设项目顺利推进，填补了碣石与“三甲”地区中职教育的空白。
    平安治理筑宜居根基，精神文明促进和谐幸福，医疗教育增加民生福祉。在“广东省县级文明城市提名城市”灯塔的照耀下，今日的陆丰，老百姓出行更加顺心、居住更加暖心、治安更加放心、生活更加舒心，人民群众的获得感幸福感和安全感得到前所未有的提升。
    念好营商经 劲吹宜业春风
    时下，陆丰正处于实现蓝牌崛起、蓝色崛起的关键期，实现这一目标，需要营造更好的营商环境，吸引更多企业和项目落地于此。
    好的营商环境就是生产力，陆丰深谙此道。近年来，陆丰聚焦临港工业、新能源、电子信息等产业，推动“3+2”产业体系量质齐升；聚焦“八个便利化”和“六个通办”，全面打响“店小二”式服务招牌，持续优化营商环境，大力发展实体经济、打造创新创业热土，为实现蓝牌崛起，蓝色崛起助力。
    走进陆丰政务服务大厅，宽敞明亮，覆盖公安、税务、社保、医保等多领域的80个窗口一应俱全。陆丰全市所有政务服务事项均进驻服务大厅，在汕尾市率先实现了“应进必进”，并推出了一批线上线下融合受理和24小时自助服务高效、便捷有特色的政务服务项目。
    前来办事的市民小陈仅用了一个上午就成了私营企业主。“实在没想到这么快，还以为得至少跑个三四趟，等个十天半个月呢。”捧着手里的食品经营证书，他兴奋地有点不知所措。
    半天成为企业主、一趟办完所有事，在陆丰早已不是什么新鲜事儿。正如小陈评价道，“只要来了，就没有办不成的事，总有一个窗口适合你。”
    近年来，陆丰深化“放管服”改革，市政务服务大厅以“一窗、一次、一地、一网、一证、一码”六个通办为抓手，打造审批最少、流程最优、效率最高、服务最好的“四最”政务服务环境。针对与企业和市民工作生活息息相关的高频服务事项，推进“六个通办”，推出“秒批”审核，做到“进一扇门办所有事”，让群众办事省时、省力、更省心。
    而针对重点项目和企业，陆丰市当好“店小二”角色，主动送服务上门。现场协调、回应诉求、无缝对接。“办事效率高了、服务贴心了、政策更有保障了，我们也愿意踏实留在这里和这个城市一起奋斗。”体验过上门服务的群众表示。
    好的营商环境带来高质量的发展，看似一项项小小的举措，实则牵动着万千市场主体的心。如今，越来越多的企业安家在这里。碣石临港产业园、海工基地重大项目、星都经济开发区相继在陆丰开工，中广核、明阳智慧、中天科技、天能重工等8家重点企业落户，陆丰已然成为了一片最旺盛、最火热的创新创业之地。
    下活文旅棋 打响宜游品牌
    初冬时节，地处粤东沿海的陆丰仍旧暖意融融。走进碣石湾畔金厢镇的十二岗村，只见蓝天白云、沙滩绵绵、碧波荡漾的海边乡村美景。新修建的占地3万平方米的陆丰市沙滩体育文化公园就在此。公园内以红色革命故事为主题的特色沙雕景观，与优美的海滨风光交相辉映，吸引了越来越多的游客驱车前来度假游玩。
    近年来，陆丰旅游产业初具规模，并保持了逆势发展的强劲势头。即便在行业普遍受疫情严重影响的2020年，依然凭借强大的产业生命力，为陆丰市贡献了30多亿元收入，取得了同比增长1%的好成绩。
    陆丰历史悠久、文化灿烂，具有丰富的旅游资源，既是红色革命圣地，又有优美的自然风景，还有迷人的妈祖文化。陆丰旅游缘何近两年才突出重围、大放异彩？
    俗话说旅游业都是靠山吃山、靠海吃海，陆丰不仅做到了这一点，更是下活旅游产业一盘棋，让山海相映、山海相融，实现产业升级，走上现代服务业之路。
    依托乡村振兴景观示范带、红色基因、宗教文化等资源要素，陆丰推进现代服务业高质量集聚发展，盘活星级品牌酒店、精品民宿、大型商超一条龙，拓展“N+旅游”新模式，以“拍陆丰、画陆丰、写陆丰、唱陆丰、游陆丰”的方式，推动文体和旅游融合发展，打造旅游体育休闲城乡体系，加快建成全域旅游示范区。
    目前，陆丰坚持“望得见山、看得见水、记得住乡愁”的理念，因地制宜，打造了以滨海公路黄金海岸、红色文旅、乡村休闲、滨海度假、智慧农业、观光农业为主要特色，以“感沧海桑田，游文化长廊”为形象定位的乡村振兴滨海走廊示范带，以及包含“山水画廊”“谷乡慢城”“浪漫荷香”“龙潭湖谷”“薪火蓝湾”五个主题的美丽乡村景观示范带，全面实现红色资源、传统文化、运动休闲三要素与旅游产业的深度融合，推动全域旅游建设、打响陆丰旅游品牌。
    在陆丰，产区变景区、田园变公园、劳作变体验、农房变客房，游客来了看不够、逛不完、吃不尽、住不穷。
    “体验蛮好的，开车来很方便。这里不仅景色美，旅游硬件设施和服务意识也好，一点也不是传统印象里的那种低质量乡村游。值得推荐，下次还会喊朋友们一起来。”来自广州的游客说道。
    最难能可贵的是，截至目前，陆丰创造并一直保持着旅游行业服务质量零投诉、旅游安全零事故的纪录。
    如今，村村通、村村游，镇镇通、镇镇游的旅游旺景在陆丰全面盛开，宜游陆丰的美名已广为人知。
    【走进一线】
    海工基地助推陆丰裂变式发展
    站在陆丰市湖东镇的海堤上，眺望南侧海域，只见蓝天白云下，一个个巨大的风电主机、一台台高效的设备在无尽的海面上运转。这正是中国广核集团在汕尾后湖投产的50万千瓦海上风电项目，该项目位于汕尾海洋工程基地（陆丰）（以下简称“陆丰海工基地”）。
    陆丰拥有长达190多公里的海岸线，是汕尾市所有县（市、区）中最长的。境内滩涂广阔，周围环境空旷，沿海年可供发电有效风时近万小时，几乎具有发展风电的所有最佳条件。随着汕尾市政府与中广核工程有限公司《海上风电工程基地合作协议》的签署，陆丰市依托丰富海岸线和广阔腹地，全面投资建设陆丰海工基地。
    基地位于陆丰核电站施工进场道路东南侧，项目用地约149公顷，总建筑面积约32万平方米，用海面积约45公顷，规划有风机综合厂（明阳园区）、配套装备厂（天能重工）、导管架厂（长风园区）、海底电缆厂（中天园区）等，基地码头（一期）在建2个码头及防波堤，包括9900T、5000DWT重件泊位和运维泊位各1个，年设计通过能力145.5万吨，码头二期计划增加3个5000—10000DWT风电专用泊位和4个10000DWT通用泊位，覆盖了管桩及导管架基础制造厂、海上风电配套装备制造等领域，产能规模按年均75万千瓦配套设备能力规划设计，总投资108亿元。
    日前，中国广核集团位于陆丰海工基地的91台风机全部并网发电，正式进入投产运营阶段，成为国内目前在运单体容量最大的海上风电场。基地内的明阳智能、中天科技、江苏长风等国内知名的海洋工程装备工业企业，也将在陆丰有一番大作为。
    陆丰正大力发展清洁能源、临港工业和现代农业等主导产业，打造千亿级新能源和海洋高端装备制造基地，按照汕尾市赋予的新定位，奋力当好粤东蓝色经济崛起示范区、全市高质量发展新引擎。
    美丽乡村振兴示范带建设全面开花
    走进陆丰上海村，一块刻有“上海”二字的石头矗立在村口，这里色彩亮丽的墙体彩绘让人仿佛置身魔都，墙上绘有摩天大楼、黄包车、园林等上海标志性元素，成为最美网红打卡点。
    上海村属于陆丰打造的乡村振兴滨海走廊示范带，与金厢滩、浅澳滩共同构成滨海旅游片区。近年来，陆丰市全面推进乡村振兴，按照“一带一主题”的原则，发挥红色文化、绿色山水、蓝色海洋、田园风光、特色产业、地域文化等优势，打造了滨海走廊、龙潭湖谷、山水画廊、谷乡慢城、浪漫荷香、薪火蓝湾6条特色鲜明的乡村振兴示范带，以点带面、串珠成链，充分发挥示范带示范引领作用，让沿线乡村面貌和乡风民风发生巨大改变。
    为建设好、治理好和运营好乡村振兴示范带，日前，陆丰市在上海村举行了第三季乡村振兴示范带擂台赛，夯实乡村振兴示范带的产业基础。各条景观示范带在会场内激烈比拼，竞争2亿元项目建设资金。当晚，浪漫荷香景观示范带获得第一名，参加擂台赛的三条示范带现场签约包括在内的海边度假村、生态农业、数字农业在内18个乡村振兴项目。
    引流资金、发展加快、振兴提速。陆丰美丽乡村振兴示范带建设促成了美丽乡村经济，结出“美丽硕果”。据统计，国庆期间，仅上海村一村凭借一己之力，累计接待游客近7万人次。目前，陆丰市各示范带建成体验节点和展馆38个、停车场约500个、公厕71座，建设“四好农村路”标准道路60多公里，美化绿化道路90多公里，沿线53个村庄完成农房管控风貌提升，带动全域美丽、全面振兴，实现集体经济壮大、农民持续增收。
    【成绩单】
    零投诉
    近年来，陆丰创造并保持了旅游行业服务质量零投诉、旅游安全零事故的纪录。在受疫情严重影响的2020年，陆丰文旅产业收入30.17亿元，同比增长1%。
    一项空白填补
    陆丰市投资5.3亿元的龙山新校区已投入使用，投资1.34亿元的市一职、甲秀职校和新安职校建设项目顺利推进，填补了碣石与“三甲”地区中职教育的空白。
    一个摘帽
    陆丰成功将“毒帽”和涉枪问题挂牌督办重点县摘帽摘牌，实现连续四年本地区零制毒，陆丰籍涉毒逃犯接近“清零”，省委政法委对陆丰正式解除社会治安重点地区整治。
    两项荣誉
    2020年12月25日，省文明办公布的2021—2023年创建周期广东省文明城市提名城市名单，陆丰保留“广东省文明城市提名城市”资格。目前，陆丰市体育场地面积369.30万平方米，人均体育场地面积达到2.56平方米，超过广东省的人均水平。因群众体育工作发展强势，今年9月，经推荐审核以及公示环节，陆丰市获得由国家体育总局评选的2017—2020年全国群众体育先进单位荣誉称号。
    一个唯一
    2021年5月10日，广东省政务服务数据管理局发布了首届全省市县级政务服务“标杆大厅”榜单。陆丰市政务服务大厅榜上有名，成为粤东地区唯一上榜的县区级“标杆大厅”。陆丰率先在汕尾市将所有政务服务事项进驻政务大厅，实现了“应进必进”。
    两个第一
    三季度，陆丰市实现地区生产总值278.1亿元，同比增长14.1%，在汕尾市建制县区中排名第一。
    2021年，陆丰市全力推进“项目双进会战年”行动，重大项目建设按下快进键。截至9月，全市共安排重点项目82个，年度计划总投资130.16亿元，累计完成投资151.88亿元，占年度计划116.69%。其中，列入汕尾市重点项目69个，累计完成投资150.44亿元，占年度计划119.35%。列入省重点项目13个，累计完成投资79.26亿元，占年度计划113.47%。在汕尾市向纵深推进项目“双进”会战行动第三季度考核中，排名第一。
en_title: Build a beautiful new Lufeng that is livable, business and travel friendly
en_text: Struggling for fission development and realizing the blue rise is the goal that Lufeng people set for themselves, and it also shows Lufeng's ambition and determination to catch up. In recent years, Lufeng has improved the balance and coordination of development in an all-round way by further improving the urban-rural integrated development mechanism, coordinating the promotion of rural revitalization, town and street revitalization, and urban revitalization. Today, a new picture of "three beauties advancing together" of urban beauty, township beauty and rural beauty is slowly unfolding, and the beautiful new Lufeng, which is suitable for living, working and traveling, is displayed. Lufeng is striving to walk out step by step with steady steps. A new way for the fission of urban and rural appearances. ●Written by: Peng Jun, Chen Xinxin, closely following the people's livelihood, and polishing the livable background. During this year's National Day, when everyone was immersed in the festive atmosphere, Shanwei's aunt Huang and her son had an "uncomfortable" scene. The old man insisted on moving back to Lu Feng's old house, insisting that "it would be more comfortable to go back and live there", which made his son who specially took her to the new house for retirement a little puzzled. The community where Aunt Huang lives is Yuyin Community, Donghai Town, built in the 1980s. From the chat with the old sister, the old man learned that Lu Feng has made great efforts to create a civilized city and upgraded the old community: the road that used to be bumpy and bumpy has become flat and spacious, all the wires like spider webs have gone into the ground, and the small leisure square has been renovated as new. Some aging-friendly facilities have also been added... The renovated Yuyin Community has a new look, which is also the main reason for attracting the elderly to come back. Since the beginning of this year, Lufeng City has carried out the practice activity of "I do practical things for the masses" in combination with the study and education of the party's history. Taking the action of creating a civilized city as the starting point, the city continues to comprehensively carry out the joint creation of civilization at the city, town and village levels, and focuses on the improvement of urban and rural environmental sanitation in various places, setting off a "sanitation revolution". In cities and towns, promote the renovation of old residential areas, dispose of domestic waste, and renovate the appearance of streets; in villages and towns, with the overall goal of rural revitalization, improve the living environment in rural areas, build beautiful villages, and carry out the work of "three cleanups, three demolitions and three renovations". In addition to the brand-new environmental changes and the new style of civilization deeply rooted in the hearts of the people, what the residents praised is the improvement and improvement in all aspects from the outside to the inside. Lufeng focuses on safe society, urban construction, people's livelihood services, road network facilities, education and medical care, and promotes livable construction in all fields. Lu Feng spared no effort to promote the people's livelihood goals of "good education for the young, excellent education for learning, great rewards for labor, good doctors for the sick, good care for the elderly, livable living, and public support for the weak", and achieved remarkable results. At present, the Political and Legal Committee of the Provincial Party Committee has officially lifted the rectification of key areas of social security in Lufeng, the city's social security has achieved a fundamental improvement, and the public security situation has been stable and improving; km, the transportation network is more three-dimensional and fast; the sewage treatment, natural gas pipelines, etc. have been optimized, and the municipal infrastructure has been optimized and upgraded; the newly built Longshan campus has been put into use, and the construction projects of Lufeng City, Jiaxiu Vocational School and Xin’an Vocational School are progressing smoothly. It fills the gap of secondary vocational education in Jieshi and "three top" areas. Safety governance builds the foundation of livability, spiritual civilization promotes harmony and happiness, and medical education increases people's well-being. Under the light of the "Nominated City of Guangdong Province's County-level Civilized City" lighthouse, today's Lufeng, the common people travel more smoothly, live more warmly, security is more assured, life is more comfortable, the people's sense of happiness and security are unprecedented improvement. Thinking about the business economy is booming. At the moment, Lufeng is in a critical period of realizing the rise of the blue card and the blue. To achieve this goal, it is necessary to create a better business environment and attract more companies and projects to land here. . A good business environment is productivity, and Lu Feng knows this. In recent years, Lufeng has focused on the port industry, new energy, electronic information and other industries, and promoted the "3+2" industrial system to improve both quality and quality; focusing on "eight facilitations" and "six general services", it has fully launched the "second shop" We will continue to optimize the business environment, vigorously develop the real economy, and create a hot spot for innovation and entrepreneurship, so as to help achieve the rise of the blue card and the rise of the blue. Entering the Lufeng government service hall, it is spacious and bright, with 80 windows covering public security, taxation, social security, medical insurance and other fields. All government service matters in Lufeng city are stationed in the service hall. It took the lead in realizing the "should enter must enter" in Shanwei City, and launched a batch of online and offline integrated acceptance and 24-hour self-service efficient, convenient and distinctive government service projects. Xiao Chen, a citizen who came to work, became a private business owner in just one morning. "I really didn't expect it to be so fast. I thought I would have to make at least three or four trips and wait for ten days and a half months." Holding the food business certificate in his hand, he was a little overwhelmed with excitement. Becoming a business owner in half a day and doing everything in one trip is nothing new in Lufeng. As Xiao Chen commented, "As long as you come here, there is nothing that can't be done. There is always a window for you." In recent years, Lu Feng has deepened the reform of "decentralization, management and services". The six general procedures of land, one network, one certificate and one code are the starting points to create the "four most" government service environment with the least approval, the best process, the highest efficiency and the best service. For the high-frequency service matters that are closely related to the work and life of enterprises and citizens, the "six general procedures" are promoted, and the "second batch" audit is launched to achieve "one door to do everything", so that the masses can save time, effort, and more. Peace of mind. For key projects and enterprises, Lufeng City plays a good role as the "Second Shopkeeper" and takes the initiative to deliver services to the door. On-site coordination, responding to demands, and seamless connection. "The work efficiency is high, the service is considerate, and the policy is more guaranteed. We are also willing to stay here and fight together with this city." People who have experienced door-to-door service said. A good business environment brings high-quality development. It seems like a small measure, but it actually affects the hearts of thousands of market players. Today, more and more companies are settling here. Jieshi Lingang Industrial Park, major projects of offshore engineering base, and Xingdu Economic Development Zone have started construction in Lufeng one after another. Eight key enterprises including CGN, Mingyang Wisdom, Zhongtian Technology, and Tianneng Heavy Industry have settled in Lufeng. Lufeng has become one of the most prosperous, The hottest place for innovation and entrepreneurship. Play cultural tourism chess and start the Yiyou brand In the early winter, Lufeng, located on the coast of eastern Guangdong, is still warm. Walking into Shishigang Village in Jinxiang Town by Jieshi Bay, you can see the beautiful seaside countryside with blue sky and white clouds, sandy beaches and rippling blue waves. The newly built Lufeng Beach Sports Culture Park covering an area of 30,000 square meters is located here. The characteristic sand sculpture landscape with the theme of the red revolution story in the park complements the beautiful seaside scenery, attracting more and more tourists to drive for vacation. In recent years, Lufeng's tourism industry has begun to take shape and has maintained a strong momentum of development against the trend. Even in 2020, when the industry is generally severely affected by the epidemic, with its strong industrial vitality, it has contributed more than 3 billion yuan in revenue to Lufeng City, achieving a good result of a year-on-year increase of 1%. Lufeng has a long history, splendid culture and rich tourism resources. It is not only a red revolutionary holy place, but also beautiful natural scenery and charming Mazu culture. Why did Lufeng Tourism stand out and shine in the past two years? As the saying goes, the tourism industry relies on the mountains to eat the mountains and the sea to eat the sea. Lu Feng not only achieved this, but also played a game of chess to revitalize the tourism industry, so that the mountains and the seas complement each other and the mountains and the seas blend together, so as to achieve industrial upgrading and embark on the road of modern service industry. Relying on the rural revitalization landscape demonstration belt, red genes, religious culture and other resource elements, Lufeng promotes the high-quality agglomeration development of the modern service industry, revitalizes the star-brand hotels, boutique homestays, and large-scale commercial supermarkets, and expands the new model of "N+ tourism". The method of "photographing Lufeng, painting Lufeng, writing Lufeng, singing Lufeng, and visiting Lufeng" promotes the integrated development of culture, sports and tourism, builds a tourism, sports and leisure urban and rural system, and accelerates the establishment of an all-for-one tourism demonstration area. At present, Lufeng adheres to the concept of "seeing the mountains, seeing the water, and remembering the nostalgia", and according to local conditions, has created a coastal road with the golden coast, red cultural tourism, rural leisure, coastal vacation, smart agriculture, and tourism agriculture as the main features. , the demonstration belt of rural revitalization coastal corridor with the image of "feeling the vicissitudes of life, visiting the cultural corridor", and including "Shanshui Gallery", "Guxiang Slow Town", "Romantic Lotus Fragrance", "Longtan Lake Valley" and "Xinhuo Blue Bay" The five-themed beautiful rural landscape demonstration belt fully realizes the in-depth integration of the three elements of red resources, traditional culture, sports and leisure with the tourism industry, promotes the construction of global tourism, and builds the Lufeng tourism brand. In Lufeng, production areas have become scenic spots, pastoral fields have become parks, labor has become experience, and farm houses have become guest rooms. "The experience is pretty good, and it's very convenient to drive here. Not only is the scenery beautiful here, but the tourism hardware facilities and service awareness are also good, and it is not the kind of low-quality rural tour in the traditional impression at all. It is worth recommending, and I will call my friends next time. Get up," said the tourist from Guangzhou. The most commendable thing is that up to now, Lufeng has created and maintained a record of zero complaints of service quality in the tourism industry and zero accidents of tourism safety. Nowadays, the tourist attractions of village-to-village, village-to-village, town-to-town and town-to-town travel are in full bloom in Lufeng, and the reputation of Yiyou Lufeng has been widely known. [Going into the front line] Offshore engineering base boosts Lufeng's fission-style development Standing on the seawall of Hudong Town, Lufeng City, looking at the sea on the south side, under the blue sky and white clouds, there are huge wind power mainframes and high-efficiency equipment. Running on the endless sea. This is the 500,000-kilowatt offshore wind power project put into operation by China General Nuclear Power Group in Houhu Lake, Shanwei. The project is located in Shanwei Offshore Engineering Base (Lufeng) (hereinafter referred to as "Lufeng Offshore Engineering Base"). Lufeng has a coastline of more than 190 kilometers, which is the longest among all counties (cities, districts) in Shanwei City. The tidal flats in the territory are vast and the surrounding environment is open. The coastal area can generate nearly 10,000 hours of effective wind hours per year, and it has almost all the best conditions for developing wind power. With the signing of the "Offshore Wind Power Engineering Base Cooperation Agreement" between Shanwei Municipal Government and China Guangdong Nuclear Power Engineering Co., Ltd., Lufeng City has fully invested in the construction of Lufeng Offshore Engineering Base, relying on its rich coastline and vast hinterland. The base is located on the southeast side of the construction approach road of Lufeng Nuclear Power Station. The project covers an area of about 149 hectares, with a total construction area of about 320,000 square meters and a sea area of about 45 hectares. It is planned to have a comprehensive fan plant (Mingyang Park) and ancillary equipment plants (Tianneng). Heavy Industry), Jacket Factory (Changfeng Park), Submarine Cable Factory (Zhongtian Park), etc. The base wharf (Phase I) is under construction with two wharves and breakwaters, including 9900T and 5000DWT heavy duty berths and one operation and maintenance berth. , the annual design passing capacity is 1.455 million tons. The second phase of the terminal plans to add 3 5000-10000DWT wind power special berths and 4 10000DWT general berths, covering the fields of pipe pile and jacket foundation manufacturing plant, offshore wind power supporting equipment manufacturing and other fields. According to the annual average capacity of 750,000 kilowatts of supporting equipment, the total investment is 10.8 billion yuan. A few days ago, all 91 wind turbines of China General Nuclear Power Group in Lufeng Offshore Engineering Base were connected to the grid to generate electricity, and officially entered the stage of operation, becoming the largest offshore wind farm in China currently in operation. The well-known domestic marine engineering equipment industrial enterprises such as Mingyang Intelligence, Zhongtian Technology, and Jiangsu Changfeng in the base will also make great achievements in Lufeng. Lufeng is vigorously developing leading industries such as clean energy, port-side industry and modern agriculture, and building a 100 billion-level new energy and high-end marine equipment manufacturing base. According to the new positioning given by Shanwei City, it is striving to become a demonstration area for the rise of the blue economy in eastern Guangdong. A new engine for the city's high-quality development. The construction of the beautiful rural revitalization demonstration belt is in full bloom. Entering Lufeng Shanghai Village, a stone engraved with the word "Shanghai" stands at the entrance of the village. The brightly colored wall paintings here make people feel like they are in a magical capital. The walls are painted with skyscrapers and rickshaws. , gardens and other iconic elements of Shanghai have become the most beautiful Internet celebrity check-in points. Shanghai Village belongs to the demonstration belt of the coastal corridor for rural revitalization created by Lufeng, and together with Jinxiang Beach and Qian'ao Beach constitute the coastal tourism area. In recent years, Lufeng City has comprehensively promoted rural revitalization. In accordance with the principle of "One Belt, One Theme", it has made full use of its advantages such as red culture, green landscape, blue ocean, pastoral scenery, characteristic industries, and regional culture to create a coastal corridor, Longtan Lake Valley, Shanshui Gallery, Guxiang Slow Town, Romantic Lotus Fragrance, and Xinhuo Lanwan are six distinctive rural revitalization demonstration belts, which are connected by dots and surfaces and beaded into chains, giving full play to the leading role of the demonstration belts and making a huge difference in the appearance of the villages and folk customs along the line. Change. In order to build, manage and operate the rural revitalization demonstration belt well, Lufeng City recently held the third-quarter rural revitalization demonstration belt contest in Shanghai Village to consolidate the industrial foundation of the rural revitalization demonstration belt. Various landscape demonstration belts competed fiercely in the venue, competing for 200 million yuan of project construction funds. That night, the romantic lotus fragrant landscape demonstration belt won the first place, and the three demonstration belts participating in the ring competition signed 18 rural revitalization projects including seaside resorts, ecological agriculture, and digital agriculture. Drainage funds, accelerate development, and speed up revitalization. The construction of the Lufeng Beautiful Rural Revitalization Demonstration Belt has contributed to the beautiful rural economy and produced "beautiful fruits". According to statistics, during the National Day, Shanghai Village alone received nearly 70,000 tourists. At present, each demonstration belt in Lufeng City has built 38 experience nodes and exhibition halls, about 500 parking lots, 71 public toilets, more than 60 kilometers of standard roads of "Four Good Rural Roads", more than 90 kilometers of beautified and green roads, and 53 villages along the line. Complete the improvement of the management and control of farm houses, drive the beauty and revitalization of the whole region, realize the growth of the collective economy, and continue to increase the income of farmers. 【Transcript】 Zero Complaints In recent years, Lufeng has created and maintained a record of zero complaints of service quality in the tourism industry and zero accidents of tourism safety. In 2020, which was severely affected by the epidemic, the revenue of Lufeng's cultural tourism industry was 3.017 billion yuan, a year-on-year increase of 1%. A new Longshan campus with an investment of 530 million yuan in Lufeng City has been put into use, and the construction projects of Shiyi Vocational School, Jiaxiu Vocational School and Xin'an Vocational School with an investment of 134 million yuan have been smoothly advanced, filling the secondary vocational schools in Jieshi and "three top" areas. Education blank. Lu Feng successfully listed "drug caps" and gun-related issues to supervise and delist key counties, and achieved zero drug production in the region for four consecutive years. The rectification of key areas of social security will be lifted. Two honors On December 25, 2020, the Provincial Civilization Office released the list of nominated cities for civilized cities in Guangdong Province for the 2021-2023 creation cycle, and Lufeng retained the qualification of "Nominated Cities for Civilized City in Guangdong Province". At present, the sports ground area of Lufeng City is 3.693 million square meters, and the per capita sports ground area reaches 2.56 square meters, which exceeds the per capita level of Guangdong Province. Due to the strong development of mass sports work, in September this year, Lufeng City won the honorary title of the 2017-2020 National Mass Sports Advanced Unit selected by the State Sports General Administration after the recommendation, review and publicity link. On May 10, 2021, the Guangdong Provincial Government Service Data Administration released the first list of "benchmark halls" for government services at the city and county levels in the province. Lufeng Municipal Affairs Service Hall is on the list, becoming the only county-level "benchmark hall" in eastern Guangdong on the list. Lufeng took the lead in putting all government service matters in the government hall in Shanwei City, realizing the "should advance must advance". In the first and third quarters, Lufeng City achieved a regional GDP of 27.81 billion yuan, a year-on-year increase of 14.1%, ranking first among the counties and districts in Shanwei City. In 2021, Lufeng City will make every effort to promote the "Project Double Entry and Battle Year" action, and press the fast-forward button for major project construction. As of September, the city has arranged a total of 82 key projects, with a total annual planned investment of 13.016 billion yuan, and a cumulative completed investment of 15.188 billion yuan, accounting for 116.69% of the annual plan. Among them, there are 69 key projects in Shanwei City, with a total investment of 15.044 billion yuan, accounting for 119.35% of the annual plan. It was included in 13 provincial key projects, with a total investment of 7.926 billion yuan, accounting for 113.47% of the annual plan. It ranked first in the third quarter assessment of the "Double Entry" campaign of Shanwei's in-depth promotion project.

title: 四十余种罕见病用药已纳入医保药品目录
text:
据新华社北京12月18日电 为破解罕见病患者用药难题，有关部门在行动。记者从18日在京举行的2021年中国罕见病大会了解到，截至目前，国内共有60余种罕见病用药获批上市，其中已有40余种被纳入国家医保药品目录，涉及25种疾病。
    自2018年成立以来，国家医疗保障局每年一次动态调整医保药品目录，罕见病用药也在调入之列。同时，通过对罕见病药品谈判准入，罕见病用药价格大幅降低。国家医疗保障局副局长李滔在会上介绍，2021年共有7个罕见病药品谈判成功，价格平均降幅达65%。
    据有关机构估计，我国现有各类罕见病患者约2000万人，每年新增患者超过20万人。面对日益庞大的罕见病患者群体，用药保障的步伐必须不断加快。
    近年来，我国对罕见病治疗药品实施优先审评审批。国家药品监督管理局将具有明显临床价值的防治罕见病的创新药和改良型新药纳入优先审评审批程序。
    国家药品监督管理局副局长陈时飞介绍，国家药监局会同国家卫生健康委联合发布关于临床急需境外新药审评审批相关事宜的公告，遴选发布了三批临床急需境外新药品种名单，鼓励企业申报。三批遴选发布的81个药物中，罕见病治疗药品超过一半。目前，已有26个罕见病药物通过临床急需境外新药专门通道获批上市。
    “在所有药品上市申请中，罕见病药品审评审批时限最短。”陈时飞说，2020年，新修订的药品注册管理办法明确了将具有明显临床价值的防治罕见病的创新药和改良型新药纳入优先审评审批程序，对于临床急需的境外已上市境内未上市的罕见病药品在70日内审结。
    据介绍，2021年，国家药监局新批准利司扑兰口服溶液用散等10个罕见病药品，用于治疗脊髓性肌萎缩症等罕见病。
en_title: More than 40 kinds of drugs for rare diseases have been included in the medical insurance drug list
en_text: According to Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, December 18th, relevant departments are taking action to solve the problem of drug use for patients with rare diseases. The reporter learned from the 2021 China Rare Disease Conference held in Beijing on the 18th that as of now, more than 60 rare disease drugs have been approved for marketing in China, of which more than 40 have been included in the National Medical Insurance Drug List, involving 25 diseases. Since its establishment in 2018, the National Medical Security Administration has dynamically adjusted the list of medical insurance drugs once a year, including drugs for rare diseases. At the same time, through the negotiation of access to rare disease drugs, the price of rare disease drugs has been greatly reduced. Li Tao, deputy director of the National Medical Security Administration, introduced at the meeting that in 2021, a total of 7 rare disease drugs have been successfully negotiated, with an average price drop of 65%. According to estimates by relevant institutions, there are about 20 million patients with various types of rare diseases in my country, with more than 200,000 new patients every year. In the face of an increasingly large group of rare disease patients, the pace of drug protection must be accelerated. In recent years, my country has implemented priority review and approval for rare disease treatment drugs. The State Drug Administration will include innovative drugs and improved new drugs for the prevention and treatment of rare diseases with obvious clinical value into the priority review and approval process. Chen Shifei, deputy director of the State Drug Administration, introduced that the State Drug Administration and the National Health Commission jointly issued an announcement on matters related to the review and approval of overseas new drugs that are urgently needed for clinical use. Among the 81 drugs selected and released in the three batches, more than half of the rare disease treatment drugs. At present, 26 rare disease drugs have been approved for marketing through the special channel for overseas new drugs urgently needed in clinical practice. "Among all drug marketing applications, the time limit for the review and approval of rare disease drugs is the shortest." Chen Shifei said that in 2020, the newly revised drug registration management measures clarified that innovative drugs and improved new drugs for the prevention and treatment of rare diseases with obvious clinical value will be included. The priority review and approval process is to complete the review within 70 days for the rare disease drugs that have been marketed overseas and have not been marketed in China. According to reports, in 2021, the State Food and Drug Administration will newly approve 10 rare disease drugs, including risprom oral solution powder, for the treatment of rare diseases such as spinal muscular atrophy.

title: 来自黑土地的发展“答卷”
text:
□新华社记者 刘伟 管建涛 强勇
    正处于爬坡过坎、滚石上山关键阶段的黑龙江，努力克服新冠肺炎疫情和低温雪灾等不利影响，在绿色发展、创新发展、高质量发展中形成全省奋进之势，加快推动全面振兴全方位振兴步伐。
    涌动“绿色浪潮”
    “以前只管产得多，可劲儿上化肥农药，黑土地都板结了，粮食也卖不上价。”石山清说，如今，通过发展绿色种植，村里种的小米不上化肥，不打农药，出现虫害也使用人工方式除虫，虽然成本有所增加，但现在卖20元一斤，是过去的4倍。
    在黑龙江省大庆市肇源县头台镇仁和堡村，村党支部书记石山清见证了村子从“粗放”种植到“绿色”种植的转变。
    截至目前，黑龙江绿色、有机食品认证面积8500多万亩，绿色食品产量、认证面积、标准化生产水平等指标连续多年居全国前列。
    为确保“中国饭碗”装上更多绿色粮、优质粮，黑龙江深入实施“藏粮于地”战略，加强保护黑土地这个“耕地中的大熊猫”，全省累计落实黑土地保护示范区面积1000多万亩。
    2021年，黑龙江粮食总产创历史新高，达1573.54亿斤，占全国总产量的11.5%，粮食安全“压舱石”地位进一步巩固。
    巍巍大小兴安岭、茫茫林海雪原、辽阔的大草原、蜿蜒的河流界江……黑龙江生态环境优势突出，森林面积、湿地面积、自然保护区占比均居全国前列。
    在伊春森工上甘岭林业局有限责任公司溪水林场分公司，绿色发展让“靠山吃山”的方式变了，过去“吃”木头为主，现在“吃”林下经济和自然风光。2016年这个林场农家乐仅1家，现在农家乐和民宿30多家。
    曾是伐木工人的刘养顺变成经营农家乐能手，虽然受疫情影响，但今年农家乐纯收入仍有五六万元。以旅游业为代表的一批绿色产业快速发展，带动林区产业转型。
    当好祖国北方重要生态屏障的黑龙江，坚持走生态优先、绿色发展的现代化道路，在振兴征程中塑造发展新优势。
    冰天雪地是黑龙江的又一“生态”。中国“雪乡”所在的大海林林业局有限公司双峰林场，利用独特的气候特点，把冰天雪地打造成特色旅游“聚宝盆”，大部分林场职工依靠旅游实现增收致富梦想。目前，“雪乡”拥有的经营主体已达201家。
    近期，哈尔滨市发生新冠肺炎疫情，但在“冰城”的冰雪大世界园区里，工人们严格执行防疫措施的同时，正忙着运冰、雕刻……为盛大开园做最后准备。
    点燃“创新引擎”
    在哈尔滨安天科技集团股份有限公司一楼，照片墙上布满年轻面孔，展现着青春“天团”的澎湃力量。公司员工平均年龄30岁出头，毕业于哈尔滨工业大学的“95后”工程师韩耀光正是其中一员。
    “安天是网络安全领域的翘楚，有很多高手，这将帮助我快速提高个人专业技能。”韩耀光说。
    作为国家级网络安全应急服务支撑单位之一，安天目前拥有超过1000项专利申请和约400项专利授权，为全球十几亿部智能终端和数十万台网络设备提供安全防护。公司创始人、首席架构师肖新光说，安天反病毒核心技术不断突破，秘诀正是坚持高研发投入，走自主创新道路。
    在创新“第一动力”引领下，黑龙江新产业、新业态增势亮眼，曾经工业一柱擎天、结构单一的“二人转”局面正逐渐改变。数据显示，前三季度，黑龙江高技术制造业投资增长达28.5%。迄今全省高新技术企业总数1932家，这些知识技术密集的经济实体正成为最直接的创新源泉。
    黑龙江科技资源富集，集聚着哈尔滨工业大学等一批高校和科研院所，2021年全省有4人跻身两院院士行列。黑龙江把科技成果本地转化作为重要发力点，从改革科技体制机制着手打破条框，允许科技人员兼职创业，给予企业更多“真金白银”支持，由此带来的新动能正聚集蓄势。
    哈尔滨科友半导体产业装备与技术研究院有限公司董事长赵丽丽说，公司在初创阶段获得当地政府上亿元股权投资，这笔引导资金成为公司发展壮大的“及时雨”。
    数字经济是黑龙江振兴发展的重中之重。目前黑龙江5G基站已建设2.5万个，运营的大数据中心30多个。2021年10月20日，黑龙江省政府印发《推动“数字龙江”建设加快数字经济高质量发展若干政策措施》，推出20条“真金白银”措施，培育经济发展新动能。
    北大荒集团建三江分公司依托物联网、5G等新一代信息技术及天空地一体化智能感知系统，开启了大面积、大规模智慧农场建设项目，建设了6个“管理可量化、数据可利用、经验可复制”的智慧农场群，目前已实现水旱田耕种管收全程无人化作业，可完成无人化作业面积159.3万亩。
    迈向高质量之路
    老工业基地黑龙江在全面振兴全方位振兴道路上，面临许多“娄山关”“腊子口”，改革是破解高质量发展难题的“金钥匙”。
    国企是东北经济顶梁柱，也是全面深化改革的“硬骨头”。
    在中国一重风电装配产业基地，一个占地约4500平方米的厂房里，左侧摆放着一排正在组装的风力发电机机舱，每个机舱长7米、高4米、宽3.5米；右侧是一排4米高的圆形轮毂。今年截至11月底，基地完成70多台风力发电机装配任务，将带来5亿多元营业收入。
    过去坐家“等米下锅”，现在主动去市场“找米下锅”。中国一重集团有限公司党委常委、副总经理陆文俊说，一重瞄准风电开发、新能源汽车等新市场发力，在风电产业上实现了从无到有，风机制造核心能力、整机装配能力日臻成熟。前三季度，中国一重实现利润总额同比增长38.1%，营收同比增长15.1%。
    无独有偶，12月初大庆油田也传来捷报，三次采油年产量再次突破千万吨，建成了全球规模最大的三次采油生产基地。作为一个开发建设60多年的老油田，大庆油田高质量发展的道路不断拓宽。
    打好优化营商环境关键一战，为全面深化改革开好头、聚好势。
    10月26日，深圳（哈尔滨）产业园科创总部，首家入园企业中国能源建设集团投资有限公司黑龙江分公司正式乔迁到此。深圳（哈尔滨）产业园投资开发有限公司总经理奉均衡说，作为深哈合作首个“飞地”项目，产业园“带土移植”深圳先进经验、管理模式，入园企业享有深圳同样的政策环境，已吸引国内300多家企业注册。
    市场环境好不好，企业的感受最直接。前三季度，黑龙江新登记市场主体37.7万户，同比增长25%。其中，新登记企业7.4万户，增长10%。
    营商环境是东北地区体制机制问题的“表”，其实质是处理好政府与市场的关系。黑龙江正以优化营商环境为突破口，努力打造让企业办事更便捷、更高效、企业家生活更舒心、更幸福的营商环境。
    （参与采写 杨喆）
