en_title: "Answer Sheet" for Development from the Black Land
en_text: □ Xinhua News Agency reporter Liu Wei Guan Jiantao Qiang Yong is in Heilongjiang, which is at the critical stage of climbing over hurdles and rolling rocks up the mountain. The province is forging ahead and accelerating the pace of comprehensive revitalization. The "green wave" is surging. "In the past, I only wanted to produce more, but I used chemical fertilizers and pesticides. The black land was hardened, and the grain could not be sold at a high price." Shi Shanqing said that now, through the development of green planting, the millet grown in the village is not Fertilizers are used, pesticides are not used, and insect pests are also used to remove insects manually. Although the cost has increased, it is now sold for 20 yuan per pound, which is 4 times that of the past. In Renhebao Village, Toutai Town, Zhaoyuan County, Daqing City, Heilongjiang Province, Shi Shanqing, Secretary of the Village Party Branch, witnessed the village's transformation from "extensive" planting to "green" planting. Up to now, the certified area of green and organic food in Heilongjiang is more than 85 million mu, and indicators such as green food output, certified area and standardized production level have been at the forefront of the country for many years. In order to ensure that the "Chinese rice bowl" is filled with more green grains and high-quality grains, Heilongjiang has implemented the strategy of "holding grain in the ground" and strengthened the protection of black land, the "giant panda in cultivated land". More than 10 million mu. In 2021, the total grain output in Heilongjiang will reach a record high of 157.354 billion catties, accounting for 11.5% of the country's total output, further consolidating its status as a "ballast stone" for food security. The majestic and small Xing'an Mountains, the vast forests, seas and snowfields, the vast prairie, the meandering rivers and rivers... Heilongjiang has outstanding ecological environment advantages, and the forest area, wetland area, and nature reserves all rank among the top in the country. In Yichun Sengong Shangganling Forestry Bureau Co., Ltd. Xishui Forest Farm Branch, green development has changed the way of "relying on the mountains and eating the mountains". In the past, "eating" mainly wood, and now "eating" the economy and natural scenery under the forest. In 2016, there was only one forest farmhouse, and now there are more than 30 farmhouses and homestays. Liu Yangshun, who used to be a lumberjack, has become an expert in operating farmhouses. Although affected by the epidemic, the net income of farmhouses this year is still 50,000 to 60,000 yuan. The rapid development of a number of green industries represented by tourism has driven the industrial transformation of forest areas. Be a good Heilongjiang, an important ecological barrier in the north of the motherland, adhere to the modernization path of ecological priority and green development, and create new advantages in development in the revitalization journey. Ice and snow is another "ecology" of Heilongjiang. The Shuangfeng Forest Farm of Dahailin Forestry Bureau Co., Ltd., where China's "Snow Township" is located, makes use of the unique climate characteristics to turn the ice and snow into a "treasure pot" for tourism. At present, "Xuexiang" has 201 business entities. Recently, the new crown pneumonia epidemic occurred in Harbin, but in the Ice and Snow World Park of the "Ice City", while the workers strictly implemented epidemic prevention measures, they were busy transporting ice and carving... making final preparations for the grand opening of the park. Ignite the "Innovation Engine" On the first floor of Harbin Antiy Technology Group Co., Ltd., the photo wall is full of young faces, showing the surging power of the youth "Heavenly Group". The average age of the company's employees is in their early 30s, and Han Yaoguang, a post-95 engineer who graduated from Harbin Institute of Technology, is one of them. "Antian is a leader in the field of network security, and there are many experts, which will help me quickly improve my personal professional skills." Han Yaoguang said. As one of the national network security emergency service support units, Antiy currently has more than 1,000 patent applications and about 400 patent authorizations, providing security protection for more than one billion smart terminals and hundreds of thousands of network devices around the world. Xiao Xinguang, the company's founder and chief architect, said that the secret of Antiy's continuous breakthrough in anti-virus core technology is to insist on high R&D investment and take the road of independent innovation. Under the leadership of the "first driving force" of innovation, Heilongjiang's new industries and new business formats have grown brightly. Data show that in the first three quarters, investment in high-tech manufacturing in Heilongjiang increased by 28.5%. So far, there are 1,932 high-tech enterprises in the province, and these knowledge and technology-intensive economic entities are becoming the most direct source of innovation. Heilongjiang is rich in scientific and technological resources, and gathers a number of universities and research institutes such as Harbin Institute of Technology. In 2021, 4 people in the province will join the ranks of academicians of the two academies. Heilongjiang regards the local transformation of scientific and technological achievements as an important force, starting from reforming the scientific and technological system and mechanism to break the rules, allowing scientific and technological personnel to start businesses part-time, and giving enterprises more "real money" support. The new momentum brought by this is gathering momentum. . Zhao Lili, chairman of Harbin Keyou Semiconductor Industry Equipment and Technology Research Institute Co., Ltd., said that the company received hundreds of millions of equity investment from the local government at the start-up stage, and this guiding fund has become a "timely rain" for the company's development and growth. The digital economy is the top priority for the revitalization and development of Heilongjiang. At present, 25,000 5G base stations have been built in Heilongjiang, and more than 30 big data centers have been operated. On October 20, 2021, the Heilongjiang Provincial Government issued the "Several Policies and Measures to Promote the Construction of "Digital Longjiang" and Accelerate the High-quality Development of the Digital Economy, and launched 20 "real money and silver" measures to cultivate new momentum for economic development. Beidahuang Group Jiansanjiang Branch, relying on the new generation of information technologies such as the Internet of Things, 5G, and the sky-ground integrated intelligent perception system, started a large-scale and large-scale smart farm construction project, and built 6 "quantifiable management, data usable" projects. , the experience can be replicated" smart farm group, has realized the whole process of unmanned operation of farming, management and harvesting of wet and dry fields, and can complete the unmanned operation area of 1.593 million mu. On the road to high quality, the old industrial base Heilongjiang faces many "Loushanguan" and "Lazikou" on the road of comprehensive revitalization. Reform is the "golden key" to solve the problem of high-quality development. State-owned enterprises are the backbone of the Northeast's economy and the "hard bones" for comprehensively deepening reforms. In the wind power assembly industry base of China First Heavy Industries Group, in a factory building covering an area of about 4,500 square meters, there is a row of wind turbine cabins being assembled on the left. Each cabin is 7 meters long, 4 meters high and 3.5 meters wide; On the side is a row of 4-meter-high circular wheels. As of the end of November this year, the base has completed more than 70 wind turbine assembly tasks, which will bring in more than 500 million yuan in operating income. In the past, I sat at home "waiting for rice to cook", but now I take the initiative to go to the market to "find rice and cook". Lu Wenjun, member of the Standing Committee of the Party Committee and Deputy General Manager of China First Heavy Industry Group Co., Ltd., said that China First Heavy Industries Group Co., Ltd. is aiming at new markets such as wind power development and new energy vehicles, and has achieved nothing in the wind power industry. Mature. In the first three quarters, China First Heavy's total profit increased by 38.1% year-on-year, and revenue increased by 15.1% year-on-year. Coincidentally, good news came from Daqing Oilfield in early December. The annual output of tertiary oil recovery once again exceeded 10 million tons, and the world's largest tertiary oil recovery production base was built. As an old oilfield developed and constructed for more than 60 years, the road to high-quality development of Daqing Oilfield is constantly broadening. We will fight the key battle to optimize the business environment, and make a good start and gather momentum for comprehensively deepening reforms. On October 26, the Shenzhen (Harbin) Industrial Park Science and Technology Headquarters and the Heilongjiang Branch of China Energy Construction Group Investment Co., Ltd., the first enterprise to enter the park, officially moved here. Feng Bingjing, general manager of Shenzhen (Harbin) Industrial Park Investment and Development Co., Ltd., said that as the first "enclave" project of Shenzhen-Kazakhstan cooperation, the industrial park "transplants" Shenzhen's advanced experience and management model with soil, and enterprises entering the park enjoy the same policies in Shenzhen. environment, has attracted more than 300 domestic enterprises to register. Whether the market environment is good or not, the company's feelings are the most direct. In the first three quarters, there were 377,000 newly registered market entities in Heilongjiang, a year-on-year increase of 25%. Among them, there were 74,000 newly registered enterprises, an increase of 10%. The business environment is the "table" of institutional and institutional problems in the Northeast, and its essence is to properly handle the relationship between the government and the market. Heilongjiang is taking the optimization of the business environment as a breakthrough, and strives to create a business environment that makes business operations more convenient and efficient, and entrepreneurs live a more comfortable and happier life. (Participating in the writing of Yang Zhe) Xinhua News Agency, Harbin, December 18th

title: 广西：刘宁到自治区信访局接访群众
text:
12月17日下午，广西壮族自治区党委书记刘宁带头落实领导干部接访制度，来到自治区信访局接访群众。他强调，要坚持以习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想为指导，深入学习贯彻党的十九大和十九届历次全会精神，全面落实习近平总书记关于加强和改进人民信访工作的重要指示要求，深刻领会“两个确立”的决定性意义，自觉增强“四个意识”、坚定“四个自信”、做到“两个维护”，坚决扛起信访工作政治责任，进一步把以人民为中心的发展思想和人民至上理念落到实处，切实把信访工作做到群众心坎上。
　　在广西信访应急处置联合指挥中心，刘宁通过视频连线方式，接待了柳州市城中区牛车坪村村民，他们反映了整村改造项目房屋拆迁安置补偿问题。刘宁认真听取诉求意见，与项目业主单位和城中区负责同志共同研究分析，当场对信访群众诉求作出回应。他说，城市是人民的，实施城市更新改造，是为了改善大家的生活环境，希望得到大家的理解和支持。在推进城市更新改造过程中难免存在一些不足和问题，希望大家及时反映，帮助有关部门更好地改进工作。“你们能够按程序如实反映信访诉求，这是对党委、政府的信任，我将督促柳州市抓好落实，尽快解决你们的合理诉求，也希望你们积极配合柳州城市更新改造工作，一起努力把家园建设好，让广大市民朋友过上更加幸福美好的生活。”刘宁强调，相关部门要以此为戒、举一反三，在城市建设、城市更新、设施改造等工作中进一步加强和改进作风，敬畏人文历史、敬畏文物遗存、敬畏群众诉求、敬畏生态环境，切实践行以人民为中心的发展思想，留住乡愁、保护风貌，用心用情用力解决好群众急难愁盼问题。
　　刘宁还来到群众来访候谈大厅和接谈室，看望一线信访工作者。他强调，信访工作是送上门的群众工作，是党和政府密切联系群众的桥梁和纽带。全区各地各相关部门要认真落实习近平总书记提出的“三到位一处理”要求，多听取群众诉求，多了解群众意愿，实事求是帮助群众解决合理诉求和实际困难，对诉求不当的耐心做好解释工作，对生活困难需要救助的及时帮扶。元旦春节将至，要把群众身边的事当作自己的事，下功夫解决好群众反映的突出问题和普遍性问题，不断提升人民群众的获得感、幸福感、安全感。要坚持和发展新时代“枫桥经验”，提高源头治理信访问题的能力水平，落实好领导干部接访制度，推进信访积案专项治理，完善社会矛盾纠纷多元预防调处化解机制，不断提高信访工作质量、效率和公信力，引导人民群众感党恩、听党话、跟党走，凝心聚力建设新时代中国特色社会主义壮美广西，以民族团结、社会稳定、边疆安宁的良好局面迎接党的二十大胜利召开。
　　周异决陪同接访。（记者 魏恒 龚文颖）
en_title: Guangxi: Liu Ning went to the Autonomous Region Letters and Calls Bureau to meet the masses
en_text: On the afternoon of December 17, Liu Ning, Secretary of the Party Committee of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region, took the lead in implementing the system of receiving visits from leading cadres, and came to the Bureau of Letters and Calls of the Autonomous Region to receive visits from the masses. He emphasized that it is necessary to adhere to the guidance of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, thoroughly study and implement the spirit of the 19th National Congress of the Communist Party of China and the 19th Plenary Sessions, and fully implement the important instructions and requirements of General Secretary Xi Jinping on strengthening and improving the people's petition work. Understand the decisive significance of the "two establishments", consciously enhance the "four consciousnesses", strengthen the "four self-confidences", and achieve the "two maintenances", resolutely shoulder the political responsibility for petition work, and further implement the people-centered development thinking And the concept of the supremacy of the people has been put into practice, and the petition work has been put into the hearts of the masses. At the Joint Command Center for Emergency Response for Letters and Visits in Guangxi, Liu Ning received the villagers from Niucheping Village, Chengzhong District, Liuzhou City through video connection. Liu Ning listened carefully to the appeals and opinions, studied and analyzed together with the project owner unit and the responsible comrades in Chengzhong District, and responded to the appeals of the petitioners on the spot. He said that the city belongs to the people, and the implementation of urban renewal is to improve everyone's living environment, and he hopes to get everyone's understanding and support. There are inevitably some deficiencies and problems in the process of promoting urban renewal and transformation. I hope everyone will report them in time and help relevant departments to better improve their work. "You can truthfully reflect your petition demands according to the procedures, which is your trust in the party committee and the government. I will urge Liuzhou to implement it and resolve your reasonable demands as soon as possible. If the construction is done well, the general public will live a happier and better life." Liu Ning emphasized that relevant departments should take this as a warning, draw inferences from one case, and further strengthen and improve their work style in urban construction, urban renewal, and facility renovation, and respect humanities. History, reverence for cultural relics, the appeal of the masses, the ecological environment, and the implementation of the people-centered development philosophy, to retain nostalgia, protect the style, and solve the problems of the people's distress and longing with heart and soul. Liu Ning also came to the waiting room and reception room to visit the front-line petition workers. He emphasized that the petition work is a mass work delivered to the door, and it is a bridge and link between the party and the government to closely contact the masses. Relevant departments in all parts of the region should conscientiously implement the requirements of "three in place and one treatment" put forward by General Secretary Xi Jinping, listen more to the demands of the masses, understand more about the will of the masses, seek truth from facts to help the masses solve reasonable demands and practical difficulties, and explain the patience of improper demands. work, and timely assistance to those in need of assistance in life difficulties. As the New Year's Day and the Spring Festival are approaching, we should take the things around the masses as our own, work hard to solve the prominent and common problems reported by the masses, and continuously improve the people's sense of gain, happiness, and security. It is necessary to adhere to and develop the "Fengqiao Experience" in the new era, improve the level of ability to deal with petition problems at the source, implement the system for leading cadres to receive visits, promote the special management of petition backlogs, improve the multiple prevention, mediation and resolution mechanisms for social conflicts and disputes, and continuously improve the quality of petition work. , efficiency and credibility, guide the people to feel the favor of the party, listen to the party's words, follow the party, and concentrate on building a new era of socialism with Chinese characteristics. Ten victories held. Zhou Yijue accompanied the visit. (Reporter Wei Heng Gong Wenying)

title: 习近平主持召开中央全面深化改革委员会第二十三次会议强调加快建设全国统一大市场提高政府监管效能 深入推进世界一流大学和一流学科建设
text:
新华社北京12月17日电 中共中央总书记、国家主席、中央军委主席、中央全面深化改革委员会主任习近平12月17日下午主持召开中央全面深化改革委员会第二十三次会议，审议通过了《关于加快建设全国统一大市场的意见》、《关于进一步提高政府监管效能推动高质量发展的指导意见》、《关于深入推进世界一流大学和一流学科建设的若干意见》、《关于加强科技伦理治理的指导意见》、《关于推动个人养老金发展的意见》。
    习近平在主持会议时强调，发展社会主义市场经济是我们党的一个伟大创造，关键是处理好政府和市场的关系，使市场在资源配置中起决定性作用，更好发挥政府作用。构建新发展格局，迫切需要加快建设高效规范、公平竞争、充分开放的全国统一大市场，建立全国统一的市场制度规则，促进商品要素资源在更大范围内畅通流动。要加快转变政府职能，提高政府监管效能，推动有效市场和有为政府更好结合，依法保护企业合法权益和人民群众生命财产安全。要突出培养一流人才、服务国家战略需求、争创世界一流的导向，深化体制机制改革，统筹推进、分类建设一流大学和一流学科。科技伦理是科技活动必须遵守的价值准则，要坚持增进人类福祉、尊重生命权利、公平公正、合理控制风险、保持公开透明的原则，健全多方参与、协同共治的治理体制机制，塑造科技向善的文化理念和保障机制。要推动发展适合中国国情、政府政策支持、个人自愿参加、市场化运营的个人养老金，与基本养老保险、企业（职业）年金相衔接，实现养老保险补充功能。
    中共中央政治局常委、中央全面深化改革委员会副主任李克强、王沪宁、韩正出席会议。
    会议指出，党的十八大以来，党中央坚持社会主义市场经济改革方向，从广度和深度上推进市场化改革，减少政府对资源的直接配置，减少政府对微观经济活动的直接干预，不断完善产权保护、市场准入、公平竞争等制度，推进价格改革和土地、资本、劳动力、技术、知识、数据等重要生产要素市场化改革，加强反垄断、反不正当竞争，着力清除市场壁垒，提高资源配置效率和公平性，加快形成企业自主经营、公平竞争，消费者自由选择、自主消费，商品和要素自由流动、平等交换的现代市场体系。同时，我国市场体系仍然存在制度规则不够统一、要素资源流动不畅、地方保护和市场分割等突出问题。
    会议强调，要从制度建设着眼，坚持立破并举，在完善市场基础制度规则、推进市场设施高标准联通、加快要素和资源市场建设、推进商品和服务市场高水平统一、提升监管治理水平等方面出台有效的政策举措，不断提高政策的统一性、规则的一致性、执行的协同性，以统一大市场集聚资源、推动增长、激励创新、优化分工、促进竞争。要加快清理废除妨碍统一市场和公平竞争的各种规定和做法。要结合区域重大战略、区域协调发展战略实施，优先开展统一大市场建设工作，发挥示范引领作用。
    会议指出，提高政府监管效能，要着力解决好“谁来管”、“管什么”、“怎么管”的问题。按照“谁审批、谁监管，谁主管、谁监管”的原则，理清责任链条，提高履责效能，严肃问责追责。行业主管部门要严格落实行业监管职责，相关监管部门要切实履行各自职责范围内监管责任，地方政府要全面落实属地监管责任，企业要加强自我管理、自我约束。对涉及多个部门、管理难度大、风险隐患突出的监管事项，要建立健全跨部门综合监管制度，完善各司其职、各负其责、相互配合、齐抓共管的协同监管机制。（转3版）
en_title: Xi Jinping presided over the 23rd meeting of the Central Committee for Comprehensively Deepening Reforms, emphasizing accelerating the construction of a unified national market, improving the efficiency of government supervision, and further promoting the construction of world-class universities and first-class disciplines
en_text: Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, December 17. Xi Jinping, General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the State, Chairman of the Central Military Commission, and Director of the Central Comprehensive Deepening Reform Commission, presided over the 23rd meeting of the Central Comprehensive Deepening Reform Committee on the afternoon of December 17. Opinions on Accelerating the Construction of a Large National Market", "Guiding Opinions on Further Improving the Efficiency of Government Supervision and Promoting High-quality Development", "Several Opinions on Further Promoting the Construction of World-Class Universities and First-Class Disciplines", "Guiding Opinions on Strengthening the Ethical Governance of Science and Technology" Guiding Opinions" and "Opinions on Promoting the Development of Individual Pensions". When chairing the meeting, Xi Jinping emphasized that the development of the socialist market economy is a great creation of our party. The key is to properly handle the relationship between the government and the market, so that the market can play a decisive role in resource allocation and the government can better play its role. To build a new development pattern, there is an urgent need to speed up the construction of an efficient, standardized, fair competition, and fully open national unified large market, establish a unified national market system and rules, and promote the smooth flow of commodity factor resources on a larger scale. It is necessary to speed up the transformation of government functions, improve the efficiency of government supervision, promote a better combination of effective markets and promising governments, and protect the legitimate rights and interests of enterprises and the safety of people's lives and property in accordance with the law. It is necessary to highlight the orientation of cultivating first-class talents, serving the national strategic needs, and striving for world-class development, deepening the reform of systems and mechanisms, and making overall plans to promote and classify the construction of first-class universities and first-class disciplines. Science and technology ethics is a value criterion that scientific and technological activities must abide by. It is necessary to adhere to the principles of enhancing human well-being, respecting the right to life, fairness and justice, reasonably controlling risks, and maintaining openness and transparency. cultural concepts and safeguard mechanisms. It is necessary to promote the development of personal pensions that are suitable for China's national conditions, supported by government policies, voluntary participation of individuals, and market-oriented operations, and connect with basic old-age insurance and enterprise (occupational) annuities to realize the supplementary function of old-age insurance. Li Keqiang, Wang Huning and Han Zheng, members of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and deputy directors of the Central Committee for Comprehensively Deepening Reform, attended the meeting. The meeting pointed out that since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, the CPC Central Committee has adhered to the direction of socialist market economic reform, promoted market-oriented reform in breadth and depth, reduced the government's direct allocation of resources, and reduced the government's direct intervention in microeconomic activities, and continued to improve Institutions such as property rights protection, market access, fair competition, etc., promote price reform and market-oriented reform of important production factors such as land, capital, labor, technology, knowledge, and data, strengthen anti-monopoly and anti-unfair competition, and strive to remove market barriers and improve The efficiency and fairness of resource allocation, accelerate the formation of a modern market system in which enterprises operate independently, compete fairly, consumers freely choose and consume independently, and commodities and factors flow freely and exchange equally. At the same time, my country's market system still has outstanding problems such as insufficient uniformity of institutional rules, poor flow of factor resources, local protection and market segmentation. The meeting emphasized that it is necessary to focus on system construction, adhere to both standing and breaking, and improve the basic system and rules of the market, promote high-standard connectivity of market facilities, accelerate the construction of factor and resource markets, promote high-level unification of commodity and service markets, and improve regulatory governance. Effective policies and measures shall be introduced to continuously improve the uniformity of policies, the consistency of rules, and the coordination of implementation, so as to unify the large market and gather resources, promote growth, stimulate innovation, optimize the division of labor, and promote competition. It is necessary to speed up the elimination of various regulations and practices that hinder a unified market and fair competition. It is necessary to combine the implementation of major regional strategies and regional coordinated development strategies, give priority to the construction of a unified large market, and play a leading role in demonstration. The meeting pointed out that in order to improve the efficiency of government supervision, efforts should be made to solve the problems of "who is in charge", "what is in charge" and "how to be in charge". In accordance with the principle of "who approves, who supervises, who is in charge, who supervises", clarify the chain of responsibility, improve the efficiency of responsibility performance, and take responsibility seriously. Industry authorities should strictly implement their industry supervision responsibilities, relevant supervision departments should effectively perform their supervision responsibilities within their respective responsibilities, local governments should fully implement their territorial supervision responsibilities, and enterprises should strengthen self-management and self-discipline. For regulatory matters that involve multiple departments, are difficult to manage, and have prominent risks and hidden dangers, it is necessary to establish and improve a comprehensive cross-departmental regulatory system, and to improve a coordinated regulatory mechanism in which each performs its own duties, assumes their own responsibilities, cooperates with each other, and manages them together. (transfer to version 3)

title: 既要正视困难　又要坚定信心
text:
王俊岭
　　“我们沉着应对百年变局和世纪疫情，构建新发展格局迈出新步伐，高质量发展取得新成效，实现了‘十四五’良好开局。”在日前举行的中央经济工作会议上，回顾即将收官的2021年，习近平总书记这样说。
　　一年来，中国经济交出了一份极为不易、亮点突出的成绩单——中国经济发展和疫情防控保持全球领先地位，国家战略科技力量加快壮大，产业链韧性得到提升，改革开放向纵深推进，民生保障有力有效，生态文明建设持续推进。
　　中央经济工作会议指出，“在充分肯定成绩的同时，必须看到我国经济发展面临需求收缩、供给冲击、预期转弱三重压力。”世纪疫情冲击下，百年变局加速演进，外部环境更趋复杂严峻和不确定。受新冠肺炎疫情特别是变异毒株的影响，全球生产和物流接连遭受冲击，主要国家通胀压力加大，发达国家的超宽松政策可能产生较强负外溢性，单边主义、保护主义、民粹主义上升。从国内看，中国经济运行面临的主要矛盾在供给侧，国民经济和产业循环不畅是目前面临的突出矛盾，消费和投资增长势头减弱，企业成本压力加大，经济金融领域风险隐患不容忽视，阶段性结构性周期性因素交织。这些困难，对中国经济“在危机中育新机、于变局中开新局”提出了更高要求。
　　“我们既要正视困难，又要坚定信心。”中央经济工作会议的表述铿锵有力。时与势在我们一边，这是中国的定力和底气所在。应该看到，中国连续多年稳居世界第二大经济体、第二大消费市场、制造业第一大国、货物贸易第一大国、外汇储备第一大国，2020年成为第一大外资流入国；中国拥有全球最完整、规模最大的工业体系、强大的生产能力、完善的配套能力，拥有超过1.5亿户市场主体和1.7亿多受过高等教育或具备各类专业技能的人才，以及包括4亿多中等收入群体在内的14亿多人口所形成的超大规模内需市场，正处于新型工业化、信息化、城镇化、农业现代化快速发展阶段，投资需求潜力巨大。
　　中国经济稳中向好、长期向好的基本面没有变，中国经济潜力足、韧性大、活力强、回旋空间大、政策工具多的基本特点没有变，中国发展具有的多方面优势和条件没有变。“底盘”稳固的中国，千磨万击还坚劲，从不畏惧挑战和难题。
　　如何应对风险挑战？中央经济工作会议给出了答案：必须坚持党中央集中统一领导，必须坚持高质量发展，必须坚持稳中求进，必须加强统筹协调。这“四个必须”，是我们党在应对风险挑战的实践中，进一步积累的对做好经济工作的规律性认识，是做好经济工作的重要认识论和方法论，让我们更加坚定了必胜信心、增强了战略定力。
　　如何驾驭新的重大理论和实践问题？中央经济工作会议指明了方向：要正确认识和把握实现共同富裕的战略目标和实践途径，正确认识和把握资本的特性和行为规律，正确认识和把握初级产品供给保障，正确认识和把握防范化解重大风险，正确认识和把握碳达峰碳中和。这五个方面，既是当下必须面对并亟待解决的重大现实问题，又具有前瞻性、战略性、长期性。
　　在全面建设社会主义现代化国家、向第二个百年奋斗目标进军的新征程上，有以习近平同志为核心的党中央的坚强领导和习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想的科学指引，有长期以来形成的显著制度优势和雄厚物质技术基础，有超大规模的市场优势和内需潜力，有庞大的人力资本和人才资源，无论国际风云如何变幻，只要我们坚定不移做好自己的事情，中国经济航船定能行稳致远、一往无前。
　　（
本文摘编自《人民日报海外版》
）
en_title: It is necessary to face up to difficulties and strengthen confidence
en_text: Wang Junling said, "We have calmly responded to the changes in the century and the epidemic of the century, made new steps in building a new development pattern, achieved new results in high-quality development, and achieved a good start to the '14th Five-Year Plan'." At the recent Central Economic Work Conference, he reviewed the upcoming At the end of 2021, General Secretary Xi Jinping said this. Over the past year, China's economy has handed over an extremely difficult report card with outstanding highlights - China's economic development and epidemic prevention and control have maintained a leading position in the world, the national strategic scientific and technological strength has been accelerated, the resilience of the industrial chain has been improved, and reform and opening up has advanced in depth. , people's livelihood protection is effective and effective, and the construction of ecological civilization continues to advance. The Central Economic Work Conference pointed out that "while fully affirming the achievements, we must see that my country's economic development is facing the triple pressure of demand contraction, supply shock, and weakening expectations." Under the impact of the epidemic in the century, the evolution of the century-old changes has accelerated, and the external environment has become more complex and severe. and not sure. Affected by the new crown pneumonia epidemic, especially the mutant strains, global production and logistics have been hit one after another, inflation pressure in major countries has increased, and the ultra-loose policies of developed countries may have strong negative spillovers, unilateralism, protectionism, populism. rise. From a domestic perspective, the main contradiction facing China's economic operation is the supply side. The sluggish national economy and industrial circulation are the prominent contradictions currently facing. The growth momentum of consumption and investment has weakened, and the cost pressure of enterprises has increased. The hidden risks in the economic and financial fields cannot be ignored. Periodic structural cyclical factors are intertwined. These difficulties have put forward higher requirements for China's economy to "cultivate new opportunities in the midst of crises, and open up new situations in changing situations". "We must face up to the difficulties and strengthen our confidence." The statement of the Central Economic Work Conference was sonorous and forceful. Time and momentum are on our side, and this is where China's strength and confidence lie. It should be noted that China has been the world's second largest economy, the second largest consumer market, the largest manufacturing country, the largest country in goods trade, and the largest country in foreign exchange reserves for many consecutive years, and will become the largest foreign capital inflow country in 2020; China has the world's most complete and largest industrial system, strong production capacity, and complete supporting capabilities. It has more than 150 million market entities, more than 170 million highly educated or possessing various professional skills, and more than 400 million people. The super-large domestic demand market formed by a population of more than 1.4 billion including the middle-income group is in the stage of rapid development of new industrialization, informatization, urbanization, and agricultural modernization, and the potential for investment demand is huge. The fundamentals of China's economic stability and long-term improvement have not changed. The basic characteristics of China's economy with sufficient potential, great resilience, strong vitality, large room for manoeuvre, and many policy tools have not changed. China's development has many advantages and conditions. Change. China, which has a stable "chassis", is still strong despite hard work, and is never afraid of challenges and problems. How to deal with risk challenges? The Central Economic Work Conference gave the answer: we must adhere to the centralized and unified leadership of the Party Central Committee, we must adhere to high-quality development, we must insist on making progress while maintaining stability, and we must strengthen overall planning and coordination. These "four musts" are the regular understanding of economic work that our party has further accumulated in the practice of coping with risks and challenges. They are an important epistemology and methodology for doing a good job in economic work. , Enhanced strategic focus. How to navigate new major theoretical and practical issues? The Central Economic Work Conference pointed out the direction: we must correctly understand and grasp the strategic goals and practical ways to achieve common prosperity, correctly understand and grasp the characteristics and behavioral laws of capital, correctly understand and grasp the supply guarantee of primary products, and correctly understand and grasp the prevention and resolution of major problems. Risks, correct understanding and grasp of carbon peak carbon neutrality. These five aspects are not only major practical problems that must be faced and urgently solved, but also forward-looking, strategic and long-term. On the new journey of building a modern socialist country in an all-round way and marching towards the second centenary goal, there is the strong leadership of the Party Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping at the core and the scientific guidance of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era. China's significant institutional advantages and strong material and technological foundation, super-large-scale market advantages and domestic demand potential, and huge human capital and human resources, no matter how the international situation changes, as long as we unswervingly do our own thing, China's economic ship will be fixed. Able to go steadily and far and go forward. (This article is excerpted from "People's Daily Overseas Edition")

title: 阳茂高速 双向八车道 全线通车
text:
12月16日，广东省交通集团所属阳茂高速改扩建项目发布消息，作为粤西地区融入大湾区建设的高速公路主骨架，阳茂高速今日全线开放双向八车道通行，广大车主可以体验更加宽阔舒适的新道路。
    “我刚从茂名运送货物回来，现在阳茂高速双向八车道路面视野很开阔，通行非常顺畅，运输时间也节省了，比原来快了近半小时。”一位货运司机经阳西站驶出高速时说道。
    阳茂高速改扩建项目起于阳江市江城区白沙街道，止于茂名市电白区观珠镇，全长79.76公里。新升级的阳茂高速采用双向八车道标准改扩建，路基宽度由原来的28米增加到42米，通行时速120公里，车辆通行能力显著提高。
    为保障司乘行车安全，项目还将中分带原波形护栏升级为混凝土护栏，最大程度避免车辆因事故导致穿越、骑跨护栏的情况；采用道路视频事件检测系统，实现路面异常情况全自动检测和精准应对。
    “项目新建蒲牌和沙垌两处互通及所属收费站，将为沿线村镇提供更便利的出行选择。”阳茂高速改扩建项目负责人邓敏维表示，蒲牌互通可通往阳西县沙扒镇，沙垌互通可达茂名市电白区沙垌村，对进一步改善区域交通条件，促进当地农业及经济发展有重要意义。
    “以前运输农作物需绕行几公里地方路才能进入高速，蒲牌站开通，在家门口就可以上高速了，非常方便。”种植户陈先生说。目前，蒲牌互通已同步开通，沙垌互通待地方路连接线完善后将于近期开通。
    项目还将新建省内首个以风筝与蚝为主题的新阳西服务区，同时对原阳西服务区进行扩建，并更名为新墟服务区，预计于明年正式投入使用。
    阳茂高速连接阳江和茂名两地，日均车流量近5万车次，车流高峰期最高可达约13.5万车次。项目开放八车道通行后，将进一步打通粤西融入大湾区建设的交通大动脉，对加快推进粤西滨海地区开发建设，带动培育新的经济增长极，助力广东构建“一核一带一区”发展格局具有重要意义。
    值得一提的是，阳茂高速沿线旅游资源十分丰富，尤其以温泉、海洋和海岛风光等最为突出。行驶阳茂高速，轻松就能到达享誉全国的咸水矿温泉、月亮湾、放鸡岛、浪漫海岸等景点，还可享用国家地理标志产品程村生蚝、鹅乸饭、米粿叶贴等美食。
    朱妙娜 沈高 刘志浩
en_title: Yangmao Expressway opens to traffic
en_text: On December 16, the Yangmao Expressway Reconstruction and Expansion Project, a subsidiary of Guangdong Provincial Communications Group, announced that, as the main skeleton of the expressway in the western part of Guangdong integrated into the construction of the Greater Bay Area, Yangmao Expressway will open two-way eight-lane traffic on the whole line today, and the majority of car owners can experience more Wide and comfortable new roads. "I just came back from Maoming's delivery of goods. Now the two-way eight-lane road of Yangmao Expressway has a wide field of vision, the traffic is very smooth, and the transportation time is also saved, which is nearly half an hour faster than before." A freight driver drove out through Yangxi Station. Said at high speed. The reconstruction and expansion project of Yangmao Expressway starts from Baisha Street, Jiangcheng District, Yangjiang City, and ends at Guanzhu Town, Dianbai District, Maoming City, with a total length of 79.76 kilometers. The newly upgraded Yangmao Expressway adopts the standard of two-way eight-lane reconstruction and expansion. The width of the roadbed is increased from the original 28 meters to 42 meters, the traffic speed is 120 kilometers per hour, and the vehicle traffic capacity is significantly improved. In order to ensure the safety of drivers and passengers, the project also upgraded the original wave guardrail in the middle section to a concrete guardrail to avoid the situation of vehicles crossing or riding over the guardrail due to accidents to the greatest extent; the road video event detection system is adopted to realize automatic detection of road anomalies. and precise responses. "The newly built Pupai and Shadong stations and their toll stations will provide more convenient travel options for villages and towns along the line." Deng Minwei, the person in charge of the reconstruction and expansion project of Yangmao Expressway, said that Pupai Interconnection can lead to Shapa Town, Yangxi County , Shadong intercommunication can reach Shadong Village, Dianbai District, Maoming City, which is of great significance to further improve regional traffic conditions and promote local agricultural and economic development. "In the past, it was necessary to detour several kilometers of local roads to enter the expressway. With the opening of Pupai Station, you can get on the expressway at your doorstep, which is very convenient," said Mr. Chen, a grower. At present, Pupai Interconnection has been opened simultaneously, and Shalong Interconnection will be opened soon after the local road connection line is completed. The project will also build the first Xinyang West Service Area in the province with the theme of kites and oysters. At the same time, the Yuanyang West Service Area will be expanded and renamed the Xinxu Service Area, which is expected to be officially put into use next year. Yangmao Expressway connects Yangjiang and Maoming, with an average daily traffic flow of nearly 50,000 vehicles, and a maximum of about 135,000 vehicles during peak hours. After the opening of the eight-lane traffic, the project will further open up the transportation artery for the integration of western Guangdong into the construction of the Greater Bay Area, accelerate the development and construction of the coastal area in western Guangdong, drive the cultivation of new economic growth poles, and help Guangdong build a "one core, one belt, one district" development. Layout is important. It is worth mentioning that the tourism resources along the Yangmao Expressway are very rich, especially the hot springs, ocean and island scenery. Driving on the Yangmao Expressway, you can easily reach the famous saltwater mineral hot springs, Moon Bay, Fangji Island, Romantic Coast and other scenic spots. You can also enjoy the national geographical indication products such as Chengcun oysters, goose rice, rice cakes and other delicacies . Zhu Miaona Shen Gao Liu Zhihao

title: 习近平主持召开中央全面深化改革委员会第二十三次会议强调
text:
中共中央总书记、国家主席、中央军委主席、中央全面深化改革委员会主任习近平12月17日下午主持召开中央全面深化改革委员会第二十三次会议，审议通过了《关于加快建设全国统一大市场的意见》、《关于进一步提高政府监管效能推动高质量发展的指导意见》、《关于深入推进世界一流大学和一流学科建设的若干意见》、《关于加强科技伦理治理的指导意见》、《关于推动个人养老金发展的意见》。
习近平在主持会议时强调，发展社会主义市场经济是我们党的一个伟大创造，关键是处理好政府和市场的关系，使市场在资源配置中起决定性作用，更好发挥政府作用。构建新发展格局，迫切需要加快建设高效规范、公平竞争、充分开放的全国统一大市场，建立全国统一的市场制度规则，促进商品要素资源在更大范围内畅通流动。要加快转变政府职能，提高政府监管效能，推动有效市场和有为政府更好结合，依法保护企业合法权益和人民群众生命财产安全。要突出培养一流人才、服务国家战略需求、争创世界一流的导向，深化体制机制改革，统筹推进、分类建设一流大学和一流学科。科技伦理是科技活动必须遵守的价值准则，要坚持增进人类福祉、尊重生命权利、公平公正、合理控制风险、保持公开透明的原则，健全多方参与、协同共治的治理体制机制，塑造科技向善的文化理念和保障机制。要推动发展适合中国国情、政府政策支持、个人自愿参加、市场化运营的个人养老金，与基本养老保险、企业(职业)年金相衔接，实现养老保险补充功能。
中共中央政治局常委、中央全面深化改革委员会副主任李克强、王沪宁、韩正出席会议。
会议指出，党的十八大以来，党中央坚持社会主义市场经济改革方向，从广度和深度上推进市场化改革，减少政府对资源的直接配置，减少政府对微观经济活动的直接干预，不断完善产权保护、市场准入、公平竞争等制度，推进价格改革和土地、资本、劳动力、技术、知识、数据等重要生产要素市场化改革，加强反垄断、反不正当竞争，着力清除市场壁垒，提高资源配置效率和公平性，加快形成企业自主经营、公平竞争，消费者自由选择、自主消费，商品和要素自由流动、平等交换的现代市场体系。同时，我国市场体系仍然存在制度规则不够统一、要素资源流动不畅、地方保护和市场分割等突出问题。
会议强调，要从制度建设着眼，坚持立破并举，在完善市场基础制度规则、推进市场设施高标准联通、加快要素和资源市场建设、推进商品和服务市场高水平统一、提升监管治理水平等方面出台有效的政策举措，不断提高政策的统一性、规则的一致性、执行的协同性，以统一大市场集聚资源、推动增长、激励创新、优化分工、促进竞争。要加快清理废除妨碍统一市场和公平竞争的各种规定和做法。要结合区域重大战略、区域协调发展战略实施，优先开展统一大市场建设工作，发挥示范引领作用。
会议指出，提高政府监管效能，要着力解决好“谁来管”、“管什么”、“怎么管”的问题。按照“谁审批、谁监管，谁主管、谁监管”的原则，理清责任链条，提高履责效能，严肃问责追责。行业主管部门要严格落实行业监管职责，相关监管部门要切实履行各自职责范围内监管责任，地方政府要全面落实属地监管责任，企业要加强自我管理、自我约束。对涉及多个部门、管理难度大、风险隐患突出的监管事项，要建立健全跨部门综合监管制度，完善各司其职、各负其责、相互配合、齐抓共管的协同监管机制。要统筹推进市场监管、质量监管、安全监管、金融监管，加快建立全方位、多层次、立体化监管体系，实现事前事中事后全链条全领域监管，堵塞监管漏洞。对直接关系人民群众生命财产安全、公共安全，以及潜在风险大、社会风险高的重点领域，要实施重点监管，防范化解重大风险。要坚持依法监管，抓紧制定重点领域、新兴领域、涉外领域监管亟需的法律法规，建立任职限制、终身禁入和终身追责制度。要创新监管方法，提升监管的精准性和有效性。要严格规范政府监管行为，建立贯穿监管工作全过程的监督机制，提高监管规范性和透明度。
会议强调，办好世界一流大学和一流学科，必须扎根中国大地，办出中国特色。要坚持社会主义办学方向，坚持中国特色社会主义教育发展道路，贯彻党的教育方针，落实立德树人根本任务。要牢牢抓住人才培养这个关键，坚持为党育人、为国育才，坚持服务国家战略需求，瞄准科技前沿和关键领域，优化学科专业和人才培养布局，打造高水平师资队伍，深化科教融合育人，为加快建设世界重要人才中心和创新高地提供有力支撑。
会议指出，党的十八大以来，党中央组建国家科技伦理委员会，完善治理体制机制，推动科技伦理治理取得积极进展。要坚持促进创新与防范风险相统一、制度规范与自我约束相结合，强化底线思维和风险意识，把科技伦理要求贯穿到科学研究、技术开发等科技活动全过程，覆盖到科技创新各领域，加强监测预警和前瞻研究，及时从规制上做好应对，确保科技活动风险可控。要避免把科技伦理问题泛化，努力实现科技创新高质量发展与高水平安全的良性互动。
会议强调，发展多层次、多支柱养老保险体系，是积极应对人口老龄化、实现养老保险制度可持续发展的重要举措。要完善制度设计，合理划分国家、单位和个人的养老责任，为个人积累养老金提供制度保障。要严格监督管理，完善配套政策，抓紧明确实施办法、财税政策、金融产品规则等，让老百姓看得明白、搞得懂、好操作，让参与各方有章可循、制度运行可监测可检验。
中央全面深化改革委员会委员出席会议，中央和国家机关有关部门负责同志列席会议。
en_title: Xi Jinping presided over the 23rd meeting of the Central Committee for Comprehensively Deepening Reforms, stressing that
en_text: Xi Jinping, General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, President of the State, Chairman of the Central Military Commission, and Director of the Central Comprehensive Deepening Reform Committee, presided over the 23rd meeting of the Central Comprehensive Deepening Reform Committee on the afternoon of December 17, and reviewed and approved the "On Accelerating the Construction of a Large National Unified Market". Opinions", "Guiding Opinions on Further Improving the Efficiency of Government Supervision and Promoting High-quality Development", "Several Opinions on Further Promoting the Construction of World-Class Universities and First-Class Disciplines", "Guiding Opinions on Strengthening the Ethical Governance of Science and Technology", "On Promoting Individual Opinions on Pension Development. When chairing the meeting, Xi Jinping emphasized that the development of the socialist market economy is a great creation of our party. The key is to properly handle the relationship between the government and the market, so that the market can play a decisive role in resource allocation and the government can better play its role. To build a new development pattern, there is an urgent need to speed up the construction of an efficient, standardized, fair competition, and fully open national unified large market, establish a unified national market system and rules, and promote the smooth flow of commodity factor resources on a larger scale. It is necessary to speed up the transformation of government functions, improve the efficiency of government supervision, promote a better combination of effective markets and promising governments, and protect the legitimate rights and interests of enterprises and the safety of people's lives and property in accordance with the law. It is necessary to highlight the orientation of cultivating first-class talents, serving the national strategic needs, and striving for world-class development, deepening the reform of systems and mechanisms, and making overall plans to promote and classify the construction of first-class universities and first-class disciplines. Science and technology ethics is a value criterion that scientific and technological activities must abide by. It is necessary to adhere to the principles of enhancing human well-being, respecting the right to life, fairness and justice, reasonably controlling risks, and maintaining openness and transparency. cultural concepts and safeguard mechanisms. It is necessary to promote the development of personal pensions that are suitable for China's national conditions, government policy support, voluntary participation of individuals, and market-oriented operations, linking with basic old-age insurance and enterprise (occupational) annuities to realize the supplementary function of old-age insurance. Li Keqiang, Wang Huning and Han Zheng, members of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and deputy directors of the Central Committee for Comprehensively Deepening Reform, attended the meeting. The meeting pointed out that since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, the CPC Central Committee has adhered to the direction of socialist market economic reform, promoted market-oriented reform in breadth and depth, reduced the government's direct allocation of resources, and reduced the government's direct intervention in microeconomic activities, and continued to improve Institutions such as property rights protection, market access, fair competition, etc., promote price reform and market-oriented reform of important production factors such as land, capital, labor, technology, knowledge, and data, strengthen anti-monopoly and anti-unfair competition, and strive to remove market barriers and improve The efficiency and fairness of resource allocation, accelerate the formation of a modern market system in which enterprises operate independently, compete fairly, consumers freely choose and consume independently, and commodities and factors flow freely and exchange equally. At the same time, my country's market system still has outstanding problems such as insufficient uniformity of institutional rules, poor flow of factor resources, local protection and market segmentation. The meeting emphasized that it is necessary to focus on system construction, adhere to both standing and breaking, and improve the basic system and rules of the market, promote high-standard connectivity of market facilities, accelerate the construction of factor and resource markets, promote high-level unification of commodity and service markets, and improve regulatory governance. Effective policies and measures shall be introduced to continuously improve the uniformity of policies, the consistency of rules, and the coordination of implementation, so as to unify the large market and gather resources, promote growth, stimulate innovation, optimize the division of labor, and promote competition. It is necessary to speed up the elimination of various regulations and practices that hinder a unified market and fair competition. It is necessary to combine the implementation of major regional strategies and regional coordinated development strategies, give priority to the construction of a unified large market, and play a leading role in demonstration. The meeting pointed out that in order to improve the efficiency of government supervision, efforts should be made to solve the problems of "who is in charge", "what is in charge" and "how to be in charge". In accordance with the principle of "who approves, who supervises, who is in charge, who supervises", clarify the chain of responsibility, improve the efficiency of responsibility performance, and take responsibility seriously. Industry authorities should strictly implement their industry supervision responsibilities, relevant supervision departments should effectively perform their supervision responsibilities within their respective responsibilities, local governments should fully implement their territorial supervision responsibilities, and enterprises should strengthen self-management and self-discipline. For regulatory matters that involve multiple departments, are difficult to manage, and have prominent risks and hidden dangers, it is necessary to establish and improve a comprehensive cross-departmental regulatory system, and to improve a coordinated regulatory mechanism in which each performs its own duties, assumes their own responsibilities, cooperates with each other, and manages them together. It is necessary to coordinate the promotion of market supervision, quality supervision, safety supervision, and financial supervision, accelerate the establishment of an all-round, multi-level, and three-dimensional supervision system, realize pre-event, in-process, and post-event supervision in the whole chain and in all fields, and plug regulatory loopholes. For key areas that are directly related to the safety of people's lives and property, public safety, as well as potential risks and high social risks, it is necessary to implement key supervision to prevent and resolve major risks. It is necessary to adhere to supervision in accordance with the law, and promptly formulate laws and regulations that are urgently needed for supervision in key areas, emerging areas, and foreign-related areas, and establish a system of job restrictions, lifetime bans, and lifetime accountability. It is necessary to innovate supervision methods and improve the accuracy and effectiveness of supervision. It is necessary to strictly regulate government regulatory behavior, establish a monitoring mechanism that runs through the entire process of regulatory work, and improve regulatory standardization and transparency. The meeting emphasized that to run world-class universities and disciplines well, we must take root in China and develop Chinese characteristics. It is necessary to adhere to the direction of running a socialist school, adhere to the development path of socialist education with Chinese characteristics, implement the party's educational policy, and implement the fundamental task of building morality and cultivating people. We must firmly grasp the key to talent training, adhere to educating people for the party and the country, adhere to serving the strategic needs of the country, aim at the frontier and key areas of science and technology, optimize the layout of disciplines and talent training, build a high-level teaching team, and deepen the integration of science and education. Educating people, providing strong support for accelerating the construction of an important talent center and innovation highland in the world. The meeting pointed out that since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, the Party Central Committee has established the National Science and Technology Ethics Committee to improve the governance system and mechanism, and promote positive progress in the governance of science and technology ethics. It is necessary to adhere to the unity of promoting innovation and preventing risks, the combination of institutional norms and self-discipline, strengthen bottom-line thinking and risk awareness, and apply scientific and technological ethics requirements to the entire process of scientific research, technology development and other scientific and technological activities, covering all fields of scientific and technological innovation, and strengthening Monitoring, early warning and forward-looking research, timely and regulatory response, to ensure that the risks of scientific and technological activities are controllable. It is necessary to avoid generalizing scientific and technological ethics issues, and strive to achieve a benign interaction between high-quality development of scientific and technological innovation and high-level security. The meeting emphasized that the development of a multi-level and multi-pillar pension insurance system is an important measure to actively respond to the aging of the population and achieve sustainable development of the pension insurance system. It is necessary to improve the system design, reasonably divide the pension responsibilities of the state, units and individuals, and provide institutional guarantees for individuals to accumulate pensions. It is necessary to strictly supervise and manage, improve supporting policies, and promptly clarify implementation methods, fiscal and taxation policies, financial product rules, etc., so that ordinary people can understand, understand, and operate well, so that all parties involved have rules to follow, and system operation can be monitored and tested. Members of the Central Committee for Comprehensively Deepening Reforms attended the meeting, and responsible comrades from relevant departments of the central and state organs attended the meeting as nonvoting delegates.

title: 莫让恶意抢注歪风 吹走童话
text:
■静 子
12月16日，作家郑渊洁发微博称，《童话大王》将于2022年1月停刊，因为“精力有限，只能通过停止写作去和多项注册商标作维权斗争”。
创刊于1985年，发行36年、出刊495期、总销量逾2亿册……郑渊洁以一人之力创造了儿童读物的童话奇迹。活泼开朗的皮皮鲁教我们追逐正义、勇敢无畏的舒克与贝塔让我们懂得善良，《童话大王》像一颗星火，点燃了“我们的故事”，构筑了人们的温暖记忆，承载了太多人的童年情怀，也就不难理解人们的不舍与惋惜。
如果说停刊的事实让人在情感上难接受，那停刊的缘由显然让人倍感无力——作家要全力以赴去维权。有报道称，郑渊洁多年饱受恶意抢注商标顽疾之苦，被抢注的数量高达1000多个。此次直接导致《童话大王》停刊的3个注册商标，已耗费郑渊洁总共32年，但目前并未维权成功。
对文学创作来说，恶意抢注、侵权不仅耗费作家的大量精力，最大危害是伤及作家的原创积极性。如果自己呕心沥血塑造的人物形象总是成为他人的囊中物，恐怕不再会有作家一门心思关注创作。提早注册商标固然可有效规避此类风险，但一味苛责多产的作家抓紧注册商标，又怎能保证创作精力的充沛？再说，被恶意抢注的商标名称五花八门，试图提前注册完所有的相关商标既不现实，更没有必要。与其紧盯创作者的各种预防性努力，不如多管齐下，以全方位的举措加快推动知识产权保护高质量发展。
“我想用《童话大王》停刊的方式，唤醒大家对保护商标领域知识产权的重视，这样如果还没用，那我可能将来只能停止出版我的所有书。”郑渊洁仍在与恶意抢注商标的歪风作顽强抗争。作家的使命是创作，而非无可奈何地走上漫漫维权路。为此，让违法违规行为付出应有代价才是正解，加快完善商标注册与审核的机制才是正途。
en_title: Don't let malicious cybersquatting blow away fairy tales
en_text: ■Jingzi On December 16, writer Zheng Yuanjie posted on Weibo that the publication of "The King of Fairy Tales" will be discontinued in January 2022, because "the energy is limited, and we can only fight against multiple registered trademarks by stopping writing". Founded in 1985, it has been in circulation for 36 years, published 495 issues, and sold more than 200 million copies... Zheng Yuanjie has created a fairy tale miracle for children's books with one person. The lively and cheerful Pipilu taught us to pursue justice, and the brave and fearless Shuke and Beta taught us to be kind. "Fairy Tale King" is like a spark, igniting "our story", building people's warm memories, carrying the great Many people's childhood feelings, it is not difficult to understand people's reluctance and regret. If the fact that the publication is suspended is emotionally difficult to accept, then the reason for the suspension is obviously very weak - writers must go all out to defend their rights. It is reported that Zheng Yuanjie has suffered from the stubborn disease of malicious squatting trademark registration for many years, and the number of squatting registrations is as high as more than 1,000. The three registered trademarks that directly led to the suspension of "Fairy Tale King" have cost Zheng Yuanjie a total of 32 years, but they have not successfully defended their rights so far. For literary creation, malicious squatting and infringement not only consume a lot of energy of the writer, but also hurt the writer's enthusiasm for originality. If the characters that he has worked so hard to create always become the possessions of others, I am afraid that there will no longer be writers who focus on creation. Registering a trademark in advance can effectively avoid such risks, but how can a writer who blindly blames prolific writers quickly register a trademark, how can they ensure that they are full of creative energy? Besides, there are all kinds of trademark names that have been maliciously squatted, and it is neither realistic nor necessary to try to register all relevant trademarks in advance. Instead of focusing on the various preventive efforts of creators, it is better to take a multi-pronged approach to accelerate the high-quality development of intellectual property protection with comprehensive measures. "I want to use the method of suspending the publication of "Fairy Tale King" to awaken everyone's attention to protecting intellectual property rights in the field of trademarks. If it is not used, then I may have to stop publishing all my books in the future." Zheng Yuanjie is still fighting with malicious squatting The crooked style of the trademark is stubbornly resisted. The mission of a writer is to create, not to reluctantly embark on the long road to defending rights. To this end, it is the right solution to pay the due price for violations of laws and regulations, and it is the right way to speed up the improvement of the mechanism for trademark registration and review.

title: 系好为文从艺的第一粒“扣子”
text:
【文学艺术家心语】
  习近平总书记关于青年文艺人才建设的重要论述，让我想起了自己的成长历程。16岁参军之前，我在边疆农村生活，心怀歌唱的梦想，没学过专业音乐知识。幸运的是，我在部队大熔炉里得到了锻炼，逐渐成长为一名光荣的文艺工作者。如今又到高校教书育人，这一切都是因为我赶上了一个伟大时代。我深刻认识到，一个年轻人要成长、成才，离不开国家的富强、民族的振兴和人民的培育。
  青年文艺工作者要立足新时代，脚踏实地向人民学习，在生活中锤炼专业本领，运用好新的技术手段，善于开拓创新。要端正态度，系好为文从艺的第一粒“扣子”。艺术教育工作者应当站在时代潮头，站在国家发展的宏观背景下去思考教育问题，为青年文艺人才的成长当好人梯，做好服务，真正做到识才、爱才、敬才和用才。
  （本报记者刘平安采访整理）
en_title: Fasten the first "button" for Wen Congyi
en_text: [Words of Literary Artists] General Secretary Xi Jinping's important exposition on the construction of young literary and artistic talents reminds me of my own growth process. Before I joined the army at the age of 16, I lived in the frontier countryside with a dream of singing, but I had never learned professional music knowledge. Fortunately, I got training in the melting pot of the army and gradually grew into a glorious literary and art worker. Now I am teaching and educating people in colleges and universities, all because I have caught up with a great era. I deeply realize that for a young person to grow and become a talent, it is inseparable from the prosperity of the country, the revitalization of the nation and the cultivation of the people. Young literary and art workers must base themselves on the new era, learn from the people down-to-earth, hone their professional skills in life, make good use of new technical means, and be good at pioneering and innovating. It is necessary to have a correct attitude and fasten the first "button" for literature and art. Art educators should stand at the forefront of the times and think about education issues from the macro background of national development, be a good ladder for the growth of young literary and artistic talents, provide good services, and truly recognize, love, respect and use talents. talent. (The reporter Liu Ping'an interviewed and arranged)

title: 江苏常州出台旅游促进条例
text:
近日，江苏省常州市发布《常州市旅游促进条例》，包括规划引导、产业发展、服务保障、规范管理等方面内容。
　　条例提出，各级政府和相关部门要遵循保护优先、合理开发、永续利用、利益共享的原则，做好旅游资源的保护开发与利用。条例明确，建立健全旅游市场综合监管机制，优化市场秩序，营造安全有序的旅游环境。（许瑾）
en_title: Changzhou, Jiangsu issued tourism promotion regulations
en_text: Recently, Changzhou City, Jiangsu Province issued the "Changzhou Tourism Promotion Regulations", including planning guidance, industrial development, service guarantee, standardized management and other aspects. The regulations are clear, establish and improve the comprehensive supervision mechanism of the tourism market, optimize the market order, and create a safe and orderly tourism environment. (Xu Jin)

title: 群众“下订单” 实事马上办
text:
英德举办“邻里家家亲，共建文明城”活动。
英德市大力探索党史学习教育与新时代文明实践中心融合发展工作机制，通过整合阵地资源、建强志愿队伍、探索点单式服务等多项举措，努力打造成党史学习教育新高地。前不久，清远市在英德召开宣传思想工作会议，推广了英德的经验。
整合阵地资源
投入200万元建成“好人馆”
为弘扬优秀本土文化，英德建成了市新时代文明实践广场、非物质文化技艺传承馆、英红镇博物馆实践所、浛洸镇新时代文明实践广场等示范性实践阵地；投入资金200万元建成英德“好人馆”，好人馆展示了400多名好人事迹，为党员干部群众提供向榜样学习的场所。
据了解，目前英德全市镇（街）村（社区）均建设了新时代文明实践所（站），其中东华、下太两所文明实践所是省级示范所，72个文明实践站为省级示范站。依托市委党校、气象局、女子足球基地、英九庄园茶场等单位特色资源，该市还新增26个实践基地。
在实施“双百计划”中，英德又在9个镇（街）设立社工服务站，盘活了党群活动中心、社区公共文化服务中心等社区公共服务阵地资源，推动社工、社会组织、社区“三社聚心”志愿服务体系的构建。
建强志愿服务队伍
组建市镇村服务队1200多支
以党史学习教育为契机，采取“1+12+N”的模式，整合“乡村名嘴”、“乡村新闻官”、返乡青年、社工人员、社区居民、退休干部等文明实践力量，组建市镇村三级志愿服务队1200多支。围绕群众需求，结合行业特色，新组建了新时代文明实践品牌队伍15支。在全市10个社区（小区）还成立了10支“暖阳阳”社区志愿服务队。培育孵化英德市大白陆战队、英德市河湖志愿者护卫队、英德市心理关怀志愿服务队等10支专业化志愿服务队。其中，该市的大白陆战队、心理关怀志愿服务队，获评广东省新时代文明实践百佳志愿服务队。
正是通过一次次的志愿服务，英德把党史学习教育和服务群众紧密结合起来，让党员干部、志愿者在志愿实践中体悟了党为人民谋幸福的初心宗旨，在全社会营造起知史爱党、知史爱国的浓厚氛围。
坚持精准互动
建立“点单式”服务运转机制
在全清远率先创建新时代文明实践中心网络平台，并设置“文明实践”“乡村振兴”“尚德之城”“便民服务”“党史学习教育”栏目，实时发布服务项目清单、实践活动展示等内容，将文明实践触角延伸至全市329个实践阵地（实践中心、点、所、站）。利用实践中心小程序、融媒体中心客户端、政府官网平台、“文明英德”微信公众号等网络平台资源，构建起线上线下同频共振的网络实践阵地，发布文明实践信息累计达6500条。
建立“服务菜单”，实行精准对接。通过设立志愿集市摊位、党员干部走访、志愿者上门、小程序需求问卷等方式常态化搜集群众需求，形成“订单”；实践中心每月统筹各地、各队伍资源进行“派单”，各级市级志愿服务队、各实践所（站）、社工组织、志愿服务组织“接单”后开展志愿服务活动，同时设置了微信、小程序留言区、热线电话供群众“评单”，收集民声民意。由此形成了由群众“点单”—中心“派单”—志愿者“接单”—群众“评单”的运转机制。今年以来共发布文明实践活动1054场。
立足暖心服务
文明新风吹进群众心坎
聚焦镇村发展，助力乡村振兴。推出了连江口“奋进追梦”小镇、东华“红色激励”小镇、望埠“刚硬石匠”小镇和波罗“文明种子”小镇等一批具有鲜明特色的“实践小镇”。构建“社工+志愿者”服务模式，激发群众自助、共助能力。该市连江口社工站创新设立志愿服务积分超市，提高村民参与度；东华镇开设“鱼湾夜校”扶贫扶智助力乡村振兴；波罗镇打造“文明·波罗蓝”品牌队伍，为困难群体送温暖送关怀。
聚焦少年儿童，提供暖心服务。今年，英德被确定为省级乡村“复兴少年宫”试点。依托新时代文明实践阵地、红色基地等资源，该市建设乡村“复兴少年宫”24所，拓宽了农村未成年人活动阵地。以服务对象需求为导向，持续推出了“四点半”课堂、周五课堂、快乐家园、青少年课堂、“童心港湾”等公益项目，在浛洸、横石水、望埠等镇建立儿童快乐家园，壹乐园儿童服务站，为乡村儿童提供近距离关爱服务。
聚焦实践内容，丰富“六讲六传”。针对不同群体的年龄结构、服务需求等内容，该市采取灵活多样的形式开展实践活动，利用“宣、评、助、庆、乐、赛”6种实践形式，全市300多个新时代文明实践所（站、点）常态化开展“六讲六传”活动2112次，受众8万人次。推动了党史学习教育和新时代文明实践工作互融互促，让人民群众感受更多的获得感和幸福感。

title: 一本讲述建党百年成功之道的“大家小书”
text:
中国共产党百年光辉历程和成功经验告诉我们，中国共产党人依靠学习走到今天，也必然要依靠学习走向未来。在学习党史的过程中，我欣喜地读到了由吉林人民出版社出版的、吉林大学资深教授孙正聿的新著《掌握“看家本领”》。这虽然是一本12万字体量的“小书”，却有着相当丰富的理论内涵。这本“大家小书”，具有以下几个鲜明特色，使之成为一本难得的理论佳作。
  第一，这部新著以中国共产党百年历程为主线，讲清楚了我们党从胜利走向胜利的“看家本领”，有助于读者弄清什么是中国共产党百年辉煌的成功之道，回答中国共产党为什么能、马克思主义为什么行、中国特色社会主义为什么好等重要问题。全书开篇引用了习近平总书记的经典论述：“我们党历来重视抓全党特别是领导干部的学习，这是推动党和人民事业发展的一条成功经验。”这一重要论述，画龙点睛，对于建党百年伟业与创造性学习运用马克思主义之间不可割裂的血肉联系，作出了比以往更加透彻的科学揭示：“我们党的历史，就是一部不断推进马克思主义中国化的历史，就是一部不断推进理论创新、进行理论创造的历史。”这部新著正是围绕习近平总书记的这一重要论述展开的。
  第二，这部新著系统阐释了中国共产党人的马克思主义观。习近平总书记指出，“要认真学习马克思主义理论，这是我们做好一切工作的看家本领，也是领导干部必须普遍掌握的工作制胜的看家本领”。该书集中论述了马克思主义理论四大独特品格，即科学性、人民性、实践性、开放性，进而回答了为什么必须掌握马克思主义“看家本领”这个基本问题。马克思主义是科学的理论，创造性地揭示了人类社会发展规律；马克思主义是人民的理论，第一次创立了人民实现自身解放的思想体系；马克思主义是实践的理论，指引着人民改造世界的行动；马克思主义是不断发展的开放的理论，始终站在时代前沿。掌握马克思主义这个“看家本领”，就要以“科学的理论”“人民的理论”“实践的理论”和“不断发展的开放的理论”为实质内容，深刻理解和深切体悟马克思主义的巨大真理威力和强大生命力。
  第三，该书阐述了怎样“读原著，悟原理”，怎样掌握马克思主义“看家本领”的问题。作者根据多年研究的心得体会，指出了一条怎样“读原著”的科学路径：阅读《马克思恩格斯全集》，从整体上把握马克思主义理论体系；精读《马克思恩格斯选集》，从思想上领悟马克思主义基本原理；深研“名篇”，从重点上掌握马克思主义核心思想；探究“观点”，从理论上弄通马克思主义思想内涵；掌握“方法”，在实践中运用马克思主义理论思维。作者还依据习近平总书记重要讲话精神，指出了“悟原理”的九个方面的基本观念、基本原理，即唯物史观、人民主体观、生产力与生产关系的辩证关系观、人民民主观、文化建设观、社会建设观、生态文明观、世界历史观、新型政党观。马克思主义理论体系博大精深、内容丰富、体系复杂，怎样才能找到一条入门之道与深入之道呢？对于广大干部群众来说，这不是一个能够轻而易举地解决的问题。这部新著，为大家指明了一条简单易行的入门之道，也是一条知行统一的深入之道。
  第四，这是一部雅俗共赏的大众通俗读物，便于广大干部群众阅读。大道至简。作者采取了深入浅出的叙述方法，如同谈心一样，娓娓道来，侃侃而谈，把马克思主义的入门之道、深入之道，说得简单明了，朴实可行。对于学习马列经典的一般读者来说，这是入门之道的良好向导，可以将其作为开卷有益的必备书、案头书。而对广大青年学生来说，更有引人入胜的思想启迪作用。
  （作者：王东，系北京大学哲学系教授）
en_title: A "little book for everyone" that tells about the success of the party's century-old success
en_text: The glorious history and successful experience of the Communist Party of China in the past century tell us that the Communists of China rely on learning to get to today, and they must also rely on learning to move forward into the future. In the process of studying party history, I was delighted to read the new book "Mastering the "Housekeeping Skills" by Sun Zhengyu, a senior professor at Jilin University, published by Jilin People's Publishing House. Although this is a "small book" with 120,000 fonts, it has quite rich theoretical connotations. This "Everybody's Little Book" has the following distinctive features, making it a rare theoretical masterpiece. First, this new book takes the 100-year history of the Chinese Communist Party as the main line, and clearly explains the "housekeeping skills" of our Party from victory to victory. Important issues such as why the Communist Party can, why Marxism works, and why socialism with Chinese characteristics is good. The opening of the book quotes General Secretary Xi Jinping's classic exposition: "Our party has always attached great importance to the study of the whole party, especially leading cadres. This is a successful experience in promoting the development of the party and the people's cause." The inseparable connection between the great cause and the creative learning and application of Marxism has made a more thorough scientific revelation than ever before: "The history of our party is a history of continuously promoting the Sinicization of Marxism, and a history of continuously promoting theoretical innovation. , the history of theoretical creation." This new book is based on this important exposition of General Secretary Xi Jinping. Second, this new work systematically explains the Marxist view of the Chinese Communists. General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out, "To earnestly study Marxist theory, this is the housekeeping skill for us to do all work well, and it is also the housekeeping skill that leading cadres must generally master to win the work." The book focuses on the four unique characteristics of Marxist theory, namely, scientific, popular, practical, and open, and then answers the basic question of why it is necessary to master the "housekeeping skills" of Marxism. Marxism is a scientific theory, which creatively reveals the laws of development of human society; Marxism is a theory of the people, which for the first time created the ideological system for the people to achieve their own liberation; Marxism is a theory of practice, guiding the people's actions to transform the world ; Marxism is a continuously developing open theory, always standing at the forefront of the times. To master the "housekeeping skills" of Marxism, it is necessary to take "scientific theory", "people's theory", "practice theory" and "continuously developing open theory" as the substantive content, and deeply understand and deeply appreciate the greatness of Marxism. The power of truth and the mighty vitality. Third, the book expounds how to "read the original work and understand the principles" and how to master the "housekeeping skills" of Marxism. Based on the experience and experience of many years of research, the author points out a scientific path on how to "read the original work": read the "Complete Works of Marx and Engels" to grasp the theoretical system of Marxism as a whole; read "The Selected Works of Marx and Engels" to comprehend the basics of Marxism ideologically Principles; in-depth study of "famous articles", to grasp the core ideas of Marxism from the point of view; to explore "viewpoints", to understand the connotation of Marxist ideas theoretically; to master "methods", to apply Marxist theoretical thinking in practice. Based on the spirit of General Secretary Xi Jinping's important speech, the author also pointed out the basic concepts and basic principles of nine aspects of the "Principle of Understanding", namely, the historical materialism, the people's subject, the dialectical relationship between productive forces and production relations, the people's democracy, culture The concept of construction, the concept of social construction, the concept of ecological civilization, the concept of world history, and the concept of new political parties. The Marxist theoretical system is broad and profound, rich in content, and complex in system. How can we find a way to get started and to go deeper? For the cadres and the masses, this is not a problem that can be easily solved. This new book points out a simple and easy way for everyone to get started, and it is also an in-depth way to unify knowledge and action. Fourth, this is a popular reading material that can be enjoyed by both the refined and the popular, which is convenient for the general cadres and the masses to read. Road to simplicity. The author adopts the narration method in simple language, just like talking with one's heart. For general readers of the classics of Marxism-Leninism, this is a good guide for getting started, and it can be used as a necessary and useful book for opening books. For the majority of young students, it has a more fascinating ideological inspiration. (Author: Wang Dong, professor at the Department of Philosophy, Peking University)

title: 全面推行林长制 共建南粤秀美山川
text:
南方日报评论员
12月15日，广东省政府举行新闻发布会，介绍《关于全面推行林长制的实施意见》相关情况。这是贯彻落实党中央、国务院重大决策部署的有力举措，对推动我省生态文明和美丽广东建设具有重要意义。
全面推行林长制，是习近平总书记从人与自然和谐共生、加快推进生态文明建设的战略高度作出的重大决策部署，是破解我国新老林草问题、保障国家林草系统安全的重大制度创新。党的十九届五中全会明确提出“推行林长制”，中共中央办公厅、国务院办公厅印发《关于全面推行林长制的意见》，为我们指明了前进方向、厘清了行动思路。全省各地各部门要深刻认识《实施意见》是深入学习贯彻习近平生态文明思想、把总书记对广东系列重要讲话和重要指示批示精神落到实处的重要举措，是广东助推“双碳”目标实现、打造新发展格局战略支点的有力抓手，是我们推动林业治理体系与治理能力现代化、打开森林草原资源保护管理新局面的行动指南，切实把思想和行动统一到党中央、国务院的决策部署上来，以“林长制”力促“林长治”，力争像全面推行河长制、湖长制那样走在全国前列。
广东是“七山一水二分田”的林业大省。早在2019年，我省就尝试开展林长制试点，今年以来，已有13个地级市印发了实施（工作）方案，为我省全面推行林长制积累了宝贵经验。在此基础上，《实施意见》明确到2025年全面建成运行机制顺畅的省市县镇村五级林长制组织体系，到2035年实现全面推行林长制成效更加显著，为我们明确了任务书、时间表、路线图。全省上下要坚持生态优先、保护为主，绿色发展、生态惠民，问题导向、因地制宜，党委领导、部门联动原则，发扬钉钉子精神，坚定信心、咬定目标，苦干实干、久久为功。
林长制的核心是责任制。全面推行林长制，就是要构建起党政同责、属地负责、部门协同、源头治理、全域覆盖的责任体系和工作机制，实现“山有人管、树有人护、责有人担”。今年以来，广东坚持把林长制工作摆在重要位置，由党委、政府主要负责同志双“挂帅”担任总林长，划定以名山命名的省级林长责任区域，充分体现了党政同责、高位推动的工作思路。迈上新发展阶段，林长要干什么、怎么干，各级党政主要负责人要想清楚、做到位，跳出部门抓林草、林草抓林草的传统思维，将林草纳入经济社会协调发展的重要内容来抓，全面建立区域与自然生态系统相结合的省市县镇村五级林长体系，明确各级林长的森林草原资源保护发展职责，强化工作措施，统筹各方力量，形成一级抓一级、层层抓落实的工作格局。
全面推行林长制是一个复杂的系统工程，是一项跨层级、跨部门、跨区域的项目，所涉及的内容较多，肩负的任务繁重，要善于把握关键、明确重点。聚焦《实施意见》部署的七个方面主要任务，我们要严格实施森林草原资源监管，高质量开展森林草原资源生态修复，构建以国家公园为主体的自然保护地体系，严格实施森林草原资源灾害防控，创新推进林长制信息化建设，全面深化林业改革，加强基层基础建设。推进林长制落地见效，还要强化机制保障、优化精准服务，通过加强组织领导、健全保障机制、强化监督参与、严格督导考核等四项措施，为全面推行林长制提供坚强保障。要特别强调强化资金保障，建立林长制考核指标体系，落实党政领导干部生态环境损害责任终身追究制，推动工作有效落实。
森林和草原是重要的自然生态系统，对于维护国家生态安全、推进生态文明建设具有基础性、战略性作用。全省上下要深入学习贯彻习近平生态文明思想，积极践行绿水青山就是金山银山的理念，抓紧完善配套林长制各项制度，推动林长惠民绿园建设，创建林长制改革示范区，不断增进人民群众的生态福祉，打造高质量南粤秀美山川，为建设美丽广东、早日实现人与自然和谐共生的现代化提供有力生态支撑。
en_title: Fully implement the forest chief system and jointly build the beautiful mountains and rivers of southern Guangdong
en_text: Nanfang Daily commentator On December 15, the Guangdong Provincial Government held a press conference to introduce the relevant situation of the "Implementation Opinions on the Comprehensive Implementation of the Forest Chief System". This is a powerful measure to implement the major decisions and deployments of the Party Central Committee and the State Council, and is of great significance to promoting ecological civilization and the construction of a beautiful Guangdong in our province. The full implementation of the forest chief system is a major decision and deployment made by General Secretary Xi Jinping from the strategic perspective of harmonious coexistence between man and nature and accelerating the construction of ecological civilization. . The Fifth Plenary Session of the 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China clearly put forward the "implementation of the forest chief system", and the General Office of the CPC Central Committee and the General Office of the State Council issued the "Opinions on the Comprehensive Implementation of the Forest Chief System", which pointed out the way forward and clarified the ideas for action. All departments throughout the province must deeply understand that the "Implementation Opinions" is an important measure to thoroughly study and implement Xi Jinping's ecological civilization thought, and to implement the spirit of the General Secretary's series of important speeches and important instructions to Guangdong. A powerful starting point for realizing and creating a strategic fulcrum for a new development pattern is an action guide for us to promote the modernization of forestry governance systems and governance capabilities, and to open up a new situation in forest and grassland resource protection and management. Come up, use the "Lin Chief System" to promote "Lin Changzhi", and strive to be at the forefront of the country like the full implementation of the River Chief System and the Lake Chief System. Guangdong is a major forestry province with "seven mountains, one water and two fields". As early as 2019, our province tried to carry out the pilot forest chief system. Since this year, 13 prefecture-level cities have issued implementation (work) plans, accumulating valuable experience for our province to fully implement the forest chief system. On this basis, the "Implementation Opinions" clarifies that by 2025, a five-level forest chief system with a smooth operation mechanism will be fully established, and by 2035, the full implementation of the forest chief system will be more effective, which clarifies the tasks for us. Books, timetables, roadmaps. The whole province must adhere to the principle of giving priority to ecology, focusing on protection, green development, benefiting the people with ecology, problem-oriented, adapting measures to local conditions, leading the party committee, and the principle of inter-departmental linkage. The core of the forest chief system is the responsibility system. The full implementation of the forest chief system is to build a responsibility system and working mechanism in which the party and the government have the same responsibility, territorial responsibility, departmental coordination, source governance, and global coverage, so as to realize "mountains are managed, trees are protected, and responsibilities are shouldered." Since the beginning of this year, Guangdong has insisted on placing the forest chief system in an important position. The main responsible comrades of the party committee and the government are the chief forest chiefs. The work idea of responsibility and high-level promotion. Stepping into a new stage of development, what and how the forest chief should do it, the main party and government leaders at all levels must be clear and in place, jump out of the traditional thinking of departments focusing on forests and grasses, and forests and grasses, and integrate forests and grasses into economic and social coordination. Focus on the important content of development, comprehensively establish a five-level forest chief system of provinces, cities, counties, towns and villages that integrates regions and natural ecosystems, clarify the forest chiefs' responsibilities for the protection and development of forest and grassland resources, strengthen work measures, and coordinate all forces. Formation of a work pattern of first-level focus on first-level and layer-by-layer implementation. The full implementation of the forest chief system is a complex and systematic project. It is a cross-level, cross-departmental, and cross-regional project. It involves a lot of content and shoulders heavy tasks. It is necessary to be good at grasping the key points and clarifying the key points. Focusing on the seven main tasks deployed in the "Implementation Opinions", we must strictly implement the supervision of forest and grassland resources, carry out high-quality ecological restoration of forest and grassland resources, build a natural reserve system with national parks as the main body, and strictly implement forest and grassland resources disaster prevention. Control, innovatively promote the informationization of forest chief system, comprehensively deepen forestry reform, and strengthen grass-roots infrastructure. To promote the effective implementation of the forest chief system, it is necessary to strengthen the mechanism guarantee, optimize the precise service, and provide a strong guarantee for the full implementation of the forest chief system through four measures: strengthening organizational leadership, improving the guarantee mechanism, strengthening supervision and participation, and strictly supervising and evaluating. Special emphasis should be placed on strengthening financial security, establishing an assessment index system for the forest chief system, and implementing a lifelong accountability system for leading party and government officials for ecological and environmental damage, so as to promote the effective implementation of the work. Forests and grasslands are important natural ecosystems, which play a fundamental and strategic role in maintaining national ecological security and promoting ecological civilization construction. The whole province must thoroughly study and implement Xi Jinping's thought on ecological civilization, actively practice the concept that lucid waters and lush mountains are invaluable assets, promptly improve the supporting systems of the forest chief system, promote the construction of forest chiefs benefiting the people and green gardens, and create forest chief reform demonstration areas. Continuously improve the ecological well-being of the people, create high-quality southern Guangdong and beautiful mountains and rivers, and provide strong ecological support for the construction of beautiful Guangdong and the early realization of the modernization of harmonious coexistence between man and nature.

title: 恋爱期间的赠与能否撤销
text:
男女双方在恋爱期间作出赠与行为十分常见。当恋爱关系结束后，赠与方要求对方返还财物时，能否得到支持？日前，某地法院审理了一件此类赠与合同纠纷案。
    原告袁某与被告朱某确立恋爱关系10个月后，因琐事分手。交往中，袁某通过某平台给朱某打赏5.2万余元，通过支付宝、微信向朱某支付13.3万余元，在京东等网站为朱某购买物品价值5.3万余元。同时在交往期间，朱某除向袁某日常小额转款外，大额回赠共7.02万余元。
    法院审理后认为，对于原告袁某向直播平台充值打赏的款项，应视为被告朱某通过自己劳动获得的应得利益。对于袁某向被告多次通过微信、支付宝转款或购物、订购外卖等大量小金额款项，其中还存在金额为“52”“520”“1314”等具有特殊含义的款项，应视为双方表达爱意的赠与，为一般赠与；对于袁某向朱某大额转款或购物金额，已经超出男女日常交往时礼尚往来的范围，属于大额赠与，结合生活常理及婚俗习惯，应视为一种附条件的民事法律行为，即附条件的赠与合同，一旦赠与合同生效条件未成就，受赠人应予以返还。但因朱某在与袁某的交往中，除多次小金额转款和购物回赠原告外，亦转款7.02万余元给原告，已超过了袁某所给付的金额，应视为朱某已返还了袁某的附条件赠与。因此，法院判决驳回袁某的诉讼请求。
    【法官解析】
    《中华人民共和国民法典》第657条规定：“赠与合同是赠与人将自己的财产无偿给予受赠人，受赠人表示接受赠与的合同。”第661条规定：“赠与可以附义务。”
    恋爱期间或婚约关系存续期间，男女双方互赠未超过合理范围的财物应认定为一般赠与，该部分赠与一旦将财物交付，赠与合同即成立并生效，非因法定情形赠与人不得撤销赠与而要求受赠人返还赠与的财产；对于金额较大，明显超过双方交往期间正常开支范畴的部分馈赠，不同于一般的财物赠与，双方虽在成立赠与合同当时没有明示，但双方都明白大额度财物的馈赠行为，暗含了双方将来缔结婚姻或共同生活的美好愿望，这一愿望是双方当事人成立该赠与法律关系的目的，双方缔结婚姻或共同生活是一种将来可能发生的不确定的事实，即双方的赠与合同实际上附了解除条件，自条件成就（双方不能缔结婚姻或共同生活）时赠与合同失效，受赠人应向赠与人返还赠与的财产。
en_title: Can a gift during a relationship be revoked?
en_text: It is very common for both men and women to make gifts during their relationship. Can the donor get support when the donor asks the other party to return the property after the relationship ends? A few days ago, a local court heard a case of such a gift contract dispute. Ten months after the plaintiff Yuan and the defendant Zhu established a relationship, they broke up due to trivial matters. During the exchange, Yuan gave Zhu a reward of more than 52,000 yuan through a certain platform, paid Zhu more than 133,000 yuan through Alipay and WeChat, and purchased items worth more than 53,000 yuan for Zhu on JD.com and other websites. At the same time, during the period of communication, in addition to daily small transfers to Yuan, Zhu gave a total of more than 70,200 yuan in large rebates. After the trial, the court held that the money paid by the plaintiff Yuan to the live broadcast platform should be regarded as the due benefits obtained by the defendant Zhu through his own labor. For Yuan to the defendant repeatedly through WeChat, Alipay, or a large amount of small sums of money, such as shopping, ordering takeaways, etc., there are also sums with special meanings such as "52", "520", "1314", etc., it should be regarded as the expression of both parties. The gift of love is a general gift; the large amount of money transferred from Yuan to Zhu or the amount of shopping has exceeded the scope of daily exchanges between men and women. Conditional civil juristic acts, namely conditional gift contracts, should be returned by the recipient once the conditions for the validity of the gift contract have not been fulfilled. However, in the interaction between Zhu and Yuan, in addition to several small transfers and shopping rebates to the plaintiff, he also transferred more than 70,200 yuan to the plaintiff, which exceeded the amount paid by Yuan, and it should be deemed that Zhu has Yuan's conditional gift was returned. Therefore, the court ruled to reject Yuan's claim. [Judge's Analysis] Article 657 of the Civil Code of the People's Republic of China stipulates: "A gift contract is a contract in which the donor gives his property to the donee free of charge, and the donee expresses his acceptance of the gift." Article 661 stipulates: "The gift can be Obligations.” During the period of love or the existence of the marriage contract, the mutual gift of property that does not exceed a reasonable range should be regarded as a general gift. Once the property is handed over, the gift contract will be established and become effective. Revocation of the gift and requiring the recipient to return the gifted property; for the part of the gift with a large amount that obviously exceeds the normal expenses during the period of communication between the two parties, it is different from the general gift of property. Although the two parties did not express it when the gift contract was established, both parties understood The gift of a large amount of property implies the good wishes of both parties to conclude a marriage or live together in the future. This wish is the purpose of the parties to establish the legal relationship of the gift. The conclusion of marriage or living together is an uncertain future that may occur. The fact is that the gift contract of both parties is actually attached with a termination condition, and the gift contract becomes invalid when the conditions are fulfilled (both parties cannot conclude a marriage or live together), and the donee should return the gifted property to the donor.

title: 考古重大发现之后是保护
text:
■丁建庭
12月14日，国家文物局公布汉唐时期三项重要考古发现，其中最受关注的是确认陕西省西安市白鹿原江村大墓即为汉文帝霸陵。
千年之谜，终于揭开了谜底！这次考古发现否定了元代以来世传的“凤凰嘴”为汉文帝霸陵的传统认知，确定了霸陵的准确位置，解决了西汉十一陵的名位问题，对深入研究中国古代帝王陵墓制度具有极为重要的意义，也有助于做好霸陵的保护和开发。
霸陵发现之后，许多网友惊叹白鹿原是一片“神奇的土地”，还建议“规划旅游线路”。实际上，接下来更重要的任务是保护，而不是规划旅游景区的开发。霸陵的发现，起初是源于盗墓贼的破坏，后面被迫进行抢救性发掘所取得的考古成果。这些年，陵墓被盗案仍时有发生，例如钱镠墓盗掘案等，一再提醒我们文物保护不可掉以轻心，比挖掘和开发更重要的是保护。
历史文化遗产不仅属于我们，也属于子孙后代。发现汉文帝霸陵实属不易，保护工作更是任重道远。
