en_title: Archaeological finds followed by conservation
en_text: ■Ding Jianting On December 14, the State Administration of Cultural Heritage announced three important archaeological discoveries in the Han and Tang Dynasties, among which the most concerned is the confirmation that the tomb of Jiangcun in Bailuyuan, Xi'an City, Shaanxi Province is the Mausoleum of Emperor Hanwen. The thousand-year-old mystery has finally been revealed! This archaeological discovery denies the traditional cognition that the "Phoenix Mouth" has been handed down since the Yuan Dynasty as the Paling Mausoleum of Emperor Wen of the Han Dynasty. The mausoleum system is of great significance, and it also contributes to the protection and development of Ba Mausoleum. After the discovery of Baling, many netizens marveled that Bailuyuan was a "magical land" and suggested "planning tourist routes". In fact, the next more important task is to protect, not to plan the development of tourist attractions. The discovery of Baling was initially due to the destruction of tomb robbers, and was later forced to carry out salvage excavations. In recent years, the robbery of mausoleums still occurs from time to time, such as the robbery of Qian Liu’s tomb, which reminds us repeatedly that the protection of cultural relics should not be taken lightly, and that protection is more important than excavation and development. Historical and cultural heritage belongs not only to us, but also to future generations. It is not easy to discover the Tomb of Emperor Hanwen, and the protection work is a long way to go. title: 哈尔滨交警“四个结合”抗疫-
text:
□本报记者 冯锐 通讯员 黄庆 高阳
    12月1日，黑龙江省哈尔滨市出现新冠肺炎确诊病例，哈尔滨市公安局交警部门迅速行动，组织民警坚守抗击疫情第一线，克服工作强度大、天气寒冷、降雨降雪等困难，坚持“四个结合”工作举措，坚决打赢疫情防控阻击战。
    “固定警力+巡逻警车”相结合。按照疫情防控统一部署，交警部门全天24小时派出固定警力，值守在各疫情防控检查点，全力做好出入城车辆核查引导工作，配合相关部门开展扫码、测温、检查、转运等工作。在市区，各交警大队主动对接相关部门，提前摸排核酸检测点位设置情况，采取固定警力维护与巡逻警车管控的有效措施，维护各点位现场交通秩序。1日以来，各检查点位累计投入警力6400余人次、警车1700余辆次，各核酸检测点累计投入警力3700余人次、警车1300余辆次。
    “开道护送+定点守护”相结合。7日，交警部门接到有关指令，称有一批核酸检测样本需从五常市区运往哈尔滨市区。执勤民警随后变身护送员，以警车带道的方式开展工作，减少途中运输风险。经两个小时护送、驱车100余公里，他们顺利完成了核酸检测样本转运工作。1日以来，交警部门派出专门警力执行移动实验室的交通安保任务，实时协调实验室场地进出车辆的时间、路线，引导车辆安全、高效进出。
    “网上办+预约办”相结合。为方便市民办理违法处理等公安交管业务，避免人员过多聚集，交警部门通过媒体、微信群等渠道，倡导公安交管业务网上办。6日，为减少病毒传播风险，交警部门各窗口单位全面启动预约办理机制，市民可采取网上预约、电话预约等方式进行办理。在办理业务现场，窗口交警严格执行测体温、扫码等安全措施，实时提示群众保持安全距离。
    “绿色通道+人性执法”相结合。为保障各类民生物资在疫情期间的顺利运输，各交警大队主动对接菜市场、超市等场所，提前了解物资运送需求，及各类运输车辆行车时间、路线等，开辟绿色通道，采取针对性保障措施，确保各类民生物资及时高效中转；在菜市场、超市等场所，他们科学部署巡逻警力和固定警力，对轻微交通事故采取快处快办等举措，有序疏导过往车辆。
en_title: Harbin Traffic Police "Four Combinations" Anti-epidemic-
en_text: □ Our reporter Feng Rui correspondent Huang Qinggaoyang On December 1, a confirmed case of new coronary pneumonia appeared in Harbin, Heilongjiang Province. The traffic police department of the Harbin Public Security Bureau acted quickly to organize the police to stick to the front line of fighting the epidemic, overcoming the high workload and cold weather , rain and snowfall, etc., adhere to the "four combinations" work measures, and resolutely win the battle of epidemic prevention and control. The combination of "fixed police force + patrol police car". In accordance with the unified deployment of epidemic prevention and control, the traffic police department dispatched fixed police officers 24 hours a day to be on duty at various epidemic prevention and control checkpoints. Work. In the urban area, each traffic police brigades took the initiative to connect with relevant departments, check the setting of nucleic acid detection points in advance, and take effective measures to maintain fixed police force and patrol police vehicles to maintain on-site traffic order at each point. Since the 1st, more than 6,400 police personnel and more than 1,700 police vehicles have been invested in each inspection point, and more than 3,700 police personnel and more than 1,300 police vehicles have been invested in each nucleic acid testing point. The combination of "clearing the way escort + fixed-point guardianship". On the 7th, the traffic police department received relevant instructions, saying that a batch of nucleic acid test samples needed to be transported from Wuchang urban area to Harbin urban area. The police on duty then turned into escorts and carried out work in the way of police cars leading the way to reduce the risk of transportation on the way. After two hours of escort and driving more than 100 kilometers, they successfully completed the transfer of nucleic acid test samples. Since the 1st, the traffic police department has dispatched special police forces to carry out the traffic security tasks of the mobile laboratory, coordinate the time and route of vehicles entering and leaving the laboratory site in real time, and guide vehicles to enter and exit safely and efficiently. The combination of "online application + appointment application". In order to facilitate citizens to handle public security traffic management services such as illegal handling and avoid excessive gathering of people, the traffic police department advocates online public security traffic management services through media, WeChat groups and other channels. On the 6th, in order to reduce the risk of virus transmission, all window units of the traffic police department fully launched the appointment processing mechanism, and citizens can make online appointments, telephone appointments, etc. At the business site, the window traffic police strictly implemented safety measures such as temperature measurement and code scanning, and reminded the public to maintain a safe distance in real time. The combination of "green channel + humane law enforcement". In order to ensure the smooth transportation of various types of civilian materials during the epidemic, each traffic police brigades took the initiative to connect with vegetable markets, supermarkets and other places to understand the material delivery needs in advance, as well as the travel time and routes of various transport vehicles, open up green channels, and take targeted guarantees. Measures to ensure the timely and efficient transfer of various civilian materials; in vegetable markets, supermarkets and other places, they scientifically deploy patrol police force and fixed police force, take measures such as quick handling of minor traffic accidents, and orderly divert passing vehicles.

title: 东方电气集团召开人才工作会
text:
本网讯 12月14日，东方电气集团召开人才工作会，认真贯彻落实党的十九届六中全会精神和中央人才工作会议精神，总结工作、交流经验、部署任务。集团公司党组书记、董事长俞培根出席会议并讲话。党组副书记、董事宋致远主持会议。党组成员、副总经理张继烈，纪检监察组组长、党组成员袁明刚出席会议。四川省人力资源和社会保障厅二级巡视员付林、四川省委组织部人才工作处处长王军应邀参加会议。
	       俞培根指出，集团公司党组和各企业党委坚持以习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想为指导，把做好人才工作作为贯彻落实党中央重大决策部署的实际行动，扎实推进全集团人才队伍建设各项工作，人才引领发展的战略地位更加明确，人才发展体制机制改革取得重要进展，人才效能明显提升，人才素质和结构稳步改善，人才激励力度明显加大，各方面工作取得了积极进展和明显成效。
       俞培根强调，要深入学习贯彻中央人才工作会议精神，增强“四个意识”、坚定“四个自信”、做到“两个维护”，牢记“国之大者”，从坚持和捍卫“两个确立”的政治高度，全面贯彻新时代人才工作新理念新战略新举措，不断增强做好人才工作的思想自觉、政治自觉和行动自觉。
       俞培根要求，要深入实施人才强企战略，将习近平总书记重要讲话精神转化为推动集团公司人才工作高质量发展的思路、举措，转化为实施人才强企战略的生动实践，全力开创集团公司人才工作新局面。一要牢固树立人才引领发展的战略地位，以高质量人才工作为集团公司“十四五”高质量发展提供坚强保证；二要推进创新型企业和人才高地建设，着力建设吸引和集聚人才的高质量平台；三要坚定不移改革创新人才发展体制机制，全方位培养、引进、用好人才；四要聚焦“四个面向”，加快培养一流科技领域人才队伍和具有国际竞争力的青年科技人才及卓越工程师队伍；五要加强党对人才工作的全面领导，形成凝聚各方面优秀人才创新创业的强大合力。
	       付林在会上指出，东方电气集团服务国家战略，主动对接地方社会经济发展，充分发挥人才、技术、要素优势，为推动治蜀兴川再上新台阶作出了突出贡献。希望东方电气集团继续在人才发展、就业创业、社会保障等方面发挥央企带动作用，将企业的技术、人才等优势与四川人事人才工作有机结合，推动共赢共享共同发展。
       会议对集团公司第八届有突出贡献优秀专家、有突出贡献高技能人才进行了表彰，并颁发了荣誉证书。
       组织人事部对《集团公司“十四五”人力资源规划》进行了宣贯和解读。东方电机、东方汽轮机、东方锅炉、东方风电、东方研究院作了交流发言。
       集团公司董事会秘书，股份公司领导，纪检监察组副组长，总部职能部门和直属单位主要负责人，各二级企业相关负责人及相关人员，第八届有突出贡献优秀专家和高技能人才代表参加会议。
en_title: Dongfang Electric Group held a talent work meeting
en_text: On December 14th, Dongfang Electric Group held a talent work meeting, conscientiously implemented the spirit of the Sixth Plenary Session of the 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and the spirit of the Central Talent Work Conference, summed up work, exchanged experience, and deployed tasks. Yu Peigen, secretary of the party group and chairman of the group company, attended the meeting and delivered a speech. Song Zhiyuan, deputy secretary of the party group and director, presided over the meeting. Member of the party group and deputy general manager Zhang Jilie, head of the discipline inspection and supervision team and member of the party group Yuan Minggang attended the meeting. Fu Lin, the second-level inspector of the Sichuan Provincial Department of Human Resources and Social Security, and Wang Jun, Director of the Talent Work Department of the Organization Department of the Sichuan Provincial Party Committee, were invited to attend the meeting. Yu Peigen pointed out that the party group of the group company and the party committees of all enterprises adhere to the guidance of Xi Jinping's new era of socialism with Chinese characteristics, take the talent work as a practical action to implement the major decisions and deployments of the Party Central Committee, and solidly promote the construction of the group's talent team. Work, the strategic position of talent-led development has become clearer, important progress has been made in the reform of the talent development system and mechanism, the efficiency of talent has been significantly improved, the quality and structure of talent has been steadily improved, the incentives of talent have been significantly increased, and positive progress and significant results have been achieved in all aspects of work. Yu Peigen emphasized that it is necessary to thoroughly study and implement the spirit of the Central Talent Work Conference, strengthen the "four consciousnesses", strengthen the "four self-confidences", achieve "two maintenances", keep in mind the "bigger of the country", and from insisting and defending "two We will fully implement the new concept, new strategy and new measures of talent work in the new era, and continuously enhance the ideological, political and action consciousness of doing a good job in talent work. Yu Peigen demanded that the strategy of strengthening the enterprise with talents should be implemented in depth, and the spirit of General Secretary Xi Jinping's important speech should be transformed into ideas and measures to promote the high-quality development of the talent work of the group company, and transformed into a vivid practice of implementing the strategy of strengthening the enterprise with talents, so as to fully create talents in the group company. New work situation. First, we must firmly establish the strategic position of talent-led development, and provide a strong guarantee for the high-quality development of the group company during the "14th Five-Year Plan" period with high-quality talent work; quality platform; thirdly, we must unswervingly reform and innovate the system and mechanism of talent development, and comprehensively cultivate, introduce and make good use of talents; fourthly, we must focus on "four aspects" and accelerate the cultivation of first-class talents in the field of science and technology and young scientific and technological talents with international competitiveness and a team of outstanding engineers; fifth, we must strengthen the party's overall leadership over talent work, and form a strong synergy that brings together outstanding talents in all aspects of innovation and entrepreneurship. Fu Lin pointed out at the meeting that Dongfang Electric Group served the national strategy, actively connected with local social and economic development, and gave full play to the advantages of talents, technology and elements, and made outstanding contributions to promoting the governance of Sichuan and Xingchuan to a new level. It is hoped that Dongfang Electric Group will continue to play the leading role of central enterprises in talent development, employment and entrepreneurship, social security, etc., and organically combine the company's advantages in technology and talents with Sichuan's personnel and talent work to promote win-win sharing and common development. The meeting commended outstanding experts with outstanding contributions and high-skilled talents with outstanding contributions in the eighth session of the group company, and issued honorary certificates. Organize the personnel department to publicize and interpret the "Group Company's "14th Five-Year Plan" Human Resource Planning. Dongfang Electric, Dongfang Steam Turbine, Dongfang Boiler, Dongfang Wind Power and Dongfang Research Institute made speeches. The secretary of the board of directors of the group company, the leader of the joint-stock company, the deputy head of the discipline inspection and supervision team, the principals of the functional departments of the headquarters and the directly affiliated units, the relevant persons in charge of the second-level enterprises and relevant personnel, the eighth session of outstanding experts with outstanding contributions and representatives of high-skilled talents Attend a meeting.

title: 榜单上的东莞 五年频进位 实现大跨越
text:
东莞行政中心广场。黄伟兴 摄
五年来的接续奋斗，让东莞经济社会取得长足发展，“双万”新起点已触手可及。
这五年，是东莞综合实力实现大跨越的五年——深化改革开放取得显著进展，创新驱动发展获得重大突破，产业发展优势得到明显巩固，城市品质内涵实现稳步提升，生态环境质量持续改善，民生社会事业阔步向前……
在东莞市第十五次党代会即将召开之际，让我们一起来盘点这五年榜单上的东莞。一份份榜单、一项项荣誉，正全方位、多角度地展现了即将迈上“双万”新起点关键阶段的东莞。
采写：何绮莹 龚名扬
靳延明 郭文君
以城市之名，大秀实力
东江翻腾，见证南粤科创新星冉冉升起；荣誉傍身，莞邑大地日新月异、生机勃发。
今年9月，2021年第18期《求是》杂志上公布了由国家统计局提供的《经济社会发展统计图表：第七次全国人口普查超大、特大城市人口基本情况》。根据普查数据显示，东莞晋升成为全国14座特大城市之一，位列特大城市第二位。
千万人口与东莞共生共荣，共同创造了一个综合实力强劲、一往无前的东莞。
在外界看来，东莞的标签有很多：“中国外贸百强城市”“特大城市”“新一线城市”，但这只是冰山一角。
近年来，东莞屡屡在各大榜单上“出圈”：以城市之名秀综合实力——2021中国城市综合经济竞争力排名第17位；2021中国城市可持续竞争力排名第13位；2021先进制造业百强市第19位；集约用地、环境治理、财政预算、商事制度改革、稳住外贸基本盘等工作获国务院督查激励。
GDP即将迈入万亿大关，高质量发展行稳致远，这背后不容忽视的，是东莞33个镇街（园区）的持续发力。
虎门的时装、大朗的毛织、长安的五金模具、厚街的制鞋、大岭山的家具……提起每个镇街（园区），总能想到一两个优势产业，人们会惊喜地发现东莞“一镇一品”的产业集群特征。
这在榜单中也早有体现，在《2021年中国中小城市高质量发展指数研究成果发布》中的2021年度全国综合实力千强镇前100名榜单上，东莞有15个镇跻身全国“百强镇”，28个镇全部入选全国千强镇。而在《中国乡镇综合竞争力报告2020》中，东莞有20个镇进入2020中国百强镇，占据全省超半数席位，长安镇、虎门镇则进入全国十强。
“镇街兴，东莞兴”，分散的各镇街（园区）犹如点点星光，汇聚成兴旺发达的光辉足迹，助力东莞迈向“双万”新起点。
以科创之新，迸发活力
要想在城市发展竞争中占据主导地位，科技是第一要素。
这五年，松山湖科学城纳入大湾区综合性国家科学中心先行启动区；这五年，全国唯一、全球第四台脉冲式散裂中子源建成运行；这五年，大湾区大学、香港城市大学（东莞）相继落户……
今年11月，中国社科院财经战略研究院与中国社会科学出版社共同发布《中国城市竞争力报告No.19》，对2021年中国291个城市进行评价，其中，东莞挺进全国科创20强，位列地级市第三名，从全国第40位跃升至第20位。
在科技部和中国科学技术信息研究所公布的《国家创新型城市创新能力监测报告2020》和《国家创新型城市创新能力评价报告2020》中，东莞国家创新型城市创新能力位列第22位。
科创榜单的“大跨越”来源于东莞对科技创新、先进制造引领经济发展的前瞻性。
随着新活力的持续激发，松山湖科学城对外凸显强劲虹吸效应，更多高层次人才和高水平项目源源不断汇聚，松山湖科学城俨然成为带动东莞科创高水平发展的强力引擎。
广东省首批启动建设的4家省实验室之一、成立于2018年的松山湖材料实验室就位于松山湖科学城中，这里藏着众多“最强大脑”。据悉，实验室现有“两院”院士8位，研究成果连续两年先后入选“中国科学十大进展”和“中国重大技术进展”。实验室累计引进人才超900人，目前引进25个高水平研究团队，孵化了26家产业化公司。
R&D（科学研究与试验发展）占GDP比重全省第二；国家高新技术企业数量超过7200家，稳居全省地级市第一；79家企业获评国家级专精特新“小巨人”企业，排名全国第九……
大大小小的想法汇聚成一家家科创企业，集聚了一群群人才，串珠成链，东莞用科创引领经济，绘就了全链条体系的“科技创新+先进制造”新蓝图。
以生活之美，展现魅力
走在繁花点缀、绿意葱茏的莞邑街头，洁净的道路旁偶遇便利店，还可以约上知己好友，在街角的咖啡厅喝上一杯香气四溢的咖啡。
生活在东莞，便利，惬意。
今年1月，住房和城乡建设部、国家发展和改革委员会发布《关于命名第十批（2020年度）国家节水型城市的公告》，东莞上榜，成为“国家节水型城市”。10月，在《生物多样性公约》缔约方大会第十五次会议生态文明论坛上，东莞市被授予第五批“国家生态文明建设示范市”称号。
至此，东莞先后获得国家环境保护模范城市、国家文明城市、国家卫生城市、国家森林城市、全国绿化模范城市、国家水生态文明试点市、国家生态文明先行示范区、国家节水型城市、国家生态文明建设示范市等荣誉称号。
麻涌华阳湖从“龙须沟”变身国家湿地公园，滨海长廊、茅洲河、石马河等流域河道水质景观改善，都成为了市民们消遣娱乐、拍照打卡的好去处。
而“高颜值”的东莞在社会治理方面更是走出了一条自己的“路子”，“红凳子”引领社会治理、“蓝马甲”筑牢平安防线、“乡贤”化解纠纷矛盾……在外来人口众多、各处乡音交杂的东莞，市民也能迅速获得归属感，找到“家的港湾”。
正是有了这些“绣花功”，才凝结成“莞版”社会治理“秘笈”，让东莞在这类榜单上一骑绝尘。
2017年9月，东莞实现全国社会治安综合治理工作和平安建设的最高荣誉——“全国社会治安综合治理优秀城市”三连冠。该荣誉由平安中国建设协调小组、中央政法委每4年评选表彰一次，连续三届被评为全国优秀城市的地方将被授予“长安杯”。至此，东莞市实现“全国社会治安综合治理优秀城市”三连冠，并首次捧回“长安杯”。
值得一提的是，在2020年，东莞实现了全国社会治理创新典范城市“六连冠”，持续“点亮技能”，为社会治理带来更多“好点子”。
以赤诚之心，凸显引力
人才的聚集与城市的经济发展水平、政策及配套设施高度相关。
从“三来一补”起家吸引港商台商来莞投资创业，到中国散裂中子源（CSNS）集聚科创人才引领东莞先进制造，经济科技的“双提升”，离不开对人才的重视与政策支持。在东莞，宜商宜业不只是说说而已。
在去年年底由粤港澳大湾区研究院、21世纪经济研究院联合发布的《2020年中国296个地级及以上城市营商环境报告》中，东莞营商环境水平排名全国第18名，在地级市中排第3名。
而在2020中国经济传媒大会上发布的首份《全国地级市营商环境热力指数报告》中，东莞荣登“营商环境热力之城TOP50”第3名。
营商环境名列前茅的背后是政策的大力支持。
此前，在中国人民大学国家发展与战略研究院发布的“中国城市政商关系排行榜（2017）”与“中国城市政商关系排行榜（2018）”，东莞政商关系健康总指数均排名第一。
由此可见，东莞的“亲企清政”得到了应有的回报，真正做到了“栽下梧桐树，引得凤凰来”。
除了营商环境的建设，东莞也在对外讲好“东莞故事”，城市软实力不断提升。一直以来，东莞饱受负面刻板印象的影响，给外界留下难以轻易改变的“初印象”，但在不断地努力宣传下，这种情况正发生变化，也取得了可喜的成绩。
在刚刚结束的首届“中国城市国际传播论坛”上，发布了《中国城市海外影响力分析报告（2021）》，东莞凭借在海外媒体平台推出的《这就是东莞》系列城市宣传片，并在传播推广中开展的《画出你心中的东莞》欧洲青少年绘画竞赛等活动，入选了“中国城市国际传播特色案例”。
在《这就是东莞》系列城市宣传片中，“工业发展可以和生态保护和谐发展”的可持续发展理念被外媒持续引用报道，“可持续发展”的东莞为人所熟知，打造了东莞独特的城市品牌形象，有效提升了东莞的正向形象。
榜单的成绩并非空中楼阁，名声远扬的背后，是东莞用谦逊与实干创造出的佳绩，在厚积薄发中讲好“东莞故事”，大步向前，跑出“东莞速度”。
展望未来，东莞正坚定地走好走稳新时代高质量发展之路，立足“双万”新起点，聚焦科技创新和先进制造，奋力谱写东莞现代化建设新篇章！
en_title: Dongguan on the list has achieved a big leap in five-year frequency carry
en_text: Dongguan Administrative Center Plaza. Photo by Huang Weixing The continuous struggle in the past five years has made Dongguan's economy and society develop by leaps and bounds, and the new starting point of "double 10,000" is within reach. The past five years are the five years for Dongguan's comprehensive strength to achieve a great leap - significant progress has been made in deepening reform and opening up, major breakthroughs have been made in innovation-driven development, industrial development advantages have been significantly consolidated, urban quality connotation has been steadily improved, and ecological environment quality has continued to improve. People's livelihood and social undertakings are striding forward... As the 15th Party Congress of Dongguan is about to be held, let us take stock of Dongguan on the five-year list. Lists and honors are showing Dongguan, which is about to enter the critical stage of the new starting point of "Double 10,000" in an all-round and multi-angle manner. Written by: He Qiying, Gong Mingyang, Jin Yanming, Guo Wenjun, in the name of the city, showed his strength and the Dongjiang tossed, witnessing the rising stars of Nanyue science and technology innovation; In September this year, the 18th issue of "Seeking Truth" in 2021 published the "Statistical Chart of Economic and Social Development: Basic Population of Super Large and Super Large Cities in the Seventh National Census" provided by the National Bureau of Statistics. According to the census data, Dongguan has been promoted to become one of the 14 megacities in the country, ranking second among megacities. Tens of millions of people coexist and prosper with Dongguan, and jointly create a strong and indomitable Dongguan. In the eyes of the outside world, Dongguan has many labels: "China's Top 100 Foreign Trade Cities", "Mega City" and "New First-tier City", but this is only the tip of the iceberg. In recent years, Dongguan has repeatedly been "out of the circle" on major lists: with the city's famous comprehensive strength - 2021 China's urban comprehensive economic competitiveness ranked 17th; 2021 China's urban sustainable competitiveness ranked 13th; 2021 Ranked 19th among the top 100 cities for advanced manufacturing industries; the intensive land use, environmental governance, financial budgeting, commercial system reform, and stabilization of foreign trade fundamentals have been supervised and motivated by the State Council. GDP is about to hit the trillion mark, and high-quality development is going steadily and far. What cannot be ignored is the continuous efforts of 33 towns and streets (parks) in Dongguan. Fashion in Humen, woolen weaving in Dalang, metal molds in Chang'an, shoemaking in Houjie, furniture in Dalingshan... When it comes to every town street (park), one or two advantageous industries can always be thought of, and people will be pleasantly surprised. Discover the industrial cluster characteristics of "one town, one product" in Dongguan. This has long been reflected in the list. In the 2021 Top 100 List of Top 1000 Towns with Comprehensive Strength in China in the "Research Results Release of High-Quality Development Index of Small and Medium-sized Cities in China in 2021", 15 towns in Dongguan rank among the whole country. Top 100 Towns", all 28 towns were selected into the top 1000 towns in the country. In the "Comprehensive Competitiveness Report of China's Townships and Towns 2020", 20 towns in Dongguan entered the top 100 towns in China in 2020, occupying more than half of the seats in the province, and Chang'an Town and Humen Town entered the top ten in the country. title: 山东省属企业全面赋能 落实“双碳”使命
text:
山东能源集团是山东国企改革的典型代表，2020年7月原兖矿集团和原山东能源集团联合重组为新山东能源集团。2020年，营业收入6752亿元，利润170亿元，净利润112亿元，资产总额6851亿元，国有资本保值增值率107.8%，平均净资产收益率7.4%，成为山东首家资产、营收“双6000亿”企业；入选国务院国资委国有重点企业管理标杆创建行动标杆企业，位列世界500强企业第70位、中国企业500强第24位、省属企业第一名。
据悉，山东能源集团以强化科技创新为突破口，积极推动互联网、大数据、人工智能、5G等新基建与煤炭工业深度融合，大力实施装备换人、技术换人、管理换人，将大量井下工人从繁重的体力劳动、危险恶劣的工作场所中解放出来，井下“无人化、少人化”开采从梦想逐渐变为现实。下一步，山东能源集团将积极投身于新技术研发、新产业壮大、新模式应用，力争年底前9个国家级智能化示范矿井具备验收条件，“十四五”期间全面建成安全、绿色、智能、高效“四型矿井”。目前，山东能源集团被确定为省级新能源投资平台，积极布局“双千万、双园区”新能源基地，获得渤中海上风电基地主导开发权，正积极推进一期240万千瓦装机前期工作，启动沂水县整县分布式光伏和企业自有分布式光伏项目；省外正在筹建阿拉善盟40万千瓦、杭锦旗10万千瓦风电项目、灵台10万千瓦光伏项目。
作为山东省内新兴国企，水发集团以水务起步，发展到拥有水务、农业、环保、清洁能源等主要产业。
水发集团表示，在清洁能源产业，水发集团以国家“碳达峰、碳中和”战略目标为指引，大力发展风电、光伏、水电、生物质发电、城乡供热、天然气等清洁能源产业，积极布局储能节能、能源交易、能源装备、能源技术等领域，打造形成了山东最大的清洁能源产业集群，清洁能源资产规模670亿元，接近山东省内排名第二的企业两倍。目前拥有清洁能源发电装机800万千瓦，拟开发风光发电项目超过2000万千瓦，城乡供热面积6676万平方米，日供天然气800万立方米。
据悉，西藏最大光伏项目、山东省属企业最大援藏项目，被评为年度十大典型城市清洁高效供能项目之一的日喀则50MW光伏+100MWh储能综合能源示范项目，就是水发能源积极在省外布局清洁能源产业的典型案例。
此外，由水发能源集团参与投资建设的“吉电入鲁”吉林通榆500MW风电项目，以高效率推进项目建设，预计今年底全面并网发电，大大领先同期获批的其他企业。
“双碳”国家使命和山东能源“四增两减、一提升、两保障、两强化”工程，为水发清洁能源的发展设定了新的航标。到“十四五”末，将实现市值过千亿、资产过千亿、营收过500亿、利润过50亿，成为走在全国地方新能源企业前列的千亿级新能源新材料领军型企业集团。

title: 河北实行食品经营风险分级管理
text:
本报讯 
为科学划分食品经营者风险等级，对食品经营活动实施分类监管，提高监管工作的针对性和有效性。日前，河北省市场监督管理局正式印发《河北省食品经营风险分级管理工作规范》(以下简称《工作规范》)。
《工作规范》将食品经营者细分为11种类型，制定静态风险因素量化分值表和动态风险因素量化分值表，实施分类评定。
在风险等级划分方面，《工作规范》将食品经营者风险等级从低到高划分为A级风险、B级风险、C级风险、D级风险4个等级。各市、县级市场监督管理部门负责开展本地区食品经营风险分级管理的具体工作。县局根据食品经营者年度监督检查记录，调整食品经营者风险等级。
按照分类监管的原则，《工作规范》对不同类型食品经营者日常监督检查要点表、风险等级动态风险值评定表进行了内容整合，实现两表合一，提升监管工作效能。
《工作规范》明确对不同风险等级的食品经营者的检查频次要求。对风险等级为A级风险的食品经营者，每年至少进行1次监督检查;对风险等级为B级风险的食品经营者，每年至少进行2次监督检查，每半年至少进行1次;对风险等级为C级风险的食品经营者，每年至少进行3次监督检查，每4个月至少进行1次;对风险等级为D级风险的食品经营者，每年至少进行4次监督检查，每季度至少进行1次。(邵玉姿)《中国食品报》(2021年12月14日08版)
(责编：
高 娜
)
en_title: Hebei implements food business risk classification management
en_text: News from this newspaper is to scientifically classify the risk levels of food operators, implement classified supervision of food business activities, and improve the pertinence and effectiveness of supervision work. A few days ago, the Hebei Provincial Market Supervision and Administration Bureau officially issued the "Hebei Province Food Business Risk Classification Management Work Specification" (hereinafter referred to as the "Work Specification"). The "Work Specification" subdivides food operators into 11 types, formulates a quantitative score table for static risk factors and a quantitative score table for dynamic risk factors, and implements classification assessment. In terms of risk level classification, the "Work Specification" divides the risk level of food operators into four levels: A-level risk, B-level risk, C-level risk, and D-level risk. The municipal and county-level market supervision and management departments are responsible for the specific work of the grading management of food business risks in their respective regions. The county bureau adjusts the risk level of food operators based on the annual supervision and inspection records of food operators. In accordance with the principle of classified supervision, the "Work Specification" integrates the content of the daily supervision and inspection points table for different types of food operators and the dynamic risk value evaluation table of risk levels, realizing the integration of the two tables and improving the efficiency of supervision work. The "Work Specification" specifies the inspection frequency requirements for food operators with different risk levels. For food operators with risk level A, at least one supervision and inspection per year shall be conducted; for food operators with risk level B, supervision and inspection shall be conducted at least twice a year, and at least once every six months; For food operators with risk level C, at least 3 supervision and inspections are conducted every year, and at least once every 4 months; for food operators with risk level D, supervision and inspections are conducted at least 4 times a year and at least quarterly. 1 time. (Shao Yuzi) "China Food News" (December 14, 2021 08 edition) (Editor in charge: Gao Na)

title: 党建引领  协商共治 有效破解无物业老旧小区治理难题
text:
朱  瑞


宁夏回族自治区石嘴山市惠农区是宁夏的老工业基地，城市老旧小区较多，且存在基础设施老化、无法满足业主需求等问题，一直是社区治理的难点。为解决好群众的烦心事，有效破解无物业小区管理难题，惠农区紧扣“多元参与、协商共治”主题，积极探索无物业小区“党建+自治+协商”管理模式，成功打通无物业小区治理的“梗阻点”，有效提升了群众的幸福感和满意度。


聚焦党建引领


惠农区坚持以党建引领社区治理，发挥社区党组织牵头抓总、协调各方的引领作用，不断提升社区党组织在社区治理中把方向、作决策、统资源、强服务的能力。


建立“社区党委—小区党支部—楼栋党小组—党员中心户”组织架构，推行“双报告双报到”、党员包片联户、党员积分管理等制度，促进社区党组织延伸党建工作触角，为党组织引领群众、宣传群众、凝聚群众、服务群众奠定基础。公园社区党支部发挥战斗堡垒作用，协调解决了老街坊小区供暖矛盾，为社区居民办实事；惠西社区通过社区党组织领导下的党员包片联户工作机制，较好地解决了辖区38个无物业老旧小区的管理问题，让居民通过社区治理得到实惠。


发展“红色物业”


惠农区引导社区党支部通过“双向进入、交叉任职”的方式，打造“红色物业”。


该区以“党支部+业主委员会筹备组”的运行模式，把乐于奉献、有一定业余时间、履职能力强的社区“两委”班子成员、老党员、楼栋长等作为业委会成员候选人，酝酿组建“红色业委会”，为无物业小区引进物业公司规范化管理打好基础。目前，全区新成立22个业主委员会，并对领航鑫源小区、中街小区等6个小区引进物业公司进行管理。对于暂时不具备引进物业管理的小区，在社区党组织的带领下，精准施策，分类治理，探索实行社区代管、社会组织服务、业主委员会自治、居民自我服务4种管理模式，实现了无物业小区“垃圾有人清、卫生有人扫、社区有人管”的目标。


抓牢“议事协商”


为加强社区、业委会、物业公司三方协商沟通，惠农区依托 “党群同心苑”“红色管家议事厅”“石榴亭圆桌会”“小区板凳会”等社区议事平台，制定居民议事制度，召集社区党组织、居民委员会、物业公司、业主委员会、社会组织、共建单位等社区治理各方主体定期开展议事协商，小区“改什么、建什么，怎么改、怎么建”，都由居民说了算。


通过议事协商，全区先后解决了老旧小区改造、供水供暖、垃圾清运等一大批与居民生活密切相关的问题。如在政府老旧小区改造项目实施过程中，中街社区通过“支部庭院”广泛听取居民意见建议，修改完善施工方案，使政府民生项目更加符合民意；水韵名都社区通过“党群同心苑”居民议事会搭建起居民与物业服务企业沟通的桥梁，物业服务水平有效提升；桥西社区每月定期举办“居民议事会”，化解了一批居民身边的急难愁盼问题。


深挖联动共建


惠农区大力推行“一书三单”，深度挖掘共驻共建工作机制优势，各社区与共建单位签订共建协议228份，理清社区共建共治资源清单、治理需求清单、服务项目清单，将社区各类服务资源与群众需求有效对接，有机整合，聚集区域共建合力，形成社区“吹哨”、部门“报到”机制。


全区通过开展“星期五志愿服务日”，在职党员、志愿者深入小区、楼宇，对楼栋内的卫生死角和楼道小广告进行清理，改善无物业小区环境卫生。目前，累计有1800余名在职党员先后到社区报到。共建单位积极参与社区共建共治，为社区安装休闲座椅、加装充电桩、设置无障碍通道、维修活动室、改造景观水系、捐赠文体活动设施等，切实为居民办实事、为社区解难题。
en_title: Party building leads negotiation and co-governance to effectively solve the problem of governance in old communities without property
en_text: Zhu Rui Huinong District, Shizuishan City, Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region is an old industrial base in Ningxia. There are many old residential areas in the city, and there are problems such as aging infrastructure and inability to meet the needs of owners, which has always been a difficulty in community governance. In order to solve the troubles of the masses and effectively solve the management problems of non-property communities, Huinong District closely adheres to the theme of "multiple participation, negotiation and co-governance", actively explores the management model of "party building + autonomy + negotiation" in non-property communities, and successfully opens up the non-property community The "blocking point" of community governance has effectively improved the happiness and satisfaction of the masses. Focusing on party building to lead Huinong District Adhering to the leadership of community governance by party building, giving play to the leading role of community party organizations in taking the lead and coordinating all parties, and continuously improving the ability of community party organizations to direct direction, make decisions, unify resources, and strengthen services in community governance . Establish the organizational structure of "community party committee - community party branch - building party group - party member central household", implement the system of "dual report and double registration", party member packaged households, party member point management and other systems, and promote community party organizations to extend the tentacles of party building work, Lay the foundation for the party organization to lead the masses, publicize the masses, unite the masses, and serve the masses. The Party branch of the park community played the role of a fighting fortress, coordinated and solved the heating contradiction of the old neighborhood community, and did practical things for the community residents; Huixi community, through the working mechanism of party members’ package and household cooperation under the leadership of the community party organization, better solved the problem of 38 districts under its jurisdiction. There are no management issues in old residential areas, allowing residents to benefit from community governance. Develop "red property" Huinong District guides the community party branch to create "red property" through the method of "two-way entry and cross-serving". The district adopts the operation mode of "Party Branch + Owner's Committee Preparatory Group", and includes members of the community "two committees", old party members, and building bosses who are willing to contribute, have a certain spare time, and have a strong ability to perform their duties. Candidates are planning to set up a "red industry committee" to lay a solid foundation for the introduction of standardized management of property companies in non-property communities. At present, 22 new owners' committees have been established in the district, and 6 residential property companies including Linghang Xinyuan Community and Zhongjie Community have been introduced to manage them. For communities that do not have the ability to introduce property management for the time being, under the leadership of the community party organization, precise policy implementation, classified governance, and exploration and implementation of four management modes: community escrow, social organization service, owner committee autonomy, and residents' self-service have achieved the realization of no property management. The goal of the community is that "the garbage will be cleaned, the sanitation will be cleaned, and the community will be managed". Focus on "discussion and negotiation" In order to strengthen the tripartite negotiation and communication between the community, the property committee and the property management company, Huinong District relies on the "Party and Mass Tongxin Garden", "Red Housekeeper's Council", "Pomegranate Pavilion Roundtable", "Community Bench Meeting" and other community discussions The platform, formulate the residents' discussion system, and convene community party organizations, residents' committees, property companies, owners' committees, social organizations, co-construction units and other community governance parties to conduct regular discussions and consultations. It is up to the residents to decide. Through discussion and consultation, the district has solved a large number of problems closely related to residents' life, such as renovation of old residential areas, water supply and heating, garbage removal and transportation. For example, during the implementation of the government's old community renovation project, Zhongjie Community widely listened to residents' opinions and suggestions through the "branch courtyard", and revised and improved the construction plan to make the government's livelihood project more in line with public opinion; "The Residents' Council has built a bridge for communication between residents and property service companies, and the level of property services has been effectively improved; Qiaoxi Community regularly holds a "resident's council" every month, which has resolved the distress and worries around a group of residents. Digging deeper and co-constructing Hui Nong District vigorously promoted the "one book and three orders", and deeply explored the advantages of co-resident and co-construction working mechanism. Each community signed 228 co-construction agreements with co-construction units, and sorted out the list of community co-construction and co-governance resources. The list of governance needs and service items will effectively connect various service resources in the community with the needs of the masses, integrate them organically, gather regional joint efforts, and form a community “whistle blowing” and department “reporting” mechanism. Through the "Friday Volunteer Service Day" in the whole district, in-service party members and volunteers went deep into the community and buildings to clean up the sanitary corners and small advertisements in the corridors and improve the environmental sanitation of the non-property community. At present, a total of more than 1,800 in-service party members have reported to the community one after another. The co-construction units actively participate in the co-construction and co-governance of the community, install leisure seats, add charging piles, set up barrier-free passages, maintain activity rooms, renovate landscape water systems, donate cultural and sports facilities, etc. Solve puzzles.

title: 甘肃：50万余套“无证房”有“户口”了
text:
拿到房屋不动产权证书的一刻，65岁的兰州市民李先生内心五味杂陈。“7年的等待总算有了结果，了却了我一桩难心事。”李先生说。
李先生家住甘肃省兰州市城关区亚太国际公馆。该楼盘2010年建成并面向社会销售，由于地产开发易主，土地出让金缴纳陷入纠纷，房产证迟迟办不下来。2014年，李先生购买了这里的房产。自此，他也和其他业主一样，开始了漫长焦灼的等待。
业主们的期盼在今年有了回音。7月中旬，工作人员开始上门丈量房屋面积。之后申报资料、核定、缴税……李先生终于拿到了苦盼多年的不动产权证书。
因历史遗留问题导致的不动产“登记难”影响群众落户、子女入学、房产买卖，是群众反映强烈的烦心事、揪心事。今年以来，甘肃省聚焦这一难题，全面摸排、研判分析，厘清政府部门、开发建设主体和购房人责任，简化办理程序，明确任务时限，综合运用法律、市场等多种手段攻坚，最大限度保障群众财产权利。
截至目前，甘肃省累计发现涉及“登记难”问题房屋81万余套，化解50万余套，化解率超六成。
不动产“登记难”问题存量大的兰州市，通过推行“证缴分离”“证改分离”“证审分离”，将群众不动产权证办理和企业税费征缴、专项验收等区分开来、同步推进，提高办理效率。嘉峪关市采取设立服务专窗、下沉项目小区现场受理、开辟“绿色通道”、为行动不便人群提供上门服务或协调社区集中代办等方式，确保群众不动产登记“即来即办”。
甘肃省自然资源厅相关负责人表示，下一步还将加快推进问题化解，不让群众为历史遗留问题“买单”。
■新华社兰州12月13日电
en_title: Gansu: More than 500,000 "unlicensed houses" have "hukou"
en_text: The moment he got the real estate certificate of the house, Mr. Li, a 65-year-old Lanzhou citizen, had mixed feelings in his heart. "The 7-year wait has finally come to fruition, but I have a difficult problem." Mr. Li said. Mr. Li lives in Asia Pacific International Mansion, Chengguan District, Lanzhou City, Gansu Province. The building was completed in 2010 and was sold to the public. Due to the change of owners in real estate development, the payment of land transfer fees fell into disputes, and the real estate certificate was delayed. In 2014, Mr. Li purchased the property here. Since then, he, like other owners, has started a long and anxious wait. The expectations of the owners have echoed this year. In mid-July, the staff began to measure the area of the house. After that, declaration of materials, verification, and tax payment... Mr. Li finally got the real estate certificate that he had been waiting for for many years. The "difficulty in registration" of real estate caused by the problems left over from history affects people's settlement, children's schooling, and real estate sales. Since the beginning of this year, Gansu Province has focused on this problem, comprehensively surveyed, researched and analyzed, clarified the responsibilities of government departments, development and construction entities and house buyers, simplified handling procedures, clarified the time limit for tasks, and comprehensively used legal, market and other means to tackle difficulties to maximize protection. People's property rights. Up to now, Gansu Province has found more than 810,000 houses involving "difficulty in registration", and resolved more than 500,000 houses, with a resolution rate of over 60%. Lanzhou City, which has a large stock of real estate "difficulty in registration" problems, has implemented "separation of certificate payment", "separation of certificate reform" and "separation of certificate review" to separate and synchronize the processing of real estate property certificates for the masses, the collection of corporate taxes and fees, and special inspection and acceptance. Promoting and improving the efficiency. Jiayuguan City has adopted methods such as setting up special service windows, accepting on-site projects in submerged project communities, opening up "green channels", providing door-to-door services for people with disabilities, or coordinating centralized agencies in the community to ensure that the real estate registration of the masses is "immediately done". The relevant person in charge of the Natural Resources Department of Gansu Province said that the next step will be to accelerate the resolution of the problem and prevent the masses from "paying" for the problems left over from history. ■Xinhua News Agency, Lanzhou, December 13th

title:
安徽省亳州市
完善政策措施保障民生底线
text:
本报讯  今年以来，安徽省亳州市民政局以推进巩固拓展脱贫攻坚成果同乡村振兴有效衔接、推动构建分层分类的社会救助体系为重点，不断健全完善政策措施，扎实做好基本民生保障各项工作。


亳州市民政局与市扶贫开发局联合印发《亳州市巩固拓展民政领域脱贫攻坚成果同乡村振兴有效衔接的实施方案》《关于开展巩固社会救助兜底脱贫成果“回头看”的通知》，在保持民政兜底保障政策整体稳定的基础上，优化政策供给，推动建立健全低保对象动态管理、低收入人口动态监测预警、主动发现快速响应、低收入人口分层分类救助帮扶四项机制，开展低保对象精准分类和识别大排查。


印发《亳州市改革完善社会救助制度的若干措施》，制定了23项政策措施，建立健全分层分类的救助制度体系。制定《亳州市最低生活保障工作操作规程》，完善低保审核确认办法，低保“单人户”政策覆盖范围进一步扩大。出台《亳州市特困人员认定办法》，适当放宽认定条件，使困难群体基本生活得到更有效的保障。印发《亳州市临时救助工作操作规程》，推行临时救助备用金制度，落实先行救助，一次审批、分阶段救助，跟进救助等措施，提高了临时救助的时效性。


扎实做好特殊群体关爱服务保障工作，成立了亳州市未成年人保护工作委员会，全市4所救助站均设有未成年人救助保护中心，联合12345市长热线开设未成年人保护专栏，及时受理侵害未成年人权益的投诉，更加快捷有效地为未成年人提供救助保护。开展“事实无人抚养儿童助学工程”，共募得助学金38.4万元，资助事实无人抚养儿童49人。（胡月琴）
en_title: Bozhou City, Anhui Province Improves Policies and Measures to Ensure the Bottom Line of People's Livelihood
en_text: Since the beginning of this year, the Civil Affairs Bureau of Bozhou, Anhui Province has focused on promoting the effective connection between the consolidation and expansion of poverty alleviation achievements and rural revitalization, and promoting the construction of a hierarchical and classified social assistance system. item work. The Bozhou Civil Affairs Bureau and the Municipal Bureau of Poverty Alleviation and Development jointly issued the "Implementation Plan of Bozhou City to Consolidate and Expand the Achievements of Poverty Alleviation in Civil Affairs and the Effective Linkage of Rural Revitalization" and the "Notice on "Looking Back" on Consolidating Social Assistance and Alleviating Poverty Achievements. On the basis of the overall stability of the basic guarantee policy, optimize the supply of policies, promote the establishment and improvement of four mechanisms of dynamic management of subsistence allowances, dynamic monitoring and early warning of low-income population, active detection and rapid response, and stratified and classified assistance and assistance for low-income population, and carry out subsistence allowances. Object accurate classification and identification of large-scale investigation. The "Several Measures for Reforming and Improving the Social Assistance System in Bozhou City" was issued, and 23 policies and measures were formulated to establish and improve a hierarchical and classified assistance system. The "Working Regulations on Minimum Living Security in Bozhou City" was formulated, the methods for reviewing and confirming the minimum living allowance were improved, and the coverage of the "single-person household" policy on the minimum living allowance was further expanded. Promulgated the "Measures for the Identification of Extremely Poor Persons in Bozhou City" to appropriately relax the identification conditions, so that the basic life of the poor groups can be more effectively guaranteed. The "Operation Regulations for Temporary Relief Work in Bozhou City" was issued, and the temporary relief fund system was implemented, and measures such as first aid, one-time approval, staged aid, and follow-up aid were implemented, which improved the timeliness of temporary aid. We have done a solid job in ensuring the care and service of special groups. We have established the Bozhou Municipal Committee for the Protection of Minors. All 4 rescue stations in the city have set up centers for the protection of minors. We have set up a special column for the protection of minors in conjunction with the 12345 Mayor's Hotline, which can be accepted in a timely manner. Complaints against the rights and interests of minors, and provide assistance and protection to minors more quickly and effectively. Launched the "De facto Unsupported Children Education Project", raised a total of 384,000 yuan in grants, and subsidized 49 de facto unsupported children. (Hu Yueqin)

title: 高擎民族精神火炬 吹响时代前进号角
text:
(上接1版)文艺创作方法有一百条、一千条，但最根本、最关键、最牢靠的办法是扎根人民、扎根生活，要坚持以人民为中心的创作导向。
    在弘扬中国精神方面，指出我们当代文艺更要把爱国主义作为文艺创作的主旋律，引导人民树立和坚持正确的历史观、民族观、国家观、文化观，增强做中国人的骨气和底气。
    在两个效益相统一方面，指出文艺不能在市场经济大潮中迷失方向，文艺不能当市场的奴隶，不要沾满了铜臭气。
    在弘扬中华优秀传统文化方面，指出坚守中华文化立场，坚持创造性转化、创新性发展，让收藏在博物馆里的文物、陈列在广阔大地上的遗产、书写在古籍里的文字都活起来。
    在文化走出去方面，指出创作更多体现中华文化精髓、反映中国人审美追求、传播当代中国价值观念、又符合世界进步潮流的优秀作品，让我国文艺以鲜明的中国特色、中国风格、中国气派屹立于世。
    ……
    思想的光芒，照耀着新时代中国文艺事业崭新航程。
    在波澜壮阔的改革实践中，习近平总书记谋篇布局、把脉问疾、破解难题，推动建立新时代文艺发展的政策体系，一项项关键政策密集推出——
    《中共中央关于繁荣发展社会主义文艺的意见》发布，为繁荣发展社会主义文艺事业勾画出清晰可行的路线图。
    《关于实施中华优秀传统文化传承发展工程的意见》《关于支持戏曲传承发展的若干政策》《关于深化国有文艺院团改革的意见》等出台，从建设社会主义文化强国、增强国家文化软实力、实现中华民族伟大复兴中国梦的高度，对中华优秀传统文化传承发展工作作出重要部署，一系列“真金白银”的扶持政策，令文艺界倍感振奋。
    《关于全国性文艺评奖制度改革的意见》《关于推动国有文化企业把社会效益放在首位、实现社会效益和经济效益相统一的指导意见》《关于加强新时代文艺评论工作的指导意见》……文艺新政激浊扬清，导向更加鲜明，风清气正的文艺环境和行业生态逐渐形成。
    在习近平总书记重要论述指引下，广大文艺工作者奋力投身伟大斗争、伟大工程、伟大事业、伟大梦想的生动实践，回应人民需求、回答时代课题，以文艺高质量发展为民族复兴千秋伟业贡献刚健厚重、质朴先进的精神文化力量。
    举精神旗帜、立精神支柱、建精神家园。从纪念抗战胜利70周年文艺晚会《胜利与和平》、庆祝中国共产党成立95周年音乐会《信念永恒》，到庆祝改革开放40周年文艺晚会《我们的四十年》、庆祝中华人民共和国成立70周年文艺晚会《奋斗吧  中华儿女》、庆祝中国共产党成立100周年文艺演出《伟大征程》……近年来，围绕党和国家重要时间节点举办的一系列重大文艺活动，以充溢爱国情怀、民族气概、英雄气节的强大正能量，奏响民族复兴路上一个又一个强音。
    2021年6月28日晚，“鸟巢”上空，绚烂的焰火升腾绽放，化作“100”的纪年字样，掌声欢呼声响彻夜空……中国文艺用华美篇章，深情礼赞党的百年华诞。文艺演出《伟大征程》热忱诠释着文艺工作者与党同心、与民同心的坚定信念。习近平总书记等领导同志同全场观众齐声高唱：“没有共产党就没有新中国……”
    冬日的阳光洒向气势恢宏的中国共产党历史展览馆。馆前广场，大型党旗雕塑《旗帜》气势如虹，《信仰》《伟业》《攻坚》《追梦》四组大型雕塑庄重、巍然。
    “展览馆建设要同中国共产党的精神相吻合，充分体现中国共产党百年奋斗的历史和其中蕴含的伟大奋斗精神，反映中国共产党人筚路蓝缕、顽强奋斗的伟大历程”——牢记习近平总书记的重要指示，全国美术工作者齐心协力，精心创作完成了这项重大主题雕塑工程。
    习近平总书记高度重视中华优秀传统文化保护传承发展工作，多次考察并作出重要指示。在山东曲阜考察，提出对历史文化特别是先人传承下来的道德规范，要坚持古为今用、推陈出新，有鉴别地加以对待，有扬弃地予以继承；在甘肃考察，到敦煌莫高窟了解文化传承和文物保护；来到西安博物院，关心的第一个问题就是小雁塔的保护；置身广州市荔湾区西关历史文化街区永庆坊，走进粤剧艺术博物馆，勉励票友把粤剧传承好发扬好；在福建朱熹园指出，如果没有中华五千年文明，哪里有什么中国特色？……一次次寻访传统、触摸信仰，展现着习近平总书记守护中华民族文化根脉的历史自觉和文化自信。
    在习近平总书记亲自关怀和大力倡导下，中华优秀传统文化传承发展工程深入实施。图书《平“语”近人——习近平总书记用典》版权输出30多个语种，系列图书《中华优秀传统文化百部经典》深受读者欢迎，电视节目《中国诗词大会》《典籍里的中国》《中国考古大会》《记住乡愁》海内外热播，剪纸蜀绣等非遗技艺助力脱贫，年画社戏等传统民俗展现生机，国潮文创、古风汉服等成为时尚……中华优秀传统文化日益融入社会生活、走进百姓日常。
    深情关怀，殷殷嘱托
    ——习近平总书记立足文艺战线生机勃勃长远发展，引导广大文艺工作者把艺术理想融入党和人民事业，为中华民族伟大复兴凝心聚力
    一幕幕情深意切的交友交心，传递着习近平总书记对文艺事业的真诚炽热，一回回悉心引导、关怀备至，彰显着习近平总书记对文艺工作者的深情厚爱——
    和路遥交朋友，从彼此的长谈中增进对文学的见解；撰写散文《忆大山》，动情回忆与贾大山亦师亦友的深厚情谊……
    以作家柳青“对陕西关中农民生活有深入了解，所以笔下的人物才那样栩栩如生”的生动事例，鞭策文艺工作者要从人民的伟大实践和丰富多彩的生活中汲取营养。
    给耄耋之年加入中国共产党的电影表演艺术家牛犇写信，勉励他“继续在从艺做人上作表率，带动更多文艺工作者做有信仰、有情怀、有担当的人”。
    给中央美术学院8位老教授回信，激励他们“做好美育工作，要坚持立德树人，扎根时代生活，遵循美育特点，弘扬中华美育精神，让祖国青年一代身心都健康成长”。
    给中国戏曲学院师生回信，勉励他们“在教学相长中探寻艺术真谛，在服务人民中砥砺从艺初心”。
    为94岁高龄的表演艺术家蓝天野颁授“七一勋章”，亲切地说：“蓝老，你的很多戏我都看过。难得你这么大岁数，还在工作。”
    蔚蓝的天空下，紫红色的蒙古舞袍随风漫卷，马头琴琴声悠扬飘荡，内蒙古的广袤草原上，一支支乌兰牧骑为群众唱响动人牧歌。60多年来，乌兰牧骑队员们始终扎根生活沃土、服务牧民群众。
    2017年11月，习近平总书记在给内蒙古自治区苏尼特右旗乌兰牧骑队员们回信中深情写道，“乌兰牧骑的长盛不衰表明，人民需要艺术，艺术也需要人民。”这封回信，不仅鼓舞着苏尼特右旗乌兰牧骑队员们励志把最好的表演献给牧民，永远做草原上的“红色文艺轻骑兵”，更激励着广大文艺工作者始终将目光投向祖国的山川大地，扎根人民、扎根生活，为人民提供更好更多的精神食粮。
    谨记总书记嘱托和期待，广大文艺工作者心怀“国之大者”，以充沛的激情、细腻的笔触、优美的旋律、动人的形象，展现时代变迁、反映多彩生活，新时代文艺工作更加贴近人民的时代需求，不断激发文化自信，振奋民族精神。
    记录时代——疫情汹涌，中国摄影家协会迅速组建小分队奔赴武汉，用“为天使造像”重大摄影工程保存下国家和民族的特殊记忆；战争史诗电影《长津湖》弘扬伟大抗美援朝精神，夺得中国影史票房冠军、全球年度票房冠军；《新的天地》《天耀中华》《灯火里的中国》等“中国梦”主题新创作歌曲广为传唱……文艺经典构筑起时代的精神坐标。
    聚焦现实——《乡村国是》《十八洞村的十八个故事》等报告文学力作真实而生动地讲述中国脱贫攻坚故事；《我和我的祖国》系列三部曲以及《攀登者》《中国医生》《山海情》《大江大河》《鸡毛飞上天》等现实题材优秀影视剧“圈粉”无数；《人世间》《云中记》《经山海》等一大批“中国好书”从不同侧面反映中国社会沧桑巨变……文艺工作者走入生活深处，用心用情用功抒写精彩的中国故事。
    礼赞英雄——舞剧《永不消逝的电波》创新形式再现为我党民族解放事业而壮烈牺牲的英雄形象，被观众称为“又美又燃又好哭”；河北梆子《李保国》讲述35年如一日奋战在脱贫攻坚和科技创新第一线的感人事迹；复排民族歌剧《党的女儿》将革命精神表现得淋漓尽致。
    服务人民——一批批优秀文艺工作者积极参加“到人民中去”“送欢乐下基层”等志愿服务活动，深入400多个地市、区、县，累计培训基层文艺骨干20余万人；全国电影银幕数五年来增长4万多块，持续向农村基层下沉，更好服务观众观影；公共文化服务不断创新，2020年各地博物馆推出2000余个线上展览，吸引超50亿人次浏览。
    走向世界——广大文艺工作者遵循习近平总书记的重要指示，放眼全球，自信地与世界对话。大型舞剧《大梦敦煌》亮相德国、意大利、新加坡等国，以精彩的视听盛宴，让外国观众感知中华文明的底蕴；昆剧《临川四梦》巡演欧洲，《情满丝路》中国杂技武术专场演出走出国门，让海外友人了解中华文化的多彩；《流浪地球》《急先锋》等电影出口全球五大洲150多个国家和地区取得良好票房；1万余部中国网络文学作品成功出海……奋力抒写多彩的中国、进步的中国，中国文艺获得越来越多国外受众的关注与喜爱。
    高擎民族精神火炬，吹响时代前进号角。
    在习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想指引下，新时代的文艺工作者必将不忘初心、勇担使命，以文艺繁荣的壮阔盛景和振奋人心的优秀作品，不负党的重托、无愧伟大时代！
    新华社记者 王思北 周玮 施雨岑 史竞男
    （新华社北京12月13日电）
en_title: Holding the torch of the national spirit and blowing the horn of the times
en_text: (Continued from the first edition) There are one hundred and one thousand methods of literary and artistic creation, but the most fundamental, critical, and most reliable method is to take root in the people and life, and adhere to the people-centered creative orientation. In carrying forward the Chinese spirit, it is pointed out that our contemporary literature and art should take patriotism as the main theme of literature and art creation, guide the people to establish and adhere to the correct view of history, nation, country, and culture, and strengthen the backbone and confidence of being Chinese. In terms of the unity of the two benefits, it is pointed out that literature and art should not lose their way in the tide of the market economy, literature and art should not be slaves of the market, and should not be stained with the stench of copper. In promoting the excellent traditional Chinese culture, it is pointed out that we will stick to the standpoint of Chinese culture, insist on creative transformation and innovative development, and make the cultural relics collected in museums, the heritage displayed on the vast land, and the words written in ancient books all come alive. In terms of cultural going global, it is pointed out that the creation of more outstanding works that reflect the essence of Chinese culture, reflect the aesthetic pursuit of Chinese people, spread contemporary Chinese values, and conform to the trend of world progress, make Chinese literature and art with distinctive Chinese characteristics, Chinese style, and Chinese style. stand in the world. ... The light of thought shines on a new voyage of Chinese literature and art in the new era. In the magnificent reform practice, General Secretary Xi Jinping planned the layout, asked the pulse, solved the problems, and promoted the establishment of a policy system for the development of literature and art in the new era. "Opinions" was released, drawing a clear and feasible roadmap for the prosperity and development of socialist literary and artistic undertakings. The "Opinions on Implementing the Project for the Inheritance and Development of Chinese Excellent Traditional Culture", "Several Policies for Supporting the Inheritance and Development of Traditional Chinese Opera", "Opinions on Deepening the Reform of State-owned Art Troupes", etc. Realizing the height of the Chinese dream of the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation, making important arrangements for the inheritance and development of Chinese excellent traditional culture, and a series of "real money" support policies, the literary and art circles are very excited. "Opinions on the Reform of the National Literary and Art Award System", "Guiding Opinions on Promoting State-owned Cultural Enterprises to Put Social Benefits First and Realizing the Integration of Social and Economic Benefits", "Guiding Opinions on Strengthening the Work of Literature and Art Criticism in the New Era"... The new policy of literature and art has been intensified and clear, and the orientation has become more clear, and a clean and upright literature and art environment and industry ecology have gradually formed. Under the guidance of General Secretary Xi Jinping's important expositions, the vast number of literary and art workers strive to devote themselves to the vivid practice of great struggles, great projects, great causes and great dreams, respond to the needs of the people, answer the issues of the times, and contribute vigorously to the great cause of national rejuvenation with high-quality development of literature and art. Thick, simple and advanced spiritual and cultural power. Raise spiritual banners, establish spiritual pillars, and build spiritual homes. From the theatrical evening "Victory and Peace" to commemorate the 70th anniversary of the victory of the Anti-Japanese War, the concert "Eternal Faith" to celebrate the 95th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China, to the theatrical evening to celebrate the 40th anniversary of reform and opening up, "Our Forty Years", to celebrate the 70th anniversary of the founding of the People's Republic of China Theatrical evening "Struggle, Chinese Children", the theatrical performance "The Great Journey" to celebrate the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China... In recent years, a series of major literary and artistic activities have been held around important time points of the party and the country, full of patriotism, national spirit, heroic The strong positive energy of integrity plays one strong note after another on the road to national rejuvenation. On the evening of June 28, 2021, splendid fireworks rose and bloomed over the "Bird's Nest", turning into the words "100", and applause and cheers resounded in the night sky... Chinese literature and art use gorgeous chapters to praise the party's centenary. The theatrical performance "The Great Journey" enthusiastically interprets the firm belief that literary and art workers are of the same heart as the party and the people. General Secretary Xi Jinping and other leading comrades sang in unison with the audience: "Without the Communist Party, there will be no new China..." The winter sun shines on the magnificent Chinese Communist Party History Exhibition Hall. In the square in front of the museum, the large-scale party flag sculpture "Flag" is like a rainbow. "The construction of the exhibition hall must be in line with the spirit of the Communist Party of China, fully reflect the history of the Communist Party of China's century-long struggle and the great struggle spirit contained in it, and reflect the great journey of the Chinese Communists' struggle and perseverance." - Remember the important instructions of General Secretary Xi Jinping , art workers across the country made concerted efforts to carefully create and complete this major theme sculpture project. General Secretary Xi Jinping attaches great importance to the protection, inheritance and development of Chinese excellent traditional culture, and has made several inspections and made important instructions. During the inspection in Qufu, Shandong Province, it was proposed that the historical culture, especially the moral norms passed down by the ancestors, should be used for the present, the old should be used for the present, the old should be used for the present, the old should be used for the present, the old should be treated with distinction, and the inheritance should be inherited. Cultural relic protection; when I came to Xi'an Museum, the first issue I cared about was the protection of the Small Wild Goose Pagoda; I was in Yongqingfang, Xiguan Historical and Cultural District, Liwan District, Guangzhou, and walked into the Cantonese Opera Art Museum to encourage fans to inherit and carry forward Cantonese opera; Fujian Zhu Xiyuan pointed out that if there is no Chinese civilization for 5,000 years, how can there be any Chinese characteristics? ... The search for traditions and beliefs again and again shows General Secretary Xi Jinping's historical awareness and cultural confidence in protecting the cultural roots of the Chinese nation. Under the personal care and vigorous advocacy of General Secretary Xi Jinping, the project of inheritance and development of Chinese excellent traditional culture has been implemented in depth. The copyright of the book "Ping "Language" Approaching People - General Secretary Xi Jinping's Dictionary" is copyrighted and exported to more than 30 languages. The series of books "Hundred Classics of Chinese Excellent Traditional Culture" are well received by readers. "China", "China Archaeology Conference" and "Remember Nostalgia" are popular at home and abroad. Intangible cultural heritage techniques such as paper-cutting and Shu embroidery help alleviate poverty. Traditional folk customs such as New Year's painting clubs and operas show vitality. National trendy cultural creations and ancient Hanfu have become fashionable... Excellent traditional Chinese culture It is increasingly integrated into social life and into the daily life of the people. Affectionate care, earnest entrustment - General Secretary Xi Jinping is based on the vigorous and long-term development of the literary and art front, and guides the majority of literary and art workers to integrate artistic ideals into the cause of the party and the people, and unite for the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation. It conveys General Secretary Xi Jinping's sincerity and enthusiasm for the cause of literature and art, and he has carefully guided and cared for him again and again, showing General Secretary Xi Jinping's deep affection and love for literary and art workers - making friends with Lu Yao, and enhancing the understanding of literature from each other's long talks. Opinions; writing the prose "Remembering the Mountain", emotionally recalling the deep friendship with Jia Dashan, who is also a teacher and a friend... With the vivid example of the writer Liu Qing "having a deep understanding of the life of farmers in Guanzhong, Shaanxi, so the characters in the pen are so lifelike", spurred Literature and art workers must draw nourishment from the great practice and colorful life of the people. He wrote a letter to Niu Ben, a film performance artist who joined the Communist Party of China in his old age, and encouraged him to "continue to set an example in being an artist and a person, and drive more literary and art workers to be people with faith, feelings, and responsibilities." Reply to the eight old professors of the Central Academy of Fine Arts, inspiring them to "do a good job of aesthetic education, insist on building morality and cultivating people, take root in the life of the times, follow the characteristics of aesthetic education, carry forward the spirit of Chinese aesthetic education, and let the young generation of the motherland grow up physically and mentally". Reply to the teachers and students of the China Academy of Opera, encouraging them to "search for the true meaning of art in teaching and learning, and forge the original intention of art in serving the people". Awarded the "July 1st Medal" to the 94-year-old performing artist Lan Lan Ye, and said kindly: "Lao Lan, I have seen many of your plays. It is rare that you are so old and still working." Under the blue sky, The purple-red Mongolian dance robes rolled in the wind, and the sound of the horse head qin swayed melodiously. On the vast grasslands of Inner Mongolia, a branch of Wulan Muqi sang a moving pastoral song for the masses. For more than 60 years, the Ulan Raiders have always taken root in the fertile soil and served the herdsmen. In November 2017, General Secretary Xi Jinping wrote affectionately in his reply to the Ulan Muqi team members of the Sunite Right Banner, Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region, "The longevity of Wulan Muqi shows that the people need art, and art also needs the people. "This reply not only inspired the Ulan cavalry members of the Sunite Right Banner to give their best performances to the herdsmen, and to be the "red literary light cavalry" on the grassland forever, but also inspired the vast number of literary and art workers to always give their best performances. Focus on the mountains and rivers of the motherland, take root in the people, take root in life, and provide better and more spiritual food for the people. Bearing in mind the general secretary's entrustment and expectations, the vast number of literary and art workers have "the great man of the country" in their hearts, and show the changes of the times and reflect the colorful life with abundant passion, delicate brushwork, beautiful melody and moving image, and the literary and art work in the new era is closer. The needs of the people of the times constantly stimulate cultural self-confidence and invigorate the national spirit. Recording Era - The epidemic was raging, and the Chinese Photographers Association quickly formed a team to go to Wuhan to save the special memory of the country and the nation with the major photography project of "Making a Statue of Angels"; He has won the box office champion in Chinese film history and the global annual box office champion; Newly composed songs with the theme of "Chinese Dream" such as "New World", "Tian Yao China" and "China in the Lights" are widely sung... Literature and art classics build the spiritual coordinates of the times. Focus on reality - reportage masterpieces such as "Country Country" and "Eighteen Stories of Shibadong Village" truly and vividly tell the story of China's poverty alleviation; the series trilogy of "My Motherland and Me" and "The Climber" "Chinese Doctor", "Shan Hai Qing", "Big River", "Chicken Feather Flying to the Sky" and other excellent film and television dramas with realistic themes have countless fans; "The World", "The Story of the Clouds", "The Classic of Mountains and Seas" and a large number of "Chinese Good Books" Reflecting the vicissitudes of Chinese society from different aspects... Literature and art workers go deep into their lives and write wonderful Chinese stories with their hearts and emotions. Praise for Heroes - The innovative form of the dance drama "The Eternal Wave" reproduces the heroic image of heroic sacrifice for our party's national liberation cause, which is called "beautiful, burning and crying" by the audience; Hebei Bangzi's "Li Baoguo" tells about 35 years Such as the touching deeds of fighting poverty alleviation and the front line of technological innovation; the revival of the national opera "The Party's Daughter" shows the revolutionary spirit vividly. Serving the people - batches of outstanding literary and art workers actively participated in volunteer service activities such as "going to the people" and "sending joy to the grassroots", reaching more than 400 cities, districts and counties, and accumulatively training more than 200,000 grass-roots literary and art backbones ; The number of movie screens nationwide has increased by more than 40,000 in the past five years, and it has continued to sink to the rural grassroots to better serve audiences to watch movies; public cultural services continue to innovate. In 2020, museums around the country will launch more than 2,000 online exhibitions, attracting more than 5 billion people. Browse. Going to the world - the majority of literary and art workers follow the important instructions of General Secretary Xi Jinping, look at the world, and confidently communicate with the world. The large-scale dance drama "Dunhuang Dream" appeared in Germany, Italy, Singapore and other countries, with a wonderful audio-visual feast, allowing foreign audiences to perceive the heritage of Chinese civilization; Kun Opera "Linchuan Four Dreams" toured Europe, "Love Full Silk Road" Chinese acrobatics Special martial arts performances went abroad to let overseas friends understand the colorfulness of Chinese culture; films such as "The Wandering Earth" and "Pioneer" were exported to more than 150 countries and regions on five continents and achieved good box office; more than 10,000 Chinese online literature works were successfully sold overseas... …Strive to describe a colorful China and a progressive China, and Chinese literature and art have gained more and more attention and love from foreign audiences. Hold high the torch of national spirit and sound the clarion call for the advancement of the times. Under the guidance of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, literary and art workers in the new era will never forget their original aspirations and shoulder their mission bravely. era! Xinhua News Agency reporter Wang Sibei Zhou Wei Shi Yucen Shi Jingnan (Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, December 13)

title: 中国节能与中国民生银行签署战略合作协议
text:
12月15日，中国节能与中国民生银行在节能大厦签署战略合作协议。集团公司党委书记、董事长宋鑫，中国民生银行党委副书记、副董事长、行长郑万春出席签约仪式。集团公司党委常委、总会计师朱庆锋，民生银行党委委员、副行长石杰分别代表双方签署协议。
签约仪式前，双方就深化合作进行了会谈。宋鑫介绍了中国节能的发展历程及取得的成就，希望双方围绕国家“十四五”战略规划以及碳达峰、碳中和目标，加大绿色金融合作，拓宽合作领域，共同推动经济社会绿色高质量发展。郑万春表示，期待双方在良好合作基础上，为中国节能提供更加多元化的金融产品服务，发挥各自优势，开展更加深入合作。
双方有关部门和子公司负责人参加签约仪式。
