en_title: China Energy Conservation and China Minsheng Bank signed a strategic cooperation agreement
en_text: On December 15, CECEP and China Minsheng Bank signed a strategic cooperation agreement in the Energy Conservation Building. Song Xin, secretary of the party committee and chairman of the group company, and Zheng Wanchun, deputy secretary of the party committee, vice chairman and president of China Minsheng Bank, attended the signing ceremony. Zhu Qingfeng, member of the Standing Committee of the Party Committee and Chief Accountant of the group company, and Shi Jie, member of the Party Committee and Vice President of Minsheng Bank, signed the agreement on behalf of both parties. Before the signing ceremony, the two sides held talks on deepening cooperation. Song Xin introduced the development history and achievements of CECEP. He hoped that the two sides will focus on the national "14th Five-Year Plan" strategic plan and the goals of carbon peaking and carbon neutrality, increase green financial cooperation, expand cooperation fields, and jointly promote economic and social green development. high-quality development. Zheng Wanchun expressed his expectation that on the basis of good cooperation, the two parties will provide CECEP with more diversified financial products and services, give full play to their respective advantages, and carry out more in-depth cooperation. The heads of relevant departments and subsidiaries of both parties attended the signing ceremony. Author: Liao Zhican Photographer: Xu Fanqi Editor in charge:

title: 胸怀家国　担当作为 ——企业家精神述评
text:
穿越历史长河，中华民族始终生生不息，背后是一代又一代人的顽强拼搏。无数奋斗者中，一大批具有鲜明时代特征、民族特色、世界水准的企业家，胸怀家国，担当作为，在波澜壮阔的历史画卷中书写下企业家精神的华彩篇章。
    习近平总书记强调：“要千方百计把市场主体保护好，激发市场主体活力，弘扬企业家精神，推动企业发挥更大作用实现更大发展，为经济发展积蓄基本力量。”
    精神照亮前路，梦想铸就辉煌。与时俱进的企业家精神正激励广大企业家攻坚克难、勇攀高峰，奋力谱写新时代发展新篇章。
    心中有家国
    云南畹町，南洋华侨机工回国抗日纪念碑巍然屹立，无声诉说着80多年前那段可歌可泣的峥嵘岁月。
    抗战全面爆发后，著名华侨领袖陈嘉庚不仅捐献巨款，而且在他的号召下，3000多名华侨机工毅然回国，奔赴滇缅公路，运送抗战物资，1000多名华侨机工牺牲在这条公路上。
    主动为国担当、为国分忧——这是优秀企业家对国家、对民族的崇高使命感和强烈责任感。他们在国家危难之际、人民需要之时，挺身而出，奉献自我，为抗战胜利作出了重要贡献。
    时间来到2020年，病毒突袭而至，新冠肺炎疫情来势汹汹，人民生命安全和身体健康面临严重威胁。一方有难，八方支援。各行各业扛起责任，国企、民企并肩而行，奋战在疫情防控和复工复产一线。
    中国建筑在10天、12天内分别完成火神山、雷神山医院建设任务；卓尔控股联合专业机构火速建立多家应急医院；中远海运、中粮集团、顺丰、京东等企业昼夜不息，全力打好后勤保障战；石油石化、电网电力等国企疫情期间不停工，信息技术、装备制造等民企以“点”带“链”有序复工复产……
    企业家精神，在大考中淬炼；家国情怀，在磨砺中升华。
    中国共产党百年华诞之际，中华民族迎来又一个历史时刻——习近平总书记代表党和人民庄严宣告，在中华大地上全面建成了小康社会，历史性地解决了绝对贫困问题。
    在这场伟大的反贫困斗争中，有着坚定信念的企业冲锋在前，勇于担当。
    ——各尽所能。中央企业结对帮扶240多个国家扶贫开发工作重点县，民营企业“万企帮万村”，合力将人、财、物等资源向最需要的地方汇集。
    ——各展所长。通过产业扶贫、健康扶贫、文化扶贫等，带动贫困户脱贫增收，强健身心；创新金融保险产品等，为帮扶地区经济社会发展保驾护航……
    从全面抗战到全力抗疫，再到脱贫攻坚、决胜全面建成小康社会，历史奔腾向前，企业家精神历久弥新，持续迸发出强大力量。
    敢为天下先
    1982年的一天，浙江萧山召开千人大会传达中央精神。台上说“乡镇企业可以实行承包制”，台下有人立刻站起来大声说：“我要承包！”他是37岁的鲁冠球。
    1983年，鲁冠球向乡里承包了万向节厂，这是万向集团的前身。如今，万向集团已发展成年营收超千亿元的企业，转型步伐不断加快，深入布局新能源产业。
    “蕴藏之以致用，是可以舍之则藏的。”改革开放以来，广大企业家敢想敢闯、敢为天下先，大力弘扬创新精神，为我国经济发展取得举世瞩目成就贡献了重要力量。
    创新是企业发展的不竭动力。习近平总书记曾勉励企业“要有志气和骨气加快增强自主创新能力和实力”。
    在一粒米上铣出56个汉字，在一根头发丝上铣出7个字母……中钨高新金洲公司瞄准世界科技前沿，成功研制直径0.01毫米的极小径铣刀，将极大助力电子信息、医疗等领域提质升级。
    从无到有、从弱到强，拼出一片天地——这是中国企业创新发展的一个生动缩影，更是其助力经济高质量发展的真实写照。
    回首新中国建立初期，我国重工业几乎为零，轻工业只是少量的纺织业，人们日常用的是“洋火”“洋油”“洋钉”。
    新中国成立不久，我国就建立起独立的比较完整的工业体系和国民经济体系。在迈入新时代的今天，我国已成为世界第二大经济体。
    创新释放活力，创新赢得发展。一个个数字印证着中国企业的勃勃生机，彰显创新主体地位。从7.6万家到27.5万家！——“十三五”期间全国高新技术企业数量大幅跃升；突破1.3万亿元！——2021中国企业500强研发投入规模节节攀升，研发强度创历史新高；创新指数排名连续9年稳步上升！——世界知识产权组织发布的报告显示，中国排名由2013年的第35位升至2021年的第12位……
    千千万万企业创新源泉涌流不停，创造活力竞相迸发，汇聚成推动经济发展的澎湃动能。
    奋勇争一流
    “时间就是金钱，效率就是生命。”1981年，这块巨型标语牌矗立在深圳蛇口工业区最显眼的地方。这十二个字，有着鲜明时代印记，是企业家精神在经济特区这方热土的生动呈现。
    新中国第一家由企业创办的股份制商业银行——招商银行，新中国第一家由企业创办的商业保险机构——平安保险，先后在蛇口成立。历经改革开放洗礼，如今两家企业都已经成长为世界500强企业，蛇口因此被称为“单位面积培育知名企业最多的地方”。
    岁月在变，传承不变。一代代有胆识、勇创新的创业者奋勇前行、争创一流。
    污水能供暖？听上去有些不可思议。然而这项技术在我国许多地区已得到应用和推广。
    作为专精特新“小巨人”企业，哈尔滨工大金涛科技公司多年来深耕清洁能源领域，从城市排污截留干渠内的污水里提取热能，把“温暖”送到居民家，目前为数十个城市提供取暖服务。相比使用煤炭，每年减少二氧化碳、二氧化硫等污染物排放超过470万吨。
    规模小，能量大。4762家国家级专精特新“小巨人”企业身怀绝技，越来越多的企业成为“单项冠军”“独角兽”，俨然一道亮丽的风景。有国外机构统计，2020年全球500多家“独角兽”企业中，我国大陆有112家，数量位居第二。
    企业不分大小，要做就做最好。一份《财富》世界500强榜单，见证中国企业的成长速度和雄心壮志——20年前，进入榜单的中国企业只有10余家，此后这一数字逐年攀升；2年前，中国企业以129家的数量首次登顶榜单；2021年，入围中国企业增加至143家，继续领跑。这是一道漂亮的上扬曲线。自1995年这份榜单开始发布以来，还没有任何一个别的国家或地区的企业如中国一样，以如此快的速度扩大其在榜单上的席位。
    关山万千重，山高人为峰。新征程上，机遇与挑战并存。我们相信，在企业家精神激励下，亿万市场主体必将凝聚起高质量发展的强大共识和磅礴力量，共创新时代的新辉煌。（谭谟晓）
en_title: Bearing in mind the responsibility of the country and the country - a review of entrepreneurial spirit
en_text: Across the long river of history, the Chinese nation has never ceased to exist, and behind it is the tenacious struggle of generations. Among the countless strugglers, a large number of entrepreneurs with distinctive characteristics of the times, national characteristics, and world-class standards, cherished their homeland and country, took responsibility, and wrote a colorful chapter of entrepreneurship in the magnificent historical picture. General Secretary Xi Jinping emphasized: "We must do everything possible to protect market players, stimulate the vitality of market players, promote entrepreneurship, promote enterprises to play a greater role and achieve greater development, and accumulate basic strength for economic development." Create brilliance. The entrepreneurial spirit of advancing with the times is motivating the vast number of entrepreneurs to overcome difficulties, climb the peak bravely, and strive to write a new chapter in the development of the new era. Home in my heart In Wanding, Yunnan, the monument to the return of overseas Chinese from Nanyang to fight against Japan stands majestically, silently telling the splendid years of more than 80 years ago. After the outbreak of the Anti-Japanese War, the famous overseas Chinese leader Tan Kah Kee not only donated huge sums of money, but under his call, more than 3,000 overseas Chinese mechanics resolutely returned to China and went to the Yunnan-Myanmar Highway to transport anti-Japanese war materials. More than 1,000 overseas Chinese mechanics died on this road. superior. Taking the initiative to take responsibility for the country and share its worries for the country - this is the lofty sense of mission and strong sense of responsibility of outstanding entrepreneurs to the country and the nation. When the country was in crisis and the people needed it, they stepped forward, dedicated themselves, and made important contributions to the victory of the War of Resistance. The time has come to 2020, the virus has attacked, the new crown pneumonia epidemic is menacing, and people's lives and health are facing serious threats. A difficult one, P Plus support. All walks of life have shouldered their responsibilities, and state-owned enterprises and private enterprises have walked side by side to fight the front line of epidemic prevention and control and resumption of work and production. China State Construction completed the construction tasks of Huoshenshan and Leishenshan hospitals in 10 days and 12 days respectively; Zall Holdings and professional institutions quickly established a number of emergency hospitals; COSCO SHIPPING, COFCO, SF Express, JD.com and other companies worked day and night to make good progress Logistics support war; state-owned enterprises such as petroleum and petrochemicals, power grids and electric power did not stop working during the epidemic, and private enterprises such as information technology and equipment manufacturing resumed work and production in an orderly manner with "points" and "chains"... Entrepreneurial spirit, tempered in the big test; home and country Feelings are sublimated in the tempering. On the occasion of the centennial anniversary of the Communist Party of China, the Chinese nation ushered in another historical moment—General Secretary Xi Jinping solemnly announced on behalf of the Party and the people that a moderately prosperous society has been built in all respects on the land of China, and the problem of absolute poverty has been solved historically. In this great anti-poverty struggle, companies with firm beliefs are charging forward and have the courage to take responsibility. - Do your best. Central enterprises have paired up to help more than 240 key counties in national poverty alleviation and development work, and private enterprises have "10,000 enterprises help 10,000 villages", working together to bring human, financial, material and other resources to the places where they are most needed. - Director of each exhibition. Through industrial poverty alleviation, health poverty alleviation, cultural poverty alleviation, etc., to drive poor households to get rid of poverty and increase income, strengthen fitness; innovate financial and insurance products, etc., to escort the economic and social development of the region... The decisive victory is to build a moderately prosperous society in an all-round way, the history is galloping forward, the entrepreneurial spirit is ever-lasting, and the strong force continues to emerge. Dare to be the first in the world One day in 1982, a thousand-person meeting was held in Xiaoshan, Zhejiang to convey the spirit of the central government. On the stage, "Township and village enterprises can implement the contract system." Someone in the audience immediately stood up and said loudly, "I want to contract!" He was 37-year-old Lu Guanqiu. In 1983, Lu Guanqiu contracted the Wanxiang Joint Factory, the predecessor of Wanxiang Group. Today, Wanxiang Group has developed into an enterprise with an annual revenue of over 100 billion yuan. "What is hidden and used is what can be left behind and hidden." Since the reform and opening up, the vast number of entrepreneurs have dared to think, dare to forge ahead, dare to be the first in the world, vigorously promote the spirit of innovation, and have contributed an important force to the world-renowned achievements of my country's economic development. Innovation is the inexhaustible driving force for enterprise development. General Secretary Xi Jinping once encouraged enterprises to "have ambition and backbone to accelerate the enhancement of independent innovation capabilities and strength". Milling 56 Chinese characters on a grain of rice, and milling 7 letters on a single strand of hair... China Tungsten Hi-Tech Jinzhou Company aims at the forefront of world science and technology, and successfully developed a very small diameter milling cutter with a diameter of 0.01 mm, which will greatly help Quality upgrades in electronic information, medical and other fields. From scratch, from weak to strong, spelling out a world - this is a vivid epitome of the innovation and development of Chinese enterprises, and it is a true portrayal of their high-quality economic development. Looking back at the early days of the founding of New China, my country's heavy industry was almost zero, light industry was only a small amount of textile industry, and people used "foreign fire", "foreign oil" and "foreign nails" on a daily basis. Not long after the founding of New China, my country established an independent and relatively complete industrial system and national economic system. Entering a new era, my country has become the second largest economy in the world. Innovation releases vitality and innovation wins development. Each number confirms the vitality of Chinese enterprises and highlights the main position of innovation. From 76,000 to 275,000! ——During the "13th Five-Year Plan" period, the number of high-tech enterprises in the country jumped sharply; it exceeded 1.3 trillion yuan! ——The scale of R&D investment in the top 500 Chinese enterprises in 2021 has been rising steadily, and the R&D intensity has reached a record high; the ranking of innovation index has risen steadily for 9 consecutive years! ——The report released by the World Intellectual Property Organization shows that China's ranking has risen from the 35th in 2013 to the 12th in 2021... The innovation source of thousands of enterprises is constantly flowing, and the creative vitality is bursting out, converging to promote the economy The surging momentum of development. Strive to be first class "Time is money, efficiency is life." In 1981, this giant placard stood in the most conspicuous place in Shenzhen Shekou Industrial Zone. These 12 words have a distinct imprint of the times, and are a vivid presentation of entrepreneurial spirit in the special economic zone. China Merchants Bank, the first joint-stock commercial bank founded by an enterprise in New China, and Ping An Insurance, the first commercial insurance institution founded by an enterprise in New China, were successively established in Shekou. After the baptism of reform and opening up, both companies have grown into the world's top 500 companies, and Shekou is therefore known as "the place with the most well-known companies per unit area". The years are changing, but the inheritance remains the same. Entrepreneurs with courage and innovation from generation to generation forge ahead bravely and strive to be first-class. Can sewage be heated? It sounds incredible. However, this technology has been applied and promoted in many areas of our country. As a specialized and new "little giant" enterprise, Harbin Institute of Technology Jintao Technology Co., Ltd. has been deeply involved in the field of clean energy for many years, extracting heat energy from sewage in urban sewage interception trunk canals, and delivering "warmth" to residents' homes, currently serving dozens of cities. Heating service is provided. Compared with the use of coal, the emission of pollutants such as carbon dioxide and sulfur dioxide is reduced by more than 4.7 million tons per year. Small in scale, large in energy. 4,762 national-level specialized and special new "little giant" enterprises possess unique skills, and more and more enterprises have become "single champions" and "unicorns", just like a beautiful landscape. According to statistics from foreign institutions, among the more than 500 "unicorn" companies in the world in 2020, there are 112 in mainland my country, ranking second in number. Enterprises, regardless of size, do what they do best. A Fortune Global 500 list, witnessing the growth rate and ambition of Chinese companies - 20 years ago, there were only more than 10 Chinese companies on the list, and the number has risen year by year since then; two years ago, Chinese companies The number of 129 companies topped the list for the first time; in 2021, the number of shortlisted Chinese companies will increase to 143, continuing to lead. This is a nice upward curve. Since the list was published in 1995, no company from any other country or region has expanded its presence on the list at such a rapid rate as China. Guanshan has thousands of weights, and the heights of the mountains are man-made peaks. On the new journey, opportunities and challenges coexist. We believe that under the inspiration of entrepreneurial spirit, hundreds of millions of market players will surely gather a strong consensus and mighty force for high-quality development, and jointly create new glory in the new era. (Tan Moxiao)

title: 洗煤专业化管理走稳走实
text:
□商霞 陈洪瑞 牛群

今年1至10月，山东能源新矿集团累计炼焦精煤产率71.67%，同比升高3.18%。这两个数据十分亮眼。
按照新矿集团“精煤增收”战略部署要求，洗煤分公司对各洗煤厂持续深化一体化运营，实施技改升级和管理融合，取得明显经济效益。
“我们加快落实专家会诊重点技改项目，推动了精煤产率稳中上升，增强了企业核心竞争力。”洗煤分公司副总工程师、技术研发部主任许光前说。根据生产实际，他们潜心攻关“重介不背灰”、煤泥深加工、中煤深加工等国内前沿技术，向极致化迈进，为各矿井提供优质洗选服务。
中心、协庄洗煤厂煤泥深加工项目运行保持连续稳定。其中，协庄洗煤厂高硫、高灰精煤产率分别上升5.62%、3.71%，中心洗煤厂不同煤层的精煤产率提高1.23%―4.29%，实现煤泥“吃干榨净”，彻底解决了重介背灰问题。
新巨龙、良庄洗煤厂重介质旋流器结构优化技改效果喜人。其中，新巨龙洗煤厂一段重介分选效率提高2%、二段重介分选效率提高10%，良庄洗煤厂实现精煤磁尾直接回收，减少了重复分选。
华丰、孙村等5家洗煤厂叠层筛深度脱泥项目顺利完成，粗精煤泥灰分降低1%―3%。中心、长城三矿洗煤厂螺旋排矸项目完成后，中煤发热量提高700―1200大卡。
翟镇、长城一矿洗煤厂二次浮选技改项目施工有序推进。孙村、华丰、协庄洗煤厂浮选改造成功，良庄洗煤厂浮选改造加快推进。
“我们深化精益管理，构建实施安全、生产、机电等8个方面标准，最大化发挥协同优势。”许光前介绍说，通过落地实施“5×4”选煤全流程过程管理清单，实现洗煤生产控制全流程管理。
搭建技术共享平台，每月邀请行业专家授课，实施内部创新共享。开展月度“小微创新”评比，激发基层创新活力，1―10月评出小微创新170项。
开展机电会诊，推广“四新”技术，围绕“劳动减量”解决现场难题。实施大宗物资统一管理，统一验收标准和流程，今年以来介质消耗比2020年降低0.16千克/吨。
自10月开始，内蒙区域中心洗煤厂、长城一矿洗煤厂、长城三矿洗煤厂组织开展“小指标竞赛”活动，将产品质量及产率、大宗物资消耗等纳入竞赛项目，以赛促学、以学促用，深入挖掘选煤增收创效潜能。
“‘精煤增收’战略，须持续深化！”洗煤分公司总工程师王军表示，下一步要致力于更高标准、更高质量、更高效率，进一步深化洗煤专业化管理，确保实现“选煤极致增收”。
en_title: Coal washing professional management is stable and solid
en_text: □Shangxia Chen Hongrui Niu Qun From January to October this year, Shandong Energy New Mining Group's cumulative coking clean coal yield was 71.67%, a year-on-year increase of 3.18%. These two figures are very eye-catching. In accordance with the strategic deployment requirements of the "clean coal income increase" of the New Mining Group, the coal washing branch continued to deepen the integrated operation of each coal washing plant, implemented technical upgrading and management integration, and achieved significant economic benefits. "We have accelerated the implementation of key technical transformation projects for expert consultation, which has promoted a steady increase in the yield of clean coal and enhanced the core competitiveness of the company," said Xu Guangqian, deputy chief engineer of the Coal Washing Branch and director of the Technology R&D Department. According to the actual production, they have devoted themselves to tackling key domestic cutting-edge technologies such as "heavy media without ash", coal slime deep processing, and medium-sized coal deep processing, striving to the extreme, and providing high-quality washing services for all mines. The operation of the coal slime deep processing project of the Center and Xiezhuang Coal Washing Plant remained continuous and stable. Among them, the yields of high-sulfur and high-ash clean coal in the Xiezhuang Coal Washing Plant increased by 5.62% and 3.71% respectively, and the clean coal yields of different coal seams in the Central Coal Washing Plant increased by 1.23%-4.29%, realizing the “eat and squeeze” of coal slime. Completely solve the problem of heavy media back dust. The results of structural optimization of heavy medium cyclones in Xinjulong and Liangzhuang Coal Washing Plants are gratifying. Among them, the new Julong Coal Washing Plant’s first-stage dense medium separation efficiency increased by 2%, the second-stage dense medium separation efficiency increased by 10%, and Liangzhuang Coal Washing Plant realized the direct recovery of clean coal magnetic tails, reducing repeated sorting. Five coal washing plants including Huafeng and Suncun have successfully completed the deep desliming project of laminated sieves, and the ash content of coarse and refined coal slime has been reduced by 1% to 3%. After the completion of the spiral gangue discharge project of the center and the Great Wall No. 3 Coal Washing Plant, the calorific value of China Coal will increase by 700-1200 kcal. The construction of the secondary flotation technical transformation project of the coal washing plant in Zhai Town and the Great Wall No. 1 Mine is progressing in an orderly manner. The flotation transformation of Suncun, Huafeng and Xiezhuang Coal Washing Plants was successful, and the flotation transformation of Liangzhuang Coal Washing Plant was accelerated. "We deepened lean management, built and implemented 8 standards of safety, production, and electromechanical, and maximized synergistic advantages." Xu Guangqian said that by implementing the "5 × 4" coal preparation process management list, the coal washing production control was realized. Whole process management. Build a technology sharing platform, invite industry experts to give lectures every month, and implement internal innovation sharing. The monthly "small and micro innovation" evaluation was carried out to stimulate the vitality of grassroots innovation, and 170 small and micro innovations were selected from January to October. Carry out electromechanical consultation, promote "four new" technologies, and solve on-site problems around "labor reduction". Implement unified management of bulk materials, unified acceptance standards and procedures, and this year's media consumption has been reduced by 0.16 kg/ton compared with 2020. Since October, the Inner Mongolia Regional Center Coal Washing Plant, the Great Wall No. 1 Coal Washing Plant, and the Great Wall No. 3 Coal Washing Plant have organized the "Small Indicator Contest" activity, including product quality, yield, and consumption of bulk materials into the competition items to promote learning through competitions , Promoting application through learning, and digging deep into the potential of coal preparation to increase income and create benefits. "The strategy of 'increasing income from clean coal' must continue to be deepened!" Wang Jun, chief engineer of the Coal Washing Branch, said that the next step should be to focus on higher standards, higher quality, and higher efficiency, and further deepen the professional management of coal washing to ensure the realization of "separation of coal". The ultimate increase in coal income”.

title: 为生存而呐喊
text:
在45岁叙利亚难民阿卜杜拉·库尔迪位于伊拉克北部城市埃尔比勒的家中，墙上挂着一幅画：海水中的小美人鱼奋力游向俯卧沙滩上的小艾兰，试图营救，但这个3岁的小男孩早已没有了呼吸。
　　2015年，小艾兰“卧眠”地中海海滩，成为当年欧洲难民危机中最令人揪心的画面。时至今日，类似悲剧仍在世界一些地区不断上演。生存权和发展权，作为首要的基本人权，对世界上许多人而言依旧可望而不可即。
　　“生存是叙利亚人的权利”，如果生存的权利都得不到保障，其他权利都只是镜花水月
　　2015年9月2日凌晨2时左右，土耳其西南部城市博德鲁姆的海边。夜色之中，3辆车载着一群人来到一个渔村，库尔迪夫妇和两个儿子就在其中。他们要在这里坐船，渡过地中海，前往希腊。
　　当时，叙利亚危机进入第五个年头，局势愈加混乱，偷渡逃难成为许多人迫不得已的选择。
　　船只严重超载，刚出海几分钟就被巨浪打翻。库尔迪幸免于难，却永远失去了妻子蕾汉、大儿子加利布和小儿子艾兰。
　　自2011年西亚北非局势动荡以来，难民潮在欧洲从南到东的边界不断涌动。据联合国难民署估计，2011年，经地中海抵达欧洲以及葬身地中海的难民人数均创2006年以来新高，分别超过5.8万人和1500人。
　　随着西亚北非持续动荡，难民危机愈演愈烈。2014年至2019年，每年有超过10万人经地中海偷渡至欧洲。2014年至2020年，超过2万名偷渡者命丧地中海。2021年上半年，这一死亡人数为1146人，比去年同期增加58%。
　　对于任何人，如果生存的权利得不到保障，一切其他权利都只是镜中花水中月。在新华社记者对叙利亚、伊拉克、也门、埃及等中东地区10个阿拉伯国家民众的走访调查中，谈到人的权利，约七成受访者都希望“能更好地活着”。
　　“生存是叙利亚人的权利，”红十字国际委员会叙利亚办事处发言人阿德南·哈齐姆说，“我们不仅是在谈论叙利亚人，更是在谈论人类整体。在任何地方、任何时候，（人）必须享有这一权利。”
　　美西方的军事介入、经济制裁、政治干涉等霸权行径，成为破坏相关国家发展、威胁民众生存的突出因素
　　库尔迪一家原本住在叙利亚边境小镇科巴尼，生活安定。2011年，叙利亚危机爆发，形势不断恶化。库尔迪说，大约在2013年，他注意到情况变得更加不一样，因为“伊斯兰国”来了。
　　2003年，美国以存在大规模杀伤性武器为由入侵伊拉克。当时，小布什政府欲推行所谓“大中东民主计划”，在伊拉克复制美国政治模式，但很快就陷入与武装组织的长期对抗，持续的战乱为“基地”组织提供了生存空间。
　　2011年，美国在巴基斯坦击毙“基地”组织头目本·拉丹，随后开始从伊拉克仓促撤军，但其留下的乱局带来严重后果，极端恐怖势力迅速崛起。与此同时，在美西方推波助澜下，“阿拉伯之春”冲击叙利亚，令其陷入内乱。“基地”组织伊拉克分支借机把势力扩张到叙利亚，并更名为“伊斯兰国”，在伊叙两国攻城略地，制造了大量骇人听闻的暴行。
　　瑞士历史学家甘泽认为，极端组织“伊斯兰国”其实就是“美国制造”。
　　六年过去，库尔迪至今仍在自责，认为是自己把妻儿送上了不归路。但他更加痛恨，西方的干预破坏了原本的和平，逼得一家人流离失所。
　　据不完全统计，2001年以来，美国以“反恐”之名发动的战争和开展的军事行动覆盖了全球约40%的国家，夺去超过80万人的生命，令3800多万人流离失所。
　　在一些西方机构发布的所谓“2021年人权和法治指数”排名中，评分最低的20国包括叙利亚、利比亚、委内瑞拉等。但分析发现，它们之中，在所谓“阿拉伯之春”中经历重大政治变动的约占25%，过去20年间发生过战争的约占40%，曾经或正在遭受西方制裁的约占80%……而从近现代史看，这些国家几乎均曾遭西方入侵或殖民。
　　正是这些源自西方的军事介入、经济制裁、政治干涉等霸权行径，成为破坏相关国家发展、威胁其民众生存的突出因素。
　　追求幸福是人类共同愿望。一个国家，有了和平稳定的环境，自主发展权利才能得到有效保障
　　2015年那场海难发生后，库尔迪亲手埋葬了两个孩子。此后无数个夜晚，他都无法走出狂涛中呼喊找寻孩子的噩梦。
　　悲剧应被铭记，为了不再重演。“我不希望同样的悲剧发生在其他孩子身上。”库尔迪说。
　　根据新华社近期进行的海外人权治理问卷调查，关于对未来生活有什么期待，选择“远离战乱动荡，期待一切都能好起来”的中东受访者比例超过43%。
　　美国约翰斯·霍普金斯大学经济学家史蒂夫·汉克编制的“2020年痛苦指数”中，生存压力最大的10国包括委内瑞拉、津巴布韦、黎巴嫩、利比亚、伊朗等，而这些国家和平发展得以维系的内部环境，往往因外部势力的干涉而遭到破坏。
　　新华社这次问卷调查中，关于“自主而有效的国家治理对于人权保障的作用”，分别有超过52%和30%的受访者选择了“极为重要”或“非常重要”。
　　卢旺达就是一个比较有说服力的例子。这个非洲国家在20世纪曾饱受内战和动荡困扰，民不聊生，直至2000年，正是保罗·卡加梅总统确立了独立、自主的发展方向，找到了一条适合本国国情的道路，才使该国走出谷底，进入高速发展期，民生不断改善。
　　追求幸福生活是各国人民的共同愿望。一个国家，不管基础多么薄弱，只要有和平稳定的环境，自主发展权利得到保障，就会也一定会迸发出巨大的潜能。
　　每年9月2日，库尔迪都会为附近难民营的孩子们送去衣服、书包。让更多的孩子免于苦难，免于饥饿，享有教育和医疗的机会，是库尔迪的心愿，也是他余生的目标。
　　采访间隙，一个两岁左右、咬着奶嘴的小男孩溜进客厅，模样像极了曾经的小艾兰。库尔迪对记者说，这是自己重新组建家庭后所生的孩子，他给孩子起的名字是——“艾兰”。“这个名字寄托了思念，也蕴含着新生。”
　　（参与记者  李良勇  杨威  陈瑶  海洋  涂一帆  吉莉  史先涛）
　　（新华社巴格达12月12日电）
en_title: cry for survival
en_text: At the home of 45-year-old Syrian refugee Abdullah Kurdi in the northern Iraqi city of Erbil, a painting hangs on the wall: The Little Mermaid in the water swims to the prone Aylan on the beach, trying to rescue him , but the 3-year-old boy has long been out of breath. In 2015, Little Ailan "sleeping" on a Mediterranean beach became the most disturbing picture of the European refugee crisis that year. Today, similar tragedies are still being staged in some parts of the world. The rights to subsistence and development, as the primary basic human rights, are still elusive to many people in the world. "Survival is the right of the Syrians." If the right to survive is not guaranteed, all other rights will only be seen in the mirror at around 2:00 am on September 2, 2015, at the seaside of Bodrum, a city in southwestern Turkey. In the darkness of the night, three cars took a group of people to a fishing village, where the Kurdi couple and their two sons were. They're going to take a boat here, cross the Mediterranean, and go to Greece. At that time, the Syrian crisis entered its fifth year, and the situation became more and more chaotic, and smuggling became a last resort for many people. The ship was severely overloaded and was overturned by huge waves just minutes out of the sea. Kurdi survived, but lost forever his wife Lehan, eldest son Galib and youngest son Alan. Since the turmoil in West Asia and North Africa in 2011, refugee flows have been surging along the borders of Europe from south to east. According to estimates by the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees, in 2011, the number of refugees who arrived in Europe via the Mediterranean Sea and died in the Mediterranean reached new highs since 2006, exceeding 58,000 and 1,500 respectively. As the turmoil in West Asia and North Africa continues, the refugee crisis intensifies. From 2014 to 2019, more than 100,000 people smuggled across the Mediterranean to Europe each year. Between 2014 and 2020, more than 20,000 stowaways died in the Mediterranean. In the first half of 2021, the death toll was 1,146, a 58% increase from the same period last year. For anyone, if the right to life is not guaranteed, all other rights are just a blur in the mirror. In a survey conducted by Xinhua News Agency reporters on people in 10 Arab countries in the Middle East, including Syria, Iraq, Yemen, and Egypt, when it comes to human rights, about 70% of the respondents hope to "live better." "Survival is the right of Syrians," said Adnan Hazim, spokesman for the ICRC in Syria. "We are not only talking about Syrians, but about humanity as a whole. Anywhere, anytime, (People) must enjoy this right.” The hegemonic actions of the United States and the West, such as military intervention, economic sanctions, and political interference, have become prominent factors that undermine the development of relevant countries and threaten the survival of the people. The Kurdi family originally lived in the Syrian border town of Koba. Ni, life is stable. In 2011, the Syrian crisis broke out and the situation continued to deteriorate. Around 2013, Kurdi said, he noticed that things had become more different because of the coming of the Islamic State. In 2003, the United States invaded Iraq, citing the presence of weapons of mass destruction. At that time, the Bush administration wanted to implement the so-called "Greater Middle East Democracy Project" to replicate the American political model in Iraq, but it soon fell into a long-term confrontation with armed groups. In 2011, the United States killed al Qaeda leader Osama bin Laden in Pakistan, and then began to withdraw troops hastily from Iraq, but the chaos left behind brought serious consequences, and extremist terrorist forces rose rapidly. At the same time, with the help of the United States and the West, the "Arab Spring" hit Syria and plunged it into civil strife. The Iraqi branch of Al Qaeda took the opportunity to expand its power into Syria and changed its name to the "Islamic State". The Swiss historian Ganzer believes that the extremist organization "Islamic State" is actually "Made in America". Six years later, Kurdi still blames himself, believing that he had sent his wife and children to the point of no return. But he hated even more that Western intervention destroyed the original peace and forced the family to be displaced. According to incomplete statistics, since 2001, the wars and military operations launched by the United States in the name of "anti-terrorism" have covered about 40% of the world's countries, killing more than 800,000 people and displacing more than 38 million people. In the so-called "Human Rights and Rule of Law Index 2021" published by some Western institutions, the 20 countries with the lowest scores include Syria, Libya, and Venezuela. But the analysis found that among them, about 25% experienced major political changes in the so-called "Arab Spring", about 40% had wars in the past 20 years, and about 80% had been or are under Western sanctions... …and from the perspective of modern history, almost all of these countries have been invaded or colonized by the West. It is these hegemonic acts originating from the West, such as military intervention, economic sanctions, and political interference, that have become prominent factors that undermine the development of relevant countries and threaten the survival of their people. The pursuit of happiness is the common aspiration of human beings. In a country, with a peaceful and stable environment, the right to independent development can be effectively guaranteed. After the shipwreck in 2015, Kurdi buried his two children with his own hands. For countless nights after that, he couldn't get out of the nightmare of screaming for the child in the raging waves. Tragedy should be remembered in order not to repeat itself. "I don't want the same tragedy to happen to other children," Kurdi said. According to a recent survey of overseas human rights governance conducted by Xinhua News Agency, more than 43% of the respondents in the Middle East chose to "stay away from war and turmoil, and hope that everything will get better" when it comes to their expectations for future life. In the "2020 Misery Index" compiled by economist Steve Hanke of Johns Hopkins University, the 10 countries with the greatest survival pressure include Venezuela, Zimbabwe, Lebanon, Libya, Iran, etc., while these countries are peaceful The internal environment in which development can be maintained is often destroyed by the interference of external forces. In the questionnaire survey conducted by Xinhua News Agency, more than 52% and 30% of the respondents chose "extremely important" or "very important" respectively regarding "the role of autonomous and effective state governance in the protection of human rights". Rwanda is a more telling example. This African country was plagued by civil war and turmoil in the 20th century, and the people were struggling. Until 2000, it was President Paul Kagame who established an independent and independent development direction and found a path suitable for the country's national conditions. After getting out of the valley and entering a period of rapid development, people's livelihood has been continuously improved. Pursuing a happy life is the common aspiration of people of all countries. A country, no matter how weak its foundation is, as long as there is a peaceful and stable environment and the right to independent development is guaranteed, it will and will surely burst out with huge potential. Every year on September 2, Kurdi delivers clothes and school bags to children in nearby refugee camps. It is Kurdi's wish and goal for the rest of his life to free more children from suffering, from hunger, and to have access to education and medical care. Between the interviews, a two-year-old boy with a pacifier slipped into the living room, looking very much like the former little Ailan. Kurdi told reporters that this is the child he gave birth to after he rebuilt his family, and he named the child "Ailan". "This name is a symbol of longing and a new life." (Participating reporters Li Liangyong, Yang Wei, Chen Yaoyang, Tu Yifan, Jili and Shi Xiantao) (Xinhua News Agency, Baghdad, December 12)

title: 青藏联网工程安全运行十周年 持续创造社会经济效益
text:
12月9日，西藏第一条“电力天路”——青藏联网工程建成投运十周年。截至今年11月底，该工程累计为西藏送入电量87.67亿千瓦时，送出电量56.77亿千瓦时，创造直接社会经济效益14.57亿元。
青藏联网工程输电线路
青藏高原是我国重要的安全屏障、生态屏障和战略资源基地，在国家安全和发展中具有重要的战略意义。2010年以前，西藏电网网架结构极其薄弱，部分地区仅靠小型水电站、光伏电站和柴油发电机等供电，电力十分紧缺，边远地区甚至无电可用。青藏联网工程的投运使西藏电网通过青海电网首次与全国大电网互联互通。十年来，依托该工程建设积累的宝贵经验，西藏相继建成了川藏联网、藏中电力联网和阿里联网3条“电力天路”，形成迄今为止世界上海拔最高、环境最复杂、建设难度最大的高原超高压输变电工程群。
到2020年年底，一条条“电力天路”推动西藏主电网不断向更加艰苦和偏远的地区延伸，形成主电网覆盖西藏74个县（区）和主要乡镇的统一电网，最高用电负荷不断刷新纪录，全社会用电量从2010年全年的20.41亿千瓦时增长到今年前11月的89.11亿千瓦时。在充足电力的拉动下，西藏地区生产总值（GDP）逐年增长，2021年前三季度GDP为1440.35亿元，是2010年GDP的近3倍。
阿里联网工程输电线路
12月4日，西藏第4条“电力天路”阿里与藏中电力联网工程建成投运一周年。阿里联网工程投运一年来，阿里电网最大负荷4.33万千瓦，比工程投运前最大负荷增长55.2%；供电可靠率达99.52%，比工程投运前提升14个百分点。自工程投运至今年11月30日，联网通道总输送电量约1.3亿千瓦时，占阿里地区总供电量的87%；阿里供电公司售电量1.32亿千瓦时，同比增长67.27%。工程的投运推动阿里电网与藏中电网实现同网同价，电价总体降幅达到55%以上，新增电力用户1533户，同比增长77.5%。
工程投运带动了社会用电需求增长，也明显改善了阿里地区的营商环境。阿里地区市场监督管理局统计数据显示：2020年年底，阿里地区的一二三产业结构比为10.7∶35.3∶54；截至2021年9月，三次产业结构比为6.7∶37.7∶55.6，产业结构更优化。到11月30日，阿里地区登记注册的各类市场主体总量达14658家，注册资金220.42亿元，与去年同期相比分别增长36%、64%。其中，今年新增长的市场主体达2835家，注册资金增长36.13亿元。2021年前三季度，阿里地区生产总值达55.48亿元，同比增长7%。
十年来，在高寒缺氧等极端恶劣条件下，国家电网公司全力确保青藏联网工程安全运行，先后投入8.7亿元升级维护，开展年度检修10次，完成设备检修1.1万余台次，完成技改大修项目80项。

en_title: The tenth anniversary of the safe operation of the Qinghai-Tibet interconnection project continues to create social and economic benefits
en_text: December 9 marked the tenth anniversary of the completion and operation of the Qinghai-Tibet Interconnection Project, the first "electric power road" in Tibet. As of the end of November this year, the project has delivered a total of 8.767 billion kWh of electricity and 5.677 billion kWh of electricity to Tibet, creating direct social and economic benefits of 1.457 billion yuan. Qinghai-Tibet Interconnection Project Transmission Line The Qinghai-Tibet Plateau is an important security barrier, ecological barrier and strategic resource base in China, and has important strategic significance in national security and development. Before 2010, the grid structure of Tibet's power grid was extremely weak, and some areas only relied on small hydropower stations, photovoltaic power stations and diesel generators for power supply. The commissioning of the Qinghai-Tibet Interconnection Project enabled the Tibet power grid to be interconnected with the national large power grid for the first time through the Qinghai power grid. Over the past ten years, relying on the valuable experience accumulated in the construction of this project, Tibet has successively built three "electric power roads", namely the Sichuan-Tibet Interconnection, the Tibet-Central Electricity Interconnection and the Ali Internet connection, forming the world's highest altitude, the most complex environment and the most difficult construction so far. The plateau ultra-high voltage power transmission and transformation project group. By the end of 2020, one after another "electricity road" will promote the continuous extension of Tibet's main power grid to more difficult and remote areas, forming a unified power grid with the main power grid covering 74 counties (districts) and major towns and towns in Tibet, and the highest electricity load is constantly refreshed Record, the electricity consumption of the whole society increased from 2.041 billion kWh in 2010 to 8.911 billion kWh in the first 11 months of this year. Driven by sufficient electricity, Tibet's gross domestic product (GDP) has grown year by year. In the first three quarters of 2021, the GDP will be 144.035 billion yuan, nearly three times the 2010 GDP. Transmission Line of Ali Interconnection Project On December 4th, the 4th "Power Sky Road" in Tibet, the Ali and Tibet-Central Electricity Interconnection Project was completed and put into operation. One year after the Ali networking project was put into operation, the maximum load of Ali grid was 43,300 kilowatts, an increase of 55.2% compared with the maximum load before the project was put into operation; the reliability rate of power supply reached 99.52%, an increase of 14 percentage points compared with that before the project was put into operation. Since the project was put into operation to November 30 this year, the total electricity delivered by the network channel is about 130 million kWh, accounting for 87% of the total power supply in the Ali area; Ali Power Supply Company sold 132 million kWh of electricity, a year-on-year increase of 67.27%. The commissioning of the project has promoted the realization of the same price on the same grid and the same price as the grid in Tibet. The overall electricity price has dropped by more than 55%, and 1,533 new electricity users have been added, a year-on-year increase of 77.5%. The commissioning of the project has driven the growth of social demand for electricity and significantly improved the business environment in the Ali area. Statistics from the Market Supervision and Administration Bureau of Ali Region show that by the end of 2020, the ratio of the primary, secondary and tertiary industries in the Ali region was 10.7:35.3:54; as of September 2021, the ratio of the tertiary industry structure was 6.7:37.7:55.6, and the industrial structure was more optimization. As of November 30, the total number of market entities registered in the Ali area reached 14,658, with a registered capital of 22.042 billion yuan, an increase of 36% and 64% respectively compared with the same period last year. Among them, 2,835 new market players have grown this year, and the registered capital has increased by 3.613 billion yuan. In the first three quarters of 2021, the gross domestic product of the Ali region reached 5.548 billion yuan, a year-on-year increase of 7%. Over the past ten years, under extreme conditions such as high cold and hypoxia, State Grid Corporation of China has made every effort to ensure the safe operation of the Qinghai-Tibet Interconnection Project. 80 overhaul projects.
