title: 赣鄱大地聚灵秀 心系桑梓共担当
text: 绘江西精彩华章，展天下赣商风采。12月6日，第三届世界赣商大会在赣州市举行。江西省委书记易炼红出席并致辞时强调，实现全面建设社会主义现代化江西的美好愿景，需要海内外赣鄱儿女共同努力、并肩奋战，以“作示范”的担当、“勇争先”的实干，加快推动江西高质量跨越式发展，携手缔造现代化，奋力续写新辉煌。开幕式由江西省委副书记、代省长叶建春主持，省委副书记、赣州市委书记吴忠琼致辞，省领导史文斌、曾文明、殷美根、陈俊卿出席；江西省商务厅党组书记、厅长谢一平介绍了大会正式议程；赣州市领导许南吉、赵多仙、徐兵、唐舒龙等出席。首先，易炼红代表江西省委、省政府和全省人民以最炽烈的乡情真情欢迎各位赣商回家。他说，改革开放以来，广大赣商披荆斩棘、阔步前行，述说着一个又一个精彩的创业故事，演绎了一段又一段经典的人生传奇，成为了商界的佳话、家乡的骄傲。面对世界百年未有之大变局，近年来广大赣商临危不乱、从容应对，以高超的智慧投身市场、搏击商海，一大批企业在逆势而上中跑出了“加速度”，在乘风破浪中干出了“新精彩”，彰显着自强不息的坚韧执着，饱含着心系桑梓的深厚情怀，秉承着义利天下的使命担当，拳拳之心、赤子之情，令人动容、感人至深。江西好，赣商才会好；赣商好，江西会更好。江西省第十五次党代会提出了全面建设创新江西、富裕江西、美丽江西、幸福江西、和谐江西、勤廉江西的奋斗目标，擘画了江西未来发展美好蓝图。易炼红强调，今日之江西，既有发展的“速度”、产业的“深度”、开放的“宽度”，也有创新的“热度”、情感的“温度”，已成厚积薄发、蓄势突破之势，正是一方干事创业的热土，是一片成就梦想的福地，为广大赣商和国内外投资者创新创业提供了空前广阔的舞台。新时代的江西正处于大有作为的重要战略机遇期，机不可失，时不我待，投资江西就是投资未来、拥抱机遇。把握时势，全力抢占未来发展先机。易炼红希望广大赣商和各位企业家，以“风雨不动安如山”的定力和“春江水暖鸭先知”的敏锐，辩证看待形势、牢牢把握大势，准确识变、科学应变、主动求变，努力在市场竞争的大潮中抢占先机、激流勇进，争当时代发展的引领者、开拓者。要增创优势，共享江西改革发展红利，紧紧抓住江西发展的“风口”，率先搭乘江西发展的“快车”，抢滩登陆、乘风而起、扶摇直上，共促家乡发展、共享江西红利。要奋楫争先，大力弘扬新时代赣商精神，心怀天下志报国，心存高远创大业，心系桑梓共奋进，自觉将自己的事业、企业的发展，融入全面建设社会主义现代化的壮阔洪流之中，聚焦实业、深耕主业、做强企业，始终心系家乡和老区人民，把“先进经验”学回来，把“先进技术”带回来，把“高端人才”引回来，把“优质项目”落下来，把“总部基地”迁回来，聚四海之气，借八方之力，携手书写全面建设社会主义现代化江西的精彩华章。世界是赣商的舞台，江西是赣商永远的家园，江西各级党委政府是赣商永远的坚强后盾。易炼红表示，江西将崇商重商，坚持把优化营商环境作为“一号改革工程”，聚焦企业全生命周期服务，对标国际国内一流水平，持续深化“放管服”改革，持续深化惠企帮扶行动，着力构建“亲”“清”新型政商关系，全面打响“江西办事不用求人、江西办事依法依规、江西办事便捷高效、江西办事暖心爽心”营商环境品牌，争当全国政务服务满意度一等省份，努力为企业做优做强做大提供更加灿烂的阳光、更加适宜的土壤、更加滋润的雨露，让广大赣商和各方企业家在江西投资放心、创业安心、发展顺心、生活舒心。会上，吴忠琼代表赣州市委、市政府和983万赣南父老乡亲，对大家的到来表示热烈欢迎，对大家长期以来的关心支持表示衷心感谢。她说，赣州是文化厚重、多姿多彩的美丽老家，承载着乡贤游子魂牵梦萦的浓浓乡愁；是风劲潮涌、动力十足的现代新城，书写着革命老区振兴发展的华彩篇章；是开放包容、商机无限的创业之州，期待着赣商回乡创业的精彩绽放。一直以来，广大赣商秉承“江右商帮”的优良传统，发扬“厚德实干、义利天下”的赣商精神，富而思源，回馈桑梓，为家乡发展作出了重要贡献。当前，赣州上下正在深入学习贯彻党的十九届六中全会精神和江西省第十五次党代会部署，解放思想、改革攻坚、开放创新、担当实干，大力实施“三大战略、八大行动”，加快建设革命老区高质量发展示范区。广大赣商荣归故里、大展宏图，恰逢其势、正当其时。希望大家一如既往关心支持家乡发展，把更多项目、更多资金引向江西、投向赣州，多为赣州发展提出宝贵意见，多为赣州招大引强、招才引智牵线搭桥。她还诚挚邀请各位领导、嘉宾多来赣州走一走、看一看，漫步千年宋城，品味客家美食，缅怀革命先烈，接受心灵洗礼。期间，全国工商联副主席、江西赣商联合总会会长、科瑞集团董事局主席郑跃文，珠海格力电器董事长兼总裁董明珠，深圳同兴达科技董事长、总经理万锋，宁德时代联合创始人、副董事长李平等赣商及“新赣商”代表先后致辞，大家真切表达了心系桑梓的真情、情牵老区的深情和创新创业的激情。此外，会议表彰了50名2019-2020年度江西省回乡投资优秀赣商代表；并举行了项目签约仪式，共签约130多个项目，金额超过2000亿元。其中，现场签约项目30个，金额747.6亿元。会前，易炼红、叶建春、吴忠琼等省领导会见了部分赣商代表。
en_title: The land of Ganpo gathers spirits and shows heart and takes responsibility for Sang Zi
en_text: Paint the wonderful chapters of Jiangxi, and show the style of Gan merchants in the world. On December 6, the 3rd World Ganzhou Business Conference was held in Ganzhou City. Yi Lianhong, Secretary of the Jiangxi Provincial Party Committee, attended and delivered a speech, stressing that realizing the beautiful vision of building a socialist modern Jiangxi in an all-round way requires the joint efforts of the Jiangxi people at home and abroad, fighting side by side, with the responsibility of "exemplifying" and the hard work of "striving for the first" , accelerate the promotion of Jiangxi's high-quality leap-forward development, work together to create modernization, and strive to continue to write new glory. The opening ceremony was presided over by Ye Jianchun, Deputy Secretary of the Jiangxi Provincial Party Committee and Acting Governor. Wu Zhongqiong, Deputy Secretary of the Provincial Party Committee and Secretary of the Ganzhou Municipal Party Committee, delivered a speech. Provincial leaders Shi Wenbin, Zeng Wenming, Yin Meigen and Chen Junqing attended; Jiangxi Provincial Department of Commerce Party Secretary and Director Xie Xie Yiping introduced the official agenda of the conference; Ganzhou city leaders Xu Nanji, Zhao Duoxian, Xu Bing, Tang Shulong and others attended. First of all, on behalf of the Jiangxi Provincial Party Committee, the Provincial Government and the people of the whole province, Yi Lianhong welcomed all Gan merchants home with the most fiery nostalgia and sincerity. He said that since the reform and opening up, the vast number of Gan businessmen have overcome difficulties and strode forward, telling one wonderful entrepreneurial story after another, and interpreting classic life legends one after another, which has become a good story in the business world and the pride of their hometown. In the face of great changes unseen in the world in a century, in recent years, the majority of Gan businessmen have been calm and calm in the face of danger, and have joined the market with superb wisdom to fight the business sea. Zhonggan has produced "new wonderful", showing the tenacity and perseverance of self-improvement, full of deep feelings for Sang Zi, adhering to the mission of righteousness and benefiting the world, the heart of boxing, the love of pure children, which is moving and touching. If Jiangxi is good, Ganshang will be good; if Ganshang is good, Jiangxi will be better. The 15th Party Congress of Jiangxi Province put forward the goal of building an innovative Jiangxi, a prosperous Jiangxi, a beautiful Jiangxi, a happy Jiangxi, a harmonious Jiangxi, and a diligent and honest Jiangxi, and drew a blueprint for the future development of Jiangxi. Yi Lianhong emphasized that today's Jiangxi has not only the "speed" of development, the "depth" of the industry, the "width" of openness, but also the "heat" of innovation and the "temperature" of emotion. It is a hot spot for a party to start a business and a blessed place to achieve their dreams. It provides an unprecedented and broad stage for the vast number of Gan businessmen and domestic and foreign investors to innovate and start a business. Jiangxi in the new era is in a period of important strategic opportunities with great achievements. The opportunity cannot be missed, and the time does not wait. Investing in Jiangxi is investing in the future and embracing opportunities. Grasp the current situation and make every effort to seize the opportunities for future development. Yi Lianhong hopes that the vast number of Gan businessmen and entrepreneurs will use the determination of "wind and rain will not move like a mountain" and the keenness of "spring river plumbing duck prophet", dialectically view the situation, firmly grasp the general trend, accurately recognize changes, respond scientifically, and take the initiative. Seek change, strive to seize the first opportunity in the tide of market competition, advance bravely, and strive to be the leader and pioneer of the development of the times. It is necessary to create advantages and share the dividends of Jiangxi's reform and development, firmly grasp the "window" of Jiangxi's development, and take the lead in taking the "express train" of Jiangxi's development to land on the beach, ride the wind, and soar upward, so as to jointly promote the development of the hometown and share the dividends of Jiangxi. We must strive to be the first, vigorously carry forward the spirit of Ganshang in the new era, serve the country with aspirations to serve the country, have lofty aspirations to create a great cause, and strive to forge ahead together with our hearts, and consciously integrate our own career and enterprise development into the magnificent torrent of building socialist modernization in an all-round way In the middle, focus on industry, deepen the main business, strengthen the enterprise, always care about the hometown and the people of the old area, learn back "advanced experience", bring back "advanced technology", bring back "high-end talents", and bring back "high-quality projects" After falling down, move the "headquarters base" back, gather the energy of the world, and use the power of all parties to join hands to write a wonderful chapter of building a socialist modern Jiangxi in an all-round way. The world is the stage for Jiangxi businessmen, Jiangxi is the eternal home of Ganzhou businessmen, and the party committees and governments at all levels in Jiangxi are the strong backing of Jiangxi businessmen forever. Yi Lianhong said that Jiangxi will focus on business and business, insist on optimizing the business environment as the "No. 1 reform project", focus on enterprise life cycle services, benchmark the international and domestic first-class standards, continue to deepen the reform of "delegating power, regulating services", and continuing to Deepen the action of benefiting and assisting enterprises, focus on building a new "close" and "clean" relationship between government and business, and fully launch the business environment brand of "doing things in Jiangxi without asking for help, handling affairs in Jiangxi in accordance with laws and regulations, handling affairs in Jiangxi is convenient and efficient, and handling affairs in Jiangxi is heart-warming". When the national government service satisfaction first-class province, strive to provide more bright sunshine, more suitable soil, and more moist rain for enterprises to become better, stronger and bigger, so that the majority of Gan businessmen and entrepreneurs from all walks of life can invest and start businesses in Jiangxi. Peace of mind, smooth development, and comfortable life. At the meeting, Wu Zhongqiong, on behalf of the Ganzhou Municipal Party Committee, the municipal government and the 9.83 million Gannan elders and villagers, extended a warm welcome to everyone and expressed sincere gratitude to everyone for their long-term concern and support. She said that Ganzhou is a beautiful hometown with rich and colorful culture, carrying the nostalgia of the sages and wanderers; it is a modern new city full of dynamism and dynamism, writing a colorful chapter in the revitalization and development of old revolutionary areas; it is open An entrepreneurial state with tolerance and unlimited business opportunities, looking forward to the wonderful bloom of Gan merchants returning to their hometowns to start their own businesses. For a long time, the majority of Gan merchants have been adhering to the fine tradition of "Jiangyou Business Gang", carrying forward the Gan merchant spirit of "honesty, hard work, righteousness and benefit to the world". At present, Ganzhou is thoroughly studying and implementing the spirit of the Sixth Plenary Session of the 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and the deployment of the 15th Party Congress of Jiangxi Province, emancipating the mind, reforming and tackling difficulties, opening up and innovation, and taking responsibility for practical work, and vigorously implementing the "three major strategies and eight major actions" ”, to accelerate the construction of high-quality development demonstration areas in old revolutionary base areas. The vast number of Gan merchants returned to their hometowns and made great plans, which was at the right time and at the right time. I hope that everyone will continue to care and support the development of their hometowns as always, direct more projects and more funds to Jiangxi and Ganzhou, provide valuable opinions for the development of Ganzhou, and help Ganzhou attract talents and talents. She also sincerely invites all leaders and guests to come to Ganzhou for a walk, take a look, stroll the millennium Songcheng, taste Hakka cuisine, cherish the memory of revolutionary martyrs, and accept spiritual baptism. During the period, Zheng Yuewen, Vice Chairman of All-China Federation of Industry and Commerce, Chairman of Jiangxi Ganshang Federation, Chairman of the Board of Directors of Kerui Group, Dong Mingzhu, Chairman and President of Gree Electric Appliances in Zhuhai, Wan Feng, Chairman and General Manager of Shenzhen Tongxingda Technology, and Ningde Times Co-founder and vice chairman Li Pingping, Ganshang and representatives of "New Ganshang" delivered speeches one after another. They truly expressed their true feelings for Sang Zi, their affection for the old district and their passion for innovation and entrepreneurship. In addition, the meeting commended 50 outstanding representatives of Jiangxi businessmen who returned to their hometowns to invest in Jiangxi Province in 2019-2020; a project signing ceremony was held, and a total of more than 130 projects with an amount of more than 200 billion yuan were signed. Among them, there were 30 on-site contracted projects with an amount of 74.76 billion yuan. Before the meeting, Yi Lianhong, Ye Jianchun, Wu Zhongqiong and other provincial leaders met with some representatives of Gansu businessmen.

title: 全民反诈 重拳出击
text:
本报讯 记者肖新民、通讯员周胤伍报道：今年以来，湖北省襄阳市公安局襄城分局聚焦电信网络诈骗治理，坚持“打防结合、预防为先”，做实源头防控，创新宣传方式，强化末端治理，持续掀起全警反诈、全民反诈新高潮。
    襄城分局制定打击治理电信网络诈骗违法犯罪重点工作任务责任分工方案、打击整治电信网络诈骗犯罪12条工作举措、反电诈宣传交互抽查工作方案等，逐级压实主体责任；紧盯城区发案“重灾区”，实行分局党委包保责任制，班子成员分别包保联系城区派出所，每周到联系派出所参加宣传，持续推进工作；按照工作互补、衔接严密的原则，重新划分分局机关每周入户宣传的社区，按照“逐人下载、逐人安装、逐人宣传”的原则，切实把机关与派出所的分工合作做实，把结对联勤工作做优；组建反诈中心和电诈打击攻坚队，整体部署推进全区电信网络诈骗案件的打击、整治、防范、宣传等工作，对电诈案件进行一键式预警拦截、资金查控、分析研判、技术反制、实战指挥、宣传防范，形成合力重拳出击。
    襄城分局充分动员社会各方力量，调动“一村一辅”、社区村组干部、师生家长、小区物业、网格员、快递员、外卖员等人员积极参加反诈志愿宣传活动。针对投资理财、网络刷单、转账退款、冒充人员等常见高发诈骗手段，持续推进警地、警企、警校、警民联动宣传防范工作；借助新媒体平台及时发布各类反诈知识、预警信息和案例分析，依托公安接处警窗口、户籍窗口、禁毒教育基地等设立反诈宣传点，组织民警通过“进社区、进村组、进单位、进企业、进学校、进家庭、进网络”和“横幅挂到、海报贴到、讲座讲到、考试考到、案例发到、责任签到、专班督到”的“七进七到”反诈宣传模式壮大宣传队伍、延伸宣传触角。4月以来，全区组织反诈集中宣传日活动20次、入户走访宣传10万余户，张贴反电诈横幅5000余条，发放宣传单20万余份，推广安装“国家反诈中心”App16万余人。
en_title: National anti-fraud attack
en_text: Our reporter Xiao Xinmin and correspondent Zhou Yinwu reported: Since the beginning of this year, the Xiangcheng Branch of the Public Security Bureau of Xiangyang City, Hubei Province has focused on the management of telecommunication network fraud, adhered to the principle of "combining combat and prevention, and putting prevention first", making real source prevention and control, and innovative publicity. In this way, we will strengthen end-to-end governance, and continue to set off a new upsurge in anti-fraud for the entire police and anti-fraud for the whole people. Xiangcheng Sub-bureau has formulated a plan for the division of responsibilities for key tasks and responsibilities for cracking down on telecommunication and network fraud crimes, 12 work measures for cracking down and rectifying telecommunication and network fraud crimes, and a work plan for interactive spot checks on anti-telephone fraud publicity, etc., to consolidate the main responsibilities step by step; In the case of "severe disaster areas", the sub-bureau party committee implements the responsibility system for guaranteeing guarantees. The members of the team guarantee the contact with the urban police station, go to the contact police station every week to participate in publicity, and continue to promote the work; in accordance with the principle of complementarity and tight connection, the sub-bureau organs are re-divided weekly. In the community where household publicity is promoted, in accordance with the principle of "downloading, installing, and publicizing one by one", the division of labor and cooperation between the agencies and the police station should be implemented, and the work of pairing and joint logistics should be optimized; The overall deployment and promotion of the crackdown, rectification, prevention, and publicity of telecommunications and network fraud cases in the region will be carried out by one-click early warning and interception, fund inspection and control, analysis and judgment, technical countermeasures, actual combat command, and publicity and prevention of fraud cases. Form a combined force to attack. The Xiangcheng Branch fully mobilized the forces of all parties in the society, and mobilized "one village and one auxiliary", community village cadres, teachers and students parents, community property managers, grid workers, couriers, takeaways and other personnel to actively participate in anti-fraud volunteer publicity activities. Aiming at common high-incidence fraud methods such as investment and wealth management, online billing, transfer refunds, impersonation of personnel, etc., continue to promote the joint publicity and prevention work of police districts, police enterprises, police academies, and police and civilians; with the help of new media platforms, various anti-fraud knowledge, Early warning information and case analysis, relying on the police reception window, household registration window, anti-drug education base, etc. to set up anti-fraud propaganda points, and organize the police through "entering the community, entering the village group, entering the unit, entering the enterprise, entering the school, entering the family, entering the network. "And the "seven-in-seven-arrival" anti-fraud propaganda model of "banners, posters, lectures, exams, case distribution, responsible sign-in, and special class supervision" has strengthened the propaganda team and extended its publicity tentacles. Since April, the district has organized 20 anti-fraud intensive publicity activities, visited more than 100,000 households, posted more than 5,000 anti-fraud banners, distributed more than 200,000 leaflets, and promoted the installation of the "National Anti-Fraud Center". App more than 160,000 people.

title: 中央经济工作会议在北京举行
text:
应对风险挑战实践中
　　四点做好经济工作的规律性认识
　　●必须坚持党中央集中统一领导，沉着应对重大挑战，步调一致向前进。必须坚持高质量发展，坚持以经济建设为中心是党的基本路线的要求，全党都要聚精会神贯彻执行，推动经济实现质的稳步提升和量的合理增长。必须坚持稳中求进，调整政策和推动改革要把握好时度效，坚持先立后破、稳扎稳打。必须加强统筹协调，坚持系统观念
　　●明年将召开党的二十大，这是党和国家政治生活中的一件大事，要保持平稳健康的经济环境、国泰民安的社会环境、风清气正的政治环境。做好明年经济工作，要以习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想为指导，全面贯彻落实党的十九大和十九届历次全会精神，弘扬伟大建党精神，坚持稳中求进工作总基调，完整、准确、全面贯彻新发展理念，加快构建新发展格局，全面深化改革开放，坚持创新驱动发展，推动高质量发展，坚持以供给侧结构性改革为主线，统筹疫情防控和经济社会发展，统筹发展和安全，继续做好“六稳”、“六保”工作，持续改善民生，着力稳定宏观经济大盘，保持经济运行在合理区间，保持社会大局稳定，迎接党的二十大胜利召开
　　明年经济工作要稳字当头稳中求进
　　积极推出有利于经济稳定的政策
　　●一是宏观政策要稳健有效
　　　二是微观政策要持续激发市场主体活力
　　　三是结构政策要着力畅通国民经济循环
　　　四是科技政策要扎实落地
　　　五是改革开放政策要激活发展动力
　　　六是区域政策要增强发展的平衡性协调性
　　　七是社会政策要兜住兜牢民生底线
　　正确认识和把握新的重大理论和实践问题
　　●要正确认识和把握实现共同富裕的战略目标和实践途径
　　　要正确认识和把握资本的特性和行为规律
　　　要正确认识和把握初级产品供给保障
　　　要正确认识和把握防范化解重大风险
　　　要正确认识和把握碳达峰碳中和
　　新华社北京12月10日电 中央经济工作会议12月8日至10日在北京举行。中共中央总书记、国家主席、中央军委主席习近平，中共中央政治局常委李克强、栗战书、汪洋、王沪宁、赵乐际、韩正出席会议。
　　习近平在会上发表重要讲话，总结2021年经济工作，分析当前经济形势，部署2022年经济工作。李克强在讲话中对明年经济工作作出具体部署，并作了总结讲话。
　　会议认为，今年是党和国家历史上具有里程碑意义的一年。我们隆重庆祝中国共产党成立一百周年，实现第一个百年奋斗目标，开启向第二个百年奋斗目标进军新征程，沉着应对百年变局和世纪疫情，构建新发展格局迈出新步伐，高质量发展取得新成效，实现了“十四五”良好开局。我国经济发展和疫情防控保持全球领先地位，国家战略科技力量加快壮大，产业链韧性得到提升，改革开放向纵深推进，民生保障有力有效，生态文明建设持续推进。这些成绩的取得，是以习近平同志为核心的党中央坚强领导的结果，是全党全国各族人民勠力同心、艰苦奋斗的结果。
　　会议指出，在充分肯定成绩的同时，必须看到我国经济发展面临需求收缩、供给冲击、预期转弱三重压力。世纪疫情冲击下，百年变局加速演进，外部环境更趋复杂严峻和不确定。我们既要正视困难，又要坚定信心。我国经济韧性强，长期向好的基本面不会改变。无论国际风云如何变幻，我们都要坚定不移做好自己的事情，不断做强经济基础，增强科技创新能力，坚持多边主义，主动对标高标准国际经贸规则，以高水平开放促进深层次改革、推动高质量发展。
　　会议认为，在应对风险挑战的实践中，我们进一步积累了对做好经济工作的规律性认识。必须坚持党中央集中统一领导，沉着应对重大挑战，步调一致向前进。必须坚持高质量发展，坚持以经济建设为中心是党的基本路线的要求，全党都要聚精会神贯彻执行，推动经济实现质的稳步提升和量的合理增长。必须坚持稳中求进，调整政策和推动改革要把握好时度效，坚持先立后破、稳扎稳打。必须加强统筹协调，坚持系统观念。
　　会议强调，明年将召开党的二十大，这是党和国家政治生活中的一件大事，要保持平稳健康的经济环境、国泰民安的社会环境、风清气正的政治环境。做好明年经济工作，要以习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想为指导，全面贯彻落实党的十九大和十九届历次全会精神，弘扬伟大建党精神，坚持稳中求进工作总基调，完整、准确、全面贯彻新发展理念，加快构建新发展格局，全面深化改革开放，坚持创新驱动发展，推动高质量发展，坚持以供给侧结构性改革为主线，统筹疫情防控和经济社会发展，统筹发展和安全，继续做好“六稳”、“六保”工作，持续改善民生，着力稳定宏观经济大盘，保持经济运行在合理区间，保持社会大局稳定，迎接党的二十大胜利召开。
　　会议要求，明年经济工作要稳字当头、稳中求进，各地区各部门要担负起稳定宏观经济的责任，各方面要积极推出有利于经济稳定的政策，政策发力适当靠前。
　　一是宏观政策要稳健有效。要继续实施积极的财政政策和稳健的货币政策。积极的财政政策要提升效能，更加注重精准、可持续。要保证财政支出强度，加快支出进度。实施新的减税降费政策，强化对中小微企业、个体工商户、制造业、风险化解等的支持力度，适度超前开展基础设施投资。党政机关要坚持过紧日子。严肃财经纪律。坚决遏制新增地方政府隐性债务。稳健的货币政策要灵活适度，保持流动性合理充裕。引导金融机构加大对实体经济特别是小微企业、科技创新、绿色发展的支持。财政政策和货币政策要协调联动，跨周期和逆周期宏观调控政策要有机结合。实施好扩大内需战略，增强发展内生动力。
　　二是微观政策要持续激发市场主体活力。要提振市场主体信心，深入推进公平竞争政策实施，加强反垄断和反不正当竞争，以公正监管保障公平竞争。强化知识产权保护，营造各类所有制企业竞相发展的良好环境。强化契约精神，有效治理恶意拖欠账款和逃废债行为。
　　三是结构政策要着力畅通国民经济循环。要深化供给侧结构性改革，重在畅通国内大循环，重在突破供给约束堵点，重在打通生产、分配、流通、消费各环节。要提升制造业核心竞争力，启动一批产业基础再造工程项目，激发涌现一大批“专精特新”企业。加快形成内外联通、安全高效的物流网络。加快数字化改造，促进传统产业升级。要坚持房子是用来住的、不是用来炒的定位，加强预期引导，探索新的发展模式，坚持租购并举，加快发展长租房市场，推进保障性住房建设，支持商品房市场更好满足购房者的合理住房需求，因城施策促进房地产业良性循环和健康发展。
　　四是科技政策要扎实落地。要实施科技体制改革三年行动方案，制定实施基础研究十年规划。强化国家战略科技力量，发挥好国家实验室作用，重组全国重点实验室，推进科研院所改革。强化企业创新主体地位，深化产学研结合。完善优化科技创新生态，形成扎实的科研作风。继续开展国际科技合作。
　　五是改革开放政策要激活发展动力。要抓好要素市场化配置综合改革试点，全面实行股票发行注册制，完成国企改革三年行动任务，稳步推进电网、铁路等自然垄断行业改革。调动地方改革积极性，鼓励各地因地制宜、主动改革。扩大高水平对外开放，推动制度型开放，落实好外资企业国民待遇，吸引更多跨国公司投资，推动重大外资项目加快落地。推动共建“一带一路”高质量发展。
　　六是区域政策要增强发展的平衡性协调性。要深入实施区域重大战略和区域协调发展战略，促进东、中、西和东北地区协调发展。全面推进乡村振兴，提升新型城镇化建设质量。
　　七是社会政策要兜住兜牢民生底线。要统筹推进经济发展和民生保障，健全常住地提供基本公共服务制度。解决好高校毕业生等青年就业问题，健全灵活就业劳动用工和社会保障政策。推进基本养老保险全国统筹。推动新的生育政策落地见效，积极应对人口老龄化。
　　会议认为，进入新发展阶段，我国发展内外环境发生深刻变化，面临许多新的重大理论和实践问题，需要正确认识和把握。
　　要正确认识和把握实现共同富裕的战略目标和实践途径。在我国社会主义制度下，既要不断解放和发展社会生产力，不断创造和积累社会财富，又要防止两极分化。实现共同富裕目标，首先要通过全国人民共同奋斗把“蛋糕”做大做好，然后通过合理的制度安排把“蛋糕”切好分好。这是一个长期的历史过程，要稳步朝着这个目标迈进。要在推动高质量发展中强化就业优先导向，提高经济增长的就业带动力。要发挥分配的功能和作用，坚持按劳分配为主体，完善按要素分配政策，加大税收、社保、转移支付等的调节力度。支持有意愿有能力的企业和社会群体积极参与公益慈善事业。要坚持尽力而为、量力而行，完善公共服务政策制度体系，在教育、医疗、养老、住房等人民群众最关心的领域精准提供基本公共服务。
　　要正确认识和把握资本的特性和行为规律。社会主义市场经济是一个伟大创造，社会主义市场经济中必然会有各种形态的资本，要发挥资本作为生产要素的积极作用，同时有效控制其消极作用。要为资本设置“红绿灯”，依法加强对资本的有效监管，防止资本野蛮生长。要支持和引导资本规范健康发展，坚持和完善社会主义基本经济制度，毫不动摇巩固和发展公有制经济，毫不动摇鼓励、支持、引导非公有制经济发展。
　　要正确认识和把握初级产品供给保障。要坚持节约优先，实施全面节约战略。在生产领域，推进资源全面节约、集约、循环利用。在消费领域，增强全民节约意识，倡导简约适度、绿色低碳的生活方式。要增强国内资源生产保障能力，加快油气等资源先进开采技术开发应用，加快构建废弃物循环利用体系。要把提高农业综合生产能力放在更加突出的位置，持续推进高标准农田建设，深入实施种业振兴行动，提高农机装备水平，保障种粮农民合理收益，中国人的饭碗任何时候都要牢牢端在自己手中。
　　要正确认识和把握防范化解重大风险。要继续按照稳定大局、统筹协调、分类施策、精准拆弹的方针，抓好风险处置工作，加强金融法治建设，压实地方、金融监管、行业主管等各方责任，压实企业自救主体责任。要强化能力建设，加强金融监管干部队伍建设。化解风险要有充足资源，研究制定化解风险的政策，要广泛配合，完善金融风险处置机制。
　　要正确认识和把握碳达峰碳中和。实现碳达峰碳中和是推动高质量发展的内在要求，要坚定不移推进，但不可能毕其功于一役。要坚持全国统筹、节约优先、双轮驱动、内外畅通、防范风险的原则。传统能源逐步退出要建立在新能源安全可靠的替代基础上。要立足以煤为主的基本国情，抓好煤炭清洁高效利用，增加新能源消纳能力，推动煤炭和新能源优化组合。要狠抓绿色低碳技术攻关。要科学考核，新增可再生能源和原料用能不纳入能源消费总量控制，创造条件尽早实现能耗“双控”向碳排放总量和强度“双控”转变，加快形成减污降碳的激励约束机制，防止简单层层分解。要确保能源供应，大企业特别是国有企业要带头保供稳价。要深入推动能源革命，加快建设能源强国。
　　会议指出，要继续做好“六稳”、“六保”工作特别是保就业保民生保市场主体，围绕保持经济运行在合理区间，加强和改善宏观调控，加大宏观政策跨周期调节力度，提高宏观调控的前瞻性针对性。市场主体承载着数亿人的就业创业。要继续面向市场主体实施新的减税降费，帮助他们特别是中小微企业、个体工商户减负纾困、恢复发展。加大对实体经济融资支持力度，促进中小微企业融资增量、扩面、降价。抓好重点群体就业，落实落细稳就业举措。推动财力下沉，更好支持基层政府落实助企纾困政策和保基本民生保工资保运转。加强煤电油气运等调节，促进电力充足供应。要深化重点领域改革，更大激发市场活力和发展内生动力，运用市场化机制激励企业创新投入。促进多种所有制经济共同发展，优化民营经济发展环境，依法保护各类市场主体产权和合法权益，政策要一视同仁、平等对待。扩大高水平开放，多措并举稳定外贸，保障产业链供应链稳定，加大吸引外资力度。
　　会议要求，各级党委和政府、各级领导干部要自觉同党中央保持高度一致，提高政治判断力、政治领悟力、政治执行力，还必须学习历史知识、厚植文化底蕴、强化生态观念，要落实到行动上，体现到贯彻落实党的路线方针政策的实际行动上，体现到推动高质量发展的实际行动上，体现到为党分忧、为国尽责、为民奉献的实际行动上。
　　会议指出，领导经济工作必须尊重客观实际和群众需求，必须有系统思维、科学谋划。领导干部要提高领导经济工作的专业能力，经济社会发展是一个系统工程，必须综合考虑政治和经济、现实和历史、物质和文化、发展和民生、资源和生态、国内和国际等多方面因素。领导干部要加强经济学知识、科技知识学习，特别是要悟透以人民为中心的发展思想，坚持正确政绩观，敬畏历史、敬畏文化、敬畏生态，慎重决策、慎重用权。要加强调查研究，坚持“三严三实”，坚决防止简单化、乱作为，坚决反对不担当、不作为。
　　会议强调，要坚持“外防输入、内防反弹”，科学精准做好疫情防控工作。要统筹安排好煤电油气运保障供应。做好粮油肉蛋奶果蔬等保供稳价。保障农民工工资发放，加强安全生产和公共安全。要全力做好冬奥会、冬残奥会服务保障工作，确保办成一届简约、安全、精彩的奥运盛会。
　　会议号召，全党同志要紧密团结在以习近平同志为核心的党中央周围，增强“四个意识”，坚定“四个自信”，做到“两个维护”，运用好党史学习教育成果，以实际行动把党中央决策部署落实到位，迎接党的二十大胜利召开。
　　中共中央政治局委员、中央书记处书记，全国人大常委会有关领导同志，国务委员，最高人民法院院长，最高人民检察院检察长，全国政协有关领导同志以及中央军委委员等出席会议。
　　各省、自治区、直辖市和计划单列市、新疆生产建设兵团党政主要负责同志，中央和国家机关有关部门、有关人民团体、中央管理的部分金融机构和企业、中央军委机关各部门主要负责同志等参加会议。
en_title: Central Economic Work Conference held in Beijing
en_text: Four Points in Responding to Risks and Challenges Practice Regular Understanding of Economic Work ● We must adhere to the centralized and unified leadership of the Party Central Committee, deal with major challenges calmly, and move forward in unison. We must adhere to high-quality development and adhere to the requirements of the party's basic line of focusing on economic construction. We must insist on making progress while maintaining stability, adjust policies and promote reforms in a timely manner, and insist on establishing first and then breaking, and making steady progress. It is necessary to strengthen overall planning and coordination, and adhere to the system concept. Next year, the 20th National Congress of the Party will be held. This is a major event in the political life of the Party and the country. It is necessary to maintain a stable and healthy economic environment, a social environment of national security and public security, and a clean political atmosphere. surroundings. To do a good job in economic work next year, we must follow the guidance of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, fully implement the spirit of the 19th National Congress of the Communist Party of China and all previous 19th Plenary Sessions, carry forward the spirit of the great party building, and adhere to the general tone of making progress while maintaining stability. Accurately and fully implement the new development concept, accelerate the construction of a new development pattern, comprehensively deepen reform and opening up, adhere to innovation-driven development, promote high-quality development, adhere to the supply-side structural reform as the main line, coordinate epidemic prevention and control and economic and social development, and coordinate development and security, continue to do a good job of "six stability" and "six guarantees", continue to improve people's livelihood, focus on stabilizing the macroeconomic market, keep the economy operating within a reasonable range, maintain overall social stability, and welcome the victory of the party's 20th National Congress of economic work next year. First, the macro policy must be stable and effective. Second, the micro policy must continue to stimulate the vitality of market players. Third, the structural policy must focus on smoothing the national economic cycle. Fourth, the science and technology policy must be solid. Fifth, the reform and opening-up policy should activate the driving force of development. To achieve the strategic goal and practical approach of common prosperity, we must correctly understand and grasp the characteristics and behavioral laws of capital. We must correctly understand and grasp the supply guarantee of primary products. We must correctly understand and grasp the prevention and resolution of major risks. News Agency, Beijing, December 10. The Central Economic Work Conference was held in Beijing from December 8 to 10. General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, President of the State, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission Xi Jinping, and members of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee Li Keqiang, Li Zhanshu, Wang Yang, Wang Huning, Zhao Leji, and Han Zheng attended the meeting. Xi Jinping delivered an important speech at the meeting, summarizing the economic work in 2021, analyzing the current economic situation, and deploying the economic work in 2022. In his speech, Li Keqiang made specific plans for next year's economic work and made a concluding speech. The meeting believed that this year is a landmark year in the history of the party and the country. We solemnly celebrate the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China, achieve the first centenary goal, start a new journey towards the second centenary goal, calmly respond to the changes in the century and the epidemic of the century, build a new development pattern, take new steps, and achieve high-quality development New achievements have been made and a good start in the "14th Five-Year Plan" has been achieved. my country's economic development and epidemic prevention and control have maintained a leading position in the world, the national strategic scientific and technological strength has been accelerated, the resilience of the industrial chain has been improved, reform and opening up has been advanced in depth, people's livelihood has been effectively guaranteed, and the construction of ecological civilization has continued to advance. These achievements are the result of the strong leadership of the Party Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping at the core, and the result of the concerted efforts and hard work of the whole Party and the people of all ethnic groups in the country. The meeting pointed out that while fully affirming the achievements, we must see that my country's economic development is facing the triple pressure of demand contraction, supply shock, and weakening expectations. Under the impact of the epidemic of the century, the evolution of the century-old situation has accelerated, and the external environment has become more complex, severe and uncertain. We must face up to the difficulties and strengthen our confidence. my country's economy is resilient, and the fundamentals of long-term improvement will not change. No matter how the international situation changes, we must unswervingly do our own thing well, continuously strengthen the economic foundation, enhance the ability of scientific and technological innovation, adhere to multilateralism, take the initiative to set high standards for international economic and trade rules, and promote deep-level reforms with high-level opening up. Promote high-quality development. The meeting held that in the practice of coping with risks and challenges, we have further accumulated a regular understanding of doing economic work well. We must adhere to the centralized and unified leadership of the Party Central Committee, deal with major challenges calmly, and move forward in unison. We must adhere to high-quality development and adhere to the requirements of the party's basic line of focusing on economic construction. We must insist on making progress while maintaining stability, adjust policies and promote reforms in a timely manner, and insist on establishing first and then breaking, and making steady progress. We must strengthen overall planning and coordination and adhere to the system concept. The meeting emphasized that the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China will be held next year, which is a major event in the political life of the party and the country. It is necessary to maintain a stable and healthy economic environment, a social environment of national prosperity and public security, and a clean political environment. To do a good job in economic work next year, we must follow the guidance of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, fully implement the spirit of the 19th National Congress of the Communist Party of China and all previous 19th Plenary Sessions, carry forward the spirit of the great party building, and adhere to the general tone of making progress while maintaining stability. Accurately and fully implement the new development concept, accelerate the construction of a new development pattern, comprehensively deepen reform and opening up, adhere to innovation-driven development, promote high-quality development, adhere to the supply-side structural reform as the main line, coordinate epidemic prevention and control and economic and social development, and coordinate development and security, continue to do a good job of "six stability" and "six guarantees", continue to improve people's livelihood, focus on stabilizing the macroeconomic market, keep the economy operating within a reasonable range, maintain overall social stability, and welcome the victory of the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party. The meeting demanded that next year's economic work should take the lead and make progress while maintaining stability. All regions and departments should shoulder the responsibility of stabilizing the macro economy. All parties should actively introduce policies that are conducive to economic stability, and policy efforts should be appropriately advanced. First, macro policies should be stable and effective. We must continue to implement a proactive fiscal policy and a prudent monetary policy. Proactive fiscal policy should improve efficiency and pay more attention to precision and sustainability. It is necessary to ensure the intensity of fiscal expenditure and accelerate the progress of expenditure. Implement a new tax and fee reduction policy, strengthen support for small, medium and micro enterprises, individual industrial and commercial households, manufacturing, risk mitigation, etc., and carry out infrastructure investment moderately ahead of schedule. Party and government organs must insist on living a tight life. Serious financial discipline. Resolutely curb new hidden debts of local governments. A prudent monetary policy should be flexible and appropriate, and liquidity should be kept reasonably sufficient. Guide financial institutions to increase support for the real economy, especially small and micro enterprises, technological innovation, and green development. Fiscal policy and monetary policy should be coordinated and linked, and cross-cyclical and counter-cyclical macro-control policies should be organically combined. We will implement the strategy of expanding domestic demand and enhance the endogenous driving force for development. Second, micro-policies should continue to stimulate the vitality of market entities. It is necessary to boost the confidence of market players, further promote the implementation of fair competition policies, strengthen anti-monopoly and anti-unfair competition, and ensure fair competition with fair supervision. Strengthen the protection of intellectual property rights and create a favorable environment for the competitive development of enterprises of all types of ownership. Strengthen the spirit of contract, and effectively manage malicious delinquency and evasion of debts. Third, structural policies should focus on smoothing the circulation of the national economy. To deepen the supply-side structural reform, the focus should be on smoothing the domestic circulation, breaking through supply constraints, and opening up all links of production, distribution, circulation, and consumption. It is necessary to enhance the core competitiveness of the manufacturing industry, launch a batch of industrial base reengineering projects, and stimulate the emergence of a large number of "specialized, special and new" enterprises. Speed up the formation of a safe and efficient logistics network with internal and external connectivity. Accelerate digital transformation and promote the upgrading of traditional industries. It is necessary to adhere to the positioning that houses are for living in, not for speculation, strengthen the guidance of expectations, explore new development models, insist on both renting and purchasing, speed up the development of the long-term rental market, promote the construction of affordable housing, and support the commercial housing market to better satisfy the purchase of houses. To meet the reasonable housing needs of consumers, city-specific policies will promote a virtuous circle and healthy development of the real estate industry. Fourth, science and technology policies must be firmly implemented. It is necessary to implement a three-year action plan for the reform of the scientific and technological system, and formulate a ten-year plan for the implementation of basic research. Strengthen the national strategic scientific and technological strength, give full play to the role of national laboratories, reorganize national key laboratories, and promote the reform of scientific research institutes. Strengthen the main role of enterprises in innovation and deepen the combination of production, education and research. Improve and optimize the scientific and technological innovation ecology, and form a solid scientific research style. Continue to carry out international scientific and technological cooperation. Fifth, the reform and opening-up policy should activate the driving force for development. It is necessary to do a good job of piloting the comprehensive reform of the market-based allocation of factors, fully implement the stock issuance registration system, complete the three-year action task of state-owned enterprise reform, and steadily promote the reform of natural monopoly industries such as power grids and railways. Mobilize the enthusiasm of local reforms, encourage localities to adapt to local conditions and take the initiative to reform. Expand high-level opening to the outside world, promote institutional opening, implement national treatment for foreign-funded enterprises, attract more investment from multinational companies, and accelerate the implementation of major foreign-funded projects. Promote the high-quality development of the Belt and Road Initiative. Sixth, regional policies should enhance the balance and coordination of development. It is necessary to thoroughly implement major regional strategies and regional coordinated development strategies to promote the coordinated development of the eastern, central, western and northeastern regions. Comprehensively promote rural revitalization and improve the quality of new urbanization construction. Seventh, social policies must stick to the bottom line of people's livelihood. It is necessary to coordinate the promotion of economic development and people's livelihood security, and improve the system of providing basic public services in places of permanent residence. Solve the employment problems of young people such as college graduates, and improve the flexible employment labor employment and social security policies. Promote the national overall planning of basic old-age insurance. Promoting the implementation of the new fertility policy to take effect, and actively responding to the aging of the population. The meeting held that, entering a new stage of development, my country's internal and external environment for development has undergone profound changes, and many new major theoretical and practical problems are faced, which need to be correctly understood and grasped. It is necessary to correctly understand and grasp the strategic goals and practical ways to achieve common prosperity. Under my country's socialist system, it is necessary to continuously liberate and develop social productive forces, create and accumulate social wealth, and prevent polarization. To achieve the goal of common prosperity, we must first make the "cake" bigger and better through the joint efforts of the people across the country, and then divide the "cake" through reasonable institutional arrangements. This is a long-term historical process, and it is necessary to steadily move towards this goal. It is necessary to strengthen the priority orientation of employment in promoting high-quality development, and improve the employment driving force of economic growth. It is necessary to give full play to the function and role of distribution, adhere to the principle of distribution according to work, improve the policy of distribution according to factors, and increase the adjustment of taxation, social security, and transfer payments. Support willing and able enterprises and social groups to actively participate in charitable causes. We must persist in doing our best and do what we can, improve the public service policy and system, and provide basic public services precisely in the fields of education, medical care, elderly care, housing and other areas that the people are most concerned about. It is necessary to correctly understand and grasp the characteristics and behavioral laws of capital. The socialist market economy is a great creation. There will inevitably be various forms of capital in the socialist market economy. The positive role of capital as a factor of production must be brought into play, while its negative role must be effectively controlled. It is necessary to set "traffic lights" for capital, strengthen effective supervision of capital in accordance with the law, and prevent the savage growth of capital. It is necessary to support and guide the healthy development of capital norms, adhere to and improve the basic socialist economic system, unswervingly consolidate and develop the public economy, and unswervingly encourage, support and guide the development of the non-public economy. It is necessary to correctly understand and grasp the supply guarantee of primary products. It is necessary to insist on giving priority to saving and implement a comprehensive saving strategy. In the field of production, promote the comprehensive conservation, intensive and recycling utilization of resources. In the field of consumption, enhance the national awareness of conservation, and advocate a simple, moderate, green and low-carbon lifestyle. It is necessary to enhance domestic resource production and support capabilities, accelerate the development and application of advanced extraction technologies for oil and gas and other resources, and accelerate the establishment of a waste recycling system. It is necessary to put the improvement of comprehensive agricultural production capacity in a more prominent position, continue to promote the construction of high-standard farmland, thoroughly implement the revitalization of the seed industry, improve the level of agricultural machinery and equipment, and ensure the reasonable income of grain farmers. The Chinese people's rice bowl must be firmly established at all times in their own hands. It is necessary to correctly understand and grasp the prevention and resolution of major risks. It is necessary to continue to follow the principles of stabilizing the overall situation, overall planning and coordination, implementing classified policies, and precise bomb disposal, do a good job in risk disposal, strengthen the construction of the financial rule of law, consolidate the responsibilities of local governments, financial supervision, industry supervisors and other parties, and consolidate the main responsibility of enterprises for self-rescue. It is necessary to strengthen capacity building and strengthen the building of financial supervision cadres. Adequate resources are needed to resolve risks, and policies to resolve risks must be researched and formulated, extensive cooperation is required, and the financial risk disposal mechanism must be improved. It is necessary to correctly understand and grasp the peak carbon neutrality of carbon. Achieving peak carbon neutrality is an inherent requirement to promote high-quality development, and it must be pursued unswervingly, but it cannot be accomplished in one fell swoop. It is necessary to adhere to the principles of national overall planning, conservation priority, two-wheel drive, smooth internal and external flow, and risk prevention. The gradual withdrawal of traditional energy should be based on the safe and reliable replacement of new energy. Based on the basic national conditions of coal as the mainstay, we must do a good job in the clean and efficient utilization of coal, increase the consumption capacity of new energy, and promote the optimal combination of coal and new energy. We must pay close attention to tackling key green and low-carbon technologies. It is necessary to conduct scientific assessment, new renewable energy and raw material energy consumption should not be included in the total energy consumption control, create conditions to realize the transition from "double control" of energy consumption to "double control" of total carbon emission and intensity as soon as possible, and accelerate the formation of pollution reduction and carbon reduction. The incentive and constraint mechanism to prevent simple layer-by-layer decomposition. To ensure energy supply, large enterprises, especially state-owned enterprises, should take the lead in ensuring supply and stable prices. It is necessary to further promote the energy revolution and accelerate the construction of an energy power. The meeting pointed out that it is necessary to continue to do a good job of "six stability" and "six guarantees", especially to ensure employment, people's livelihood and market entities, focus on maintaining economic operation within a reasonable range, strengthen and improve macro-control, and increase macro-policy cross-cycle adjustment. Improve the forward-looking pertinence of macro-control. Market entities carry hundreds of millions of jobs and entrepreneurship. It is necessary to continue to implement new tax cuts and fee reductions for market players, and help them, especially small and medium-sized enterprises and individual industrial and commercial households, reduce their burdens, relieve their burdens, and resume development. Increase the financing support for the real economy, and promote the increase, expansion and price reduction of financing for small, medium and micro enterprises. Do a good job in the employment of key groups, and implement measures to stabilize employment. Promote financial resources to sink, and better support grass-roots governments to implement the bailout policy to help enterprises and ensure basic people's livelihood, wages and operation. Strengthen the adjustment of coal, electricity, oil and gas transportation, and promote the adequate supply of electricity. It is necessary to deepen the reform in key areas, stimulate the vitality of the market and the endogenous driving force for development, and use the market-oriented mechanism to encourage enterprises to invest in innovation. Promote the common development of the economy of various ownerships, optimize the development environment of the private economy, protect the property rights and legitimate rights and interests of various market players in accordance with the law, and treat the policies equally and equally. Expand high-level opening up, take multiple measures to stabilize foreign trade, ensure the stability of industrial and supply chains, and increase efforts to attract foreign investment. The meeting required that party committees, governments, and leading cadres at all levels must consciously maintain a high degree of consistency with the Party Central Committee, improve political judgment, political understanding, and political execution. They must also learn historical knowledge, cultivate cultural heritage, and strengthen ecological concepts. It must be implemented in actions, in the practical actions of implementing the party's line, principles and policies, in the practical actions in promoting high-quality development, in the practical actions in sharing the worries of the party, fulfilling responsibilities for the country, and dedicating to the people. The meeting pointed out that leading economic work must respect objective reality and the needs of the masses, and must have systematic thinking and scientific planning. To improve the professional ability of leading cadres to lead economic work, economic and social development is a systematic project, which must comprehensively consider various factors such as politics and economy, reality and history, material and culture, development and people's livelihood, resources and ecology, domestic and international factors. Leading cadres should strengthen the study of economic knowledge and scientific and technological knowledge, especially understand the people-centered development thinking, adhere to the correct view of political achievements, respect history, culture, and ecology, make prudent decision-making, and prudently use power. It is necessary to strengthen investigation and research, adhere to the "three stricts and three realities", resolutely prevent simplification and indiscriminate actions, and resolutely oppose inaction and inaction. The meeting emphasized that it is necessary to adhere to "foreign prevention of importation and internal prevention of rebound", and scientifically and accurately do a good job in epidemic prevention and control. It is necessary to make overall arrangements to ensure the supply of coal, electricity, oil and gas transportation. Do a good job in ensuring the supply and price of grain, oil, meat, eggs, milk, fruits and vegetables. Guarantee the payment of wages for migrant workers, and strengthen work safety and public safety. We must do our best to ensure the services of the Winter Olympics and the Winter Paralympic Games to ensure a simple, safe and exciting Olympic event. The meeting called on all Party comrades to unite closely around the Party Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping at its core, strengthen the "four consciousnesses", strengthen the "four self-confidences", achieve "two maintenances", make good use of the achievements of party history learning and education, Implement the decisions and arrangements of the Party Central Committee with practical actions, and welcome the victory of the Party's 20th National Congress. Members of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee, secretary of the Secretariat of the CPC Central Committee, relevant leading comrades of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress, State Councilors, President of the Supreme People's Court, Chief Procurator of the Supreme People's Procuratorate, relevant leading comrades of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference and members of the Central Military Commission attended the meeting. The main responsible comrades of the party and government of all provinces, autonomous regions, municipalities directly under the Central Government, cities under separate state planning, and Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps, relevant departments of the central and state organs, relevant people's organizations, some financial institutions and enterprises managed by the central government, and main responsible comrades of various departments of the Central Military Commission, etc. Meeting.

title: 从拉美视角看“民主灯塔”的真相
text:
在拉丁美洲，多位思想家贡献了他们对民主的真知灼见。委内瑞拉著名历史学家、思想家路易斯·布里托·加西亚认为，民主可视为多数人的主权，而主权是一种不屈服于任何其他势力的至高无上的权力。古巴民族英雄、思想家何塞·马蒂在谈及民主时指出，拉美应该构建属于自己的民主模式。他强调，拉丁美洲不能机械地复制欧洲的政治模式，相反，拉美的政治模式应充分考虑到该地区的特殊性和实际需求。马蒂在其著名的《我们的美洲》一文中写道：“政府的精神应与本国的精神相吻合。政府的形式应符合本国的独有构成。所谓政府，不过是一国诸多构成要素的一种平衡而已。”
  一直以来，美国都以“世界民主自由灯塔”自居。但实际情况真的如此吗？我们不妨通过以下几方面来一探美国式民主的真相。
  一是“言论自由”名不副实。根据世界银行数据，自2008年金融危机开始，直至今日，美国的新闻自由度呈恶化趋势。2008年，美国的新闻自由指数为4，在130个国家中排名第20位。此后，该指数大幅攀升，于2019年达到最差评分，为25.69，在130个国家中排名第48位。当前，该指数较2019年无实质性变化。另一方面，美国门户网站“新闻自由追踪系统”显示，2020年美国发生了425起针对记者的袭击事件，2021年迄今已发生了180起，另有55名记者被捕，34名记者报告说他们的采访设备遭到人为损坏。自2017年以来，至少有120名记者有被传唤或被扣押的记录。
  二是美国选举耗资惊人。根据美国联邦选举委员会的数据，2016年至2020年期间，美国总统选举的竞选开支增加了165%。2016年总统竞选支出超过15.29亿美元，而2020年这一数据达到40.58亿美元，创下历史新高。其中，民主党候选人拜登的竞选支出为31.54亿美元，占总额的78%；共和党候选人特朗普的竞选支出为8.28亿美元，占总额的20%；其他政党候选人的竞选支出占总额的2%。
  三是社会不平等问题严重。当前，美国的收入分配差距处于历史最高水平，与二战爆发前夕的大萧条时期不相上下。根据著名经济学家、巴黎经济学院教授托马斯·皮凯蒂的预测，2021年美国最富有的1%人口将占全国总收入的18.8%，而最贫穷的50%人口将只占全国总收入的13.3%。美国的财富分配不平等也达到了历史最高点。2021年美国最富有的1%的家庭将占全国财富的35.9%，而最贫穷的50%的家庭将只占全国财富的27.4%。
  联合国赤贫和人权问题特别报告员菲利普·奥尔斯顿教授指出，美国的不平等程度比大多数欧洲国家要严重得多。奥尔斯顿教授还警告说，美国的税收政策改革将加剧美国社会撕裂，或使美国成为世界上最不平等的社会。
  四是种族歧视根深蒂固。诚然，美国的奴隶制早已废除，但限制美国黑人参与国家政治、社会和经济生活的种种歧视并未随之消亡。奥尔斯顿教授在一份关于现存多种形式的种族主义、种族歧视和仇外心理的报告中指出，在当今美国，执法部门仍在谋杀和残害非洲裔美国人，这一现象相较以往并未好转，而且这些执法部门几乎不用为此承担责任。在美国，非洲裔成年人被捕入狱的概率是白人成年人的5.9倍。此外，据美国人口普查局的统计，2020年美国总人口的18.7%为拉美裔，人数约为6210万。2021年3月，根据美国独立民调机构皮尤研究中心针对美国拉美裔成年人的一项调查发现，大多数拉美裔表示肤色影响了他们的发展机会，对日常生活也造成了影响。近半数的人表示，基于种族或肤色的歧视是当今美国一个非常严重的问题。诸如此类的种族差异无疑是奴隶制残余，也是美国社会侵犯人权现象的明证。
  最后是拉美移民的人权被侵犯问题。拉丁美洲人的“美国梦”正在变成一场噩梦。从历史上看，美国的民主党和共和党政府都对试图穿越美墨边境的拉美人采取严厉的移民政策。美国政府采取的措施受到了国际社会的强烈谴责。令人遗憾的是，相关问题非但没有解决，反而加剧了危机，严重侵犯移民人权的事件层出不穷。例如，特朗普政府实施的“零容忍”移民政策导致成千上万的家庭“骨肉分离”，其中不乏大量母亲和婴幼儿的分离。据美国海关和边境保护局的数据，截至2021年3月，由美国政府监护的流动儿童数量已突破1.8万名，超过上一年度的1.7万名，且这一数字预计将继续攀升。总而言之，这种对拉美移民的残酷对待充分暴露了“美式人权”的伪善。
  20世纪最有影响力的语言学家、美国著名思想家诺姆·乔姆斯基指出，约70%的美国人（70%的低收入人群）完全脱离政治进程，这表明经济和教育水平和政治动员之间关系紧密，民众对民主丧失热情不足为奇。
  这也不由让人想起马克思关于民主的经典表述：“人民是否有权来为自己建立新的国家制度呢？对这个问题的回答应该是绝对肯定的，因为国家制度如果不再真正表现人民的意志，那它就变成有名无实的东西了。”
  
（作者：艾玛拉·盖德尔，系委内瑞拉中央大学副教授，译者楼宇系中国社会科学院习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想研究中心特约研究员）
en_title: The truth about the "Beacon of Democracy" from a Latin American perspective
en_text: In Latin America, a number of thinkers have contributed their insights into democracy. The famous Venezuelan historian and thinker Luis Brito Garcia believes that democracy can be regarded as the sovereignty of the majority, and sovereignty is a supreme power that does not submit to any other power. Cuban national hero and thinker Jose Martí pointed out when talking about democracy that Latin America should build its own democratic model. He emphasized that Latin America cannot mechanically replicate the European political model. On the contrary, the Latin American political model should fully take into account the particularities and practical needs of the region. Marty wrote in his famous "Our America": "The spirit of government should be in harmony with the spirit of the country. The form of government should be in accordance with the unique constitution of the country. The so-called government is nothing but the many elements of a country. It's just a balance." The United States has always called itself a "beacon of democracy and freedom in the world". But is this really the case? We may wish to explore the truth of American-style democracy through the following aspects. The first is that "freedom of speech" does not live up to its name. According to World Bank data, press freedom in the U.S. has deteriorated since the 2008 financial crisis. In 2008, the United States had a press freedom index of 4, ranking it 20th out of 130 countries. Since then, the index has climbed considerably, reaching its worst rating in 2019 at 25.69, placing it 48th out of 130 countries. Currently, the index is unchanged from 2019. On the other hand, the US portal Press Freedom Tracker shows 425 attacks against journalists in the US in 2020 and 180 so far in 2021, with another 55 journalists arrested and 34 journalists reporting that Their interview equipment was man-made damage. At least 120 journalists have been subpoenaed or detained since 2017. Second, the cost of US elections is staggering. Between 2016 and 2020, campaign spending in U.S. presidential elections increased by 165 percent, according to the Federal Election Commission. In 2016, the presidential campaign spent more than $1.529 billion, and in 2020 it hit a record high of $4.058 billion. Among them, Democratic candidate Biden's campaign spending was $3.154 billion, accounting for 78% of the total; Republican candidate Trump's campaign spending was $828 million, accounting for 20% of the total; other party candidates' campaign spending accounted for the total 2%. Third, the problem of social inequality is serious. Currently, the income distribution gap in the United States is at an all-time high, on par with the Great Depression on the eve of World War II. According to the forecast of Thomas Piketty, a famous economist and professor at the Paris School of Economics, in 2021 the richest 1% of the American population will account for 18.8% of the country's total income, while the poorest 50% of the population will only account for 18.8% of the country's total income. 13.3%. Inequality in the distribution of wealth in the United States has also reached an all-time high. In 2021, the richest 1 percent of U.S. households will account for 35.9 percent of the nation's wealth, while the poorest 50 percent of households will account for only 27.4 percent of the nation's wealth. Professor Philip Alston, the UN Special Rapporteur on extreme poverty and human rights, points out that inequality in the United States is far greater than in most European countries. Professor Alston also warned that tax policy reforms in the United States would exacerbate social divisions in the United States, or make the United States the most unequal society in the world. Fourth, racial discrimination is deeply rooted. It is true that slavery in the United States has long since been abolished, but the discrimination that limited the participation of black Americans in the political, social and economic life of the country has not disappeared with it. In a report on the many existing forms of racism, racial discrimination and xenophobia, Professor Alston pointed out that in the United States today, law enforcement continues to murder and maim more African-Americans than ever before. It's not getting better, and these law enforcement agencies are hardly held accountable for it. In the United States, African-American adults are 5.9 times more likely to be arrested than white adults. In addition, according to the U.S. Census Bureau, 18.7% of the total U.S. population in 2020 is Hispanic, or about 62.1 million. According to a March 2021 survey of Latino American adults by the Pew Research Center, an independent polling agency, a majority of Latinos said that skin color affects their developmental opportunities, as well as daily life. Nearly half said discrimination based on race or color is a very serious problem in America today. Racial disparities such as these are undoubtedly remnants of slavery and evidence of human rights abuses in American society. Finally, there is the issue of human rights violations of Latin American immigrants. The "American Dream" for Latinos is turning into a nightmare. Historically, both Democratic and Republican administrations in the United States have adopted harsh immigration policies against Latinos trying to cross the U.S.-Mexico border. The measures taken by the US government have been strongly condemned by the international community. Regrettably, instead of being resolved, the related issues have exacerbated the crisis, with serious violations of the human rights of migrants emerging. For example, the "zero-tolerance" immigration policy implemented by the Trump administration has resulted in the "separation" of thousands of families, many of them mothers and infants. According to U.S. Customs and Border Protection, as of March 2021, the number of migrant children in the custody of the U.S. government has exceeded 18,000, up from 17,000 the previous year, and the number is expected to continue to climb. All in all, this cruel treatment of Latin American immigrants fully exposed the hypocrisy of "American-style human rights". Noam Chomsky, the most influential linguist in the 20th century and a famous American thinker, pointed out that about 70% of Americans (70% of the low-income group) are completely out of the political process, which shows that the level of economic and education and political Mobilization is closely linked, and it is not surprising that popular enthusiasm for democracy is lost. This is also reminiscent of Marx's classic statement on democracy: "Do the people have the right to establish a new state system for themselves? The answer to this question should be absolutely yes, because if the state system no longer truly expresses the will of the people , then it becomes a real thing.” (Author: Emara Gheidel, associate professor at the Central University of Venezuela, translator Lou Lou, special researcher at the Research Center for Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, Chinese Academy of Social Sciences)

title: 国债业务公告2021年第168号——关于决定第二次续发行2021年记账式附息(十四期)国债的公告
text:
国债业务公告2021年第168号——关于决定第二次续发行2021年记账式附息(十四期)国债的公告
        
        

国债业务公告

（2021年第168号）




　　根据国家国债发行的有关规定，财政部决定第二次续发行2021年记账式附息（十四期）国债，已完成招标工作。现将有关事项公告如下：



　　一、
本次国债计划续发行260亿元，实际续发行面值金额260亿元。
本次续发行国债的起息时间、票面利率等要素均与2021年记账式附息（十四期）国债相同，即起息日为2021年10月18日，票面年利率为3.53%；利息按半年支付，利息支付日为每年的4月18日、10月18日（节假日顺延，下同），2051年10月18日偿还本金并支付最后一次利息。经招标确定的续发行价格为103.53元，折合年收益率为3.37%。本次续发行的国债从招标结束后至2021年12月13日进行分销，从12月15日起与之前发行的同期国债520亿元合并上市交易。

　　其他事宜按《国债业务公告》（2021年第1号）规定执行。

　　特此公告。

     中华人民共和国财政部

　　2021年12月10日

en_text: Government Bond Business Announcement No. 168 [2021] - Announcement on the Decision to Renew the Second Issue of 2021 Book-entry Interest-bearing (Fourteen Tranche) Government Bond Business Announcement (2021 No. 168) The Ministry of Finance has decided to issue the 2021 book-entry interest-bearing (14th tranche) treasury bonds for the second time, and the bidding has been completed.
