title: 簸箕炊
text:
●陈明漂
    簸箕炊是阳西县上洋镇的传统小吃之一，因其采用簸箕为盛具而得名。食用时可用小刀将其划成格状，在其表面放上香油、芝麻与蒜蓉浆（或花生粉）。入口细腻富有弹性，鲜香软滑而不黏牙，再加上秘制的虾酱，香浓而又不腻，那种味道绝对令人难以忘怀。
    簸箕炊广受群众的欢迎，做法一点都不复杂，几乎每个家庭都能做来吃，其原料包括大米（桂溪粘米）、瘦肉、鲜虾、姜末、蒜末、葱花、猪油（适量）、花生油、盐、上洋虾酱（适量）、白芝麻等，随处都能买到。
    做法步骤包括，先将米泡一个晚上，制作一个簸箕炊需要三至四两米。把泡好的米磨成浆，米浆不可太稠，然后把最上面的一层倒出少量，用于制作簸箕炊最上面的那层“皱纹”。鲜虾去壳、瘦肉切成丁后，与蒜末一起下锅炒香，然后将猪油、虾酱下到米浆中搅拌均匀，并用适量的盐调味。待蒸锅烧开水后，将涂上一层花生油的托盘或小簸箕放进锅炊3分钟，然后将米粉浆一层层地分成多次灌入托盘或小簸箕中，蒸熟即可。最后是做皱纹面，这是最难、最辛苦的一道工序。在温度最高的时候取出簸箕炊，倒进一层薄薄的米浆，双手左右来回摇，令其形成皱纹状。大火蒸5—7分钟后，稍微将蒸笼盖子打开一道小口，以令其最上面的蒸汽跑出来，随后盖上盖子、停火，最后下葱花、白芝麻、花生油。
    停火5—10分钟后，将簸箕炊拿出来放凉，至此，一道美味可口的传统小吃簸箕炊大功告成。
en_title: Dustpan
en_text: ●Chen Mingbiao Dustpan cooking is one of the traditional snacks in Shangyang Town, Yangxi County. When eating, use a knife to cut it into a grid, and put sesame oil, sesame and garlic paste (or peanut powder) on its surface. The entrance is delicate and elastic, fragrant and soft and not sticky to the teeth. Coupled with the secret shrimp paste, it is fragrant but not greasy. The taste is absolutely unforgettable. Dustpan cooking is widely welcomed by the masses. The practice is not complicated at all. Almost every family can make it and eat it. The raw materials include rice (Guixi sticky rice), lean meat, fresh shrimp, minced ginger, minced garlic, chopped green onion, lard (in moderation), peanut oil, salt, Shangyang shrimp paste (in moderation), white sesame seeds, etc., can be bought anywhere. The steps include soaking the rice overnight, and making a dustpan requires three to four or two meters. Grind the soaked rice into a slurry, the rice slurry should not be too thick, and then pour out a small amount of the top layer to make the "wrinkle" on the top layer of the dustpan cooker. Peel the shrimp and cut the lean meat into cubes, stir-fry with minced garlic until fragrant, then add the lard and shrimp paste into the rice milk, stir evenly, and season with an appropriate amount of salt. After the water in the steamer is boiled, put the tray or small dustpan coated with a layer of peanut oil into the pot to cook for 3 minutes, then divide the rice flour slurry into layers and pour it into the tray or small dustpan several times, and steam it. The last step is to make the wrinkle surface, which is the most difficult and laborious process. When the temperature is the highest, take out the dustpan, pour in a thin layer of rice milk, and shake it back and forth with both hands to form wrinkles. After steaming on high heat for 5-7 minutes, slightly open the lid of the steamer to let the top steam escape, then cover the lid, stop the fire, and finally add chopped green onion, white sesame and peanut oil. After 5-10 minutes of ceasefire, take out the dustpan and let it cool. At this point, a delicious traditional snack, the dustpan, is complete.

title: 引进重大项目最高奖6000万元
text:
近日，“遇见大鹏 预见未来”2021大鹏新区大鹏办事处招商推介会在玫瑰庄园艺术中心举行。大鹏办事处通过“云端”发出邀约，当日60余家企业踊跃参会，现场签署12项合作框架协议。据悉，本次招商推介会有针对性地邀请相关科研单位、重点企业，涉及医药健康、科技、文化旅游等领域。
    会上推介了大鹏办事处的区位优势和发展布局、项目建设、远景规划等。大鹏街道位于大鹏半岛中部，东濒大亚湾，西临大鹏湾，为粤港澳大湾区东部海陆中央核心，是深圳东部的经济、文化重镇，不仅生态优美，更是生机勃发的发展热土。辖区坐拥大鹏所城旅游区、金沙湾滨海旅游度假区，为大鹏新区旅游门户；汇集了国家基因库、中国农业科学院深圳农业基因组研究所等科研机构，为深圳科研高地；齐聚泰康之家·鹏园、颐和金沙等高端康养社区是大鹏湾康养福地；聚集了大亚湾核电站等大型能源企业，为国家级核电、气电、天然气基地。
    新常态下的招商，既要拼政策、拼优惠、拼资源，更要拼战略、拼服务、拼环境。
    大鹏办事处积极落实大鹏新区“1+6”产业政策，为辖区企业，特别是科技创新和产业发展、支持总部企业和高成长性企业、生物产业、科技研发促进技术创新、制造业高质量发展、商贸服务业等提供优质惠企服务。其中，大鹏办事处为辖区企业提供优质惠企服务，重大项目招商引进最高可奖励6000万元。
    在土地政策优惠方面，除配套商业部分外，重点产业项目用地出让底价按照市场价格的一定比例确定。遴选方案确定为单一意向用地单位的，按照市场价格70%确定。遴选方案确定有两个及两个以上意向用地单位联合申请的，按照市场价格60%确定。新一代信息技术、高端装备制造、绿色低碳、生物医药、数字经济、新材料、海洋经济等战略性新兴产业、生产性现代服务业及优势传统产业项目用地出让底价按照市场价格50%确定。
    会上，5家企业代表通过线上线下方式进行项目分享。其中，参会企业代表殷商王朝乙丙丁（国际）健康产业集团有限公司董事长宋玲鋆表示，“通过此次招商推介会，对大鹏有了更深的了解，大鹏的生态环境和康养产业发展具有得天独厚的优势，我们将积极抓住大鹏发展的新机遇，推进与大鹏在医药健康领域的广泛合作。”
    郑婷婷 李若石 胡珍秀
en_title: The highest award for introducing major projects is 60 million yuan
en_text: Recently, the "Meet Dapeng, Foresee the Future" 2021 Dapeng New District Dapeng Office Investment Promotion Conference was held at the Rose Manor Art Center. The Dapeng Office issued an invitation through the "cloud", and more than 60 companies actively participated in the meeting on the same day, and signed 12 cooperation framework agreements on the spot. It is reported that this investment promotion will invite relevant scientific research units and key enterprises in a targeted manner, involving fields such as medicine and health, science and technology, cultural tourism and so on. At the meeting, the location advantages, development layout, project construction and long-term planning of Dapeng Office were introduced. Dapeng Street is located in the middle of Dapeng Peninsula, adjacent to Daya Bay in the east and Dapeng Bay in the west. It is the core of the eastern sea and land center of the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area. It is an important economic and cultural town in the east of Shenzhen. . The area under the jurisdiction is located in Dapeng City Tourist Area and Jinshawan Coastal Tourist Resort, which is the tourism portal of Dapeng New District; it brings together scientific research institutions such as the National Gene Bank, Shenzhen Institute of Agricultural Genomics, Chinese Academy of Agricultural Sciences, and is a scientific research highland in Shenzhen; Gathered in Taikang Home · Pengyuan, Yihe Sands and other high-end health care communities are Dapeng Bay health and well-being places; large-scale energy companies such as Daya Bay Nuclear Power Station are gathered, and they are national-level nuclear power, gas power, and natural gas bases. Investment promotion under the new normal requires not only policies, discounts, and resources, but also strategies, services, and environment. Dapeng Office actively implements the "1+6" industrial policy of Dapeng New Area, and promotes technological innovation for enterprises in the area, especially technological innovation and industrial development, support for headquarters enterprises and high-growth enterprises, bio-industry, technological research and development, and manufacturing high-tech enterprises. Quality development, business services, etc. provide high-quality services that benefit enterprises. Among them, the Dapeng Office provides high-quality beneficial enterprise services for enterprises in the jurisdiction, and the investment promotion and introduction of major projects can be rewarded up to 60 million yuan. In terms of preferential land policies, except for the supporting commercial part, the reserve price of land for key industrial projects is determined according to a certain percentage of the market price. If the selection plan is determined as a single intended land use unit, it shall be determined at 70% of the market price. If the selection plan determines that there are two or more intending land use units to apply jointly, it will be determined at 60% of the market price. The reserve price of land for new-generation information technology, high-end equipment manufacturing, green and low-carbon, biomedicine, digital economy, new materials, marine economy and other strategic emerging industries, productive modern service industries and advantageous traditional industry projects is determined at 50% of the market price. At the meeting, representatives of 5 companies shared projects online and offline. Among them, Song Lingjun, chairman of Yinshang Dynasty Yibingding (International) Health Industry Group Co., Ltd., representative of the participating companies, said, "Through this investment promotion conference, I have a deeper understanding of Dapeng, Dapeng's ecological environment and health care industry. Development has unique advantages, and we will actively seize the new opportunities of Dapeng's development and promote extensive cooperation with Dapeng in the field of medicine and health." Zheng Tingting Li Ruoshi Hu Zhenxiu

title: 探索“1+N”模式  服务基层零距离
text:
“一年的工作总结为‘1+N’，以党建工作为主业，兼N项基层工作，注重把党建融入基层工作中，担任着基层党建工作指导员、宣讲政策理论宣传员、信息传达联络员、督促落实组织员、联系帮扶服务员等角色。”近日，廉江市派驻青平镇的党建指导员梁华锴将过去一年的工作状态概括为“1+N”工作模式。
    梁华锴是廉江市首次创新性向21个镇（街道）党（工）委和市直工委派驻的专职党建指导员中的一员。建立专职党建指导员队伍是是廉江市委组织部加强基层党建工作，有力推动各项基层组织建设工作落实的生动缩影。
    南方日报记者 李廷睿
    通讯员 张思燕 符颖庆
    创新模式
    建立专业化培养机制
    2019年3月，廉江市党建指导中心正式挂牌成立。针对解决乡镇基层党组织党建工作力量薄弱，专职党建工作干部较少，党员干部教育管理制度抓的不紧等问题，廉江市委组织部首次创新性向21个镇（街道）党（工）委和市直工委派驻至少2名专职党建指导员，负责督促和推动驻点单位党建工作。
    经过近两年的锻炼，目前，该市专职党建指导员共47人，其中本科学历占比83.70%，35岁以下占比95.30%。“专职党建指导员队伍助推基层党建工作力量提档升级，激发基层党建工作活力，畅通基层党建‘最后一公里’，打通全市上下联动党建网络，是一支高水平、专业化、能力强的队伍。”廉江市委组织部有关负责人表示，为了构建多元化、多层次、多形式的党建指导员培养机制，他们详细制定党建指导员培养计划。实行岗前培训和定期培训制度，将党建指导员培训纳入“书记课堂”“初心课堂”“组工课堂”组工干部培训，组织到红色革命教育基地、党建引领乡村振兴示范村、爱国主义教育基地开展现场讲学观摩。定期开展岗位大练兵，举办多次党建知识竞赛、业务讲学评比等活动，不同驻点党建指导员之间相互交流借鉴先进经验。
    同时，建立“帮传带”学习制度。由市委组织部业务股室负责人负责与跟班学习的党建指导员一对一业务指导，参与组织和干部管理工作，每周五常态化开展“一小时”集中学习活动。由市党建指导中心负责对党建指导员的日常管理和协调服务工作，明确党建指导员的职责任务和工作要求，每年底对党建指导员开展年度履职考核。去年，评出了7名优秀党建指导员。
    “开展党建过程中，出现不少困境和难题。首先一个就是动员的问题。”廉江市委组织部有关负责人介绍，如果党建单位、基层党建工作者难以打破惯性思维，就无法将新发展理念运用于基层党建，容易造成基层党建的融合性、开放性、差异性不足。
    以党建需求为导向，廉江市配齐配强动员教育队伍，镇街、机关、企业、园区党校由党（工）委书记任校长，分管领导任副校长。党校专职教师、党政领导干部企事业单位领导、先进典型人物、“五老”人员等各类专兼职党建指导员被纳入师资库。邻居理事会、“胜哥调解工作室”、“和家工作室”、老干部商事议事所等一批基层治理点纷纷建立。这些治理点整合党建、综治、创文、生态环保、卫生健康、应急管理等资源，打造全科网格，实行“市—街道—社区—网格—邻居理事会”五级网格化管理模式，激发城市居民以主人翁精神参与共建共治共享。
    通过建立专业化培养机制，廉江市基层党建的“触手”得以延伸、“经脉”得以疏通、“细胞”得以激活。党建引领之下，机关企事业单位及“两新”组织党员网格化、实体化、实名化融入城市基层党建的具体活动中，把基层众多党员组织起来，把城市各界人才凝聚起来，把社区广大居民动员起来，社会资源、管理权限和民生服务下放，提升了机关党员和社区居民对城市党建的认同感和支持度，强化了社区的为民、便民、安民功能。
    建强队伍
    打造基层党建“主力军”
    像梁华锴身兼“1+N”份工作的党建指导员在廉江还有许多，派驻石城镇的党建指导员吴肖蓉和黄彩珊助力村级党建阵地建设，持续跟进坡头村党支部“初心课堂”建设；派驻车板镇的党建指导员林华枫制定农村图文并茂的发展党员小册子，严守住党员发展“入口关”，主动对接有关部门开通党费专户网上转账功能，方便农村党员网上定期缴纳党费；派驻新民镇的党建指导员卢境志是一名返乡工作的“90后”大学生，坚持多下乡倾听民声，深入群众中谈心交流，为群众服务好每件事；派驻城北街道党建指导员马泽宇充分发挥自身工作经验和教育资源，创办青年干部培训夜校。
    派驻基层后，党建指导员负责宣传贯彻习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想、开展党史学习教育以及落实党建业务等工作，联系督促农村党组织开展各项党建工作，指导完成“三会一课”、组织生活会、发展党员、阵地规范化、村级换届等工作，挖掘驻点单位特色党建和总结经验，助力党建引领脱贫攻坚和乡村振兴有效衔接。
    针对基层组织信息“堵点”难题，廉江市委组织部建立“周报季结年考”管理机制，出台《党建指导员两周工作事项报告》《重大工作请示报告制度》等反馈制度，根据阶段重点工作任务分别细化信息反馈机制和报告制度，派驻的党建指导员每两周定期上报工作开展情况，在关键时刻上报重要信息，打破以往基层上报不及时的信息阻碍壁垒，为廉江市全市党建工作提供第一手资料，及早对问题难点进行“精准施策”。据统计，党建指导员队伍累计上报周报528篇工作信息，累计撰写各类基层党建建议信息稿138篇，在廉江村级换届工作中，共报送785条专项信息，其中有5条信息为更好推进工作提供重要参考。
    “工作最忙的时候想起70多年前粤桂边革命先烈为解放事业浴血奋战，这种山底精神深深激励了我。”派驻石角镇的党建指导员廖有喜在做好全镇党建工作的同时，兼任着山腰村驻队工作。廖有喜所在的石角镇党建工作办公室正是廉江市积极探索开创省际边界党建联盟的工作站之一，他负责工作站的日常联络事务工作，带队组织粤桂边各地党员干部到山底红色革命教育基地参观学习。
    自派驻工作开展以来，该支党建指导员队伍累计发展1886名党员，规范化建设398个村级党组织党建阵地，到村（社区）党组织走访400多次，开展各类政策宣讲250次，为基层党建发展提出合理化意见1000余条。
    “党建指导员非常踏实、肯干、能干。”廉江市青平镇党委书记钟桂林表示，党建指导员队伍扎根在基层，把党建融入脱贫攻坚和乡村振兴等各项工作中，发挥出党员的先锋模范作用。廉江市委组织部有关负责人表示，下一步，廉江市将继续充实该支党建指导员队伍，扩大覆盖派驻单位，建立党建指导员服务党员群众需求诉求和指导督办党建业务的“点单式”服务。
en_title: Explore the "1+N" model to serve the grassroots zero distance
en_text: "One year's work is summarized as '1+N', with party building as the main business, and N grass-roots work, focusing on integrating party building into grass-roots work, serving as grass-roots party building work instructor, policy and theory propagandist, and information communication liaison role as an organizer, supervising the implementation of organizers, and contacting and assisting waiters." Recently, Liang Huakai, a party building instructor dispatched by Lianjiang City to Qingping Town, summarized the work status of the past year as a "1+N" work model. Liang Huakai is one of the full-time party building instructors that Lianjiang City innovatively dispatched to 21 town (street) party (work) committees and municipal direct work committees for the first time. The establishment of a team of full-time party building instructors is a vivid epitome of the Lianjiang Municipal Party Committee Organization Department strengthening the grass-roots party building work and effectively promoting the implementation of various grass-roots organization construction work. Nanfang Daily reporter Li Tingrui Correspondent Zhang Siyan Fu Yingqing Innovative model Establishing a professional training mechanism In March 2019, the Lianjiang Party Building Guidance Center was officially established. In order to solve the problems of weak party building work force in township grass-roots party organizations, few full-time party building cadres, and insufficient attention to the education and management system of party members and cadres, the Organization Department of Lianjiang Municipal Party Committee innovatively provided 21 town (street) Party (work) committees and cadres for the first time. The Municipal Direct Work Committee dispatches at least 2 full-time party building instructors to supervise and promote the party building work of the stationed units. After nearly two years of training, there are currently 47 full-time party building instructors in the city, of which 83.70% have undergraduate degrees and 95.30% are under the age of 35. "The team of full-time party building instructors promotes the upgrading of grassroots party building work forces, stimulates the vitality of grassroots party building work, unblocks the 'last mile' of grassroots party building, and opens up the city's top-down linkage party building network. It is a high-level, professional and capable team. ." The relevant person in charge of the Organization Department of the Lianjiang Municipal Party Committee said that in order to build a diversified, multi-level and multi-form party building instructor training mechanism, they formulated a party building instructor training plan in detail. Implement the pre-job training and regular training system, incorporate the training of party building instructors into the "secretary class", "beginning class" and "organization class" to organize the training of cadres, and organize them to the Red Revolution Education Base, Party Building Leading Rural Revitalization Demonstration Village, and Patriotism Education Base Conduct on-site lectures and observations. Regularly carry out post training, hold many party building knowledge competitions, business lectures and evaluations and other activities, and exchange and learn from advanced experience between party building instructors at different locations. At the same time, establish a "help-passing" learning system. The person in charge of the Business Unit of the Organization Department of the Municipal Party Committee is responsible for one-on-one business guidance with the party building instructors who study with the class, participates in the organization and cadre management, and conducts "one-hour" centralized learning activities on a regular basis every Friday. The Municipal Party Construction Guidance Center is responsible for the daily management and coordination of the party construction instructors, clarifying the responsibilities, tasks and work requirements of the party construction instructors, and conducting an annual performance assessment for the party construction instructors at the end of each year. Last year, seven outstanding party building instructors were selected. "In the process of party building, there are many difficulties and problems. The first one is the problem of mobilization." The relevant person in charge of the Organization Department of the Lianjiang Municipal Party Committee introduced that if it is difficult for party building units and grass-roots party building workers to break the inertial thinking, they will not be able to apply new development concepts. It is easy to cause the lack of integration, openness and differentiation of grass-roots party building when applied to grass-roots party building. Guided by the needs of party building, Lianjiang City is equipped with a strong mobilization education team. The party school of towns, offices, enterprises and parks is headed by the secretary of the party (work) committee, and the leader in charge is the vice-president. Party school full-time teachers, party and government leading cadres, enterprise leaders, advanced typical figures, "five old" personnel and other full-time and part-time party building instructors are included in the teacher pool. A number of grassroots governance points have been established, including the Neighborhood Council, "Shenge Mediation Studio", "Hejia Studio", and the Veteran Cadre Business Council. These governance points integrate resources such as party building, comprehensive governance, cultural creation, ecological environmental protection, health and health, emergency management, etc. model, and inspire urban residents to participate in co-construction, co-governance and sharing with the spirit of ownership. Through the establishment of a specialized training mechanism, the "tentacles" of grassroots party building in Lianjiang City can be extended, the "meridians" can be dredged, and the "cells" can be activated. Under the leadership of party building, government agencies, enterprises, institutions and "two new" organizations have integrated party members into grids, substantiation, and real names into the specific activities of urban grassroots party building. The majority of residents have been mobilized, and social resources, management authority, and people's livelihood services have been decentralized, which has enhanced the identification and support of party members and community residents for the city's party building, and strengthened the community's functions of serving the people, facilitating the people, and bringing peace to the people. Build a strong team to build the "main force" of grass-roots party building. There are many party building instructors like Liang Huakai who has a "1+N" job in Lianjiang. The party building instructors Wu Xiaorong and Huang Caishan, who are stationed in Shicheng Town, help the construction of village-level party building positions and continue to follow up. The Party branch of Potou Village built the "beginning classroom"; sent Lin Huafeng, a party building instructor stationed in Cheban Town, to formulate a brochure for the development of party members in rural areas, strictly guarding the "entry gate" for the development of party members, and actively connected with relevant departments to open the online transfer function of the special account for party fees, which is convenient Rural party members regularly pay party dues online; Lu Jingzhi, a party building instructor stationed in Xinmin Town, is a post-90s college student who has returned to his hometown to work. Ma Zeyu, a party building instructor in Chengbei Street, gave full play to his work experience and educational resources to set up a night school for young cadres training. After being stationed at the grassroots level, the party building instructors are responsible for publicizing and implementing Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, carrying out party history learning and education, and implementing party building business, contact and urge rural party organizations to carry out various party building work, and guide the completion of "three meetings and one lesson", Organize life meetings, develop party members, standardize positions, and change the village level, explore the characteristics of party building in the resident units and summarize experience, and help party building lead poverty alleviation and effectively connect with rural revitalization. In response to the problem of "blocking" information in grass-roots organizations, the Organization Department of the Lianjiang Municipal Party Committee has established a management mechanism for "weekly reports and quarterly annual examinations", and introduced feedback systems such as "Party Construction Instructors Two-week Work Items Report" and "Major Work Request Report System". The work tasks are to refine the information feedback mechanism and reporting system. The dispatched party building instructors regularly report the work progress every two weeks, report important information at critical moments, break the previous information barriers that the grassroots reported untimely, and contribute to the party building work in Lianjiang City. Provide first-hand information, and implement "precise measures" on problems and difficulties as soon as possible. According to statistics, the party building instructor team has submitted a total of 528 work information in the weekly report, and has written a total of 138 information drafts of various grass-roots party building suggestions. It provides important reference for promoting the work well. "When I was the busiest at work, I remembered that the revolutionary martyrs in Guangdong and Guangxi fought bloody battles for the liberation cause more than 70 years ago. This spirit of the bottom of the mountain deeply inspired me." At the same time, he also served as the garrison work in Shanyao Village. The Shijiao Town Party Construction Office where Liao Youxi is located is one of the workstations where Lianjiang City is actively exploring the establishment of an inter-provincial boundary party building alliance. He is responsible for the daily liaison affairs of the workstation, and leads the team to organize party members and cadres from all over Guangdong and Guangxi to the red at the bottom of the mountain. Visit and study at the Revolutionary Education Base. Since the dispatch work began, the team of party building instructors has developed a total of 1,886 party members, standardized the construction of 398 village-level party organization party building positions, visited village (community) party organizations more than 400 times, and carried out various policy presentations 250 times. Party building development put forward more than 1,000 rationalization opinions. "Party building instructors are very down-to-earth, willing and capable." Zhong Guilin, secretary of the Party Committee of Qingping Town, Lianjiang City, said that the team of party building instructors is rooted at the grassroots level, integrating party building into various tasks such as poverty alleviation and rural revitalization, and playing a pioneering role in party members. exemplary role. The relevant person in charge of the Organization Department of the Lianjiang Municipal Party Committee said that in the next step, Lianjiang City will continue to enrich the team of party building instructors, expand the coverage of dispatched units, and establish an "order-based" service for party building instructors to serve the needs of the party members and the masses and guide and supervise the party building business. .

title: 坚决捍卫“两个确立” 坚定践行“两个维护”-
text:
□本报记者 宋灵云
    从胜利走向新的更大胜利。
    在中国共产党成立100周年的重要历史时刻，在“两个一百年”奋斗目标的历史交汇点，党的十九届六中全会审议通过《中共中央关于党的百年奋斗重大成就和历史经验的决议》，发出新时代中国共产党人牢记初心使命、坚持和发展中国特色社会主义的政治宣言。习近平总书记深刻指出，全面总结党的百年奋斗的重大成就和历史经验，对统一全党思想和行动、在新时代更好开创党和国家事业新局面，具有重大现实意义和深远历史意义。
    连日来，从公安部党委到全国各地基层所队党支部，各级公安机关党组织持续掀起学习贯彻党的十九届六中全会精神的热潮，广大公安民警自觉把思想和行动统一到习近平总书记重要讲话和全会精神上来，把智慧和力量凝聚到党中央重大决策部署上来，以更加昂扬的姿态护航新征程、建功新时代。
    深刻领会“两个确立”的决定性意义，增强“两个维护”的高度自觉
    壮阔的征程，需要领航的力量。
    确立习近平同志党中央的核心、全党的核心地位，确立习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想的指导地位，是时代呼唤、历史选择、民心所向。
    公安机关是党和人民手中的“刀把子”。深刻认识“两个确立”的决定性意义，是人民公安政治属性的必然要求，是公安机关加强政治建设的有效路径。公安部党委召开一系列会议，作出一系列部署要求，每一次都开宗明义指出“两个确立”的重大意义、实践要求——
    “深刻认识‘两个确立’对新时代党和国家事业发展、对推进中华民族伟大复兴历史进程具有的决定性意义。”在公安部直属机关传达贯彻党的十九届六中全会精神干部大会上，公安部党委明确强调；
    “始终坚持‘两个维护’这一最高政治原则和根本政治规矩。”在公安部党委理论学习中心组学习研讨（扩大）会议上，公安部党委作出要求；
    “增强忠诚核心、拥护核心、跟随核心、捍卫核心的高度自觉。”在印发全警的《关于认真学习贯彻党的十九届六中全会精神的通知》中，公安部党委发出号令……
    紧跟步伐，紧锣密鼓。公安部党委号令如山，全国各级公安机关步调一致。
    在公安部机关，在基层所队，在边疆口岸，在安保一线……广大公安民警通过理论学习中心组学习、专题辅导、政治轮训、青年小组学习等形式，深刻认识“两个确立”的决定性意义，深刻认识“两个维护”的历史必然性和极端重要性，在锤炼绝对忠诚的政治品格上达到新高度。
    公安部特勤局教育引导各级公安特勤部门切实增强忠诚核心、拥护核心、跟随核心、捍卫核心的高度自觉；中国人民公安大学不断深化“两个确立”的研究阐释和宣传教育；北京市公安局坚定不移维护首都安全稳定，提前谋划党的二十大安保工作……
    “两个确立”是保障公安工作取得成功的法宝，也是检验公安工作的试金石。
    中央纪委国家监委驻公安部纪检监察组副组长刘文玺表示，要以更大力度强化政治监督，督促抓好习近平总书记重要指示批示精神和党中央重大决策部署在公安机关落实落地。河北省张家口市副市长、公安局局长郭铁铮决心把对党绝对忠诚转化为保障冬奥之力、维护公平之举、服务民生之践，为成功举办一届“简约、安全、精彩”的冬奥盛会贡献公安力量。
    从党的百年奋斗中汲取智慧和力量，锻造高素质过硬公安铁军
    “让我们一起讲好党的百年奋斗历程，做红色根脉的坚定守护者……”近日，在浙江绍兴市民的微信朋友圈，一段民警用绍兴评话宣讲党的十九届六中全会精神的视频火了。
    “通过非遗曲艺，基层宣讲变得绘声绘色、深入人心。”绍兴市公安局青年民警杨迪十分喜欢这种宣讲形式。连日来，绍兴市公安局组建成立由“局领导+老民警+先进典型+青警宣讲员+基层骨干+优秀教官”组成的“大宣讲团”，深入警营开展富有特色的宣讲活动，教育引导民警从党的百年奋斗历程中汲取智慧和力量，进一步锻造高素质过硬公安铁军。
    在新的赶考路上，全国公安机关坚持和发扬党百年奋斗的宝贵历史经验，把“十个坚持”同习近平总书记“七一”重要讲话中提出的“九个必须”结合起来，以史为鉴、开创未来，以更加昂扬的姿态护航新征程、建功新时代。
    坚持党的领导——上海公安机关以党建带队建、以党风强警风、以党务促业务；安徽公安机关把学习党的理论、加强理想信念教育作为育警铸魂、固本培元的战略性工程常抓不懈。
    坚持开拓创新——公安部物证鉴定中心加快重大科研平台建设，全面提升重大科研攻关和成果产出水平；广东公安机关积极稳妥推进警务机制和勤务制度改革，进一步深化公安“放管服”改革。
    坚持敢于斗争——公安部情报指挥中心全体党员民警发扬斗争精神，下好先手棋、打好主动仗；新疆公安机关切实打好反恐维稳组合拳，确保岁末年初社会大局安全稳定。
    坚持自我革命——黑龙江公安机关通过冬季整训扎实推进第二批公安队伍教育整顿“回头看”，推动队伍革命化正规化专业化职业化建设；重庆公安机关深入推进党风廉政建设和反腐败斗争，在严明纪律、改进作风、真抓实干上形成长效机制……
    铁一般的理想信念、铁一般的责任担当、铁一般的过硬本领、铁一般的纪律作风。全国公安机关深刻认识到，注重总结宝贵经验才能获得启迪、行稳致远，善于传承精神财富才能汲取智慧、克敌制胜。
    切实把学习成果转化为强大工作动力，努力争取更大的光荣
    12月6日，在公安部组织的“团圆”行动认亲仪式现场，当被拐14年的儿子孙卓推开门的一瞬间，父亲孙海洋冲了上去，紧紧地抱着他。这一刻，跨越山川与人海的团圆，让人热泪盈眶。
    为人民而战，为正义而战。全国公安机关积极探索、综合应用新技术新手段，充分依托DNA信息库、人像比对等新技术，不断开辟查找失踪被拐儿童的新渠道、新方法，在“团圆”行动中累计找回历年失踪被拐儿童8307名。
    “要切实把学习成果转化为做好新时代公安工作的强大动力，以更加昂扬的姿态护航新征程、建功新时代，以优异成绩迎接党的二十大胜利召开。”公安部党委精准指导，确保全会精神落到实处、取得实效。
    全国公安机关以此为要求，紧紧围绕贯彻落实习近平总书记重要指示批示精神和推进党中央重大决策部署，切实找准学习贯彻的切入点着力点，潜心绘制铭记初心、勇担使命的时代风“警”——
    公安部法制局聚焦法治公安建设目标，深入整治执法顽瘴痼疾，全国已建成执法办案管理中心2794个；公安部交通管理局全面推行驾驶证电子化、二手车异地交易登记、“交管12123”App核发货车电子通行码、交通事故证据材料网上查阅等4项“我为群众办实事”改革措施；内蒙古公安机关在“疫”线检验学习成效，600名警力紧急驰援满洲里；山东公安机关紧盯黄河流域58处自然保护地，重点打击危害珍贵、濒危野生动物、非法猎捕等破坏野生动物犯罪；云南公安机关启动和全国所有省、市、区的户口迁移及开具户籍类证明“跨省通办”……
    如火的实践处处开花，如风的行动彰显担当；捍卫政治安全，维护社会安定，保障人民安宁。眺望前方的奋进路，全国公安机关斗志昂扬——“充分发挥公安机关职能作用，增强锚定既定奋斗目标、意气风发走向未来的勇气和力量，在实现第二个百年奋斗目标的伟大征程中努力创造更加辉煌的业绩，为党和人民争取更大光荣。”
    （本报北京12月9日电）
en_title: Resolutely defend the "two establishments" and firmly practice the "two maintenances"-
en_text: □ Our reporter Song Lingyun moved from victory to new and greater victory. At the important historical moment of the 100th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of China, and at the historical intersection of the "two centenary goals", the Sixth Plenary Session of the 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China deliberated and approved the "Central Committee of the Communist Party of China on Major Achievements and Historical Experiences of the Party's Centennial Struggle" Resolution", issued a political declaration that the Chinese Communists in the new era will keep their original aspirations in mind and uphold and develop socialism with Chinese characteristics. General Secretary Xi Jinping pointed out that comprehensively summarizing the major achievements and historical experience of the party's century-long struggle is of great practical significance and far-reaching historical significance for unifying the thinking and actions of the whole party and better opening up a new situation for the cause of the party and the country in the new era. In the past few days, from the Party Committee of the Ministry of Public Security to the Party branches of grass-roots teams across the country, the Party organizations of public security organs at all levels have continued to set off an upsurge of learning and implementing the spirit of the Sixth Plenary Session of the 19th Central Committee of the Party. The Secretary's important speech and the spirit of the plenary meeting gathered wisdom and strength into the major decision-making and deployment of the Party Central Committee, and escorted the new journey and contributed to the new era with a more high-spirited attitude. To deeply understand the decisive significance of the "two establishments" and to enhance the highly conscious and magnificent journey of the "two maintenances" requires the power of piloting. title: 绿水青山育优品 橙园飘香结硕果
text:
寒冬时节，微风拂过九洲江畔。廉江山野间一串串红橙随风摇动，宛如一个个黄澄澄的灯笼，渲染出丰收的亮色。
    一江碧水如碎银，满山苍翠铺黄金。廉江的水土，是橙子的天选之地。这里年平均气温为22.9℃，西南部一带的花岗岩成土母质土壤和充足的阳光，孕育了品质最优的红橙。红橙种植面积8.2万亩，从业人员近10万人，廉江市也因此被称为“中国红橙之乡”。
    时代变换，美味不变。如今，越来越多的橙农开始尝试新事物，做主播、上网络……越来越多的廉江红橙走向国内外的餐桌。
    地理位置优越▶ 造就汁多酸甜的岭南佳果
    摘一个红橙，只见果皮圆滑细腻，透露着金色光泽，拿在手里沉甸甸的，“正宗的廉江红橙，必须是汁多皮薄的，并且甜中带酸。”这话不假，咬一口，红橙汁液忙不迭地顺着嘴角留下，糖分与酸度完美平衡，每一口都在惹动细微的乡愁。
    红橙11月开始成熟。经过寒风吹过，它的风味才能积淀。“廉江处于亚热带，11、12月的昼夜温差大，经时累日，便养就了嫩滑化渣、酸甜适中的红橙。”
    说话的果农郭桂仙种植红橙已经有十几年了。从初期的20余亩到如今承包多个橙园、传输种橙养橙技术，郭大姐每天都与红橙为伴。“我们这里阳光充足，土壤又是最适合种植的，不种出好的红橙都难啊。”郭大姐一边采摘红橙，一边感慨起来。
    廉江红橙母株发现于廉江市内的国营红江农场1960年种植的新会橙园中。此后历经多年发展，廉江红橙名扬四海。去年5月，中国地理标志保护产品廉江红橙入选第一批全国名特优新农产品名录。
    但其实种植红橙风险不小。“柑橘黄龙病”一直被视为“柑橘癌症”。郭大姐说以前不少果农不善管理，橙子得黄龙病，一棵橙子树只能活个三四年。“很多人种着种着就不种了，外出找出路了。”今年，廉江果况不错，市场价一般是7—10元一斤，很多人丰产又丰收。
    线上线下联动▶ 扩大廉江红橙的知名度
    “大家好，我是郭大姐，这里是我的果园。我家的红橙汁多皮薄，欢迎大家前来采摘……”郭大姐对着手机屏幕一遍又一遍地录制视频。
    郭大姐生性爽朗，但面对镜头还是有些腼腆。她操着一口不太流利的普通话，笑着说：“现在好多橙园的负责人都录制视频推介自己的橙子，我也想尝试一下。”
    如今，通过升级品牌、拓展渠道，廉江红橙陆续进驻新零售巨头盒马鲜生等超市。同时借助现代互联网电商平台以及物联网技术，在京东、天猫、盒马鲜生、沃尔玛超市、大润发超市等全国各大超市，廉江红橙实现了全渠道覆盖。此外，还依托橙乡味道、岭南廉江红橙电子营销平台、湛大电商、供销E家等本地在线电商企业进行销售。
    在廉江，传统果农、新农人甚至政府部门都在合力把有关红橙的故事讲好。廉江正在推广无病苗种植，果农在新技术的推广下日子越过越好。
    一些土生土长的“新农人”也甘愿放弃高薪工作回乡推广红橙——廉江市橙乡人家农业发展有限公司的总经理麦丹与公司年轻人以“红线橙”为蓝本，写了一个“以橙结缘”的剧本，自导自演并在各短视频平台播送。
    去年，廉江大型原创歌调音乐剧《红橙奇缘》以红橙为媒，串联非遗、乡村振兴、传说故事等元素，讲述一代人在乡村中种植红橙的新故事。
    今年，廉江制定国家地理标志保护产品“廉江红橙”品牌标准，助推廉江红橙产业提档升级。有关廉江红橙的保护与推广，正在廉江这片大地一代又一代地接续上演。
    撰文：康韵怡 摄影：郭龙碧
en_title: Clear waters and green hills, yuyoupin orange orchards are fragrant and fruitful
en_text: In the cold winter season, the breeze blows by the Jiuzhou River. Strings of red oranges sway in the wind in the mountains and fields of Lianjiang, like yellow lanterns, rendering the bright colors of the harvest. A river of clear water is like broken silver, and the mountains are full of green and gold. The water and soil of the Lianjiang River is the perfect place for oranges. The average annual temperature here is 22.9°C, and the granite parent soil and abundant sunlight in the southwest have bred the best-quality red oranges. The planting area of red oranges is 82,000 mu, with nearly 100,000 employees. Lianjiang City is also known as the "Hometown of Red Oranges in China". Times change, but the taste remains the same. Nowadays, more and more orange farmers are beginning to try new things, becoming anchors, going online... More and more Lianjiang red oranges are going to the dining table at home and abroad. Strategic location ▶ Create a juicy and sweet Lingnan Jiaguo to pick a red orange, I saw that the peel is smooth and delicate, revealing a golden luster, and it is heavy in the hand, "The authentic Lianjiang red orange must be juicy and thin-skinned. , and sweet and sour." This is true, take a bite, and the red and orange juice rushes down the corner of the mouth, the sugar and acidity are perfectly balanced, and every bite is arousing a subtle nostalgia. Red oranges begin to ripen in November. After the cold wind blows, its flavor can accumulate. "Lianjiang is in the subtropical zone. The temperature difference between day and night in November and December is large. After many days, red oranges that are tender and slag, with moderate sweetness and sourness are raised." Guo Guixian, the fruit farmer who spoke, has been planting red oranges for more than ten years. . From the initial period of more than 20 acres to now contracting multiple orange orchards and transmitting the technology of growing oranges and raising oranges, Mrs. Guo has been with Red Orange every day. "We have plenty of sunshine here, and the soil is the most suitable for planting. It is difficult not to grow good red oranges." Sister Guo sighed while picking red oranges. The Lianjiang red orange mother plant was found in the Xinhui orange garden planted in 1960 by the state-run Hongjiang Farm in Lianjiang City. After years of development, Lianjiang Red Orange is famous all over the world. In May last year, Lianjiang red orange, a protected geographical indication product in China, was selected into the first batch of national famous, special and excellent new agricultural products list. But in fact, the risk of planting red oranges is not small. "Citrus Huanglongbing" has been regarded as "citrus cancer". Sister Guo said that in the past, many fruit farmers were not good at management, oranges suffered from Huanglongbing disease, and an orange tree could only live for three or four years. "Many people stop planting when they grow, and go out to find a way." This year, Lianjiang fruit is in good condition. The market price is generally 7-10 yuan per catty, and many people have high yields and good harvests. Online and offline linkage ▶ Expand the popularity of Lianjiang red orange "Hello everyone, I'm Sister Guo, this is my orchard. The red orange juice in my house is thin, and everyone is welcome to come and pick it..." Sister Guo turned to the screen of her mobile phone Record the video again and again. Sister Guo is cheerful by nature, but she is still a little shy in front of the camera. Speaking in Mandarin, which is not very fluent, she said with a smile, "Many orange orchard managers are now recording videos to promote their oranges, and I want to try it." Now, by upgrading the brand and expanding channels, Lianjiang Red Orange It has successively entered supermarkets such as the new retail giant Hema Xiansheng. At the same time, with the help of modern Internet e-commerce platform and Internet of Things technology, Lianjiang Red Orange has achieved omni-channel coverage in major supermarkets across the country such as JD.com, Tmall, Hema Fresh, Wal-Mart, RT-Mart and so on. In addition, it also relies on local online e-commerce companies such as Orange Township Taste, Lingnan Lianjiang Hongcheng Electronic Marketing Platform, Zhanda E-commerce, and Supply and Marketing Ejia for sales. In Lianjiang, traditional fruit farmers, new farmers and even government departments are working together to tell the story about red oranges. Lianjiang is promoting the planting of disease-free seedlings, and fruit farmers are getting better and better with the promotion of new technologies. Some native "new farmers" are also willing to give up their high-paying jobs and return to their hometowns to promote red oranges-Maidan, general manager of Lianjiang Chengxiang Renjia Agricultural Development Co., Ltd., and the company's young people wrote an article based on "red line oranges". The script of "Orange Bonding" is self-directed and self-acted and broadcast on various short video platforms. Last year, Lianjiang's large-scale original musical "Red Orange Romance" used red orange as a medium, connecting elements such as intangible cultural heritage, rural revitalization, and legends, telling a new story of a generation planting red oranges in the countryside. This year, Lianjiang formulated the national geographical indication protection product "Lianjiang Red Orange" brand standard to boost the upgrading of the Lianjiang red orange industry. The protection and promotion of Lianjiang red oranges are being staged from generation to generation in the land of Lianjiang. Written by: Kang Yunyi Photographer: Guo Longbi

title: 3年打造6个镇级美丽乡村风貌带
text:
12月6日，佛冈县召开美丽乡村风貌带建设推进会，佛冈县委书记潘国标，县委副书记、县长江红平，县政协主席袁卫国带队前往石角镇和汤塘镇实地走访调研，传达学习市美丽乡村风貌带建设会议精神，研究解决佛冈县美丽乡村风貌带建设存在问题，部署下一阶段工作。
    “美丽乡村风貌带是乡村振兴的综合体，也是一项非常系统、综合的工程，我们要集中精力推动龙南‘山水画龙’、汤塘古村两个风貌带建设，按照‘任务清单化、清单责任化、责任人头化’的要求，对标对表抓好落实，让风貌带建设的成果惠及更多农民群众。”潘国标说。
    以整村农房风貌提升为主
    为切实加快推进佛冈县美丽乡村风貌带建设工作，加强领导，经县委、县政府同意，决定成立佛冈县美丽乡村风貌带建设工作领导小组，由县委书记潘国标任组长，县委副书记、县长江红平任常务副组长，并制定了《佛冈县美丽乡村风貌带建设行动方案（2021-2023）》（下称“方案”），按照市委、市政府的决策部署，决定在全县创建一批美丽乡村风貌带，推动从建设美丽乡村向经营乡村转变，实现生态宜居、产业发展、农民增收和村集体经济壮大。
    佛冈坚持把美丽乡村风貌带作为乡村振兴综合体，统筹整合涉农资金、债券资金、社会资本等资源集中投入，以五级梯度创建的“整洁村”“示范村”“特色村”“生态村”“美丽田园”和生态特色农业、休闲旅游业等为支点，突出四沿（沿国道、沿城郊区、沿景区、沿省际）、沿线推进干净整洁、绿化美化、农房管控、风貌提升工作，规划建设多样化绿道和徒步骑行服务驿站等配套设施，打造沿线具有乡村特色的知名旅游点和乡村旅游示范村，推动乡村旅游与休闲度假、体育运动、康体养生、亲子研学、创意农业、民俗文化、特色农产品深度融合，大力培育乡村旅游新业态、新模式、新经济，变一处美为处处美，打造各具特色的美丽乡村风貌带、美丽经济新样板。
    根据方案，各镇根据资源禀赋，结合县级原来乡村振兴样板区、美丽乡村精品线路，以1个或2个相邻乡镇为单位，规划建设长度不少于15公里（3000户以上农房）、覆盖圩镇所在村（社区）的美丽乡村风貌带。
    美丽乡村风貌带以整村农房风貌提升为主，实施镇村同建，系统推进山水林田湖草和路桥、水利等设施整治提升，结合精品线路、休闲农业、精品民宿、农家乐等形成兼具生产性和观赏性的沿线连片美丽乡村风貌带。
    佛冈县实行非整县推进美丽乡村风貌带建设，全县分3个年度规划逐镇打造6个镇级美丽乡村风貌带。美丽乡村风貌带建设在科学规划前提下，实现“半年大推进，一年见成效，两年大变样，三年展新貌”的工作目标。
    打造一批乡村游示范村
    根据方案，佛冈将按照“一带一主题、一村一特色”的原则，重点突出文化内涵，注重发挥红色文化、少数民族文化、绿色文化、田园风光、特色产业、地域文化等优势，串联红色村、历史文化名村，以及产业基地、农庄、农家乐、文化遗产、农业园区、景区村庄等，打造集农业产业、乡村漫游、农旅观光、文化体验等为一体美丽乡村风貌带。
    建设美丽农房，全线建成美丽乡村。沿美丽乡村风貌带按照“洁、绿、美、景、韵”等要求建设美丽农房，打造特色农房风貌。沿美丽乡村风貌带村庄，按照五级梯度创建美丽乡村的标准，提升村容村貌、完善基础设施、建立发展机制、强化基层治理、推进乡风文明，全方位擦亮乡村振兴的美丽底色。风貌带范围内所有村庄全部建成美丽乡村，其中“整洁村”比例不高于10%，“示范村”及以上级别美丽乡村比例不少于90%，“特色村”以上级别美丽乡村比例不少于30%。
    打造一批乡村游示范村。利用历史人文资源、融合生态观光农业、拓展休闲度假项目，统筹安排生产、生活、生态空间，突出“一村一品”主题，对村庄进行景区化改造、对产业进行景观化提升、对设施进行旅游化配置、对人文进行市场化发掘，建设村庄整体风貌协调、公共服务设施齐全、传统村落彰显韵味的特色精品村，实现“产业、文化、旅游、社区”功能相叠加，每条美丽乡村风貌带建成乡村游示范村2个以上，鼓励符合条件的乡村游示范村建成A级景区。
    建设美丽通道，打造美丽田园。按照“四好农村路”的标准，全面推进沿线主干道、通行政村自然村道路、村内道路升级改造。实施沿线绿化美化，推进沿线主要通道两旁综合整治，并进行绿化美化。在群众自愿基础上完成土地互换并地整合整治，促进土地流转，提高土地的利用率，沿线田园农田撂荒率少于5%。并按照“洁化、序化、绿化、彩化”的要求，充分运用稻田、花海等自然元素，打造相映成趣、富有创意的生态生产新景观。
    以风貌带建设促进乡村振兴
    经过前期的投入，目前石角镇山水画龙、汤塘温泉古村两个风貌带已经取得了初步成效。座谈会上，副县长冯郁娴提出，各镇各部门要根据美丽乡村风貌带建设任务分解表中任务清单、推进时序，结合目前美丽乡村风貌带、特色村和生态村建设任务、村庄基础设施状况，加强整体规划，狠抓任务进度，确保如期完成工作任务。各镇政府要规范建设监管，落实监理机制，强化资金统筹，提高使用效益，打造美丽乡村风貌带工作亮点，发挥群众主体作用，引导群众积极筹资筹劳推进美丽乡村风貌带建设，推动美丽乡村向美丽经济转变。
    “我们要集中精力推动石角龙南山水画龙、汤塘古村两个风貌带建成全市乃至全省有一定知名度的乡村振兴样本，也为今后全县的乡村振兴提供好的思路与经验做法。”潘国标说。
    潘国标指出，县乡村振兴办、农业农村局作为风貌带建设的牵头单位，要学透弄懂风貌带建设的相关文件政策，统筹协调好风貌带建设各环节的工作，对照市的十项具体任务，制定风貌带建设的作战图、时间表，倒排工期、倒逼进度，压紧压实各项工作责任。石角镇、汤塘镇作为实施的主体要成立工作专班，统筹各相关单位和驻镇帮镇扶村工作组的力量，把精力集中到风貌带建设上来，齐心协力加快工作进度，探索以村为单位的长效管护机制，依法依规推进有效管护、长效运营。同时，石角镇、汤塘镇要切实压实村“两委”的责任，让广大群众理解、支持、参与到风貌带的规划建设上来，要注重发挥好农民群众的主体作用，激发乡村的内生动力，要积极引导农民回乡就业创业，建设民宿、开展现代种植、发展休闲农业等，让风貌带建设的成果惠及更多农民群众。
    “我们要以风貌带建设为契机，不断抓实乡村振兴各项工作，推动全县农业高质高效、农村宜居宜业、农民富裕富足，早日实现全面振兴。”潘国标说。南方日报记者 程浩
en_title: Build 6 town-level beautiful rural style belts in 3 years
en_text: On December 6th, Fogang County held a promotion meeting for the construction of beautiful rural style belts. Pan Guobiao, Secretary of the Fogang County Party Committee, Deputy Secretary of the County Party Committee, County Changjiang Hongping, and Chairman of the County Political Consultative Conference Yuan Weiguo led a team to visit Shijiao Town and Tangtang Town. , to convey the spirit of the conference on the construction of the beautiful rural style belt in Learning City, study and solve the problems existing in the construction of the beautiful rural style belt in Fogang County, and deploy the next stage of work. "The beautiful rural style belt is a complex of rural revitalization, and it is also a very systematic and comprehensive project. We must concentrate on promoting the construction of the two style belts in Longnan, 'Shanshui Hualong' and Tangtang Ancient Village. To meet the requirements of “reduction of responsibility and head-to-head”, we should do a good job of implementing the benchmarks and tables, so that the results of the construction of the style belt will benefit more farmers.” Pan Guobiao said. Focusing on the improvement of the style of the entire village's rural houses to effectively accelerate the construction of the beautiful rural style belt in Fogang County, strengthen leadership, and with the approval of the county party committee and the county government, it was decided to establish a leading group for the construction of the beautiful rural style belt in Fogang County, led by the secretary of the county party committee. Pan Guobiao served as the team leader, deputy secretary of the county party committee, and county Changjiang Hongping served as the executive deputy team leader, and formulated the Action Plan for the Construction of the Beautiful Rural Landscape Belt in Fogang County (2021-2023) (hereinafter referred to as the "Plan"), in accordance with the Municipal Party Committee The decision and deployment of the municipal government has decided to create a number of beautiful rural style belts in the county, to promote the transition from building beautiful villages to operating villages, to achieve ecological livability, industrial development, increase farmers' income and the growth of the village collective economy. Fogang insists on taking the beautiful rural style belt as a rural revitalization complex, and integrates the centralized investment of agriculture-related funds, bond funds, social capital and other resources, and creates "clean and tidy villages", "demonstration villages", "characteristic villages" and "ecological villages" with a five-level gradient. "Village", "Beautiful Pastoral", ecological agriculture, leisure tourism, etc. as fulcrums, highlighting the four edges (along the national road, along the suburbs, along the scenic spots, along the inter-province), along the line to promote clean and tidy, greening and beautification, farm house control, style Improve the work, plan and build various supporting facilities such as greenways and hiking and cycling service stations, build well-known tourist spots and rural tourism demonstration villages with rural characteristics along the line, and promote rural tourism and leisure vacation, sports, sports, health, parent-child research and study , creative agriculture, folk culture, and special agricultural products are deeply integrated, and vigorously cultivate new formats, new models and new economies of rural tourism, change a beauty into a beauty everywhere, and create a beautiful rural style belt with unique characteristics and a new model of beautiful economy. According to the plan, according to the resource endowment of each town, combined with the original rural revitalization model area at the county level and the beautiful rural boutique route, with one or two adjacent townships as units, the planned construction length is not less than 15 kilometers (more than 3,000 farm houses). , Covering the beautiful rural style belt of the village (community) where the town is located. The beautiful rural style belt is mainly based on the improvement of the style of the whole village, the implementation of town and village co-construction, the systematic improvement of landscape, forest, farmland, lake and grass, roads and bridges, water conservancy and other facilities. There are beautiful country-style belts along the productive and ornamental lines. Fogang County has implemented a non-county-wide promotion of the construction of beautiful rural style belts. The county plans to build 6 town-level beautiful rural style belts by town in 3 annual plans. Under the premise of scientific planning, the construction of the beautiful rural style belt will achieve the work goal of "promoting in half a year, achieving results in one year, making a big change in two years, and showing a new look in the triennial". Create a batch of rural tourism demonstration villages According to the plan, Fogang will follow the principle of "One Belt, One Theme, One Village, One Characteristic", focusing on cultural connotation, focusing on the development of red culture, minority culture, green culture, idyllic scenery, characteristic industries, The advantages of regional culture, etc., connect red villages, famous historical and cultural villages, as well as industrial bases, farms, farmhouses, cultural heritage, agricultural parks, scenic villages, etc., to create a beautiful integration of agricultural industry, rural roaming, agricultural tourism, cultural experience, etc. Country style belt. Build beautiful farm houses and build beautiful villages across the board. Along the beautiful rural style belt, build beautiful farm houses in accordance with the requirements of "cleanness, greenness, beauty, scenery and rhythm", and create a characteristic farm house style. Bring villages along beautiful rural landscapes, follow the standard of creating beautiful villages with a five-level gradient, improve the appearance of villages, improve infrastructure, establish development mechanisms, strengthen grassroots governance, promote rural customs and civilization, and polish the beautiful background of rural revitalization in an all-round way. . All villages within the style belt have been built into beautiful villages, of which the proportion of "clean and tidy villages" is not higher than 10%, the proportion of "model villages" and above is not less than 90%, and the proportion of "characteristic villages" and above is not less than 90%. at 30%. Build a group of rural tourism demonstration villages. Make use of historical and human resources, integrate ecological sightseeing agriculture, expand leisure and vacation projects, make overall arrangements for production, living, and ecological space, highlight the theme of "one village, one product", transform villages into scenic spots, upgrade industries, and tour facilities. It aims to realize the superposition of functions of "industry, culture, tourism, and community", and each beautiful rural style belt will be built in a characteristic boutique village with a coordinated overall style, complete public service facilities, and traditional villages showing the charm of traditional villages. Build more than 2 rural tourism demonstration villages, and encourage qualified rural tourism demonstration villages to build A-level scenic spots. Build beautiful passages and create beautiful countryside. In accordance with the standard of "Four Good Rural Roads", comprehensively promote the upgrading of main roads along the line, roads leading to natural villages in administrative villages, and roads in villages. Implement greening and beautification along the line, promote comprehensive renovation on both sides of the main passages along the line, and carry out greening and beautification. On the voluntary basis of the masses, land exchange and land consolidation and remediation will be completed, land transfer will be promoted, and the utilization rate of land will be improved. The abandonment rate of rural farmland along the line is less than 5%. And in accordance with the requirements of "cleaning, ordering, greening, and coloring", make full use of natural elements such as rice fields and flower seas to create a new landscape of ecological production that complements each other and is creative. Promoting rural revitalization through the construction of style belts After the initial investment, the two style belts in Shijiao Town, Shanshui Hualong and Tangtang Hot Spring Village, have achieved preliminary results. At the symposium, deputy county magistrate Feng Yuxian proposed that all towns and departments should follow the task list and schedule in the construction task breakdown table for the beautiful rural style belt, combined with the current construction tasks of the beautiful rural style belt, characteristic villages and ecological villages, and village infrastructure conditions. , strengthen the overall planning, pay close attention to the progress of the tasks, and ensure that the tasks are completed on time. The town governments should standardize construction supervision, implement the supervision mechanism, strengthen the overall planning of funds, improve the use efficiency, create the highlights of the work of beautiful rural style belts, give full play to the main role of the masses, and guide the masses to actively raise funds and labor to promote the construction of beautiful rural style belts, and promote the development of beautiful rural style belts. Beautiful economic transformation. "We must concentrate our efforts on promoting the two style belts of Shijiao Longnan, Shanshui Hualong and Tangtang Ancient Village to be built into samples of rural revitalization that are well-known in the city and even in the province, and also provide good ideas and experience for the county's rural revitalization in the future." Pan. National Standard said. Pan Guobiao pointed out that the county and rural revitalization office and the Agriculture and Rural Affairs Bureau, as the leading units for the construction of the style belt, must learn and understand the relevant documents and policies for the construction of the style belt, and coordinate the work of all aspects of the construction of the style belt. Tasks, formulate the battle map and timetable for the construction of the style belt, reverse the construction period, push the progress backward, and compress the various work responsibilities. As the main body of implementation, Shijiao Town and Tangtang Town should set up a special work class, coordinate the strength of all relevant units and the working group stationed in the town to help the town and the village, focus on the construction of the style belt, make concerted efforts to speed up the work progress, and explore ways to The village-based long-term management and protection mechanism promotes effective management and long-term operation in accordance with laws and regulations. At the same time, Shijiao Town and Tangtang Town should conscientiously consolidate the responsibilities of the "two committees" of the villages, so that the masses can understand, support and participate in the planning and construction of the style belt, and pay attention to giving full play to the main role of the peasants and stimulate the rural Endogenous driving force, we must actively guide farmers to return to their hometowns for employment and entrepreneurship, build homestays, carry out modern planting, develop leisure agriculture, etc., so that the results of the construction of style belts can benefit more farmers. "We must take the construction of the style belt as an opportunity to continuously carry out various tasks of rural revitalization, promote high-quality and efficient agriculture in the county, livable and suitable for work in rural areas, and farmers to be prosperous and prosperous, so as to realize comprehensive revitalization at an early date." Pan Guobiao said. Nanfang Daily reporter Cheng Hao

title: 长三角地区首发中老铁路国际货运列车
text:
12月8日，“江苏号”中老铁路国际货运列车准备发车。 新华社记者 李博摄
新华社南京12月8日电（记者 潘晔）12月8日11时许，随着载有76个标箱出口货物的“江苏号”中老铁路国际货运列车从中国铁路上海局集团有限公司南京货运中心尧化门铁路货场启程，长三角地区开行的首趟中老铁路（南京—万象）国际货运列车正式开行。
首趟中老货运列车将经云南磨憨铁路口岸出境，最终抵达老挝首都万象，全程3500余公里，预计运行时间6天。列车主要装载了由江苏及周边地区企业生产的我国援助老挝的远程教育工程配套物资，以及建材、电缆、电器、汽车配件等支持老挝基础设施建设及经济社会发展的重点物资，总计货值近300万美元，货重超600吨。
为了确保列车及时、安全、顺利运达，中国铁路上海局集团有限公司、江苏省交通运输厅、南京海关等企业及部门，在计划申报、通关模式、跨关区协调、运输组织等方面进行统筹协调。铁路部门落实、落细常态化疫情防控措施，实行承运、吊装、挂运“三优先”，提前挑选优质箱源，做好空车车源调配，科学组织装车和挂运，确保各个环节有序衔接，高效运转。
江苏省国际货运班列有限公司相关负责人表示，“江苏号”中老铁路（南京—万象）国际货运列车的成功开行，是江苏境内国际货运列车精品化、多元化境外线路布局的延伸，将为本地企业打通新的对外贸易通道、培育新的外贸增长点，为推进“一带一路”交汇点建设，更好服务构建新发展格局作出贡献。
en_title: The first China-Laos railway international freight train in the Yangtze River Delta region
en_text: On December 8, the "Jiangsu" China-Laos railway international freight train was ready to depart. Xinhua News Agency reporter Li Boshe Xinhua News Agency Nanjing, December 8 (Reporter Pan Ye) At about 11:00 on December 8, the "Jiangsu" China-Laos railway international freight train carrying 76 TEUs of export goods departed from China. Railway Shanghai Bureau Group Co., Ltd. Nanjing Freight Center Yaohuamen Railway Freight Yard set off, and the first China-Laos Railway (Nanjing-Vientiane) international freight train in the Yangtze River Delta region officially opened. The first China-Laos freight train will leave the country through the Mohan railway port in Yunnan and finally arrive in Vientiane, the capital of Laos. The whole journey is more than 3,500 kilometers and the estimated running time is 6 days. The train is mainly loaded with supporting materials for my country's aid to Laos' distance education project produced by enterprises in Jiangsu and surrounding areas, as well as key materials such as building materials, cables, electrical appliances, and auto parts to support Laos' infrastructure construction and economic and social development, with a total value of nearly 300 yuan. 10,000 US dollars, and the cargo weight exceeds 600 tons. In order to ensure the timely, safe and smooth delivery of trains, China Railway Shanghai Bureau Group Co., Ltd., Jiangsu Provincial Department of Transportation, Nanjing Customs and other enterprises and departments have coordinated in terms of plan declaration, customs clearance mode, cross-customs area coordination, and transportation organization. coordination. The railway department implements and implements normalized epidemic prevention and control measures, implements the "three priorities" of carrier, hoisting and hanging, selects high-quality container sources in advance, allocates empty car sources, scientifically organizes loading and hanging, and ensures that all links are Orderly connection and efficient operation. The relevant person in charge of Jiangsu International Freight Train Co., Ltd. said that the successful operation of the "Jiangsu No." China-Laos Railway (Nanjing-Vientiane) international freight train is an extension of the refined and diversified overseas route layout of international freight trains in Jiangsu. Open up new foreign trade channels for local enterprises, cultivate new foreign trade growth points, and contribute to promoting the construction of the "Belt and Road" intersection and building a new development pattern with better services.

title: 小小油茶果 绿色大产业
text:
“油茶不仅能绿化环境，还能助农增收，今年又是丰收年。”尽管已是冬天，在兴宁市石马镇米渡村的名峰现代农业发展有限公司油茶基地，漫山的油茶树为山林披上“绿衣”。一年中的油茶加工旺季来了，山间的加工厂内，工人们正在忙着挑拣、晾晒茶籽，基地负责人刘名远翻出手机的监控页面，手指轻点，基地便开始自动灌溉。
    近年来，梅州大力发展油茶产业，目前梅州油茶种植面积达70多万亩，是省内主要的油茶产区，茶油产量约9500吨，实现产值约25亿元。在绿水青山中找到金山银山，油茶成为了当地农户的“绿色银行”。
    日前，梅州出台《梅州市促进油茶产业高质量发展实施方案》（下称《方案》），围绕建设标准化油茶产业园、培育油茶龙头企业、打造油茶现代产业集群等方面制定了奖补政策，争取到2025年实现油茶产业综合产值40亿元。对于茶农来说，小小油茶果正带来更大的发展机遇。
    谋长远
    油茶产业迎来发展“春天”
    尽管已过了采摘期，在兴宁市黄陂镇，漫山绿油油的油茶林仍给当地带来了勃勃生机。种植大户丘明告诉记者，在“中国油茶之乡”兴宁，油茶是黄陂等镇村民的主要增收渠道，去年，种植油茶给他带来了近30万元收入。
    油茶产业是个古老而新兴的产业，在梅州，油茶有着悠久的种植传统，兴宁市、平远县被授予“中国油茶之乡”的称号，平远县还被列为“油茶丰产林国家林业标准化示范区”。
    2005年以来，梅州市委、市政府把油茶作为发展山区经济、增加农民收入的“生态富民”产业来抓，梅州油茶发展迎来了难得的机遇。
    目前梅州油茶种植面积达70多万亩，主要分布在兴宁市、平远县、五华县、大埔县、丰顺县，茶油产量约9500吨，实现产值约25亿元。全市获得国家林业重点龙头企业称号的油茶企业有5家。
    近期，《方案》出台，为油茶产业的发展再添了一把火。
    “《方案》的出台就像一针强心剂，鼓舞了发展油茶的农户、企业的士气。”平远县新大地生物科技股份有限公司总经理黄益斌说，近年来，该企业以油茶产业发展为主导，采取“公司+基地+农户”的模式，带动周边农户种植油茶5万多亩，通过发展森林旅游带动周边林下经济作物的销售增加林农经济收入，实现户年均增收4000元。
    “梅州的土壤、气候适合种油茶，虽说种下后5年才挂果，周期较长，可管理到位，丰产几十年不成问题。”丘明说，油茶产业对于梅州长居山区的农户来说，是真正的“绿色银行”。
    “颗颗油茶籽，滴滴茶油香。”油茶全身都是宝，不仅能生产出纯天然绿色健康的高档食用油，而且是食品、制药、化工以及化妆品工业的重要优质原料。油茶的副产品具有很高的利用价值，茶籽饼、茶皂素等可广泛用于日用化工、造纸、化学纤维、纺织、农药等领域。
    目前，梅州油茶已经研发出包括高山茶油、山茶油维E胶囊、山茶籽洗发露、山茶籽沐浴露、美白护肤山茶油、婴儿护肤山茶油、纯天然洗洁液、茶皂素、茶粕、生物有机肥等在内的数十种产品，油茶籽初始价值与终端产品价值比可达1：20。
    “根据《方案》，梅州计划用五年时间高标准建设一批标准化油茶产业园，培育若干油茶龙头企业，打造油茶现代产业集群，到2025年预计实现油茶产业综合产值达40亿元。”梅州市林业局产业科相关负责人陈运财说，其中在新造改造油茶林、油茶企业获得荣誉和上市等、设备购置、科技支撑、区域品牌培育五个方面有补助和奖励政策，对于发展油茶产业的农户、企业来说，是重大利好。
    “现在政府有政策支持培育油茶产业，我们农户只要精耕细作培育油茶，未来前景广阔，油茶果一定会成为当地农民的致富果。”兴宁市油茶协会会长、名峰现代农业发展有限公司刘名远说。
    强产业
    品种改良、低产改造增效益
    “病虫枝、枯枝、过密的交叉枝、重叠枝等要剪掉，通过修枝整形改善通风透光条件，能够培养良好的树体结构……”今年1月，梅州市农林科学院林业研究所技术人员走进兴宁市新陂镇先声村油茶基地，为该市18家油茶企业代表、油茶农户带来了高产油茶种植知识与技术。
    近年来，梅州虽然大力发展油茶产业，但管理粗放、养护不到位以及种苗质量参差不齐等因素，造成现有本应进入高产期的油茶树产量低、效益差，严重制约着油茶产业化发展。
    “一方面农户观念落后，对高冠嫁接、低产林改造修剪、施肥等丰产技术知之甚少，管理粗放，另一方面受制于良种化程度不高，多数农户种植的油茶存在品种退化，树龄老化等状态，导致油茶失管、产量低等问题凸显。”刘名远说，产量上不去直接影响农户收入，很多农户对于种植油茶投入越来越少，积极性大打折扣。
    “现在原材料需要到外面去收购，物流费增加了不少。”保仪生态科技（广东）有限公司是兴宁一家油茶产品全产业链供应商，该企业总经理方一说，“今年企业收购了2000吨油茶籽，其中大多来自梅州之外，本地产量低导致原材料紧缺，企业不得不把采购方向转移到外面的油茶基地。”
    不仅企业茶籽收购难，农户油茶产品市场销售的竞争也日益激烈。随着江西、广西、湖南等地所产茶籽大量流入本地茶油原料市场，外省茶籽生产的茶油与本地自产茶油的价差甚至可达本地价格的1/3，也加剧了梅州农户在茶籽、毛油等出现卖难怪象。
    “当前，实行科学种植，发挥科技支撑作用，在油茶新品种选育、低产低效林改造等方面下功夫，是解决怪象的关键。”刘名远说，通过改良品种和技术，改造现有低产油茶林，提高产量和质量，才能把成本和价格压下来，提高效益，进而畅通销售市场。
    改变随之而来。今年，兴宁市实施了首期3万亩低产低效林的改造工作，实行政策资金扶持，致力于改善油茶管理粗放的模式。“在政府的支持引导下，从去年摘完油茶果，我们便开始进行改造。”刘名远说，目前该基地2800多亩油茶林已改造1100多亩，预计改造后亩产量能提升5倍，同时还能提高出油率。
    在油茶林的改造中，兴宁市黄陂镇的瑞丰源现代农业发展有限公司也尝到了甜头。自2009年起，企业致力于引进油茶良种，目前良种种植示范基地实地测产鲜果1711斤/亩，与当地养护得好的老茶林亩产三四百斤相比，高出4倍多。
    利好消息持续落地，在出台的《方案》中，梅州对支持农户新造高产油茶林、低产低效油茶林垦复补植改造方面，有了相应的补助政策，为梅州茶农提高经济效益、增收致富，带来了新的发展生机。
    树品牌
    抱团助力梅州油茶走出去
    距离霜降油茶果采摘已过去一个多月，位于兴宁市的保仪生态科技（广东）有限公司迎来繁忙的加工季。厂房外，趁着晴好天气工人正在晾晒油茶果；厂房内，生产线机器轰鸣，茶籽经过反复筛选、去杂除污、冷榨冷提后，变成一瓶瓶健康茶油，准备销往各地。
    “从茶籽到合格的一滴油，需要36道工艺。”方一告诉记者，该企业引进新型双螺旋压榨生产线，可实现日处理20吨茶籽原料、5吨精炼成品油。
    相比传统压榨的山茶油，该企业在冷榨过程中采用多重低温过滤杂质，有效保留茶油固有的香味、生物活性物质以及亚麻酸、亚油酸、多种微量元素等天然特性，在品质上更胜一筹。
    “目前企业主打产品为山茶油，每年销量稳定增长，仅这一款产品就有2000多万元销售额，在广东、四川、重庆、北京、湖南、江西等地拥有不少客户群体。”方一说，通过精深加工，该企业已开发出“六千岁”山茶油，“美椿宝”等茶籽洗涤系列产品10多种，全年综合产值3000多万元。
    业内人士普遍认为，现在山茶油行业的发展还处于成长阶段，只要坚持好的品质，它的发展前景十分广阔。
    前景如何变为现实？在品牌推广力度、资源整合等方面，不少油茶企业负责人提出见解。
    “虽然油茶产业在梅州有很好的发展，但目前市场对茶油缺乏足够的认识，山茶油价格相较于其他食用油价格也较高，消费者对茶油的认识仅局限于它是‘东方橄榄油’的印象。”黄益斌说，“养在深闺人未识”仍是山茶油面临的现状，需要加大宣传，提高消费者对梅州山茶油的接受程度，让油茶产品走出围龙。
    “目前全国还没有一款让人记得住的核心山茶油产品，核心竞争力还没显现，梅州油茶企业自有品牌多且杂，无法进一步提高茶油及附加产品品牌效应。”方一说，政府要加强引导，集中力量打造“梅州油茶”大品牌，全面提升梅州油茶的整体竞争力和知名度，充分发挥龙头企业的引领作用，改变目前茶油加工企业“低、小、散”的状况，把油茶产业逐步打造成富民绿色支柱产业。
    就目前而言，梅州茶油小型加工企业多，大部分仍停留在茶油初级加工阶段，生产点分散，企业管理水平良莠不齐，多数企业设施简陋，分析检测条件差、能力弱，无力推行严格的质量管理体系，茶油质量不一、价格不一，部分消费者不认可，降低了品牌效应。
    为推动梅州油茶产业成为综合效益好、可持续发展的优势产业，《方案》在科技支撑奖补、区域品牌培育、打响“梅州茶油”品牌等方面也有鼓励支持政策。
    刘名远认为，当前油茶产业发展要做好提质增效，重心放在现有油茶基地的精细管理上，避免盲目扩张，培育市场竞争力较强的良种选育种植、精深加工、销售主体，构建农户种植、龙头企业收购加工的利益联结机制；同时，要加强行业监管力度，规范茶油市场准入机制，健全油茶产品标准体系和质量管理体系。“随着《方案》的出台，油茶产品也更有信心走出去。”刘名远说。
    ■相关
    五大方面发力
    打响“梅州茶油”品牌
    近日，梅州印发《梅州市促进油茶产业高质量发展实施方案》（下称《方案》），计划用五年时间高标准建设一批标准化油茶产业园，培育若干油茶龙头企业，打造油茶现代产业集群，构建油茶全产业链，打响“梅州茶油”特色区域品牌。到2025年预计实现油茶产业综合产值达40亿元。
    《方案》明确，2021年至2025年，梅州将在加强油茶良种繁选育技术研发、推动油茶林扩面提质、做大做强油茶经营主体、推动油茶林复合经营、打响“梅州茶油”品牌等五大方面发力。
    计划5年内选育出适合梅州种植的优良品种3—5个，增加新造高产油茶林面积10万亩，对全市18.2万亩低产低效油茶林实施提升改造，争取培育油茶类省级以上林业龙头企业10家，发展精深加工，开发更多高附加值产品，精制茶油年加工能力5万吨以上。同时，推进油茶产业与南药种植、园林花卉、森林康养旅游等产业融合，加大区域品牌培育力度，积极申请注册“梅州茶油”国家地理标志证明商标，大力申报“梅州茶油”国家地理标志保护产品。
    《方案》指出，梅州将在财政、金融、技术、基础设施建设等方面加强对油茶产业高质量发展的扶持政策。
    尤其是财政支持方面，在新造改造油茶林补助政策中，提出自2021年起新造高产油茶林集中连片20亩以上的，第一年按不低于800元/亩的标准给予种植补助，第二年到第五年抚育按每年200元/亩的标准给予补助；低产低效油茶林垦复补植改造，以不低于500元/亩的标准给予补助。
    在油茶企业获得荣誉和上市等奖励政策中，提出2021年至2025年对新认定或监测评价通过往年认定的国家林业重点龙头企业，给予一次性50万元奖励；对获得广东省林业龙头企业称号的企业，给予一次性不低于10万元奖励；对拟在主板上市并取得证券监管部门审理回执的企业，给予500万元资助；对拟在科创板、创业板上市并取得证券交易所审理回执的企业，给予300万元资助；对拟在香港和境外证券交易所上市并取得有权审理部门审理回执的企业，给予300万元资助。
    在科技支撑奖补政策中，提出重点扶持油茶企业技术中心、检测中心等建设，分别按国家级、省级、市级对实施单位给予一次性80万元、50万元、30万元补助；对主导或参与制定国际标准、国家标准、行业标准的单位，分别给予一次性50万元、20万元、10万元补助。
    文/图：南方日报记者 马吉池
en_title: Small camellia fruit green industry
en_text: "Camellia oleifera can not only green the environment, but also help farmers increase their income. This year is another harvest year." Although it is winter, at the Camellia Oil Base of Mingfeng Modern Agricultural Development Co., Ltd. in Midu Village, Shima Town, Xingning City, the oil in the mountains is full of oil. Tea trees put "green clothes" on the mountains and forests. The peak season of camellia processing in the year is coming. In the processing plant in the mountains, workers are busy picking and drying tea seeds. The head of the base, Liu Mingyuan, flipped over the monitoring page of his mobile phone, tapped his finger, and the base began to irrigate automatically. In recent years, Meizhou has vigorously developed the camellia oil industry. At present, the planting area of camellia in Meizhou is more than 700,000 mu. It is the main camellia production area in the province. The output of camellia oil is about 9,500 tons, and the output value is about 2.5 billion yuan. In the clear waters and green mountains, gold and silver mountains were found, and camellia oleifera became a "green bank" for local farmers. A few days ago, Meizhou issued the "Meizhou City's Implementation Plan for Promoting the High-Quality Development of the Camellia Oil Industry" (hereinafter referred to as the "Plan"), and formulated reward and subsidy policies around building a standardized Camellia Camellia industrial park, cultivating leading Camellia oleifera enterprises, and building a modern Camellia industry cluster, aiming to strive for By 2025, the comprehensive output value of the camellia oil industry will be 4 billion yuan. For tea farmers, small camellia fruit is bringing greater development opportunities. Looking for the long-term, the camellia oleifera industry ushered in the "spring" of development Although the picking period has passed, in Huangpi Town, Xingning City, the lush green camellia oleifera forests still bring vitality to the local area. Qiu Ming, a big planter, told reporters that in Xingning, the "hometown of Chinese camellia", camellia oleifera is the main source of income for villagers in Huangpi and other towns. Last year, planting camellia oleifera brought him nearly 300,000 yuan in income. Camellia oleifera industry is an ancient and emerging industry. In Meizhou, Camellia oleifera has a long tradition of planting. Xingning City and Pingyuan County were awarded the title of "Hometown of Camellia oleifera in China", and Pingyuan County was also listed as the "National Forestry of Camellia High-yield Forest". Standardized Demonstration Area". Since 2005, the Meizhou Municipal Party Committee and Municipal Government have regarded Camellia oleifera as an "ecological enrichment" industry to develop the mountain economy and increase farmers' income. The development of Camellia oleifera in Meizhou has ushered in a rare opportunity. At present, the planting area of camellia in Meizhou is more than 700,000 mu, mainly distributed in Xingning City, Pingyuan County, Wuhua County, Dapu County and Fengshun County. The output of camellia oil is about 9,500 tons, and the output value is about 2.5 billion yuan. There are 5 Camellia oleifera enterprises in the city that have won the title of National Forestry Key Leading Enterprise. Recently, the "Plan" was introduced, adding another fire to the development of the camellia oleifera industry. "The introduction of the "Plan" is like a booster, which has inspired the morale of farmers and enterprises that develop camellia." Huang Yibin, general manager of Pingyuan County Xindadi Biotechnology Co., Ltd., said that in recent years, the company has been dominated by the development of the camellia oil industry. , adopt the model of "company + base + farmers" to drive surrounding farmers to plant more than 50,000 mu of camellia oleifera. Through the development of forest tourism, the sales of economic crops under the surrounding forests will increase the economic income of forest farmers, and the average annual income of households will increase by 4,000 yuan. "Meizhou's soil and climate are suitable for planting camellia oleifera. Although it takes 5 years after planting to bear fruit, the cycle is long, and management can be done in place. It is not a problem to have a high yield for decades." A true "green bank". "Each camellia seed, dripping tea oil fragrance." Camellia oleifera is a treasure all over the body. It can not only produce pure natural green and healthy high-end edible oil, but also is an important high-quality raw material for the food, pharmaceutical, chemical and cosmetic industries. The by-products of camellia oleifera have high utilization value, and tea seed cake and tea saponin can be widely used in daily chemical industry, papermaking, chemical fiber, textile, pesticide and other fields. At present, Meizhou Camellia has developed products including alpine camellia oil, camellia oil vitamin E capsules, camellia seed shampoo, camellia seed shower gel, whitening skin care camellia oil, baby skin care camellia oil, pure natural detergent, tea saponin, tea For dozens of products, including meal, bio-organic fertilizer, etc., the ratio of the initial value of camellia seeds to the value of the final product can reach 1:20. "According to the "Plan", Meizhou plans to build a batch of standardized camellia oleifera industrial parks with high standards in five years, cultivate a number of leading camellia enterprises, and create a modern camellia industrial cluster. By 2025, the comprehensive output value of the camellia industry is expected to reach 4 billion yuan." Meizhou Chen Yuncai, the relevant person in charge of the Industry Section of the Municipal Forestry Bureau, said that there are subsidies and incentive policies in five aspects, such as the new construction and transformation of camellia oleifera forests, the honor and listing of camellia enterprises, equipment purchase, scientific and technological support, and regional brand cultivation. , For enterprises, it is a major benefit. "Now the government has policies to support the cultivation of camellia oleifera industry. As long as our farmers cultivate Camellia oleifera with intensive cultivation, the future prospects are bright, and Camellia oleifera fruit will definitely become the rich fruit of local farmers." said Liu Mingyuan, President of Xingning Camellia Oil Association and Mingfeng Modern Agricultural Development Co., Ltd. . Strong industrial variety improvement, low-yield transformation to increase benefits "Pest branches, dead branches, excessively dense cross branches, overlapping branches, etc. should be cut off, and the ventilation and light transmission conditions can be improved by pruning and shaping, which can cultivate a good tree structure..." In January this year, technicians from the Forestry Research Institute of Meizhou Academy of Agriculture and Forestry visited the Camellia Oil Camellia Base in Xiansheng Village, Xinpi Town, Xingning City, bringing high-yield Camellia oleifera planting knowledge and technology to representatives of 18 Camellia oleifera enterprises and Camellia farmers in the city. In recent years, although Meizhou has vigorously developed the camellia oleifera industry, factors such as extensive management, inadequate maintenance, and uneven quality of seedlings have resulted in low yield and poor benefits of the existing camellia oleifera trees that should have entered the high-yield period, seriously restricting the industrialization of camellia oleifera. develop. "On the one hand, farmers have a backward concept and know little about high-yield technologies such as high-crown grafting, low-yield forest transformation and pruning, and fertilization, and their management is extensive. On the other hand, they are subject to the low degree of improved varieties. Such conditions have led to problems such as loss of control and low output of camellia oleifera." Liu Mingyuan said that the increase in output directly affects the income of farmers, and many farmers invest less and less in planting camellia oleifera, and their enthusiasm is greatly reduced. "Now the raw materials need to be purchased outside, and the logistics cost has increased a lot." Baoyi Ecological Technology (Guangdong) Co., Ltd. is a whole industry chain supplier of camellia products in Xingning. Fang Yi, general manager of the company, said, "This year, the company acquired 2,000 tons of camellia seeds were purchased, most of which came from outside Meizhou, and the low local production led to a shortage of raw materials, so companies had to shift their purchasing direction to outside camellia oil bases." Not only is it difficult for companies to purchase tea seeds, but the competition in the market for farmers' camellia products is also increasing. fierce. With the influx of tea seeds produced in Jiangxi, Guangxi, Hunan and other places into the local tea oil raw material market, the price difference between the tea oil produced by tea seeds in other provinces and the local self-produced tea oil can even reach 1/3 of the local price, which has also exacerbated Meizhou. It is no wonder that farmers are selling tea seeds and crude oil. "Currently, implementing scientific planting, giving full play to the supporting role of science and technology, and making efforts in the selection of new varieties of Camellia oleifera and the transformation of low-yield and low-efficiency forests are the keys to solving the strange phenomenon." Liu Mingyuan said that by improving varieties and technologies, transforming existing low-yielding plants For Camellia oleifera forests, only by increasing the yield and quality can the costs and prices be suppressed, the benefits be improved, and the sales market be unblocked. Change followed. This year, Xingning City implemented the first phase of the transformation of 30,000 mu of low-yield and low-efficiency forests, implemented policy and financial support, and was committed to improving the extensive management of camellia oleifera. "Under the support and guidance of the government, we started to transform camellia oleifera fruit after picking the camellia fruit last year." Liu Mingyuan said that at present, the base's 2,800 mu of camellia oleifera forest has been transformed into more than 1,100 mu. It is expected that the yield per mu will increase by 5 times after the transformation. It can also improve the oil yield. In the transformation of camellia oleifera forest, Ruifengyuan Modern Agriculture Development Co., Ltd. in Huangpi Town, Xingning City also tasted the sweetness. Since 2009, the company has been committed to the introduction of improved camellia seeds. At present, the planting demonstration base of the improved seeds produces 1,711 jin/mu of fresh fruit, which is more than 4 times higher than that of the well-maintained old tea forest in the area. The good news continues to be implemented. In the "Plan" issued, Meizhou has a corresponding subsidy policy for supporting farmers to build new high-yield Camellia oleifera forests, low-yield and low-efficiency Camellia oleifera forests, replanting and replanting, so as to improve economic benefits and increase income for Meizhou tea farmers. , brought new development opportunities. Tree Brands Help Meizhou Camellia Go Globally More than a month has passed since the fruit picking of Shuangjiang Camellia oleifera, and Baoyi Ecological Technology (Guangdong) Co., Ltd. located in Xingning City has ushered in a busy processing season. Outside the factory, workers are drying camellia oleifera fruit in fine weather; inside the factory, the production line machines are roaring. After repeated screening, decontamination, cold pressing and cold extraction, the tea seeds are turned into bottles of healthy camellia oil, ready to be sold all over the world. . "From tea seeds to a qualified drop of oil, 36 processes are required." Fang Yi told reporters that the company introduced a new double-screw pressing production line, which can process 20 tons of tea seed raw materials and 5 tons of refined refined oil per day. Compared with the traditionally pressed camellia oil, the company adopts multiple low-temperature filtering impurities in the cold pressing process, which effectively retains the inherent fragrance, biological active substances and natural characteristics of camellia oil such as linolenic acid, linoleic acid, and various trace elements. better than ever. "Currently, the company's main product is camellia oil, and its annual sales increase steadily. This product alone has sales of more than 20 million yuan. It has many customer groups in Guangdong, Sichuan, Chongqing, Beijing, Hunan, Jiangxi and other places." Fang. It is said that through intensive processing, the company has developed more than 10 kinds of tea seed washing products such as "6000-year-old" camellia oil and "Mei Chunbao", with an annual comprehensive output value of more than 30 million yuan. People in the industry generally believe that the development of the camellia oil industry is still in the growth stage. As long as it insists on good quality, its development prospects are very broad. How does the prospect become reality? In terms of brand promotion efforts and resource integration, many leaders of camellia oleifera companies have put forward their opinions. "Although the camellia oil industry has developed very well in Meizhou, the current market lacks sufficient understanding of camellia oil, and the price of camellia oil is also higher than that of other edible oils. Consumers' understanding of camellia oil is limited to what it is." The impression of oriental olive oil'." Huang Yibin said, "raised in a boudoir and unknown to people" is still the status quo faced by camellia oil, and it is necessary to increase publicity, improve consumers' acceptance of camellia oil in Meizhou, and make camellia oil products out of the siege. "At present, there is no memorable core camellia oil product in the country, and the core competitiveness has not yet emerged. Meizhou camellia companies have many and miscellaneous brands, which cannot further improve the brand effect of camellia oil and additional products." Fang Yi said, The government should strengthen guidance, focus on building a big brand of "Meizhou Camellia", comprehensively enhance the overall competitiveness and popularity of Meizhou Camellia, give full play to the leading role of leading enterprises, and change the current "low, small and scattered" situation of camellia oil processing enterprises. The camellia oil industry will be gradually built into a green pillar industry that enriches the people. At present, there are many small-scale processing enterprises of camellia oil in Meizhou, and most of them are still in the primary processing stage of camellia oil. The production points are scattered, and the management level of enterprises is mixed. Quality management system, tea oil has different quality and price, some consumers do not recognize it, which reduces the brand effect. In order to promote the Meizhou camellia industry to become an advantageous industry with good comprehensive benefits and sustainable development, the "Plan" also has incentives and support policies in terms of scientific and technological support, awards and subsidies, regional brand cultivation, and the launch of the "Meizhou camellia oil" brand. Liu Mingyuan believes that the current development of the Camellia oleifera industry should improve quality and efficiency, focus on the fine management of the existing Camellia oleifera bases, avoid blind expansion, cultivate the main body of breeding, intensive processing and sales of improved varieties with strong market competitiveness, and build The interest linkage mechanism for farmers' planting and the acquisition and processing of leading enterprises; at the same time, it is necessary to strengthen the supervision of the industry, standardize the market access mechanism of camellia oil, and improve the standard system and quality management system of camellia oleifera products. "With the introduction of the "Plan", Camellia products are also more confident to go out." Liu Mingyuan said. ■Relevant five aspects make efforts to launch the "Meizhou Camellia Oil" brand Recently, Meizhou issued the "Meizhou City's Implementation Plan for Promoting the High-Quality Development of Camellia Oil Industry" (hereinafter referred to as the "Plan"), and plans to build a batch of standardized Camellia oleifera industries with high standards in five years Park, cultivate a number of leading companies of camellia oleifera, build a modern industrial cluster of camellia oleifera, build a whole industrial chain of camellia oleifera, and launch the characteristic regional brand of "Meizhou camellia oil". By 2025, the comprehensive output value of the camellia oil industry is expected to reach 4 billion yuan. The "Plan" makes it clear that from 2021 to 2025, Meizhou will strengthen the research and development of camellia oleifera breeding technology, promote the expansion and quality of camellia oleifera forests, expand and strengthen the main body of camellia oleifera management, promote the complex management of camellia oleifera forests, and launch the "Meizhou camellia oil" "Brand and other five aspects to make efforts. It is planned to select 3-5 excellent varieties suitable for planting in Meizhou within 5 years, increase the area of newly built high-yield camellia oleifera forest by 100,000 mu, and carry out upgrading and transformation of 182,000 mu of low-yield and low-efficiency camellia oleifera forests in the city, and strive to cultivate camellia oleifera forestry leaders above the provincial level. There are 10 enterprises, developing intensive processing, developing more high value-added products, and the annual processing capacity of refined camellia oil is more than 50,000 tons. At the same time, promote the integration of the camellia oil industry with the cultivation of southern medicine, garden flowers, forest health tourism and other industries, increase the cultivation of regional brands, actively apply for the registration of the "Meizhou camellia oil" national geographical indication certification mark, and vigorously apply for the "Meizhou camellia oil" national Geographical indication protection products. The "Plan" pointed out that Meizhou will strengthen support policies for the high-quality development of the camellia oleifera industry in terms of finance, finance, technology, and infrastructure construction. Especially in terms of financial support, in the subsidy policy for new construction and transformation of camellia oleifera forests, it is proposed that starting from 2021, new high-yield camellia oleifera forests with a contiguous area of more than 20 mu will be given a planting subsidy at the standard of not less than 800 yuan/mu in the first year. From the second year to the fifth year, the annual subsidy is 200 yuan/mu; the low-yield and low-efficiency camellia oleifera forest reclamation, replanting and transformation, the subsidy is not less than 500 yuan/mu. In the incentive policies for camellia oil companies to obtain honors and go public, it is proposed that from 2021 to 2025, a one-time reward of 500,000 yuan will be given to the newly identified or monitored and evaluated national key leading forestry enterprises in previous years; those who have won the title of Guangdong Forestry Leading Enterprise A one-time reward of not less than 100,000 yuan will be given to companies that are listed on the main board; 5 million yuan will be given to companies that plan to list on the main board and get a receipt from the securities regulatory authority; 3 million yuan will be given to enterprises that have received the trial receipt; 3 million yuan will be given to enterprises that plan to list on the Hong Kong and overseas stock exchanges and have obtained the trial receipt from the competent review department. In the science and technology support award and subsidy policy, it is proposed to focus on supporting the construction of Camellia oleifera enterprise technology centers, testing centers, etc., and provide a one-time subsidy of 800,000 yuan, 500,000 yuan and 300,000 yuan to the implementing units at the national, provincial and municipal levels respectively; For units leading or participating in the formulation of international standards, national standards and industry standards, a one-time subsidy of 500,000 yuan, 200,000 yuan and 100,000 yuan will be given respectively. Text/Photo: Nanfang Daily reporter Ma Jichi

title: 上海期货交易所关于上期标准仓单交易平台漂白硫酸盐针叶木浆品种上线有关事项的通知
text:
上海期货交易所关于上期标准仓单交易平台漂白硫酸盐针叶木浆品种上线有关事项的通知
            

上海期货交易所关于上期标准仓单交易平台漂白硫酸盐针叶木浆品种上线有关事项的通知

（上期发〔2021〕311号）




各仓单交易商、指定存管银行、指定交割仓库：

　　为确保上期标准仓单交易平台漂白硫酸盐针叶木浆品种交易上线的平稳运行，现将有关事项通知如下：


　　一、
新增交易品种

　　漂白硫酸盐针叶木浆，品种代码：SPH。
交易仓单类型

　　仓库标准仓单和厂库标准仓单。
上线时间

　　自2021年12月15日上午9点起开始交易。
交易时间

　　每周一至周五（国家法定假日除外）上午9：00-11：30，下午1：30-3：00。

　　每交易日上午10：15-10：30标准仓单交易继续进行。
交易模式

　　卖方挂牌（含定向挂牌）和买方挂牌。


　　六、
报价方式

　　全价报价和升贴水报价。

　　升贴水报价方式对应的期货挂牌合约为漂白硫酸盐针叶木浆期货全部月份合约，如2021年12月15日对应的期货挂牌合约分别为SP2112、SP2201、SP2202、SP2203、SP2204、SP2205、SP2206、SP2207、SP2208、SP2209、SP2210、SP2211等12个合约。
最小变动价位

　　2元/吨。
挂牌基准价

　　挂牌基准价由上期标准仓单交易平台在上线前一交易日公布。
最大涨跌幅度

　　最大涨跌幅度为漂白硫酸盐针叶木浆期货品种交割月份合约涨跌停板幅度的2倍。
仓单有效期

　　参与标准仓单交易的漂白硫酸盐针叶木浆标准仓单有效期须在仓单到期日（含到期日当日）内。
挂牌要求

　　仓单交易商同次挂牌多张漂白硫酸盐针叶木浆仓库标准仓单时，应当确保同次挂牌时每张标准仓单对应的品种、品级、国别、生产企业、品牌、仓库、生产/到港日期均相同；同次挂牌多张漂白硫酸盐针叶木浆厂库标准仓单时，应当确保同次挂牌时每张标准仓单对应的品种、品级、国别、厂库、生效日期均相同。
发票保证金

　　漂白硫酸盐针叶木浆品种标准仓单交易的发票保证金率为13%。
交易手续费

　　标准仓单交易暂免收取交易手续费。
仓储费和过户费

　　上期标准仓单交易平台为指定交割仓库代收并划转交易商参与标准仓单交易业务的仓储费和过户费。

　　仓储费的收取标准参照交易所漂白硫酸盐针叶木浆期货品种的仓储费相关规定。

　　标准仓单交易暂免收取过户费。
指定存管银行

　　工商银行、农业银行、建设银行、交通银行、中国银行、浦发银行、平安银行、中信银行为标准仓单交易指定存管银行。
指定交割仓库

　　上海远盛仓储有限公司等11家仓库为漂白硫酸盐针叶木浆品种标准仓单交易指定交割仓库，厦门建发纸业有限公司等4家厂库为漂白硫酸盐针叶木浆品种标准仓单交易指定交割厂库。

　　请各相关单位做好漂白硫酸盐针叶木浆品种标准仓单交易上线的各项准备工作，注意风险防范，确保市场平稳运行。

　　特此通知。

　　附件：漂白硫酸盐针叶木浆品种标准仓单交易指定交割仓库和厂库

     　　上海期货交易所
