title: 国务院医改领导小组秘书处关于新增建立健全现代医院管理制度试点医院的通知
text:
国务院医改领导小组秘书处关于新增建立健全现代医院管理制度试点医院的通知
        
        

国务院医改领导小组秘书处关于新增建立健全现代医院管理制度试点医院的通知

（国医改秘函〔2021〕66号）




各省、自治区、直辖市及新疆生产建设兵团医改牵头协调机构：

　　为贯彻落实《
国务院办公厅关于建立现代医院管理制度的指导意见
》（国办发〔2017〕67号）、《
国务院办公厅关于推动公立医院高质量发展的意见
》（国办发〔2021〕18号）和《区域医疗中心建设试点工作方案》（发改社会〔2019〕1670号）等有关文件要求，加快建立健全现代医院管理制度，决定新增首都医科大学附属北京天坛医院等14家医院（名单见附件）为建立健全现代医院管理制度试点医院。

　　各试点医院要增强使命感责任感，主动扛起试点责任，建立健全试点工作的组织领导和工作推进机制，细化实化改革任务，明确责任分工，抓好工作落实。各试点医院所在地方要加大对试点医院的支持力度，做好政策的统筹衔接和实施的具体指导，协同推进医疗、医保、医药联动改革，在重点领域和关键环节不断创新突破，为试点工作创造良好改革环境。各省份要强化对建立健全现代医院管理制度试点工作的跟踪指导，健全督促检查、评估问效机制，及时发现解决试点工作中出现的新情况、新问题，及时总结提炼试点经验，不断巩固拓展改革成效。

title: “2021·中国企业全球形象高峰论坛”在京举行
text:
据新华社北京12月6日电 （记者刘开雄）“2021·中国企业全球形象高峰论坛”6日在北京举行。本届论坛以“推进可持续发展 共建美好世界”为主题，相关部门领导、国内知名企业代表、智库专家、媒体记者近100人参与论坛活动。
    中宣部副部长张建春表示，中国企业走向海外，既是对外经济合作、实现开放共赢的市场主体，也是中华文化的生动载体。要进一步树立中国企业全球形象，展示可信、可爱、可敬的中国形象，扩大中华文化影响力和感召力，以实际行动为构建人类命运共同体作出更大贡献。
    国务院国资委副主任谭作钧认为，要讲好中国企业开拓创新、协调发展、绿色发展、开放发展、共享发展的故事，展现充满活力、和谐文明、清洁美丽、互利共赢、和合共生的中国形象，为推进可持续发展，共建美好世界作出新的更大贡献。
    全国工商联副主席李兆前提出，要把提升产品质量作为打造可持续品牌的根本，把承担社会责任作为打造可持续品牌的必要任务，把讲好中国故事作为打造可持续品牌的重要举措。
    中国外文局局长杜占元表示，围绕落实全球发展倡议和可持续发展目标，加强中国企业全球形象建设，要坚持以人为本，关注和增进各国人民福祉，主动适应变化，提升发展质量和全球竞争力，重视文化浸润，积极传递全人类共同价值。
    论坛发布了由中国外文局国际传播发展中心联合当代中国与世界研究院、凯度集团共同完成的《中国企业形象全球调查报告2021》。本次调查覆盖了美国、意大利、肯尼亚、泰国等12个国家。调查结果显示，18至35岁的青年受访者对中国经济发展为全球带来积极影响的评价最高。
en_title: "2021 China Enterprise Global Image Summit Forum" Held in Beijing
en_text: According to Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, December 6th (Reporter Liu Kaixiong) "2021 China Enterprise Global Image Summit Forum" was held in Beijing on the 6th. The theme of this forum is "Promoting Sustainable Development and Building a Better World". Nearly 100 people including leaders of relevant departments, representatives of well-known domestic enterprises, experts from think tanks and media reporters participated in the forum activities. Zhang Jianchun, Vice Minister of the Propaganda Department of the CPC Central Committee, said that Chinese enterprises going overseas are not only market players for foreign economic cooperation and openness and win-win results, but also vivid carriers of Chinese culture. It is necessary to further establish the global image of Chinese enterprises, display a credible, lovely and respectable image of China, expand the influence and appeal of Chinese culture, and make greater contributions to building a community with a shared future for mankind with practical actions. Tan Zuojun, deputy director of the State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission of the State Council, believes that it is necessary to tell the story of Chinese enterprises' pioneering and innovative, coordinated development, green development, open development, and shared development, and to present a vibrant, harmonious and civilized, clean and beautiful, mutual benefit and win-win China image, harmonious coexistence, Make new and greater contributions to promoting sustainable development and building a better world. Li Zhaoqian, vice chairman of the All-China Federation of Industry and Commerce, proposed that improving product quality should be the foundation of building a sustainable brand, taking social responsibility as a necessary task in building a sustainable brand, and taking good Chinese stories as an important measure to build a sustainable brand. Du Zhanyuan, director of the China International Publishing House, said that focusing on the implementation of global development initiatives and sustainable development goals, to strengthen the global image of Chinese enterprises, we must adhere to people-oriented, pay attention to and improve the well-being of people in all countries, actively adapt to changes, improve the quality of development and global competitiveness, and attach importance to culture. Infiltrate and actively convey the common value of all mankind. The forum released the "Global Survey Report on Chinese Corporate Image 2021", which was jointly completed by the International Communication Development Center of China International Publishing Administration, the Institute of Contemporary China and the World, and Kantar Group. The survey covered 12 countries including the United States, Italy, Kenya, and Thailand. According to the survey results, young respondents aged 18 to 35 gave the highest rating to the positive impact China's economic development has brought to the world.
